40001001	Iyake Jisas Krais orumburumbuye utuutuninji. Jisas Krais iye Deivid rumbuye, Deivid iye Eibraham rumbuye.
40001002	Eibraham nariya Aisake, Aisake nariya Jeikob, Jeikob le ŋgaŋgaŋgiya Juda na oghaghae,
40001003	Juda le ŋgaŋgaŋgiya Peres na Seal, tɨnanjiya Tama, Peres nariya Hesɨron, Hesɨron nariya Ram,
40001004	Ram nariya Aminadab, Aminadab nariya Nason, Nason nariya Salmon,
40001005	Salmon nariya Bowasa, tɨnaya Reihab, Bowasa nariya Obedi, tɨnaya Rut, Obedi nariya Jese,
40001006	Jese nariya Kiŋ Deivid. Deivid nariya Solomon, tɨnae iye Uraiya va i vaŋgukai,
40001007	Solomon nariya Rehobowam, Rehobowam nariya Abaija, Abaija nariya Asa,
40001008	Asa nariya Jehosapat, Jehosapat nariya Joram, Joram nariya Usaiya,
40001009	Usaiya nariya Jotam, Jotam nariya Eihas, Eihas nariya Hejekaiya,
40001010	Hejekaiya nariya Manase, Manase nariya Emon, Emon nariya Josaiya,
40001011	Josaiya le ŋgaŋgaŋgiya Jekonaiya na oghaghae, mbaŋaniye Babilon va thɨ mena thɨ kivwalaŋgiya Isirel na thɨ vaŋguŋgi vethiya yaku Babilon.
40001012	Va thɨ vaŋguŋgiya Isirel na vethɨ vaŋguraweŋgi Babilon na e ghereiye: Jekonaiya nariya Seyatiyel, Seyatiyel nariya Serubabol,
40001013	Serubabol nariya Abiyuda, Abiyuda nariya Ilaiyakim, Ilaiyakim nariya Eiso,
40001014	Eiso nariya Sedok, Sedok nariya Akim, Akim nariya Eliudɨ,
40001015	Eliudɨ nariya Eliyesa, Eliyesa nariya Meitan, Meitan nariya Jeikob,
40001016	na Jeikob nariya Josep Meri le ghɨmoru, iyava i ghamba Jisas, iya raŋake Mesaiya.
40001017	I mena weya Eibraham ghaghad Deivid tha theyaworo na theghevarɨ, Deivid na ghaghad va thɨ vaŋguŋgiya Isirel na thɨ raka Babilon, tha theyaworo na theghevarɨ na va e mbaŋako iyako na gheghad Mesaiya i virɨ tha theyaworo na theghevarɨ.
40001018	Jisas Krais le virɨ va ŋgora iyake. Tɨnae Meri ghaghaivaun weiye Josep, ko ma vamba thɨ ghe kaero i marabo Nyao Boboma le vurɨgheghe kaiwae.
40001019	Kaiwae Josep, Meri ghaghaivaun, iye ghathanavu va i thovuye, mava nuwaiya i vakatha na i monjina. Josep le renuwaŋa thuwele nuwaiya thɨ yawo weiye.
40001020	Ko le renuwaŋa thuweleko iyako e ghereiye Giya Loi le nyao thovuye i njawe ghenelolo e tɨne na i dagewe iŋa, “Josep, Deivid rumbuye, tha u mararu na u vaŋgwa Meri na len wevo, maraboke iyake i mena weya Nyao Boboma.
40001021	Ne i ghamba ŋgama ghɨmoru na ne u uno idae Jisas, kaiwae ne i vamoruŋgiya le gharɨgharɨ lenji tharɨ e tɨne.”
40001022	Thiyake thɨ yomara na thɨ vaemunjoruŋa ŋgoroŋga Giya Loi va i utugiya weya ghalɨŋae gharautu,
40001023	“Thɨnabwethubwethuru nevole i marabo na i ghamba ŋgama ghɨmoru na nevole thɨ rena idae Imanuwel.” Imanuwel gharumwaru “Loi iye weinda”.
40001024	Mbaŋa Josep i thuweiru, i vakatha ŋgoreiya Giya Loi le nyao thovuye me dagemawe i vaŋgwa Meri na levo.
40001025	Ko ma vamba i ndeloŋga mun weiye Meri gheghada i ghamba ŋgamako na Josep i rena idae Jisas.
40002001	Jisas va i virɨ Betɨlehem Judiya e tɨne, Herod ghambaŋa i mbaro. Jisas le virɨ e ghereiye rathimbathimba ghɨmoghɨmoru e boimako thɨ mena Jerusalem
40002002	na thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Aŋga inae Jiu lenji kiŋ amba menda i virɨke? Mendava wo vaidiya ghaghɨtara e boimako na nuwameiya wo mena wo kururuwe.”
40002003	Mbaŋa Kiŋ Herod i loŋweya utuke iyake i vakatha ghare i gaithɨ laghɨye, na Jerusalem gharayakuyakuko wolaghɨye.
40002004	Herod i kula vathavathaŋgiya ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na mbaro gharavavaghare, na i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Mesaiya, aŋga mbala i virɨ?”
40002005	Thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Betɨlehem, Judiya e tɨne, iyake kaiwae Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu va i rori:
40002006	‘Ko ghen, Betɨlehem, Judiya e thivathivaniye tɨne, u laghɨye moli, kaiwae e ghen randeviva ne i yomara, na ne i ndeviva weŋgiya lo gharɨgharɨ Isirel.’ ”
40002007	Amba Herod i kula thuweleŋgiya rathimbathimbama na thɨ niva weinji na i vaitoŋgi va thembaŋa vara ghɨtarako i yomara.
40002008	I variyeŋgi Betɨlehem na iŋa, “Hu wa na vou tamwe wagiyawe ŋgamana. Thembaŋa vou vaidi, hu mena hu giya yanawaŋgu na ghino tembe ya wa na va kururuweva.”
40002009	Mbaŋa thɨ iteta Herod ma vethɨ loŋgaloŋga na mbowo thɨ vaidiva ghɨtarama mendava thɨ vaidima e boimako, i viva e ghamwanji gheghad i mena i ndeghathɨ ŋgora ŋgamama inawe e vwatae.
40002010	Mbaŋa thɨ thuweya ghɨtarako thɨ warari laghɨye moli.
40002011	Thɨ ru e ŋgolo tɨne na thɨ vaidiya ŋgamama weiye tɨnae Meri. Thɨ ronja e ghenji vuvuye na thɨ kururuwe. Thɨ tateŋgiya lenji vethe nasiye na thɨ bigiraŋgiya lenji mwaewo, gol, preŋkinisenɨs na mer.
40002012	Vanuwovɨrɨ i mena weŋgi ghenelolo e tɨne, na thava te thɨ njogha weva Herod. Vama thɨ reŋava e kamwathɨ regha na thɨ njogha e ghambanji.
40002013	Mbaŋa vama rathimbathimbama thɨ wareri amba Giya Loi le nyao thovuye i yomara weya Josep ghenelolo e tɨne na i dagewe iŋa, “U yondo, Josep, u vaŋguŋgiya ŋgamana na tɨnae na hu vowa Ijipt. Vou yaku gheko gheghad ne ya dage weŋga amba hu njoghama, kaiwae Herod le ragagaithɨ ne thɨ tamweya ŋgamana na nuwanjiya thɨ unɨghɨ.”
40002014	Josep i thuweiru i vaŋguŋgiya ŋgamama na tɨnae gougouko iyako na thɨ wa Ijipt.
40002015	Vethɨ yaku ghaghad Herod i mare. Iyako i yomara na i vaemunjoruŋa ŋgoroŋga Giya Loi va i utugiya weya ghalɨŋae gharautu iŋa, “Ijipt e tɨne ya kularaŋgiya naruŋgu.”
40002016	Mbaŋa Herod i ghareghare rathimbathimbama thɨ yaro, ghare i gaithɨ laghɨye moli. Amba i variyeŋgiya le ragagaithɨ na thɨ gaboŋgiya gamagai ghɨmoghɨmoru Betɨlehem na ele valɨvaŋgako wolaghɨye, thiye ghanjitheghathegha umboiwo na e raberabe. Va i vakatha ŋgorako kaiwae va i gorugoru weya ŋgoroŋga rathimbathimbama lenji woraŋgiya na ghɨtarama le yomara.
40002017	Va ŋgorako na Jeremaiya le utu i tabo na emunjoru.
40002018	Iŋa: “Thɨ loŋweya ghalɨghalɨŋa regha Ramae ele valɨvaŋga, raŋivetho weiye nuwatharɨ. Reitiyel i raŋiŋgiya le ŋgaŋga, ma nuwaiya thɨ vawarariŋa kaiwae kaero thɨ mare.”
40002019	Herod va le mare e ghereiye, Giya Loi le nyao thovuye i yomarawe Josep e ghenelolo, Ijipt e tɨne,
40002020	na i dagewe iŋa, “U yondo u vaŋguŋgiya ŋgamana na tɨnae na hu wa Isirel e thivathivaniye kaiwae thiyema va thɨ mando na thɨ munjeva thɨ unɨgha ŋgamana kaero thɨ mare.”
40002021	Josep i thuweiru i vaŋguŋgiya ŋgamama na tɨnae na thɨ wa Isirel e thivathivaniye.
40002022	Ko mbaŋa Josep i loŋweya Akiulas i methɨgha ramae Herod Judiya e tɨne, i mararu na i wa gheko. Loi i dagewe e ghenelolo na thɨ wa Galili ele valɨvaŋga,
40002023	na thɨ wa na vethɨ yaku e ghemba regha idae Nasaret. Iyake i vaemunjoruŋa Loi ghalɨŋae gharautuŋgi va thɨ utuŋa: “Ne thɨŋa rara Nasaret.”
40003001	Va e mbaŋaŋgiko thiyako Jon Rabapɨtaiso i mena Judiya e njamnjamɨniye na i vavagharewe
40003002	iŋa, “Hu uturaŋgiya lemi tharɨ na hu roiteteŋgi, kaiwae Loi le ghamba mbaro ghambaŋa maiyavara.”
40003003	Jon iya utuniya Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, Aiseya va i utuŋama, iyava iŋake, “Lolo regha i kulakula e njamnjam, ‘Hu vivatha kamwathɨ Giya kaiwae; hu varumwaru kamwathɨ amalaghɨniye kaiwae na mbala i reŋawe!’ ”
40003004	Jon ghakwama va thɨ vakatha kamel vulivuliye. Mborowae gheva thetheghan njimwae na i ghanɨŋgiya bibita na ŋguyo.
40003005	Gharɨgharɨ thɨ rakamenawe, vavana thɨ rakamena Jerusalem, vavana Judiya ele valɨvaŋgako laghɨye na vavana thɨ rakamena e vanautumako laghɨye e Walaghɨta Jorɨdan ghadidiye.
40003006	Thɨ uturaŋgiya lenji tharɨ na Jon i bapɨtaisoŋgi Jorɨdan.
40003007	Ko iyemaeŋge mbaŋa i thuweŋgiya Parisi na Sadusi thɨ rakamenawe bapɨtaiso kaiwae, i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ghemi mwata raraitharɨ ghemi! Thela i dage e ghemi na hu munjeva ne hu voiteta Loi le ghatemuruko vuyowae iya i menamenako?
40003008	Hu vaemunjoruŋa e lemi vakathana kaero hu uturaŋgiya lemi tharɨ na hu roiteteŋgi.
40003009	Na thava lemi renuwaŋa hu munjeva ne hu voiteta vuyowoko iyako kaiwae huŋa, ‘Ghime rumbuma Eibraham.’ Ya dage e ghemi, Loi valɨkaiwae i mbanɨŋgiya varɨvarɨke thiyake na i vakathaŋgiya Eibraham orumburumbuye.
40003010	E mbaŋake iyake kelumo kaero ina vara e umbwaumbwa rɨgherɨghenji. Umbwa regha na regha ma i rau na thovuye ne i ikuyathu na i bigiyathu e ndɨghe une.”
40003011	“Ghino ya bapɨtaisoŋga e mbwa na i vatomwe kaero hu uturaŋgiya lemi tharɨ na hu roiteteŋgi, ko iya loloko i rereghamba e ghereiŋguke, iye ne i bapɨtaisoŋga e Nyao Boboma na e ndɨghe une. Ma elo thovuye na valɨkaiwaŋgu ne ya bigiya gheghe ghae.
40003012	Le savɨrɨ wit kaiwae kaero ina e nɨmae, ne i ghatha mbombouyeko weiye wokiwokiniyeko. Ne i mbana mbombouyeko na i vathe e ghaŋgolo na wokiwokiniyeko i ŋambu e ndɨgheko iya ma mbaŋa regha ne i mareko.”
40003013	E mbaŋako iyako e tɨne Jisas i ri Galili na i wa Jorɨdan, na i bapɨtaiso weya Jon.
40003014	Jon i munjeva ne i vɨva Jisas le renuwaŋa, i dagewe, iŋa, “Ghen eŋge mbala u bapɨtaisoŋgo, na ghen mo menava e ghino?”
40003015	Ko Jisas i gonjoghawe, iŋa, “Mbowo ŋgoreiyako e mbaŋake iyake, kaiwae e kamwathɨke iyake ne ra vakatha Loi le renuwaŋa thovuye.” Jon i wovathovuthovuyeŋa.
40003016	Mbaŋa i bapɨtaisovao na i voro e mbwako ghadidiye, e mbaŋako iyako buruburu i mavu na i thuweya Nyao Boboma i njamawe ŋgoreiya bunebune.
40003017	Amba ghalɨghalɨŋa i mena e buruburu iŋa, “Loloke iyake naruŋgu moli gharegharethovuniye. I vakathaŋgo ya warari laghɨye moli.”
40004001	Amba Nyao Boboma i yo vaŋgwa Jisas e njamnjam vurɨvurɨ vwatavwata na Seitan ve vatanathethaŋa.
40004002	Na kaiwae vama gheneyevarɨ ve yaku e njamnjam na ve mbeya ghanɨŋga naŋgo kaiwae, ko e mbaŋako iyako amba bada i gharɨ.
40004003	Amba ratanathethama i menawe na i dagewe iŋa, “Thoŋgo Loi Nariya ghen, u ŋaerambeŋgiya varɨvarɨke thiyake thɨ gharavɨ na bred.”
40004004	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Buk Boboma iŋa, ‘Ma mbene bred eŋge i ndewo lolo yawaliye, ko iyemaeŋge budakaiya Loi i utuŋa iye i ndewo lolo yawaliye.’ ”
40004005	Amba Seitan i yovaŋgu Jerusalem, i vaŋgurawe vara e Ŋgolo Boboma vwatae yavoro moli,
40004006	na i dagewe iŋa, “Thoŋgo Loi Nariya ghen, u pito ghena, kaiwae Buk Boboma iŋa, “ ‘Loi ne i variyeŋgiya le nyao thovuthovuye kaiwan, na thɨ njimbukiki wagiyaweŋge, ne thɨ mwanavairɨŋge e nɨmanji, mbala ma vo ŋge gheghen e varɨ.’ ”
40004007	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Buk Boboma tembe iŋava, ‘Tha lolo regha i mando na i woraweya Giya le Loi mando e tɨne.’ ”
40004008	Seitan mbowo i yovaŋguva na ve vaŋgurawe e ou vwatae yavoro moli, na i vatomwe weya ghamba mbaroke wolaghɨye e yambaneke, lenji laghɨlaghɨye na lenji thovuye.
40004009	I dagewe iŋa, “Iya vara ghamba mbaroko wolaghɨye thiyako ne ya vatomwe e ghen thoŋgo u ronja na u kururu e ghino.”
40004010	Amba Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “U wa Seitan! Buk Boboma iŋa, ‘U kururu weya Giya len Loi ghamberegha na ghamberegha moli u ghambu!’ ”
40004011	Amba Seitan i itete na nyao thovuthovuye thɨ mena thɨ giya thalavuwe.
40004012	Mbaŋa Jisas i loŋwe Jon utuniye kaero ina e thiyo, i njogha Galili,
40004013	na i iteta Nasaret i wa ve yaku Kapenaom. Ghembake iyake ina Galili Njighɨniye ghadidiye, uu Sebulon na Napɨtalai e lenji valɨvaŋga.
40004014	Va i vakatha ŋgoraiyako na i vaemunjoruŋa ŋgoroŋga Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, Aiseya, ghalɨŋae iya iŋake,
40004015	“Uu Sebulon na Napɨtalai e lenji valɨvaŋga tɨne, valɨvaŋgako iya kamwathɨko i wa e njighɨko, e valɨvaŋga Walaghɨta Jorɨdan i vorovoro e tɨne, na Galili e tɨne, thiye ma Jiu thiya yakuwe:
40004016	gharɨgharɨko iya thiya yaku e momouwoko va thɨ thuweya manjamanjala laghɨye, thiye thiya yaku mare e momouwowae tɨne manjamanjala ne i woya weŋgi.”
40004017	Mbaŋaniye Jisas i woraweya le vavaghare rɨghe, i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Hu uturaŋgiya lemi tharɨ na hu roitete, kaiwae Loi le ghamba mbaro maiyavara!”
40004018	Mbaŋa Jisas i ŋgalai Galili Njighɨniye ghadidiye, i vaidiŋgiya raiwo na ghaghae, Saimon idae regha Pita na ghaghae Endru, thɨ duda ghina kaiwae thiye raboroborogi.
40004019	I dage weŋgi iŋa, “Hu mena hu ghambuŋgo na ya vavaghareŋga ghemi gharɨgharɨ ghanjirakosi.”
40004020	E mbaŋako iyako thɨ iteteŋgiya lenji ghina na thɨ ghambu.
40004021	I loŋga ghaova seiwo, mbowo i vaidiŋgiva raiwo na ghaghae, Jemes Sebedi nariye na ghaghae Jon, inanji e waŋga weinji ramanji Sebedi, thɨ vavanamweŋgiya lenji ghina. Jisas i kula weŋgi,
40004022	na e mbaŋako iyako thɨ iteta waŋga na ramanji Sebedi, na thɨ ghambu.
40004023	Jisas i vaghɨliya Galili laghɨyeko, i vavaghare e ŋgolo kururu tɨnenji, i utuŋa Toto Thovuye Loi le ghamba mbaro utuniye na i thawariŋgiya tomethi gida na ghambwera weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ.
40004024	Toto amalaghɨniye utuutuniye i lalo Siriya laghɨyeko na gharɨgharɨ thɨ bigimena weya Jisas gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye tomethi ghanjighambwera, thiye thɨ ghataŋa vɨrɨ laghɨye, thavala nyao raraitharɨ ina weŋgi, thavala thɨ vaidiya vuyowo ŋgoreiya riwanji i gheroro na kuvokuvoŋgi, na i thawariŋgi.
40004025	Iya kaiwae wabwi laghɨlaghɨye thɨ rakambele. Vavana thɨ rakamena Galili na e Ghembaghemba Ghembayaworo, vavana Jerusalem, vavana Judiya na vavana thɨ rakamena Jorɨdan valɨvaŋga i vorovoro.
40005001	Jisas va i thuweŋgiya wabwi laghɨye amba i voro e bobokulu regha, na mbaŋa i ronja gharaghambu thɨ rakamenawe na thɨ meghɨliŋa.
40005002	Amba i vavaghare weŋgiya wabwiko laghɨye, iŋa:
40005003	“Loi ghare weŋgiya thavala mbinyembinyeŋgu e unenji tɨne, kaiwae le ghamba mbaro kaero ina weŋgi.”
40005004	“Loi ghare weŋgiya thavala thɨ numotharɨ, kaiwae ne i gogonja nuwanji.”
40005005	“Loi ghare weŋgiya thavala thɨ gharenja, kaiwae ne i wogiya yambaneke laghɨye weŋgi.”
40005006	“Loi ghare weŋgiya thavala e yawalinjiko thɨ badaŋa laghɨye na thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiya Loi le renuwaŋa, kaiwae Loi ne i vatabo na i vamboromboro laghɨye moli weŋgi.”
40005007	“Loi ghare weŋgiya thavala thɨ gharevɨrɨ gharɨgharɨ vavana kaiwanji, kaiwae ne i gharevɨrɨ weŋgi.”
40005008	“Loi ghare weŋgiya thavala gharenjiko laghɨye i thɨna, kaiwae ne thɨ thuweya Loi.”
40005009	“Loi ghare weŋgiya thavala thɨ vevakathaŋa gharemalɨlɨ weŋgi, kaiwae ne iŋa thiye le ŋgaŋga.”
40005010	“Loi ghare weŋgiya thavala thɨ vaidiya vuyowo weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ kaiwae ghanjithanavu i rumwaru, kaiwae Loi le ghamba mbaro kaero ina weŋgi.”
40005011	“Ghareŋgu weŋga ghemi mbaŋa gharɨgharɨ ne thɨ goviya ghamwami, mbaŋa thɨ vakatha vuyowo weŋga, na mbaŋa thɨ utu kwanɨkwan kaiwami kaiwae hu ghambuŋgo.
40005012	Mbe hu warari na nuwami i loghe kaiwae modami laghɨye mbe ina e buruburu. Kaiwae ghalɨŋaŋgu gharautuŋgi me vivako vambe thɨ vakathava vuyowo ŋgoranjiŋgiya thiyako weŋgi.”
40005013	“Ghemi ghamithanavu e yambaneke ŋgoreiya njighɨ le kaiwo. Iya kaiwae thoŋgo njighɨ le vurɨgheghe iko na ma ma e ghamɨghamɨnae, ma te kamwathɨ reghava na valɨkaiwae ra vakatha na ghamɨnaeko i njogha. Kaero i tharɨ na ma ma e ghathovuye, ra wokiyathu gharɨgharɨ thɨ vurɨghɨya.”
40005014	“Ghemi yambaneke ghamanjamanjala. Thoŋgo thɨ vakatha ghemba regha e ou vwatae gharɨgharɨke taulaghɨ ne thɨ thuwe.
40005015	Ma mbaŋa regha lolo i rɨmba lemp na i wo uye na i woyabowe, ko ne i thɨnɨrawe e tebol vwatae na i vamanjamanjalaŋaŋgiya gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye e ŋgoloko tɨne.
40005016	Ghemi tembe ŋgoreiyeva, lemi manjamanjalana i woya weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ mbala thɨ thuweya lemi vakatha na thovuye na thɨ taraweŋa Ramami iye ina e buruburu.”
40005017	“Thava lemi renuwaŋa huŋava ya mena na ya rakayathu Mosese le mbaro na Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu lenji vavaghare. Ma ya mena rakayathu kaiwae, ya mena na ya vaemunjoruŋaŋgi.
40005018	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, gheghada buruburu na yambaneke ne thɨko, mane utu nasiye regha ina e Mbaroko tɨne ne iko gheghada wolaghɨyeko thɨ tabo na emunjoru.
40005019	Thoŋgo lolo regha i raka mbaroŋgike thiyake na iŋa ma e ghanjithovuye, othembe mbaro nasiye regha ina e mbaroŋgike tɨnenji, na i vaghareŋgiya ghaune vavana na thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiye, iye ne i roreghamba moli Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne. Ko thela i ghambugha mbaro na i vaghareŋgiya gharɨgharɨ na thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiye, iye ne i roviva Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne.
40005020	Iya kaiwae, ya dage e ghemi, ghamithanavuna iya hu ghambugha Loi le mbarona thoŋgo ma i kivwalaŋgiya Mbaro gharavavaghare na Parisi, ma valɨkaiwami ne hu ru Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne.”
40005021	“Kaero hu ghareghare Mosese le mbaro va i mena weŋgiya orumburumbumi, iya iŋake, ‘Tha u gabo. Thela i gabo ne i vaidiya vuyowae.’
40005022	Ko ghino ya dage e ghemi, thela ghare i gaithɨwana ghaghae ne i vaidiya vuyowae, thela i utuvatharɨ ghaghae kaiwae ne ve kot Jiu e lenji mbaro laghɨye na thela ne iŋa, ‘Kabaleya ghen!’ valɨkaiwae ne vo nda e ndɨghe Gehena.”
40005023	“Iya kaiwae thoŋgo u womena len mwaewo e ŋgolo boboma tɨne vowo kaiwae weya Loi, na amba u renuwaŋa vaidiya ghagha ghare va i gaithɨ wanaŋge bigi regha kaiwae,
40005024	u iteta len mwaewona e ghamba vowona ghadidiye na wo u njogha na vou vakatha na namoghamwami wein, amba u njogha na vo giya len mwaewona weya Loi.”
40005025	“Thoŋgo lolo regha i wonjoweŋge bigi regha kaiwae na i yovaŋguŋge na vo kot, u yoruku na u vanamwe wonjoweko iyako wein amba muyai vou vutha e ghamba kot. Thoŋgo nandere, ne i yovaŋguŋge na ve vaŋguraweŋge kot gharavakatha e marae na iye i vaŋgugiyaŋge weya thiyo gharanjimbunjimbu na ve vaŋguruwoŋge e thiyo.
40005026	Ya dage emunjoru e ghen, mane u raŋgi ghaghada ne u vamodovao ghanɨghagako iyako.”
40005027	“Kaero hu ghareghare Mosese le mbaro iŋa ŋgoraiyake, ‘Tha u yathima wein lolo regha levo.’
40005028	Ko ghino ya dage e ghemi, thoŋgo thela i thuweya wevo regha na nuwaeko nuwaiya moli, iyako ŋgoreiya kaero i yathima weiye ele renuwaŋako tɨne.
40005029	Thoŋgo maranɨna iya e unena i vakathaŋge na u vakatha tharɨ u vovavuthuyathu. I thovuye eŋge u wokiyathu riwana ŋginauye regha na thava ne thɨ wokiyathu riwana laghɨye Gehena.
40005030	Tembe ŋgoreiyeva, thoŋgo nɨmanɨna iya unena i vakathaŋge na u vakatha tharɨ, u kitenɨyathu. I thovuye moliya u kitenɨyathu riwana ŋginauye regha na thava ne thɨ wokiyathu riwana laghɨye Gehena.”
40005031	“Mosese le mbaro iŋa, ‘Thela thoŋgo nuwaiya i botewo levo, wo i rorinjoŋa le botewoko utuutuniye e peipa na i ligiya weya wevoko.’
40005032	Ko ghino ya dage e ghemi, thoŋgo lolo regha i yawo weiye levo, othembe wevoko ma i yathima, thoŋgo wevo i gheva, loloko le tharɨ kaiwae wevoko i tabo na rayathiyathima. Tembe ŋgoreiyeva, the loloko iya i vaŋguko wevoko iye tembe i yathimava.”
40005033	“Tembe hu ghareghareva Mosese le mbaro va thɨ utugiya weŋgiya orumburumbumi, iya iŋake, ‘Tha u raka len tholona. U vakatha ŋgoreiya len dagerawe weya Loi.’
40005034	Ko ghino ya dage e ghemi, tha mbaŋa regha u tholo na u uno buruburu idae kaiwae Loi le ghamba yaku iyako.
40005035	Thava u uno yambaneke, kaiwae gheghe ghaghambalirawe iyako. Thava u uno Jerusalem, kaiwae Kiŋ laghɨye le ghamba yaku iyako,
40005036	na thava u tholo e umbalɨna, kaiwae ma valɨkaiwan ne uŋa na umbalɨna ndamwandamwa yaŋgara i kaleva na uŋana yaŋgara i bwedi.
40005037	Ma huŋaeŋge, ‘Ŋgoreiye’ o ‘Nandere.’ Thoŋgo hu guva utu regha iyana i mena weya Seitan.”
40005038	“Kaero hu ghareghare Mosese le mbaro iŋa ŋgoreiyake, ‘Thoŋgo lolo regha i vakowana gheu regha marae voghɨra, modae tembe thɨ vakowanava amalaghɨniye marae voghɨra. Thoŋgo i tagabeba gheuko ŋiŋiye regha modae tembe thɨ tagabebeva ŋiŋiye regha.’
40005039	Ko ghino ya dage e ghemi, thoŋgo lolo regha i vakatha vatharɨ e ghen, thava u lithɨ. Thoŋgo lolo regha i tagaleva galagalanɨna iya e unena, u vatomwe weya valɨgalagalanɨna tembe i tagalevava.
40005040	Na tembe ŋgoreiyeva, thoŋgo lolo regha i vaŋguraweŋge e kot na i munjeva i vakathaŋge na u ligiya weya ghanɨkwamana iya riwana ghayaboyabo, tembe u ligiyaweva ghanɨkwamana ghayaboyabo.
40005041	Thoŋgo ragagaithɨ regha i vavurɨghegheŋaŋge na u bigiya ghabigi le bwagabwaga ŋgoreiye mael regha, u bigi na ma u waova na vewo mael theghewo.
40005042	U wogiya weya lolo regha thebigiya nuwaiya e ghen, na thoŋgo lolo regha i naŋgoya bigi regha e ghen na i vakaiwoŋa thava u vagharegharewe.”
40005043	“Kaero hu ghareghare Mosese le mbaro iŋa ŋgoreiyake, ‘U gharethovu weŋgiya ghanune, u botewo moliŋgiya ghanɨthɨghɨya.’
40005044	Ko ghino ya dage e ghemi, hu gharethovu weŋgiya ghamithɨghɨya na thavala thɨ vakatha vuyowo weŋga hu naŋgo kaiwanji,
40005045	mbala gharɨgharɨ thɨ ghareghare ghemi Loi ina e buruburu le ŋgamaŋgama ghemi. Kaiwae i vakatha varae na i mbɨle weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ thovuthovuye na gharɨgharɨ raraitharɨ, na i vakatha uye i nja weŋgiya thavala ghanjithanavu i rumwaru na thavala ghanjithanavu i tharɨ.
40005046	Buda kaiwae Loi ne i giya modami thoŋgo mbe hu gharethovu weŋgi eŋge thavala thɨ gharethovu weŋga? Takis gharamban tembe thɨ vakathava ŋgoreiyako othembe thiye ma gharɨgharɨ thovuthovuyaŋgi.
40005047	Thoŋgo mbe hu gharethovu weŋgi eŋge lemi bodaboda, lemi vakathana ma i kivwala gharɨgharɨke taulaghɨ lenji vakatha. Thavala ma thɨ loŋweghathɨ tembe thɨ vakavakathava iyako.
40005048	Ghemi ghamithanavuna wolaghɨye i thovuye ŋgoreiya Ramami e buruburu ghathanavu i thovuye moli.”
40006001	“Tha mbaŋa regha hu vakatha vakatha thovuye regha gharɨgharɨ e maranji na huŋava mbala thɨ thuweya lemi vakathana. Thoŋgo hu vakatha ŋgoreiyako, mane hu vaidi modami thovuye weya Ramami e buruburu.”
40006002	“Iya kaiwae, mbaŋa ne u giya bigi regha weŋgiya mbinyembinyeŋgu, tha u ghavwareyathu ŋgoreiye rakwan lenji vakatha e ŋgolo kururu tɨne na e kamwathɨŋgiko kaiwae nuwanjiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ taraweŋgi. Ya dage emunjoru e ghen, kaero thɨ mbanɨvao modanji.
40006003	Ko mbaŋa ne u giya bigi regha weŋgiya mbinyembinyeŋgu, thava nɨmanɨna iya moina i ghareghareya nɨmanɨna iya unena le vakatha,
40006004	mbala ma lolo regha i ghareghare mo wogiya budakai. Rama e buruburu iye i thuweya iya len vakatha thuwelena, na iye ne i giya modan.”
40006005	“Mbaŋa hu naŋgo thava ŋgoreiya rakwan lenji vakatha. Thiye nuwanjiya thɨ ndeghathɨ na thɨ naŋgo e ŋgolo kururu na e kamwathɨ ghavwaghavwalaŋgi, kaiwae nuwanjiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ thuweŋgi. Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, kaero thɨ mbanɨvao modanji.
40006006	Ko mbaŋa u naŋgo, u ru e woluwolu tɨne, u kiya thɨnɨmba na u naŋgo weya Rama, iye ma ra thuwe. Rama e buruburu iye i thuwevao thebigiya u vakatha thuwelena ne i giya modan.”
40006007	“Mbaŋa ne hu naŋgo, tha mbema hu vara dagedage eŋge na hu govɨgova dage ma e ghanjirumwaru ŋgoreiya thavala ma thɨ loŋweghathɨgha Loi lenji vakatha. Thiye thɨ munjeva Loi ne i loŋweya lenji naŋgoko na i vakatha ŋgoreiye kaiwae lenji naŋgoko i molao.
40006008	Tha hu vakatha ŋgoraiyako, kaiwae thebigiya nuwamiya Ramami Loi kaero i ghareghare amba muyai hu naŋgowe.
40006009	Mbala hu naŋgo na ŋgora iyake: ‘Ramame e buruburu, wo yavwatatawana idan boboma,
40006010	len ghamba mbarona i mena weime, len renuwaŋana wo vakatha e yambaneke ŋgoreiya thɨ vakavakatha e buruburu.
40006011	U giya weime noroke ghanɨŋganiye.
40006012	U numotenɨŋgiya lama tharɨ, ŋgoreiya ghime kaero wo numoyathuŋgiya gharɨgharɨ lenji tharɨ weime.
40006013	Tha u vakathaime na wo ru tanathetha e tɨne, ko u vamoruime eŋge tharɨ e tɨne. Kaiwae ghen rambarombaro, ghen u vurɨgheghe na ghen giya laghɨye, mbaŋake wolaghɨye ma ele ghambako. Mbwana! Ŋgoreiye!’ ”
40006014	“Kaiwae thoŋgo hu numoyathuŋgiya gharɨgharɨ lenji tharɨ weŋga, ambane Ramami e buruburu i numotenɨŋgiya lemi tharɨ.
40006015	Ko thoŋgo ma hu numoyathuŋgiya gharɨgharɨ lenji tharɨ, Ramami tembe ŋgoreiyeva, mane i numotenɨŋgiya lemi tharɨ.”
40006016	“Mbaŋa ne hu mbeya ghanɨŋga naŋgo kaiwae, tha ghamiyamoyamo i nuwanuwatharɨ, ŋgoreiya rakwan lenji vakatha. Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, kaero thɨ mbanɨvao modanji.
40006017	Mbaŋa ne u mbeya ghanɨŋga naŋgo kaiwae, u thavwiya ghamwan na u woraweya bunama e umbalɨn,
40006018	mbala gharɨgharɨ ma thɨ ghareghare u mbeya ghanɨŋga, ko mbe Rama eŋge e buruburu ghamberegha, iye i rothuwele, iye i thuwevao bigi regha na regha u vakatha thuwele, ne i giya modan.”
40006019	“Tha hu mbanɨvathavatha bigibigi kaiwami e yambaneke, thaŋge ne i thɨnɨten na i vwatha, na rakaivɨ ne thɨ ru na thɨ kaivɨ.
40006020	Ko iyemaeŋge hu mbanɨvathavatha gogomwau kaiwami e buruburu, kaiwae thaŋge mane i thɨnɨten na i vwatha, na rakaivɨ mane thɨ ru na thɨ kaivɨ.
40006021	Kaiwae the bigithan i laghɨye e ghen, gharena tembe inaweva.
40006022	“Marandake ŋgora manjamanjala riwandake kaiwae. Thoŋgo maramaramina thɨ thovuye riwamina laghɨye tembe ŋgoreiyeva manjamanjala i riyevanjara.
40006023	Ko thoŋgo thɨ tharɨ, riwamina tembe ŋgoreiyeva, momouwo i riyevanjara. Thoŋgo manjamanjalana e gharemina i momouwo, o ma momouwo, i laghɨye yo!”
40006024	“Ma valɨkaiwae lolo regha ne i tabo na rakakaiwo weŋgiya giyagiya theghewo. Thoŋgo valɨkaiwae, ne i gharethovu weya regha na i botewoyathu reghava, o i botewoyathu regha na i gharethovu reghava. Tembe ŋgoreiyeva ma mbaŋara vara u kaiwo weŋgiya Loi na mani.”
40006025	“Iya kaiwae ya dage e ghemi, tha hu rerenuwaŋa budakai ne hu ghan o hu mun na i tubwe yawalimi. Tha hu rerenuwaŋa kwama kaiwae ne hu njimbo na i vakatha riwamina i dayagha. Yawalɨ gharerenuwaŋa i laghɨye kivwala ghanɨŋga na riwandake gharerenuwaŋa i laghɨye kivwala kwama, ŋgoreiye ae?
40006026	Wo hu rerenuwaŋa ma kaiwanji. Ma thɨ kaiwo, ma thɨ uloulo na ma thɨ vathe; ko iyemaeŋge Loi Rama e buruburu i njimbukikiŋgi. Ghemi hu laghɨye kivwalaŋgiya ma ae?
40006027	Ghemi ma regha valɨkaiwae ne i rerenuwaŋa na seiwova i vakatha yawaliyeko na molao.”
40006028	“Na buda kaiwae hu rerenuwaŋa kwama kaiwae? Wo hu thuweya jin inanji e njamnjam, ma thɨ kaiwo na ma thɨ ŋgiya ghanjikwama.
40006029	Ko ya dage e ghemi, othembe Kiŋ Solomon, le bigibigi va i ghanagha moli, ghakwamakwama thovuthovuye moli, mava ghanjiyamoyamo ŋgoreiye vara jinɨke thiyake regha.
40006030	Loi i vanjimboŋgiya nana ŋgoreiyako, na nanako iyako noroke i mbuthumbuthu, ko evole i mare na thɨ ŋambu e ndɨghe une. Iya kaiwae hu ghareghare wagiyawe iye ne i vanjimboŋga. Ghemi lemi loŋweghathɨ nasiye moli.
40006031	Iya kaiwae tha hu rerenuwaŋa na huŋa, ‘Ne wo ghana budakai?’ o ‘Ne wo muna budakai?’ o ‘Ne wo njimbo budakai?’
40006032	Thavala ma thɨ loŋweghathɨ thɨ tamweŋgiya bigibigi ŋgoranjiyako, ko iyemaeŋge Ramami e buruburu kaero i ghareghare ghemi nuwamiya bigibigiko thiyako.
40006033	Ko wo hu tamwekaiya Loi le ghamba mbaro na hu vakatha ŋgoreiya le renuwaŋa, amba ne i giyava e ghemi iya bigibigiko wolaghɨye.
40006034	Iya kaiwae tha hu rerenuwaŋa evole kaiwae, kaiwae budakai ne i yomara weŋga evole, evole mbe kaiwae. Mbaŋa regha na regha mbe ghavuyowo. Thava te hu vatabova vuyowoko iyako.”
40007001	“Tha hu wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋgiya ghamune, ne iwaeŋge Loi i wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋga.
40007002	Loi le wovatharɨtharɨ weŋga ne i mboromboro weiye lemi wovatharɨtharɨ weŋgiya ghamunena. Lemi vakathako gharɨgharɨ weŋgi tembene i vakathava ŋgoreiye weŋga.
40007003	“Buda kaiwae u thuweya ŋuthuŋuthuna ghanuna e marae, ko iyemaeŋge ma u thuweya umbwana laghɨye iya ghen e maranɨna?
40007004	Thoŋgo umbwa laghɨye ina e maranɨna, ŋgoroŋgaeŋge na u dage weya ghanuna, ‘Ne ya woraŋgiya ŋuthuŋuthuna e maranɨna?’
40007005	Taukwana ghen! I viva wo u woraŋgiya umbwana ghen e maranɨna na maranɨna i manjamanjala amba valɨkaiwae ne u woraŋgiya ŋuthuŋuthuna ghanuna e marae.”
40007006	“Tha hu giya bigi boboma weŋgiya mbughambugha, ne iwaeŋge thɨ ndevɨ na thɨ gharɨŋga. Tha hu wokiyathu lemi bigi thovuye mbombo e ghamwanji, ne thɨ vurɨghɨya.”
40007007	“Hu naŋgo weya Loi na i giya weŋga; hu tamwe na hu vaidi; hu dɨghɨdɨghɨ na thɨnɨmba i vu weŋga.
40007008	Kaiwae thela thoŋgo i naŋgowe ne i wo, thela thoŋgo i tamwe ne i vaidi, na thela thoŋgo i dɨghɨdɨghɨ thɨnɨmba ne i mavuwe.”
40007009	“Ŋgoroŋga, thoŋgo ghemina regha nariye i naŋgo ghanɨŋgawe, ne i wogiya varɨwe?
40007010	O thoŋgo i naŋgo weya borogi, ne i giya mwatawe?
40007011	Othembe gharɨgharɨ raraithara ghemi, ko iyemaeŋge mbaŋake wolaghɨye hu giyagiya bigibigi thovuthovuye weŋgiya lemi ŋgaŋga. Iya kaiwae ra ghareghare wagiyawe, Ramanda e buruburu i giya bigibigi thovuthovuye weŋgiya thavala thɨ naŋgowe.”
40007012	“Budakaiya nuwamiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ vakatha e ghemi, hu vakathava weŋgi kaiwae Mosese le mbaro na Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu lenji vavaghare ŋgoreiya iyako.”
40007013	“Hu ru e ghamba runa iya i mbɨmbɨthana, kaiwae Gehena ghaghamba ru i magaga na ghakamwathɨ i laghɨye, na gharɨgharɨ lemoyo thɨ rakareŋawe.
40007014	Ko yawalɨ ghaghamba ru i mbɨmbɨtha na kamwathɨniye nasiye na thegheviye eŋge thɨ vaidi.”
40007015	“Hu njimbukikiŋga, gharɨgharɨ vavana ne thɨ utu kwanɨkwan, ne thɨŋava thiye Loi ghalɨŋae gharautuŋgi. Ghanjiyamoyamo ne ŋgoreiya sip udauda, ko iyemaeŋge e gharenjiko ŋgoreiya mbugha njamnjam.
40007016	Une tene hu thuweya ve raŋgi e lenji vakathako. Waen une mane vo vu e tatata tɨnetɨne, ae? Kopi une mane vo vu e kavwala, ae?
40007017	Tembe ŋgoreiyeva, umbwa thovuye ne i rau ne une thovuye na umbwa raitharɨ i rau ne une raitharɨ.
40007018	Umbwa thovuye ma valɨkaiwae une i tharɨ na umbwa raitharɨ ma valɨkaiwae une i thovuye.
40007019	The umbwa i rau na une ma i thovuye, thɨ kitenɨyathu na thɨ bigiŋambu e ndɨghe une.
40007020	Ambane hu ghareghareŋgi e lenji vakathaŋgi.”
40007021	“Ma gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye iya thɨ dageke e ghino, ‘Giya, Giya,’ ne thɨ rakaruvao Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne, ko thela i vakatha ŋgoreiya Bwebwe e buruburu le renuwaŋa iye ne ve ru.
40007022	Mbaŋa ele ghambako gharɨgharɨ lemoyo ne thɨŋa ‘Giya, Giya, e idan wo utuŋa Loi ghalɨŋae, e idan woŋa na nyao raraitharɨ thɨ rakaraŋgi na e idan wo vakathaŋgiya vakatha ghamba rotaele laghɨlaghɨye.’
40007023	Amba ne ya dage weŋgi, ‘Ma ya ghareghareŋga. Hu roiteteŋgo, ghemi tharɨ gharavakatha.’ ”
40007024	“Iya kaiwae thela i loŋweya lo utuke na i vakatha ŋgoreiye, iye ŋgoreiya amalama le renuwaŋama va i thovuye na i vatada le ŋgoloma e varɨ vwatae.
40007025	Uyevwelaghɨ i nja, ŋgonuŋgo i voru na ndewendewe i rowo vurɨgheghe e ŋgoloko iyako, ko iyemaeŋge mava i mambun kaiwae va i vatad e varɨ vwatae.
40007026	Ko thela i loŋweya lo utuke na ma i vakatha ŋgoreiye, iye ŋgoreiya amalama le renuwaŋama mava i thovuye na i vatada le ŋgoloma e kerakera vwatae.
40007027	Uyevwelaghɨ i nja, ŋgonuŋgo i voru na ndewendewe i rowo vurɨgheghe e ŋgoloko iyako, i mambun na laiye laghɨye moli.”
40007028	Mbaŋa Jisas i utuvao utuutuke thiyake, le vavaghareko kaiwae i wo gharɨgharɨ nuwanji.
40007029	Le vavaghare ma ŋgoreiya mbaro gharavavaghare, kaiwae i vavaghare weiye mbaro.
40008001	Mbaŋa Jisas i njama e ouko ghadidiye, wabwi laghɨye thɨ rakambele.
40008002	Amala i ghataŋa lepelo i mena na i ronja e gheghe vuvuye Jisas e ghamwae na iŋa, “Giyana, thoŋgo nuwaniya, u vakathaŋgo na ya thovuye.”
40008003	Jisas i livamomoya nɨmae na i vɨghathɨgha amalama amba iŋa, “Nuwaŋguke nuwaiya, riwana i thovuye!” E mbaŋako iyako lepeloma iko.
40008004	Jisas i dagewe, “Wo u vandeŋeŋgo! Ne u ndeutuŋa iyake weya lolo regha. U wawe vara ravowovowo na ve thuweŋge. U bigiya ma manyiwo na vo vowo weya Loi ŋgoreiya Mosese le mbaro na gharɨgharɨ thɨ ghareghare emunjoru riwana kaero i thovuye.”
40008005	Mbaŋa Jisas i ru Kapenaom, Rom lenji ragagaithɨ gharandeviva i mena weya Jisas na i naŋgowe thalavu kaiwae.
40008006	Iŋa, “Amalana, lo rakakaiwo i ghambwera, mbe ina e ŋgolo i ghenaghena. Riwaeko i kuvokuvo na i vɨrɨ laghɨye.”
40008007	Jisas i dagewe, “Ra wao na va thawari.”
40008008	Ragagaithɨma lenji randeviva i gonjoghawe, iŋa, “Thava, Amalana. Ma elo thovuye ya vaŋguŋge na u mena elo ŋgolo. Mbema uŋaeŋge na lo rakakaiwoko kaero riwae i thovuye.
40008009	Ya ghareghare ghen valɨkaiwan kaiwae ya yaku randeviva laghɨlaghɨye e lenji mbaro tɨne na ghino ragagaithɨ mbe inanjiva e raberabeŋgu. Thoŋgo ya dage weya regha, ‘U wa,’ ne i wa, na ya dage weya regha, ‘U mena,’ ne i mena, na thoŋgo ya dage weya lo rakakaiwoko, ‘U vakatha iyake,’ ne i vakatha.”
40008010	Mbaŋa Jisas i loŋweya iyake, ghare i yo na i dage weŋgiya thiyeko thɨ rereghambakowe, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ma ya ndevaidi mun lolo regha le loŋweghathɨ le laghɨlaghɨye ŋgoraiyake Isirel gharɨgharɨniye e tɨnenji.
40008011	Ya dage e ghemi, thɨ ghanagha ne thɨ mena yavorowoko na bodeoko weinjiyaŋgiya Eibraham, Aisake na Jeikob, thiya yaku e lenji ghamba yaku Loi ele thaga, ele ghamba mbaro tɨne.
40008012	Ko Isirel gharɨgharɨniye lemoyo, thiye Loi va i vivathaŋa le ghamba mbaro kaiwanji, ne thɨ bigiyathu raŋgiyaŋgi eto e momouwoko na thɨ randa na thɨ rɨghɨmbiya ŋiŋinji.”
40008013	Amba Jisas i dage weya ragagaithɨma lenji randeviva, iŋa, “U njogha! Ne ŋgoreiya iya len loŋweghathɨna.” E mbaŋako iyako le rakakaiwoma riwae i thovuye.
40008014	Mbaŋa Jisas i ru Pita ele ŋgolo, i vaidiya Pita mboriyae i ghambwera na mbe ina vara e ghambae riwae i dayagha na i ghena.
40008015	I vɨghathɨgha nɨmae na dayaghama ikowe, amba i thuweiru na i vaŋamweŋgi.
40008016	Varae vama ve ronja amba thɨ bigimenaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ lemoyo nyao raraitharɨ va inanji weŋgi weya Jisas. Vambema i dage eŋge nyaoko raraitharɨ kaero thɨ rakaraŋgi na i thawariŋgiya ghambweghambwera.
40008017	I vakatha ŋgoraiyako na i vaemunjoruŋa ŋgoroŋga Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, Aiseya le utu, iya iŋake, “Iye i vaŋguraŋgiyainda ghambwera e tɨne na i woraŋgiya ghandagida.”
40008018	Mbaŋa i thuweya wabwi laghɨye thɨ meghɨliŋa, i dage weŋgiya gharaghambu na thɨ womalawa e valɨvaŋga regha.
40008019	Mbaro gharavavaghare regha i menawe na i dagewe, iŋa, “Ravavaghare, aŋga ne u reŋa mbene ya ghambuŋge vara.”
40008020	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Mbugha lavalavarɨ mbe e lenji goga, na ma mbe e unyiunyinji. Ko Lolo Nariye ma e ghambaghambae na ne i vatowoŋa riwaewe.”
40008021	Lolo reghava, iye Jisas gharaghambu regha, i dage weya Jisas iŋa, “Giyana, wo u vatomweŋgo na va beku bwebwe.”
40008022	Jisas i gonjoghawe, “U ghambuŋgo. Ramaremare tembe thɨ bekuŋgiya lenji ramaremare.”
40008023	Jisas na gharaghambu thɨ tha e waŋga na thɨ wareri.
40008024	Ma mbaŋa molao ndewendewe laghɨye i rowo e njighɨko tɨne i vakatha bagodu i vana e waŋga na i nja e waŋga tɨne. Ko Jisas va i ghenelaŋa.
40008025	Gharaghambuma thɨ wa vethɨ yavairɨ, thɨŋa, “Amalana, u vamoruime! Noroke woya munja.”
40008026	Amba i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Buda kaiwae hu mararu? Lemi loŋweghathɨ ma i laghɨye.” Amba i thuweiru na i dage weya ndewendewe na bagodu thɨ towo na mbaŋara tad laghɨye i ghagha.
40008027	Gharɨgharɨma weiyaŋgima gharenji i yo na thɨ vedage weŋgi thɨŋa, “The loloke, othembe ndewendewe na bagodu thɨ loŋweghathɨ ghalɨŋae?”
40008028	Mbaŋa Jisas vama i wamalawa valɨmbwa na i tan e valɨvaŋganiye iya Gadala gharɨgharɨniye thɨ yakukowe. Gheko i vaidiŋgiya amaamala thenjighewo nyao raraitharɨ ina weŋgi thɨ raŋgima e ghabughabubuko. Ghanjithanavu va i tharɨ moli na i vakatha gharɨgharɨ ma thɨ rakarakareŋa e kamwathɨko iyako.
40008029	E mbaŋako iyako thɨ kulawe na ghalɨŋanji i laghɨye, “Loi Nariye ghen. Nuwaniya u vakatha budakai weime? Nuwaniya u lithɨ weime, ko iyemaeŋge amba ma lithɨ ghambaŋa?”
40008030	Mbombo naura mava inanji bwagabwaga weŋgi, va thiya nuve.
40008031	Nyaoma raraitharɨ thɨ naŋgowe, thɨŋa, “Thoŋgo u variye raŋgiyaime, u variyeime na voru weŋgiya mbomboko.”
40008032	I dage weŋgi, “Hu raka!” Thɨ raŋgi na vethɨ ru weŋgiya mbomboma. Mbomboma mbe naura vara thɨ rakanjaniya dagedagema, mbaŋara e njighɨ, na vethiya munja.
40008033	Mbomboma gharanjimbunjimbu thɨ rakavo na vethɨ vutha e ghemba. Vethɨ utugiya bigibigiko wolaghɨye na tembe ŋgoreiyeva budakai me yomara weŋgiya amaamalama nyaoma raraitharɨ inanji weŋgi.
40008034	Gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye e ghembako tɨne thɨ rakaraŋgi weya Jisas. Mbaŋa thɨ thuwe, thɨ naŋgowe na i iteteŋa lenji valɨvaŋgako iyako.
40009001	Jisas i tha e waŋga na i wamalawa, i njogha e ghambae.
40009002	Amba gharɨgharɨ vavana thɨ womena thegha reghawe i kuvokuvo na vambe i ghena vara e ghambae ghavwarara. Mbaŋa i thuweya lenji loŋweghathɨko, i dage weya thegha i kuvokuvoma, “Naruŋgu, ghen gharena i matuwo! Len tharɨna kaero ya numoten.”
40009003	Mbaro gharavavaghare vavana thɨ veutu weŋgi thɨŋa, “Amalake iyake i munjeva iye Loi. Mbema i utuvatharɨ vara weya Loi.”
40009004	Jisas i ghareghareya lenji renuwaŋako, iya kaiwae i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Buda kaiwae tharɨ gharerenuwaŋa ina e gharemina?
40009005	Iyaŋganiya ghautuutu i maya, ‘Len tharɨna kaero ya numoten,’ o yaŋa, ‘U yondovirɨ na u loŋga’?
40009006	Ya vaemunjoruŋa e ghemi, Lolo Nariye ele vurɨgheghe e yambaneke na valɨkaiwae i numotena tharɨ.” Amba i dage weya theghako kuvokuvoko, “U yondo, u bigiya ghambana ghavwarara na u wa e len ŋgolo!”
40009007	Amba theghama i yondovirɨ na i wa ele ŋgolo.
40009008	Mbaŋa wabwima thɨ thuwe, i wo nuwanji na thɨ taraweŋa Loi kaiwae i giya mbaro ŋgoranjiyako weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ.
40009009	Jisas i iteta ghembako iyako na ma ve loŋgaloŋga amba i vaidiya amala regha idae Matiu; iye takis gharamban, ina ele ghamba kaiwo. I dagewe, “U ghambuŋgo.” Matiu i yondovirɨ na i ghambu.
40009010	Mbaŋa Jisas i ghanɨŋga Matiu ele ŋgolo, takis gharamban na gharɨgharɨ raraitharɨ, thɨ rakamena na thiya yaku weinjiyaŋgiya Jisas na gharaghambu na thiya ghanɨŋga.
40009011	Parisi vavana thɨ thuwe iyake, thɨ dage weŋgiya gharaghambu thɨŋa, “Buda kaiwae lemi ravavaghare i ghanɨŋga weiyaŋgiya takis gharamban na gharɨgharɨ raraitharɨ?”
40009012	Mbaŋa Jisas i loŋwevaidi utuke iyake amba iŋa, “Thavala riwanji thovuye ma nuwanjiya rathawathawari, mbe ghambweghambweraeŋge nuwanjiya.
40009013	Hu wa na vou tamweya utuke iyake gharumwaru; iya iŋake, ‘Ghino nuwaŋguiya gharenja ko ma nuwaŋguiya vowo.’ Kaiwae mava ya mena na ya kula weŋgiya thavala thɨ rumwaru, ya mena tharɨ gharavakatha kaiwanji.”
40009014	Jon Rabapɨtaiso gharaghambu thɨ mena thɨ vaito Jisas thɨŋa, “Buda kaiwae ghime weimaŋgiya Parisi wo mbeya ghanɨŋga mbaŋa vavana, ko ghanɨraghambu nandere?”
40009015	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi, “Thare valɨkaiwae ghe gharaghaghayawo ne thiya randa mbaŋa ragheghe ghɨmoru mbe inawe vara weiyaŋgi? Nandere! Ko mbaŋa tene i mena ambane thɨ vaŋgu weŋgiya ragheghe ghɨmoru ko amba thɨ mbeya ghanɨŋga.
40009016	“Ma lolo regha ne i liya kwama nasiye togha na i ŋgiyagana kwama teuyewe i bowotu, kaiwae mbaŋa ne i thavwi na i livamo toghako i mwanavatha ma i vakathaeŋge na i bowotu laghɨye.
40009017	Ma valɨkaiwae lolo regha i liŋgiya waen togha e variye teuye thɨ vakatha thetheghan njimwae. Thoŋgo ŋgoreiye, waenɨko ne le vurɨgheghe kaiwae na i topo amba waenɨko i maliŋgi na variyeko i tharɨ. Ko waen togha i liŋgi e variye togha na mbe theghewoko vara thɨ thovuye.”
40009018	Jisas vamba i utuutu, Jiu lenji randeviva regha i mena i ronja e gheghe vuvuye e ghamwae na iŋa, “Yawarumbuŋguno amba me mare eŋge. U mena. U liraweya nɨmanɨna e riwae na yawaliye i njogha.”
40009019	Jisas i yondovirɨ na i ghambu weiyaŋgiya gharaghambu.
40009020	Ela eunda i ghataŋa voruvoru theghathegha hoyaworo na umboiwo, i mena Jisas e ghereiye na i vɨghathɨgha ghakwama mbothiye.
40009021	Le renuwaŋa va iŋa, “Thoŋgo mbema ya vɨghathɨ eŋge gha kwamako, woghambwerake ne iko.”
40009022	Jisas i ndevaghɨle na i thuwe amba iŋa, “Yawarumbuŋgu, gharena i matuwo! Len loŋweghathɨna i vamoruŋge.” E mbaŋako iyako ghambwerama ikowe.
40009023	Mbaŋa Jisas i ru randevivama ele ŋgolo, i thuweŋgiya igo gharawiwi na wabwi laghɨye thiya raŋi karere i laghɨye,
40009024	amba i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Taulaghɨna ghemi hu rakaraŋgi. Wevona ma i mare, mbema i ghena eŋge.” Taulaghɨko thɨ vavɨrɨ.
40009025	Ko mbaŋa thɨ variye raŋgiyaŋgiya gharɨgharɨko eto, Jisas i ru wevoko ele ghamba ghena, i yalawe e nɨmae na i thuweiru.
40009026	Totoko iyako i lalo valɨvaŋgako iyako.
40009027	Jisas i iteta ghembako iyako na ma ina e loŋga mborowa, amba amaamala thenjighewo thɨ kulakula reghambawe, thɨŋa, “Deivid rumbuye, gharen i nja weime.”
40009028	Mbaŋa i ru e ŋgolo tɨne, amaamalama maranjima i kwaghe thɨ menawe na i vaitoŋgi, “Thare hu loŋweghathɨ valɨkaiwaŋgu ya vamoruŋga?” Thɨŋa, “Ŋgoreiye amalana.”
40009029	Amba i vɨghathɨgha maramaranji na iŋa, “Ne i yomara e ghemi ŋgoreiya lemi loŋweghathɨna.”
40009030	Kaero valɨkaiwae thɨ thuwe, Jisas i dage vavurɨgheghe weŋgi iŋa, “Ne hu ndeutuŋa weya lolo regha.”
40009031	Ko iyemaeŋge mbaŋa thɨ wa, vethɨ utuŋa Jisas utuutuniye e valɨvaŋgako iyako.
40009032	Vama thɨ wareri vara, gharɨgharɨ vavana kaero thɨ womenava amala regha weya Jisas. Nyao raitharɨ va inawe na i vakatha ma e ghalɨghalɨŋae.
40009033	Mbaŋa Jisas i dage weya nyaoko raitharɨ na i raŋgi, amalama kaero i utuutuva. Gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye gharenji i yo, thɨŋa, “Ma mbaŋa regha ra thuweya bigi regha ŋgoreiya iyake Isirel e tɨne.”
40009034	Ko Parisi thɨŋa, “Nyao raraitharɨ lenji randeviva i giya vurɨgheghewe iya i variye raŋgiyaŋgiya nyaona raraitharɨ.”
40009035	Jisas i vaghɨliya ghembaghemba laghɨlaghɨye na nanasiyeko wolaghɨye. I vavaghare Jiu e lenji ŋgolo kururu tɨne na i utuŋa Toto Thovuye Loi le ghamba mbaro kaiwae, na i thawariŋgiya gida na ghambwera tomethi.
40009036	Mbaŋa i thuweŋgiya wabwi laghɨye ghare i nja weŋgi kaiwae riwanji i karavovo na ma e ghanjirathalavu, ŋgoranjiya sip ma e ghanjiranjimbunjimbu.
40009037	Amba i dage weŋgiya gharaghambu, “Gharɨgharɨke thiyake ŋgoranjiya uma laghɨye kaero i tara ko rakakaiwo ma thɨ ghanagha.
40009038	Iya kaiwae hu naŋgo weya Giya, iye umako tanuwagae na i variyeŋgiya rakakaiwo na thɨ uloulo.”
40010001	Jisas i kula vathavathaŋgiya gharaghambu theyaworo na theghewo na i giya mbaro weŋgi na valɨkaiwanji thɨ variye raŋgiyaŋgiya nyao raraitharɨ na thɨ thawariŋgiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ ghataŋa tomethi gida na ghambwera.
40010002	Ghalɨŋae gharaghambɨ theyaworo na theghewoko thiyako: iviva, Saimon, idae regha Pita, na ghaghae Endru; Jemes Sebedi nariye na ghaghae Jon;
40010003	Pilip na Batolomiu; Tomas na Matiu iye takis gharamban; Jemes Alipiyos nariye na Tadiyas;
40010004	Saimon iye i mena e wabwi regha idanji Jilot na Judas Isakariyot, iye Jisas ghaliliva.
40010005	Jisas i variyeŋgiya gharɨgharɨke theyaworo na theghewoke thiyake. I giya vavurɨgheghe weŋgi, iŋa, “Thava ne hu wa thiye ma Jiu gharɨgharɨniye e lenji valɨvaŋga o Sameriya gharɨgharɨniye e ghambaghambanji.
40010006	Ko, mbe hu wa eŋge weŋgiya sip raghaweghawe, thiye Isirel gharɨgharɨniye.
40010007	Hu wa vou utu weŋgi, huŋa, ‘Loi le ghamba mbaro ghe mbaŋa maiyavara.’
40010008	Hu vamoruŋgiya ghambweghambwera, huŋa na ramaremare thɨ thuweiru, hu thawariŋgiya thɨ ghataŋa lepelo na hu variye raŋgiyaŋgiya nyao raraitharɨ. Kaero hu wo ma e modamodae, ko ghemieŋge hu wogiya bwaga ma e modamodae.
40010009	Tha hu bigiya gol, silva o kopa mani e lemi vethe nasiye tɨne;
40010010	tha hu bigiya bigibigi ghanjinambo lemi loŋgaloŋgana kaiwae, tha hu liya ghamikwama ghayaboyabo yaŋgarava, o ghemi ghae, o lemi pwasike. Tha hu rerenuwaŋa bigi regha kaiwae, kaiwae rakakaiwo ghambaro iye ne thɨ njimbukiki.
40010011	“Mbaŋa ne hu ru e ghemba o ghemba nasiye regha, hu tamweya lolo thovuye regha e ghembana tɨne. Hu yaku weimi gheghada hu iteta ghembana iyana.
40010012	Mbaŋa ne hu ru e ŋgolo tɨne, huŋa ‘Loi i mwaewo weŋga.’
40010013	Thoŋgo gharɨgharɨ e ŋgolona iyana thɨ warari kaiwami, lemi dage mwaewoko yakuyaku thovuye kaiwae i meghabana gheko. Ko thoŋgo ma thɨ warari kaiwami lemi dage mwaewona mbe ghemieŋge hu vaidiya ghathovuye na thiye nandere.
40010014	Thoŋgo gharɨgharɨ e ŋgoloko o e ghembako iyako ma thɨ kula vathaŋga o ma thɨ loŋweya lemi utuna, hu iteta ŋgolona o ghembana iyana na hu tagavughethu vugha e gheghemina.
40010015	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, mbaŋa Loi le ghatha ghambaŋa ne i giya vuyowo laghɨye weŋgiya Sodoma na Gomora ko iyemaeŋge laghɨye moli gharɨgharɨ ghembana iyana ne thɨ vaidi.
40010016	“Ya variyeŋga ŋgoreiya sip thɨ rakaru mbugha lavalavarɨ e tɨnenji. Ghemi mbe hu thimba ŋgoreiya mwata na mbe ghamithanavu i ghenenja ŋgoreiya bunebune.
40010017	Hu njimbukikiŋga ghamimberegha, kaiwae gharɨgharɨ vavana ne thiya laweŋga na thɨ vaŋguŋga vohu kot. Ne thɨ liya thiyo i vurɨgheghe na thɨ yabɨbɨŋgawe e lenji ŋgolo kururu tɨne.
40010018	Idaŋgu kaiwae ne thɨ vaŋguŋga na thɨ vaŋguraweŋga rambarombaro na kiŋ e maranji na hu utuŋa Toto Thovuye weŋgi na tembe ŋgoreiyeva thiye ma Jiu gharɨgharɨniye weŋgi.
40010019	Mbaŋa ne thɨ vaŋguŋga kot kaiwae, thava hu rerenuwaŋa ŋgoroŋga ne vohu utu na huŋa o ŋgoroŋga ne vohuŋa. Kaiwae ne e mbaŋako iyako the utu nuwamiya ne hu utuŋa Loi ne i woveŋga.
40010020	Kaiwae utuŋgina iya ne hu utuŋaŋgina ma ghamimberegha lemi utu, Ramami e buruburu ghamberegha Une ina e ghemi iya ne i utuna.
40010021	“Amaamala vavana ne thɨ vaŋgugiya oghaghanji weŋgiya rambarombaro na thɨ gaboŋgi, na gamagai oramanji ne thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiye weŋgiya lenji ŋgaŋga. Gamagai vavana ne thɨ ndeghereiye wanaŋgiya otatanji na oramanji na thɨ vaŋgugiya weŋgiya rambarombaro na thɨ gaboŋgi.
40010022	Idaŋgu kaiwae gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye ne thɨ botewoyathuŋga, ko thela thoŋgo i vurɨgheghe na i ghataŋaghathɨ ne le ghambako Loi i vamora yawaliye.
40010023	Mbaŋa ne thɨ vakatha vuyowo weŋga e ghemba regha, hu vo na ma hu wava e ghemba regha. Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, amba mane hu vakathavao ghamikaiwo Isirel e ghembaghembaniyeko wolaghɨye kaero Lolo Nariye i mena.
40010024	Ma ravavaona regha ne i kivwala le ravavaghare; ma rakakaiwo ne i kivwala ghagiyako.
40010025	I thovuye eŋge ravavaona i tabo na ŋgoreiya le ravavaghare na rakakaiwo ŋgoreiya ghagiya. Ŋgolo tanuwagae ghino, thoŋgo thɨ uno idaŋgu Bilɨsabul ghemi lo ŋgoloko gharɨgharɨniye ghemi, ne thɨ rena ida raraitharɨ moli na ghemi idaidami.
40010026	“Tha hu mararuŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, kaiwae budakaiya i rothuwele tene Loi i woraŋgiya e manjamanjala, na budakaiya e ghayaboyabo tene i tatethewo.
40010027	Budakai ya utuŋa weŋga e momouwo, hu utuŋa e manjamanjala; budakai ya vaŋaewiŋa weŋga hu utuŋa na ghalɨŋami laghɨye.
40010028	Tha hu mararuŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, mbene thɨ tagavamareŋge lolo riwae, ko ma valɨkaiwanji thɨ tagavamare lolo une. Hu mararu eŋge Loi, iye valɨkaiwae i vakowana lolo riwae na une Gehena.
40010029	Toeya gethɨra valɨkaiwae thɨ vamodo ma nanasiye manyiwo, ŋgoreiye? Ko iyemaeŋge mane manda i dobu e thelau vwatae na Ramanda ma i ghareghare.
40010030	Na ghemi mbe ŋgoreiyeva, umbalimina ndamwandamwae wolaghɨye kaero i vaonavao.
40010031	Iya kaiwae tha hu mararu. Ghemi hu laghɨye kivwalaŋgiya make nanasiye wolaghɨye.
40010032	“Thela thoŋgo i woraŋgiya gharɨgharɨ e maranji na iŋa iye woraghambu, ghino tembe ŋgoreiyeva, ne ya vakatha ŋgoreiye weya Bwebwe e buruburu.
40010033	Ko thela thoŋgo iŋa ma i ghareghareŋgo gharɨgharɨ e maranji, ghino tembe ŋgoreiyeva, ne yaŋa ma ya ghareghare Bwebwe e buruburu e marae.
40010034	“Thava lemi renuwaŋa huŋava ya mena e yambaneke na ya womena vanevane. Nandere. Ma ya womena vanevane, ko iyemaeŋge ya mena na mbala gaithɨ i yomara.
40010035	Ya mena na ya vakatha wabwi, ghɨmoru i ndeghereiyewana ramae, wevo i ndeghereiyewana tɨnae, na ghɨmoruko levo i ndeghereiyewana yawanyiye.
40010036	Ghɨmoru ghathɨghɨyaŋgi laghɨye moli, iye mbe le bodabodaŋgi.
40010037	Thela i mwaewo laghɨye weŋgiya tɨnae na ramae na ma i mwaewo laghɨye weŋgo iye ma valɨkaiwae i tabo na woraghambu. Thela i mwaewo laghɨye weya nariye, ghɨmoru o wevo, na ma i mwaewo laghɨye weŋgo iye ma valɨkaiwae i tabo na woraghambu.
40010038	Thoŋgo thela ma i wo ghamberegha ghakros na i ghambuŋgo, iye ma valɨkaiwae i tabo na woraghambu.
40010039	Thela thoŋgo nuwaiya i vamora yawaliye, ne i thɨvai. Thela thoŋgo i vatomweya yawaliye ghino kaiwaŋgu, ne i vaidiya yawalɨ memeghabananiye.
40010040	“Thela i kula vathaŋga, ŋgoreiya i kulavathaŋgo, na thela i kulavathaŋgo ŋgoreiya i kulavatha thela va i variyeŋgo.
40010041	Thela i kulavatha Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, kaiwae iye Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, ne i vaidiya modae ŋgoreiya Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu modae; na thela i kulavatha lolo ghathanavu thovuye kaiwae loloko iyako iye lolo thovuye, ne i vaidiya modae ŋgoreiya lolo ghathanavu thovuye modae.
40010042	Thela i thɨnɨgiya mbwa weya nanasiyeŋgike thiyake regha na i mun kaiwae iye woraghambu, ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ne e modamodae.”
40011001	Mbaŋa Jisas i giya vavurɨgheghe weŋgiya gharaghambu theyaworo na theghewo na e ghereiye, i iteta ghembako iyako na i wa Jiu e ghambaghambanji vavana ve vavaghare weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ gheko.
40011002	Jon Rabapɨtaiso i loŋweya Krais le vakatha utuniye e thiyo tɨne, i variyeŋgiya gharaghambu
40011003	weya Jisas na thɨ vaito, thɨŋa, “Ghen mbema iya Jon va i utuŋa iŋa tene i mena o wo roroghaghaweva lolo regha?”
40011004	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Hu njogha na vohu utugiya weya Jon, budakaiya kaero hu thuwe na hu loŋwe:
40011005	maramaranji i kwaghe kaero thɨ thuwe, kuvokuvo kaero thɨ loŋga, thavala thɨ ghataŋa lepelo kaero riwanji i thovuye, yanawanji i kule thɨ loŋwe, ramaremare thɨ thuweiru na mbinyembinyeŋgu thɨ loŋweya Toto Thovuye iya thɨ vavaghare weŋgi.
40011006	Na tembe hu utugiyaweva iyake: Loi ghare weya lolo iya ma i roiteta ghino kaiwaŋgu.”
40011007	Mbaŋa Jon gharaghambu thɨ rakarakanjogha, Jisas i utu weŋgiya wabwiko Jon kaiwae. Iŋa, “Mbaŋa va hu wa weya Jon e njamnjam, va nuwamiya hu thuweya budakai? Va hu wa gheko na vambema nuwamiya eŋge hu thuweya ndewendeweko i uvathawo wuŋgiwuŋgiko?
40011008	Thoŋgo nandere, va hu wa eŋge na vohu thuweya budakai? Amala regha i njimbo kwama ghayamoyamo i thovuye? Nandere, thavala thɨ njimbo kwama thovuye thɨ yaku kiŋ e lenji ŋgolo.
40011009	Ko va vohu thuwe eŋge budakai? Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu? Ŋgoreiye, ya dage e ghemi, va vohu thuweya lolo regha iye Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu na ma e vwatanjiwova.
40011010	Amalaghɨniye kaiwae iyava ghalɨŋae gharautu regha i rorina, iya iŋake Loi iŋa, ‘Ne ya variya ghalɨŋaŋgu gharautu e ghamwan, iye i vivatharaweya kamwathɨ ghen kaiwan.’ ”
40011011	“Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, iya vara taulaghɨyake thɨ yomara e yambaneke mamba regha i laghɨye kivwala Jon Rabapɨtaiso. Ko thela idae nasiye moli Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne, iye i laghɨye kivwala Jon.
40011012	I ri e mbaŋaniye Jon va i utuŋa Loi ghalɨŋae na gheghada mbaŋake noroke, gharɨgharɨ raraitharɨ thɨ munjeva thɨ vakaiwoŋa lenji vurɨgheghe na thɨ mando na thɨ wo Loi le ghamba mbaro.
40011013	Mosese le Mbaro na Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu va thɨ utuŋa Loi le ghamba mbaro utuniye i mena gheghada Jon ghambaŋa.
40011014	Thoŋgo nuwamiya hu loŋweghathɨgha iyake, mbema Jon utuniye iyava gharautu regha iŋa Ilaija ne i njoghama.
40011015	Thoŋgo e yanayanawami hu vandeŋe wagiyawe ghalɨŋaŋguke.”
40011016	“Ŋgoroŋga ne yaŋa thake noroke kaiwanji? Ya dage e ghemi, thiye ŋgoranjiya gamagai thiya yaku e ghamba maket, thɨ kulakula weŋgiya ghanjiune, thɨŋa,
40011017	“ ‘Wo wiya ghe ghaigo, ko ma hu thari. Wo wothuŋa nuwatharɨ wothuniye ko iyemaeŋge ma hu randa.’ ”
40011018	“Gharɨgharɨ thake noroke ŋgoranjiya gamagaiko thiyako tavwa ghɨthaŋgi kaiwae mbaŋa Jon va i mena, mbaŋa vavana i mbeya ghanɨŋga naŋgo kaiwae na mava i muna waen na gharɨgharɨ thɨŋa, ‘Nyao raitharɨ inawe.’
40011019	Ko mbaŋa Lolo Nariye i mena, i ghanɨŋga na i munumu, na gharɨgharɨ thɨŋa, ‘Loloke iyake ŋgaŋganirɨ na waen gharamun; iye takis gharamban na thiye ma Jiu ghanjiu.’ Ko thimba i mena weya Loi ne ra thuweya gharɨgharɨ lenji vakatha i woraŋgiya na ra wovaemuemunjoruŋa.”
40011020	Jisas va i wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ e ghembaghembako iyava i vakatha vara vakathako i ghanagha weŋgi, kaiwae gharɨgharɨ mava thɨ uturaŋgiya lenji tharɨ na thɨ roitete.
40011021	“Aleu! Korasin, nevole hu thovuyaona! Aleu! Betɨsaida, nevole hu thovuyaona! Thoŋgo vakathaŋgike ghamba rotaele iyava ya vakathaŋgina weŋga ya vakathaeŋge Taiya na Saidon weŋgi, mbala vambe teuye, thɨ njimbo kwama thɨ vakatha thetheghan vulivuliye na thɨ vavughe riwanji e vugha na i woraŋgiya kaero thɨ uturaŋgiya lenji tharɨ na thɨ roiteteŋgi na Loi i numotenɨŋgi.
40011022	Ko ya dage e ghemi, mbaŋa Loi ne ghambaŋa ghatha Taiya na Saidon ne thɨ vaidiya vuyowo seiwo ko ghemi ne hu vaidiya vuyowo laghɨye moli.
40011023	Na ghen Kapenaom, thava hu renuwaŋa Loi ne i yavwatata wanaŋga e buruburu. Loi ne i wokiyathuŋga vohu nja Hedesi. Thoŋgo vakathaŋgike ghamba rotaele iyava ya vakathaŋgina weŋga va thɨ vakatha Sodoma, mbala mbe inawe e mbaŋake noroke.
40011024	Ya dage e ghemi, mbaŋa ele ghambako, Loi ne i lithɨ e ghemi vuyowo laghɨye moli, ko va i lithɨ weŋgiya Sodoma ma vuyowo laghɨye moli.”
40011025	E mbaŋako iyako Jisas iŋa, “Ya taraweŋaŋge, Bwebwe, Giya ghen e buruburu na e yambaneke, kaiwae u wothuwela bigibigike thiyake weŋgiya rathimbathimba na thavala lenji ghareghare i laghɨye na kaero u woraŋgiya weŋgiya thavala amba lenji renuwaŋa ŋgoreiya gamagai.
40011026	Ŋgoreiye Bwebwe, kaiwae len renuwaŋana va ŋgoreiyako iya u vakathako.”
40011027	“Bwebwe vama i giyavao weŋgo ghareghareke wolaghɨye. Ma lolo regha i ghareghare Nariye, mbe Bwebwe eŋge, na ma lolo regha i ghareghare Bwebwe, mbe Nariyeke eŋge ghino, na thavala ya tuthiŋgi na ya woraŋgiya weŋgi.”
40011028	“Ghemi hu mena weŋgo thavala riwami i bane na ghamibigi i vuyowo, na ya vatowoŋaŋga.
40011029	Bigike iya ya woveŋgake, hu wo! Na hu varevareŋgo! Kaiwae ghino wothanavu i ghenenja na i udauda na hu vaidiya towowe.
40011030	Bigike iya ya woveŋgake i maya na doweke iya ne ya giyake e ghemi ma e vuyovuyowae.”
40012001	E mbaŋako iyako, Sabat regha Jisas i ghathara wit e ghauma. Bada i gharɨŋgiya gharaghambu, amba thɨ vugha wit uneune na thɨ ghan.
40012002	Mbaŋa Parisi thɨ thuweŋgi amba thɨ dage weya Jisas, thɨŋa, “Wo u thuwe, ghanɨraghambu ma thɨ ghambugha Sabat ghambaro.”
40012003	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ko ma hu ndevaona mun Deivid utuutuniye, mbaŋa va weiyaŋgiya ghaune na bada i gharɨŋgi?
40012004	Va ve ru Loi ele ŋgolo tɨne na ravowovowo i giya bred bobomawe, i raŋgi na thɨ ghan weiyaŋgiya ghauneko. Bredɨko iyako va thɨ ghan othembe mbaro i dageten weŋgi, mbe ravowovowo eŋge kaiwanji.
40012005	O ma hu vaona Mosese le Mbaro, iya iŋake Sabat regha na regha ravowovowo thɨ kaiwo e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne? Iyako kaero thɨ raka Sabat ghambaro iyemaeŋge ma thɨ vakatha tharɨ.
40012006	Ya dage e ghemi, bigi regha ina gheke, iye i kivwala Ŋgolo Boboma.
40012007	Ma hu ghareghare utuutuke thiyake ghanjirumwaru, iya iŋake, ‘Ghino nuwaŋguiya gharenja thanavuniye, ma nuwaŋguiya vowo.’ Thoŋgo hu ghareghare wagiyawe utuutuke thiyake ghanjirumwaru mbala ma hu wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋgiya gharɨgharɨke thiya ma thɨ vakatha tharɨke.
40012008	Kaiwae Lolo Nariye iye Sabat ghagiya.”
40012009	Jisas i iteta iyako na ve ru e lenji ŋgolo kururu tɨne,
40012010	na gheko, amala regha inawe, nɨmae i kuvokuvo. Gharɨgharɨ vavana va inanji gheko, nuwanjiya thɨ wonjoweya Jisas le vakatha vatharɨ kaiwae. Thɨ vaito, thɨŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga, la mbaro i vatomwe na i thovuye eŋge ra vamora lolo Sabat e tɨne o nandere?”
40012011	I dage weŋgi, iŋa “Thoŋgo ghemi regha le sip regha i dobu e goga Sabat e tɨne, ma i thovuyewe ne i yalawe na i wovoreŋa?
40012012	Emunjoru sip bigi laghɨye, ko iyemaeŋge lolo iye bigi laghɨye moli. Iya kaiwae la Mbaro i vatomweŋge weinda ra vakatha vakatha thovuye Sabat e tɨne.”
40012013	Amba i dage weya amalama, iŋa “U livamomoya nɨmanɨna.” I livamomoya nɨmaeko na kaero i thovuyeva ŋgoreiya reghako.
40012014	Parisi thɨ rakaraŋgi na vethɨ rerenuwaŋa ŋgoroŋga ne thɨŋa na thɨ unɨghɨ.
40012015	Jisas vama i ghareghare lenji renuwaŋako, i iteta ghembako iyako na gharɨgharɨ lemoyo thɨ ghambu. Ghambweghambwerako wolaghɨye va inanji e wabwiko tɨne, i thawarivaoŋgi,
40012016	i dage vurɨgheghe weŋgi na thava thɨ utuŋa utuniye thela amalaghɨniye.
40012017	Va i vakatha ŋgoreiyako na i vaemunjoruŋa ŋgoroŋga Loi va iŋa weya ghalɨŋae gharautu, Aiseya.
40012018	Iŋa: “Lo rakakaiwo iyake. Iye va ya tuthi. Ya gharethovu na ya warari laghɨye kaiwae. Ne ya wogiya uneŋgukewe, na iye ne i utuŋa lo renuwaŋa thovuye weŋgiya gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye.
40012019	Mane i wogaithɨ weiyaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ na mane i kulakula. Mane i utu na ghalɨŋae laghɨlaghɨye.
40012020	Mane i yanji wanaŋgiya thavala thɨ njavovo, na thavala riwanji ma ele vurɨgheghe mane i vakowanaŋgi. Ne i kaiwo gheghada Loi le ghamba mbaro thovuye i kivwalaŋgiya bigibigike wolaghɨye.
40012021	Amalaghɨniye e idae gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye lenji vareminje ne inawe.”
40012022	Gharɨgharɨ vavana thɨ womena amala regha maramara thɨ kwaghe na ma e ghalɨghalɨŋae, kaiwae nyao raitharɨ va inawe. Jisas i thawari ambama ghalɨŋae i mavu na kaero i thuweva.
40012023	Gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye gharenji i yo na thɨŋa, “Mbwata iye Deivid Rumbuye, ae?”
40012024	Ko mbaŋa Parisi thɨ loŋweya iyako, thɨŋa, “I variyeraŋgiya nyao raraitharɨ kaiwae nyao raraitharɨ ghanjigiya Bilɨsabul i giya vurɨgheghewe na i vakatha ŋgoreiye.”
40012025	Jisas i ghareghare lenji renuwaŋako na i dage weŋgi, iŋa “Ghamba mbaro regha thoŋgo thɨ vakatha wabwi na wabwi na thɨ vegaithɨ weŋgi, ghamba mbaroko iyako mane i wo mbaŋa molao. Na ghemba regha o ŋgolo regha, thoŋgo thɨ vakatha wabwi na wabwi na thɨ vegaithɨ weŋgi ne thɨ dobu moli.
40012026	Thoŋgo Seitan i variyeraŋgiya le nyao raitharɨ na i vakatha wabwi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne amba thɨ vegaithɨ weŋgi, le ghamba mbaroko ne i ko moli.
40012027	Ghemi huŋa ya variyeraŋgiya nyao raraitharɨ kaiwae Seitan i giya vurɨgheghe e ghino, na thela i giya vurɨgheghe weŋgiya ghamiraghambu na thɨ variye raŋgiyaŋgiya nyao raraitharɨ? Ghamiraghambu lenji vakatha i woraŋgiya lemi kwanɨna.
40012028	Ko thoŋgo Loi Une le vurɨgheghe e tɨne na ya variyeraŋgiya nyao raraitharɨ, iyake i vaemunjoruŋa Loi le ghamba mbaro kaero i mena weŋga.”
40012029	“Ma valɨkaiwae lolo regha i ru amala vurɨgheghe regha ele ŋgolo na i kaiva le bigibigi thoŋgo iviva ma i yalawekai na i ŋgarɨghathɨ e thiyo, amba muyai i kaiva le bigibigiko e ŋgoloko tɨne.”
40012030	“Thela ma weiŋgu iye wothɨghɨya, na thela ma weiŋgu wo mbanvathavatha gharɨgharɨ iye i vagevagegeyathu.
40012031	Iya kaiwae ya dage e ghemi, thela i vakatha tharɨ na i utuvatharɨ weya Loi, ne i numoten, ko thela thoŋgo i utuvatharɨ weya Nyao Boboma, Loi mane i numotena le tharɨko iyako.
40012032	Thela thoŋgo i utuvatharɨ weya Lolo Nariye, Loi ne i numoten, ko thela thoŋgo i utuvatharɨ weya Nyao Boboma, Loi mane i numoten e mbaŋake iyake o mbaŋa i menamenako.”
40012033	“Thoŋgo umbwa thovuye, une tembe thovuyeva. Thoŋgo umbwa raitharɨ, une tembe raitharɨva. Umbwa, uneko i woraŋgi, umbwa thovuye o raitharɨ.
40012034	Ghemi ŋgoramiya mwata! Ma valɨkaiwami hu utuŋa utu thovuye kaiwae gharɨgharɨ raraithara ghemi! Kaiwae budakaiya i riyevanjara gharendake, iya ve raŋgi e ghaendake.
40012035	Lolo thovuye i woraŋgiya bigi thovuye kaiwae thovuyeko iyako i mena e ghare. Lolo raitharɨ i woraŋgiya bigi raitharɨ kaiwae tharɨko iyako i mena e ghare.”
40012036	“Ya dage e ghemi, mbaŋa Loi ne ghambaŋa i ghathaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, lolo regha na regha ne ve kot weya Loi utuko raraitharɨ wolaghɨye iya i utuŋaŋgiko kaiwanji.
40012037	Thoŋgo e ghalɨŋamina lemi utu i thovuye Loi ne i wovathovuthovuyeŋaŋga. Thoŋgo e ghalɨŋamina lemi utu raraitharɨ Loi ne i wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋga.”
40012038	Amba Parisi na Mbaro gharavavaghare vavana thɨ dage weya Jisas, thɨŋa “Ravavaghare, nuwameiya u vakatha vakatha ghamba rotaele regha na wo thuwe mbala wo ghareghare u mena weya Loi.”
40012039	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Tha raraithara ghemi na hu roiteta Loi ghathanavu. Nuwamiya ya vakatha nono ghamba rotaele. Ko mane ya vakatha nono regha kaiwami. Nono ghamba rotaele mbe reghaeŋge Loi ne i giya weŋga, iyava i vakatha weya ghalɨŋae gharautu, Jona.
40012040	Kaiwae Jona va ina borogi e ŋgamoiye mbaŋa thegheto na gougou thegheto, tembene ŋgoreiyeva Lolo Nariye, mbaŋa thegheto na gougou thegheto ne ve yaku e thelau tɨne.
40012041	Mbaŋa Loi ghambaŋa i ghathaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, Ninive gharɨgharɨniye ne thɨ rakayondo thɨ wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋgiya thake iyake, kaiwae va thɨ loŋwe Jona le vavaghare, thɨ uturaŋgiya lenji tharɨ na thɨ roitete, na mbaŋake lolo regha ina gheke iye i laghɨye kivwala Jona.
40012042	Mbaŋa Loi ne ghambaŋa i ghathaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, kwin i mena e yaghalako ne i yondo na i wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋga, kaiwae i ri e ghemba bwagabwaga moli na i mena i vandeŋe Solomon le thimba. Na mbaŋake lolo regha ina gheke i laghɨye kivwala Solomon na thake iyake ma thɨ goruwe.”
40012043	“Mbaŋa nyao raitharɨ i raŋgi weya lolo regha, i wa ve loŋgatakwa njamnjamɨko tɨne ma mbwaniye, i tamweya le ghamba towo, ko iyemaeŋge ma i vaidiya regha.
40012044	Amba iŋa, ‘Wo ya njogha ŋgora lo ghamba yakuma ma rimawe.’ Mbaŋa i njogha, i thuweya le ghamba yakuko kaero thɨ wanji wagiyawe na bigibigiko wolaghɨye e tɨneko thɨ vakatha wagiyawe, ko iyemaeŋge kokowae.
40012045	Amba i wa na ve vaŋguŋgiva nyao thenjighepirɨ, thɨ tharɨ moli, thɨ kivwala amalaghɨniye. Thɨ ru na thɨ yaku gheko. Loloko iyako le yakuyaku va i viva i tharɨ, ko e mbaŋako iyako i tharɨ laghɨye moli. Iyake ne ŋgoreiye weŋga, ghemi thake raraitharɨ iyake.”
40012046	Jisas vamba i utuutu weŋgiya wabwi, tɨnae na oghaghae ma inanji eto thɨ ndeghathɨ, thɨ tamwetamwewe kaiwae nuwanjiya thɨ utuwe.
40012047	Amba lolo regha i dagewe iŋa, “Amalana, tɨna na oghagha iya thɨ ndeghathɨ etoke, nuwanjiya thɨ utu e ghen.”
40012048	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ko nava thela na oghaghaŋguŋgiya thavala?”
40012049	I liya nɨmae na i thɨvatomweŋgiya gharaghambu, na iŋa, “Wo hu thuwe! Thiyake, nava na oghaghaŋgu.
40012050	Thela thoŋgo i vakatha Bwebwe e buruburu le renuwaŋa iye ghaghaŋgu, louŋgu na tɨnaŋgu.”
40013001	Mbaŋako iyako e tɨne, Jisas i raŋgi e ŋgoloko tɨne, i wa e njighɨko ghadidiye na ve yakuwe.
40013002	Wabwi laghɨye moli thɨ rakavathavatha na thɨ rovaghɨliya, iya kaiwae i tha e waŋga regha na i yakuwe, ko gharɨgharɨko va thiya ndeghathɨ e njighɨko ghadidiye.
40013003	Mbe i goghaimbaeŋge na i utuŋa bigibigi i ghanagha weŋgi. Iŋa, “Mbaŋa regha amala regha i wa ele uma na ve yathu weiwo.
40013004	Mbaŋa i yathu vavana thɨ unja e kamwathɨ mara, ma thɨ mena thɨ ghanɨŋgi.
40013005	Vavana vethɨ unja e thelau ele varɨvarɨ ko ghanjithelauko mava i poku. Va thɨ maya e mbuthu, kaiwae ghanjithelauko mava i poku.
40013006	Ko mbaŋa varae i yovoro na i mbɨle, dayaghawae kaiwae i ŋambuŋgi na i mareyawowo kaiwae wathelilinji ma vamba ina bwagabwaga.
40013007	Weiwo vavana vethɨ unja ŋgora nana raraitharɨ kaero inanjiwe, nanako thiyako lenji mbuthu i maya na thɨ vwariŋgiya witɨma.
40013008	Mbombouye vavana va vethɨ unja e thelau thovuye na thɨ rau. Tomethi uneunenji, vavana uneunenji voghɨthaŋarɨ (100), vavana voghɨyewona (60) na vavana voghɨyeto (30).
40013009	Thoŋgo e yanayanawami hu vandeŋe wagiyawe ghalɨŋaŋguke.”
40013010	Gharaghambu thɨ menawe na thɨ vaito, thɨŋa “Buda kaiwae mbe u goghaimbaeŋge mbaŋa u utu weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ?”
40013011	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Loi le ghamba mbaro gharerenuwaŋa va i rothuwele kaero i woraŋgiya weŋga, ko ma vamba i woraŋgiya weŋgi.
40013012	Thela ele ghareghare Loi ne i vatabowe na Loi ghaghareghare i laghɨye moliwe; ko thela ma Loi ghaghareghare inawe, othembe seiwo moli ele ghareghare, Loi ne i woraŋgivaowe.
40013013	Lo rɨghe iya ya utu na mbe ya goghaimbake eŋge weŋgi, kaiwae thɨ ghaghayawo, ko iyemaeŋge ma thɨ ghewovaidi, na thɨ vandeŋe, ko iyemaeŋge ma thɨ loŋwe wagiyawe na thɨ ghareghare.
40013014	Thiyeke weŋgi, Aiseya, Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu ghalɨŋae i tabo na emunjoru, iya iŋake, Mbe hu vandevandeŋa, ko iyemaeŋge ma hu ghareghare, mbe hu ghaghayawo, ko iyemaeŋge ma hu ghewovaidi.
40013015	Kaiwae gharɨgharɨke thiyake gharenji i vurɨgheghe, thɨ vowiya yanawanji, na thɨ kɨkɨmare kaiwae thɨ botewo ghathuwathuwa. Thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiye mbala ma thɨ thuwe e maranji, ma thɨ loŋwe e yanawanji o thɨ ghareghare e gharenji, na thɨ numonjogha e ghino na ya thawariŋgi.”
40013016	“Ko ghemi, i thovuye moli kaiwae marami i manjamanjala na yanawami i bowotu.
40013017	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, Loi ghalɨŋae gharautuŋgi na gharɨgharɨ thɨ ghambugha Loi ghathanavu va nuwanjiya moli thɨ thuwe budakaiya kaero hu thuwe na thɨ loŋwe budakaiya kaero hu loŋwe, ko mava valɨkaiwanji.”
40013018	“Wo hu vandeŋe ya vamanjamanjalaŋa rayathu weiwo ghagoghaimba na hu loŋwe.
40013019	Mbaŋa lolo regha i loŋweya Loi le ghamba mbaro utuniye na ma i ghareghare gharumwaru, Seitan ne i mena na i mbana budakai va thɨ kabu e ghareko. Weiwoke iyake iyava vethɨ unja e kamwathɨma mara.
40013020	Weiwoma iyava vethɨ unja e thelauma ele varɨvarɨma, thiyake ŋgoreiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ loŋweya utu thovuye na e mbaŋako iyako thɨ wo utuko iyako weiye lenji warari,
40013021	ko iyemaeŋge ma thɨ rerenuwaŋa kaiwae na mbe mbaŋa ubotu eŋge i yaku kaiwae watheliliye ma i nja bode. Mbaŋa thɨ vaidiya vuyowo o gharɨgharɨ vavana thɨ vakathaŋgi na thɨ vaidiya vɨrɨ utuko thovuye kaiwae, e mbaŋako iyako kaero thɨ dobu.
40013022	Weiwoma iyava vethɨ unja ŋgora nanama raraitharɨ inanjiwe, thiyake ŋgoranjiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ loŋweya utu thovuye ko iyemaeŋge yambaneke renuwaŋaniye i vagaghala nuwanji na nuwanjiko i ghaŋgo weya gogomwau na nuwanjiya lemoyo, iyake kaiwae, mane thɨ mbuthu na thɨ rau.
40013023	Weiwoma iyava vethɨ unja e thelauma thovuye, thiyake ŋgoranjiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ loŋweya utu thovuye na thɨ ghareghare ŋgoroŋga gharumwaru; thɨ rau, vavana uneune voghɨthaŋarɨ (100), vavana voghɨyewona (60) na vavana voghɨyeto (30).”
40013024	Jisas mbowo i utuŋava goghaimba regha weŋgi, iŋa, “Loi le ghamba mbaro ŋgoreiya iyake. Amala regha i yathu wit mbombouye thovuthovuye ele uma.
40013025	Gougou regha gharɨgharɨko va thiya ghena amba amalama ghathɨghɨya i mena i ru e umama tɨne na i yathu nana raitharɨ mbombouye e witɨma tɨnenji na i wa.
40013026	Mbaŋa witɨma i mbuthu na kaero i woraweya le rau rɨghe, nanama raraitharɨ kaero thɨ yomarava.”
40013027	“Amalama le rakakaiwo thɨ menawe na thɨŋa, ‘Amalana, va u yathu wit mbombouye thovuye e len umako tɨne, na nanako raraitharɨ aŋga thɨ mena?’ ”
40013028	“I dage weŋgi, iŋa ‘Wothɨghɨya regha nuwaiya i vakatha tharɨ e ghino iya i vakatha iyana.’ Rakakaiwoma thɨ vaito thɨŋa, ‘Thare nuwaniya ghime wo wa na vo mutuyathu?’ ”
40013029	“Iŋa, ‘Thava, kaiwae mbaŋa ne vou muta nanana raraitharɨ ne hu therɨvairɨthavwi weiye witɨna.’ ”
40013030	“Wo thɨ mbuthu na regha weiye witɨna gheghada mbaŋa witɨna ne i mweghe na ra vughɨ. Ne e mbaŋako iyako ya dage weŋgiya ravathevatheko, ‘Hu mutukaiya nanana raraitharɨ na hu yavathaŋgi, tene ra ŋambuŋgi, ko amba hu mbana witɨna na hu vathe e ghaŋgolona.’ ”
40013031	Jisas mbowo i utuŋava goghaimba regha weŋgi, iŋa, “Loi le ghamba mbaro ŋgoreiya umbwa regha idae masɨted mbouye, amala regha va i wo na i wokabu ele uma tɨne.
40013032	Mbouyeke iyake weiwoke wolaghɨye mbombounji nasiyeninji moli. Ko mbaŋa i mbuthu na laghɨye, i kivwalaŋgiya bigibigiko wolaghɨye e umako tɨne. I tabo na umbwa regha na make wolaghɨye thɨ mena thɨ vakatha unyinji e yaŋgayaŋgako.”
40013033	Jisas mbowo i utuŋava goghaimba regha weŋgi, iŋa, “Loi le ghamba mbaro ŋgoreiya isɨt. Wevo eunda i thɨn mbe nasiye eŋge na i basi weiye pwalawa, uye vwarato, isɨtɨko i kaiwo na i ruvao e pwalawako laghɨye tɨne.”
40013034	Jisas i goghaimba mbaŋa me utuŋa bigibigike wolaghɨye thiyake weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ. Mava te i reŋava e kamwathɨ regha na i utuŋa bigi regha weŋgi mbe goghaimbaeŋge.
40013035	Iyake i vaemunjoruŋa ŋgoroŋga Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu va iŋa ne i yomara, iya iŋake: Ne ya utu mbene ya goghaimbaeŋge, mbe goghaimbaeŋge ne ya woraŋgiya weŋgi the bigiya i rothuwele mbaŋa va i vakatha yambaneke na ghaghada noroke.
40013036	Jisas i iteteŋgiya wabwima na i ru e ŋgolo tɨne. Gharaghambu thɨ menawe na thɨŋa, “U vamanjamanjalaŋa weime nanama raraitharɨ i mbuthu e umama tɨne ghagoghaimba.”
40013037	I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Loloko iya i yathu witɨko mbombouye thovuye iye Lolo Nariye.
40013038	Uma iye yambaneke, na weiwo thovuye thiye Loi le ghamba mbaro gharɨgharɨniye. Nana raraitharɨ thiye Seitan le gharɨgharɨŋgi,
40013039	na loloko iya nuwaiya i vakatha tharɨko, iya i kabu nanako raraitharɨ iye Seitan. Vathe ghambaŋa iye mbaŋa le ghambako, na ravathevathe thiye nyao thovuthovuye.”
40013040	“Kaiwae thɨ muta nana raraitharɨ na thɨ ŋambu e ndɨghe, nevole ŋgoreiya iyako mbaŋa ne ele ghambako.
40013041	Lolo Nariye ne i variyeŋgiya le nyao thovuthovuye na thɨ mutuyathuŋgiya thavala thɨ vakathaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ vavana na thɨ vakatha tharɨ na thanavu raraitharɨ gharavakathaŋgi. Taulaghɨŋgiko ne thɨ mutuyathuŋgi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne.
40013042	Ne thɨ bigiyathuruwoŋgi e ndɨghe laghɨye moli une na vethɨ randa na thɨ rɨghɨmbiye ŋiŋinji.
40013043	Amba thavala ghanjithanavu i thovuye, manjamanjalawanji ne ŋgoreiya varae manjamanjalawae Ramanji ele ghamba mbaro tɨne. Thoŋgo e yanayanawami hu vandeŋe ghalɨŋaŋguke.”
40013044	“Loi le ghamba mbaro ŋgoreiya gogomwau thovuye thɨ wole e uma tɨne na thɨ mareitete. Amala regha i vaidi na mbowo i wolenjoghava. Weiye le warari laghɨye moli gogomwauko iyako kaiwae, amba i wa na ve vakuneŋa le bigibigiko wolaghɨye, i mbana mani na i vamodo umakowe.”
40013045	“Loi le ghamba mbaro tembe ŋgoreiyeva iyake. Bigibigi gharakune regha i tamweŋgiya ŋgile thovuye moli.
40013046	Mbaŋa regha i vaidiya regha, i thovuye moli na modae i laghɨye moli, amba i wa, ve vakuneŋaŋgiya le bigibigiko wolaghɨye na i vamodo ŋgileko iyako.”
40013047	“Loi le ghamba mbaro tembe ŋgoreiyeva ghina thɨ lirawe e njighɨko tɨne, na thɨ wo borogi tomethi.
40013048	Mbaŋa i riyevanjara, thɨ momodɨvoreŋa e njighɨko ghadidiye, thiya yaku amba thɨ ghatha. Borogi thovuthovuye thɨ mbanɨŋgi e kwaekwae na raraitharɨ thɨ bigiyathu.
40013049	Nevole ŋgoreiyako mbaŋa ne ele ghambako. Nyao thovuthovuye ne thɨ rakamena na thɨ ghatha raŋgiyaŋgiya raraitharɨ thovuthovuyeko e tɨnenji,
40013050	na thɨ bigiyathuruwoŋgi e ndɨghe laghɨye moli une na vethɨ randa na thɨ rɨghɨmbiye ŋiŋinji.”
40013051	Jisas i vaitoŋgi, iŋa “Thare nuwami i manjamanjala bigibigike thiyake kaiwanji?” Thɨŋa, “Ŋgoreiye.”
40013052	I dage weŋgi, iŋa “Iya kaiwae mbaro gharavavaghare, iya thiye kaero thɨ tabo na Loi le ghamba mbaro gharaghambuŋgi, thiye ŋgoranjiya ŋgolo tanuwagae i bigiraŋgiya bigibigi totogha na teteuye ele woluwolu tɨne na i bigirawe eto.”
40013053	Mbaŋa Jisas i utuvaoŋgiya goghaimbaŋgike thiyake amba i iteta ghembako iyako.
40013054	I njogha e ghambae na i vavaghare e lenji ŋgolo kururu tɨne. Gharenji i yo le vavaghareko kaiwae na thɨŋa, “Le ghareghareko aŋga i mena? Ŋgoroŋga na valɨkaiwae i vakatha vakathaŋgike ghamba rotaele thiyake?”
40013055	“Mbema kapentama nariya iyako, ae? Tɨnaya Meri, ae? Oghaghaeŋgiya Jemes, Josep, Saimon na Judas.
40013056	Oloulouye mbe ra yaku gheke weindaŋgi, ŋgoreiye ae? Aŋga mendava i wo le ghareghareko na le vurɨghegheko?”
40013057	Iya kaiwae gharenji i gaithɨwana na thɨ botewoyathu. Jisas i dage weŋgi, iŋa “Gharɨgharɨ thɨ yavwatatawana Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu e ghembaghembako wolaghɨye, ko ghambae gharɨgharɨniye na le bodaboda ma thɨ yavwatatawana.”
40013058	Ma i vakatha vakatha ghamba rotaele lemoyo gheko kaiwae ma thɨ loŋweghathɨ.
40014001	E mbaŋako iyako, Herod, iye Galili gharambarombaro i loŋweya Jisas le vakatha utuutuniye.
40014002	I dage weŋgiya le rakakaiwo e raberabe iŋa, “Loloko iyako mbema emunjoru Jon Rabapɨtaiso, i thuweiru na tembe e yawayawaliyeva. Iya kaiwae valɨkaiwae i vakathaŋgiya vakatha ghamba rotaele ŋgoranjiyako.”
40014003	Kaiwae Herod va i viwe ghagha Pilip levo Herodiyas na i ghe weiye, Jon vambe i vathivalaŋa wevara, iŋa, “Ghanda Mbaro ma i vatomwe e ghen na u vaŋgwa Herodiyas!” Iyako kaiwae, Herod va iŋa na thɨ yalawe Jon, thɨ ŋgarɨ na thɨ woruwo e thiyo.
40014005	Herod va nuwaiya iŋa na Jon i mare, ko va i mararuŋgiya Jiu kaiwae va thɨŋa Jon iye Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu.
40014006	Mbaŋa Herod i vakatha le virɨ gharenuwaŋakiki ghanɨŋganiye, Herodiyas yawarumbuye i thari wabwiko e maranji, i vakatha Herod i warari laghɨye,
40014007	na i tholo e maranji iŋa, “Ya dagerawe e maran, the bigiya ne u naŋgo e ghino ne ya woveŋge.”
40014008	Ŋgoreiya tɨnae me le woraŋgiyawe, i dage weya Herod iŋa, “E mbaŋake iyake u woraweya Jon Rabapɨtaiso umbaliye e gaeba tɨne na u woveŋgoma.”
40014009	Kiŋɨma nuwae i tharɨ, ko kaiwae kaero me tholo na i dagerawe le valɨgiyagiyako e maranji, iŋa na thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiya wevoko le renuwaŋa.
40014010	I variyeŋgiya le rakakaiwo na vethɨ kitena Jon numwe e thiyo tɨne.
40014011	Thɨ thɨnɨmena umbaliye e gaeba na thɨ thɨnɨgiya weya wevoma na i yothɨn weya tɨnae.
40014012	Jon gharaghambu thɨ rakamena thɨ wo Jon riwae na thɨ wobeku; amba thɨ wa vethɨ utugiya utuniye weya Jisas.
40014013	Mbaŋa Jisas i loŋweya Jon utuutuniye, i tha e waŋga ghamberegha na i iteta ghembako iyako, i wa e valɨvaŋga ma gharɨgharɨniye. Gharɨgharɨ thɨ loŋweya toto Jisas kaero me wa, thɨ rakaiteteŋgiya ghambaghambanji, thɨ loŋga e gheghenji na thɨ rakareghambawe.
40014014	Jisas i nja e waŋgama na mbaŋa i thuweya wabwiko laghɨye, ghare i vɨrɨ laghɨye moli kaiwanji na i thawariŋgiya lenji ghambweghambweraŋgi.
40014015	Mbaŋa vama yeghɨyeghɨye, gharaghambu thɨ rakamenawe na thɨ dagewe, thɨŋa, “Vanatherowoke, na kaero yeghɨyeghɨye moli. U variyeŋgiya gharɨgharɨna na tembe thiye vethɨ vamodo ghanji e ghembaghemba.”
40014016	Jisas iŋa, “Thava thɨ raka. Ghemi hu giya ghanɨŋga weŋgi na thɨ ghan.”
40014017	Thɨ dagewe, thɨŋa, “Bredɨma mbe mbumbulima eŋge na borogi umboiwo ina weime.”
40014018	Iŋa, “Hu bigimena gheke.”
40014019	I dage weŋgiya gharɨgharɨko na thiya yaku e nanako vwatavwata, amba i mbana bredɨma mbumbulimama na borogima umboiwo, i ghɨmara voro e buruburu na i vata ago weya Loi ghanɨŋgako kaiwae. I njiviyaviya bredɨma, i giya weŋgiya gharaghambuma na thɨ giya weŋgiya gharɨgharɨma.
40014020	Taulaghɨko thiya ghanɨŋga na valɨkaiwanji. Amba gharaghambuko thɨ mbana ghanɨŋgama vaŋgovaŋgothiye na thɨ mbanɨvanjaraŋgiya nambonambo ŋgamwayaworo na ŋgamwaiwo.
40014021	Iya vara taulaghɨko va thiya ghanɨŋgako ghɨmoghɨmoru lenji ghanaghanagha paeb tausan na wanakau na gamagai e vwatanjiva.
40014022	Amba Jisas i dage weŋgiya gharaghambu na thɨ rakatha e waŋgama thɨ viva e ghamwae Galili Njighɨniye ele valɨvaŋga regha, na i variyeŋgiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ rakanjogha e ghambanji.
40014023	I variyeŋgiya gharɨgharɨ na e ghereiye ghamberegha i voro e ou ghadidiye na i naŋgowe. Vama i gou na Jisas ina gheko ghamberegha;
40014024	na e mbaŋako iyako waŋgama vama ina eto na bagodu i vauneuneŋa kaiwae thɨ womana i ghemba ndewendeweko marae.
40014025	Ighɨviya rakaraka Jisas i loŋga e njighɨ vwatae i mena weŋgiya gharaghambu.
40014026	Mbaŋa thɨ thuweya i loŋga e njighɨko vwatae thɨ mararu laghɨye moli. Thɨŋava, “Kaka!” na thɨ yaro weiye lenji mararu laghɨye.
40014027	Jisas i dage weŋgi e mbaŋako iyako, iŋa, “Tha huya mararu! Ghino! Ghino!”
40014028	Amba Pita i dagewe, iŋa, “Amalana, thoŋgo emunjoru ghen, u dage na ya nja ya loŋga ghaona e ghen.”
40014029	Jisas i gonjoghawe, iŋa, “U mena!” Pita i ghaenja na i loŋga ghemba Jisas e njighɨko vwatae.
40014030	Ko mbaŋa i thuweya ndewendeweko le vurɨgheghe i mararu na mbalama i munja amba i goyawaru, iŋa, “Amalana! U thalavuŋgo!”
40014031	E mbaŋako iyako Jisas i tagavamomoya nɨmanɨmae i yalawe, i vikiki amba i dagewe, iŋa, “Len loŋweghathɨ i nasiye. Buda kaiwae mo numoghegheiwo?”
40014032	Vambe thenjighewoko vara thɨ vana e waŋgama na ndewendewema i mare.
40014033	Amba gharaghambuko e waŋgako thɨ kururu weya Jisas na thɨŋa, “Mbema emunjoru Loi Nariya ghen!”
40014034	Thɨ golawa Galili Njighɨniye e ghereiye na thɨ mena thɨ goru Genesaret.
40014035	Gharɨgharɨ thɨ thuwe na thɨ ghareghare amalaghɨniye Jisas, amba thɨ variya toto e ghembaghemba e valɨvaŋgako iyako na thɨ bigimenaŋgiya ghambweghambwera.
40014036	Thɨ naŋgowe na thoŋgo i vatomwe, ghambweghambwerako ma thɨ vɨghathɨ eŋge ghakwamako mbothiye, na taulaghɨko iyava thɨ vɨghathɨko riwanji i thovuye.
40015001	Parisi na mbaro gharavavaghare vavana thɨ ri Jerusalem, thɨ wa weya Jisas na thɨ vaito, thɨŋa
40015002	“Buda kaiwae ghanɨraghambuke ma thɨ ghambugha budakaiya orumburumbunda va thɨ valawe weinda? Kaiwae mbaŋa thɨ ghanɨŋga ma thɨ thavwiya nɨmanɨmanji, ŋgoreiya la kururu le woraŋgiya weinda.”
40015003	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Na ghemi buda kaiwae ma hu ghambugha budakaiya Loi va i dage weinda na ra vakatha ŋgoreiye, ko mbe hu ghambu eŋge mbe ghemi ghamithanavu?
40015004	Kaiwae Loi iŋa, ‘Mbe hu yavwatata wanaŋgiya rama na tɨna.’ Na tembe iŋava, ‘Thela i utuvatharɨ ramae na tɨnae weŋgi, thɨ tagavamare.’
40015005	Ko iyemaeŋge ghemi lemi vavaghare ŋgoreiyake: huŋa thoŋgo lolo le bigibigi lemoyo valɨkaiwae i thalavuŋgiya tɨnae na ramae, ko mbe i thovuye eŋge thoŋgo ma i giya weŋgi na ma i yavwatata wanaŋgi. Na tembe huŋava valɨkaiwae ne i dage weŋgi na iŋa, ‘Bigibigi mendava ya bigirawe kaiwami, kaero mendava ya dagerawe Loi kaiwae, mane ya giya weŋga.’
40015006	Hu utu ŋgoreiyako kaero hu kivwala Loi le mbaro na mbe hu goruweŋge lemi vavagharena iya i mena weŋgiya o rumburumbumina.
40015007	Taukwana ghemi! Aiseya, Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, va i utuŋa emunjoru, ghemi utunimi:
40015008	Loi iŋa, Gharɨgharɨke thiyake e ghaenjike njimwae thɨ yavwatata wanaŋgo, ko gharenjiko i bwagabwaga moli e ghino.
40015009	Lenji kururu weŋgo ŋgoreiya bigi bwabwaga, thɨ vavaghareŋa gharɨgharɨ lenji renuwaŋa na thɨŋava Loi le mbaro.”
40015010	Jisas i kula vathavathaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ na i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Hu vandeŋeŋgo na nuwamina i rumwaru.
40015011	Budakai i ru e ghaendake ma i vambɨghɨyainda, ko budakai i raŋgima e ghaendake, iyake i vambɨghɨyainda.”
40015012	Gharaghambu thɨ menawe na thɨŋa, “Thare u ghareghare, Parisi gharenji me gaithɨ len utuna kaiwae?”
40015013	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Bigibigike wolaghɨye iya Bwebwe e buruburu ma va i kabuŋgi ne thɨ mutuyathuŋgi.
40015014	Tha hu rerenuwaŋa kaiwanji! Thiye ŋgoranjiya gharɨgharɨ maranji i kwaghe na thɨ mando na thɨ viva weŋgiya ghanjiune vavana. Thoŋgo lolo regha marae i kwaghe i viva weya tembe marae i kwagheva, mbene thenjighewoko vara thɨ dobu e goga.”
40015015	Pita i dagewe, iŋa, “U vamanjamanjalaŋa goghaimbake iyake weime.”
40015016	Jisas i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Ko woraghambuke ghemi nuwami mbe ma i manjamanjalava?
40015017	Ma hu ghareghare? Budakai i ru e ghaendake i nja e ŋgamoinda na ve raŋgi ele kamwathɨ.
40015018	Ko budakai i raŋgima e ghaendake i mena e gharenda. Iyake i vambɨghɨyainda.
40015019	Kaiwae i raŋgima e gharenda ŋgoranji: renuwaŋa raraitharɨ, gabo, yathima, dubwara, kaivɨ, utu kwanɨkwan na ra liya ghandau ghautu.
40015020	Thiyake thɨ vambɨghɨyainda, ko ma ra thavwiya nɨmanda na ra ghanɨŋga ma i vambɨghɨyainda.”
40015021	Jisas i iteta ghembako iyako na i wa Taiya na Saidon e lenji valɨvaŋga.
40015022	Kenani wevoniye eunda, i yaku e valɨvaŋgako iyako, i mena weya Jisas. I kulakula, iŋa, “Amalana, Deivid Rumbuye, gharen i njaweŋgo! Nyao raitharɨ ina weya yawarumbuŋguno, i vakatha na i vɨrɨ laghɨye.”
40015023	Ko Jisas ma va i ndegonjogha mun. Gharaghambu thɨ mena evasiwae na thɨ naŋgo vurɨgheghewe, thɨŋa, “U variyeyathu wevoko, kaiwae i kulakula reghamba weinda.”
40015024	Jisas iŋa, “Loi va i variyeŋgo mbe wabwi Isirel eŋge kaiwanji. Thiye ŋgoranjiya sip ma e ghanjiranjimbunjimbu.”
40015025	Elako i mena i ronja e gheghe vuvuye e ghamwae na iŋa, “Amalana, u thalavuŋgo.”
40015026	I gonjoghawe, iŋa, “Ma valɨkaiwae ra wo gamagai ghanji na ra wokiyathu weŋgiya mbughambugha. Mbwata ma valɨkaiwae ya thalavuŋge.”
40015027	Elama iŋa, “Ŋgoreiye amalana. Ko iyemaeŋge mbughambugha thɨ ghana ghanɨŋga murimuriye thɨ dobu tanuwaganji ele ghamba ghanɨŋga raberabe. Iya kaiwae valɨkaiwae u thalavuŋgo.”
40015028	Amba Jisas iŋa, “Elana, len loŋweghathɨna i laghɨye. Kaero ŋgoreiya len renuwaŋana.” E mbaŋako iyako yawarumbuyema riwae i thovuye.
40015029	Jisas i iteta ghembako iyako na i ŋgalai Galili Njighɨniye ghadidiye. I voro e ou vwatae na i yaku.
40015030	Wabwi laghɨye thɨ rakamenawe, thɨ bigimenaŋgiya ghambweghambwera, thiye thɨ kuvokuvo, maranji i kwaghe, ghenji na nɨmanji i tharɨ, thiye ma e ghalɨghalɨŋanji na vavanava. Thɨ bigiraweŋgi Jisas e ghamwae na i thawariŋgi.
40015031	Gharɨgharɨma gharenji i yo laghɨye kaiwae thɨ thuweya ghalɨŋanjima i tharɨ kaero thɨ utu, ghenji na nɨmanji i tharɨ riwanji i thovuye, kuvokuvo thɨ loŋga wagiyawe na maranji i kwaghe kaero thɨ thuwe. Iya kaiwae thɨ taraweŋa Isirel lenji Loi.
40015032	Jisas i kula vathaŋgiya gharaghambu, amba iŋa, “Ghareŋgu i vɨrɨ gharɨgharɨke thiyake kaiwanji, kaiwae mbaŋa mbaŋato kaero ra yaku weindaŋgi na kaero ma e ghanji. Ma nuwaŋguiya ya variyenjoghaŋgi mbe ŋgamoŋgamoinji eŋge, ne iwaeŋge ghare thavwathavwavo i nja weŋgi e kamwathɨ mborowa.”
40015033	Gharaghambu thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Vanatherowoke; aŋgane ra vaidiya ghanɨŋga i ghanagha na ra vaghanɨŋgiya wabwike laghɨye?”
40015034	Jisas i vaitoŋgi, iŋa, “Bred mbumbuviye na weŋga?” Thɨŋa, “Mbumbupirɨ na borogi nanasiye umboviye.”
40015035	I dage weŋgiya wabwima na thiya yaku e thelauko vwatae,
40015036	amba i mbana bredɨma mbumbupirɨma na borogima, i vata ago weya Loi, i njiviyaviya na i giya weŋgiya gharaghambuma na thiye thɨ giya weŋgiya wabwima.
40015037	Taulaghɨko thiya ghanɨŋga na valɨkaiwanji. Amba gharaghambuko thɨ mbanɨŋgiya methɨ ghanɨvareŋgima na thɨ mban vanjaraŋgiya nambonambo ŋgamwapirɨ.
40015038	E ghanɨŋgako iyako tɨne ghɨmoghɨmoru lenji ghanaghanagha po tausan, ko wanakau na gamagai ma va thɨ vaonaŋgi.
40015039	Amba Jisas i variyeŋgi na thɨ raka. Amalaghɨniye i tha e waŋga na i wa Magadan ele valɨvaŋga.
