40016001	Parisi na Sadusi vavana thɨ mena weya Jisas na nuwanjiya thɨ mando. Amba thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Wo u vakatha vakatha ghamba rotaele regha na mbala i vaemunjoruŋa emunjoru Loi le vurɨgheghe ina e ghen.”
40016002	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Mbaŋa varaeko ve ronja, kaero huŋa, ‘Evole mara thovuye kaiwae buruburuko i soro,’
40016003	na mbaŋambaŋa moli huŋa, ‘Noroke i uye kaiwae buruburuko i soro na i bwedi.’ Valɨkaiwae mbema hu thuweŋge buruburuko ghayamoyamo kaero hu ghareghare budakai ne i yomara, ko iyemaeŋge ma valɨkaiwami hu vamanjamanjalaŋa budakai thɨ yoyomara e mbaŋake iyake.
40016004	Ghemi thake iyake raraitharɨ ghemi, na hu roiteta Loi ghathanavu. Nuwamiya ya vakatha nono ghamba rotaele kaiwami. Ko mane ya vakatha nono regha kaiwami. Nono ghamba rotaele mbe iyaeŋge Loi ne i giya weŋga, iyava i vakatha weya Jona.” Jisas i iteteŋaŋgi na i wa.
40016005	Vama inanji valɨmbwa, ko gharaghambu va thɨ renuwaŋa vaghalawe, ma va thɨ bigiya bred.
40016006	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Hu njimbukiki wagiyawe! Hu njimbukiki wagiyaweŋga Parisi na Sadusi lenji isɨt kaiwae.”
40016007	Gharaghambu thɨ veutu weŋgi, thɨŋa, “Meŋa ŋgoraiyako kaiwae ma mara ndewo mun bred.”
40016008	Jisas vama i ghareghareya lenji utuko amba i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Lemi loŋweghathɨna ma i laghɨye! Buda kaiwae hu veutu weŋga bred kaiwae?
40016009	Ko nuwamina mamba i rumwaru? Thare hu renuwaŋakiki bredɨma mbumbulima, va ya njiviyaviya na ghɨmoghɨmoru paeb tausan thɨ ghan, na thɨ ghanɨvareŋgi e nambonambo ŋgamwaviye hu mbanɨvanjaraŋgi?
40016010	Na thare hu renuwaŋakikiya bredɨma mbumbupirɨma, va ya njiviyaviya na po tausan ghɨmoghɨmoru thɨ ghan, na thɨ ghanɨvareŋgi e nambonambo ŋgamwaviye hu mbanɨvanjaraŋgi?
40016011	Ŋgoroŋgaeŋge na ma nuwamina i rumwaruŋa, ghino ma, ma utuutu weŋga bred kaiwae? Hu njimbukikiŋga Parisi na Sadusi lenji isɨt kaiwae!”
40016012	Gharaghambu ambama nuwanji i rumwaru Jisas ma iŋa thɨ njimbukikiŋgi bred ghaisɨt kaiwae, ko iŋa eŋge thɨ njimbukikiŋgi Parisi na Sadusi lenji vavaghare kaiwae.
40016013	Mbaŋa Jisas i wa Sisariya Pilipai ele valɨvaŋga amba i dage weŋgiya gharaghambu iŋa, “Gharɨgharɨ thɨŋa thela Lolo Nariye?”
40016014	Thɨ gonjoghawe, thɨŋa, “Vavana thɨŋa Jon Rabapɨtaiso, vavana thɨŋa Ilaija, na vavana thɨŋa Jeremaiya o Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu regha.”
40016015	I vaitoŋgi, iŋa, “Ko naka ghemi? Huŋa thela ghino?”
40016016	Saimon Pita i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ghen Krais ghen, Loi e yawayawaliye Nariye.”
40016017	Jisas iŋa, “Loi i mwaewo weŋge, Saimon Jona nariye! Kaiwae renuwaŋana iyana ma i mena weya rameyambaneke regha, Bwebwe e buruburu i woveŋge.
40016018	Ya dage weŋge, ghen Pita, na e varɨke iyake vwatae ya vatada lo ekelesiya wabwi na Seitan le wabwi ma e lenji vurɨgheghe na ne thɨ kivwala.
40016019	Ya thɨnɨgiya Loi le ghamba mbaro gheki e ghen na e len vurɨgheghe. The vakatha ne u dageten e yambaneke Loi ne i dageten e buruburu, na the vakatha ne u vatomwe e yambaneke Loi ne i vatomwe e buruburu.”
40016020	Amba i dage vavurɨgheghe weŋgiya gharaghambu na thava thɨ utugiya weya lolo regha na thɨŋa iye Krais.
40016021	E mbaŋako iyako Jisas i utukai vara weŋgiya gharaghambu iŋa, “Wo ya wa Jerusalem na randeviva, ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na mbaro gharavavaghare thɨ vakatha vuyowo laghɨye e ghino. Ne thɨ vakathaŋgo na ya mare na mbaŋa theghetoninji e tɨne kaero ya thuweiruva.”
40016022	Pita i vaŋgwa Jisas na mbe thiye eŋge amba i dagewe iŋa, “Amalana, Loi thava i vatomwe na ŋgoreiye! Bigike iyake thava ne i yomara e ghen.”
40016023	Jisas i ndevaghɨle na i dage weya Pita, iŋa, “U mena e ghereiŋguke, Seitan! Ghen ŋgorana ghamba thalatɨva e ghino, len renuwaŋana ma i reŋa Loi ele renuwaŋa, i reŋa gharɨgharɨ e lenji renuwaŋa.”
40016024	Amba Jisas i dage weŋgiya gharaghambu, iŋa, “Thoŋgo thela nuwaiya i ghambuŋgo, tembe ghamberegha i botewo iya nuwaeko nuwaiya i vakatha na i wovaira ghakros na i wo na i ghambuŋgo.
40016025	Iya kaiwae thela tembe ghamberegha nuwaiya i vamora yawaliye, ne i thɨvaghawa yawaliye, na thela ne i thɨvaghawa yawaliye ghino kaiwaŋgu ne i vaidiya yawalɨ memeghabananiye.
40016026	Ŋgoroŋga ghathovuye thoŋgo lolo regha i wo yambaneke laghɨye na i mbaroŋa, ko iyemaeŋge i thɨvaiya yawalɨ memeghabananiye? Ne i wo budakai na i vamodanjogha yawaliyekowe?
40016027	Kaiwae Lolo Nariye ne i mena weiye Ramae le vurɨgheghe, weiyaŋgiya le Nyao Thovuthovuye, na i vamodo lolo regha na regha ŋgoreiya le kaiwo.
40016028	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, gharɨgharɨ vavana inanji gheke thiye wo ne thɨ thuweya Lolo Nariye i mena weiye le mbaro e yambaneke amba muyai thɨ mare.”
40017001	Mbaŋa theghewona e ghereiye Jisas i vaŋguŋgiya Pita, Jemes na ghaghae Jon, i viva weŋgi na thɨ voro e ou molao regha mbe thiye eŋge vara.
40017002	E maranji Jisas ghayamoyamo i ghenevaghɨle, ghamwae i ndalandala ŋgoreiye varae mara mbouye na ghakwama kakaleva na marambwelambwelawae.
40017003	Amba Mosese na Ilaija thɨ yomara na thɨ thuweŋgi e maranji thɨ utu weinji Jisas.
40017004	Pita i dagewe Jisas, iŋa, “Amalana, i thovuye inanda gheke! Thoŋgo nuwaniya ne ya vatada yoŋathowathowa ŋgoloto gheke, ŋgolora ghen, ŋgolora Mosese, na ŋgolora Ilaija.”
40017005	Mbaŋa i utuutu ŋgalɨlɨ marambwelambwelawae i ghavo tomuŋgi na Loi i dage e ŋgalɨlɨko, iŋa, “Iyake Naruŋgu valɨghareghareŋgu, i vakathaŋgo ya warari laghɨye moli. Hu vandeŋe wagiyawe!”
40017006	Mbaŋa gharaghambuko thenjighetoko thɨ loŋweya ghalɨghalɨŋako thɨ mararu laghɨye moli, thɨ dobu na ghamwanji i nja e thelauko vwatae.
40017007	Jisas i mena weŋgi i vɨghathɨŋgi na iŋa, “Hu thuweiru, tha hu mararu!”
40017008	Thɨ ghɨmara voro na ma thɨ vaidi eŋge Jisas ghamberegha.
40017009	Jisas na gharaghambuma thenjighetoma thɨ njama e ouko, i dage vurɨgheghe weŋgi, iŋa, “Mbala hu ravunyivunyiya bigiko mohu thuwe e ouko vwatae. Ne hu utuŋa weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ thembaŋa Lolo Nariye ne le mare na le thuweiru e ghereiye.”
40017010	Amba gharaghambu thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Buda kaiwae mbaro gharavavaghareŋgi thɨŋava Ilaija ne i menakai amba muyai Mesaiya i mena?”
40017011	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Emunjoru Ilaija ne i menakai na i vanamwe bigibigike wolaghɨye.
40017012	Ko iyemaeŋge, ya dage e ghemi, Ilaija kaero mendava i mena na mava thɨ ghareghare thela amalaghɨniye, ko va thɨ vakatha thambo renuwaŋa nuwanjiya thɨ vakathawe. Tembene thɨ vakathava vɨrɨ ŋgoreiyako e ghino, Lolo Nariye.”
40017013	Amba gharaghambu nuwanji i manjamanjala na thɨŋa, “Ko ana me utuuta Jon Rabapɨtaiso utuniye iya meŋake, ‘Ilaija kaero mendava i mena.’ ”
40017014	Mbaŋa thɨ njogha weŋgiya wabwima laghɨye, amba amala regha i mena weya Jisas, i ronja e ghe vuvuye e ghamwae
40017015	na iŋa, “Amalana, u gharevɨrɨ naruŋguko kaiwae, kaiwae umbaliye e ghagida na mbaŋa i ghanagha maramara thɨ ndeghathɨ na i dobu e ndɨghe une o e mbwa tɨne na i vɨrɨ laghɨye moli.
40017016	Ma vaŋgumena weŋgiya ghanɨraghambuke, ko ma valɨkaiwanji methɨ thawari.”
40017017	Jisas iŋa, “Ghemi thake iyake ma e lemi loŋweghathɨ na ghamithanavu raraitharɨ. Ŋgoroŋga mbaŋa le molamolao ne ya yaku weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi? Ŋgoroŋga mbaŋa le molamolao ne ya ghataŋaghathɨŋga? Hu vaŋgumena weŋgo!”
40017018	Jisas i dage vurɨgheghe weya nyaoma raitharɨ na i raŋgi weya theghama, na e mbaŋako iyako riwae i thovuye.
40017019	Amba gharaghambu mbe thɨye eŋge thɨ menawe na thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Buda kaiwae ghime ma me valɨkaiwame wo dagewe nyaoko raitharɨ na i raŋgi?”
40017020	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Kaiwae lemi loŋweghathɨna ma i laghɨye. Ya dage emunjoru weŋga, thoŋgo e lemi loŋweghathɨ, othembe nasiye moli ŋgoreiya umbwama masɨtedɨma mbouye, valɨkaiwami hu dage weya ouke iyake, ‘U roiteta ghambana u wa gheko,’ ne i vakatha ŋgoreiye. Thoŋgo e lemi loŋweghathɨ ma bigi regha ne i vuyowo weŋga.
40017021	Ko nyao raitharɨ ŋgorako mane i raŋgi bwaga, mbene ra naŋgo na ra ghataŋaghathɨgha bada naŋgoko kaiwae ambane ŋgoreiye.”
40017022	Mbaŋa gharaghambu thɨ mevathavatha Galili amba Jisas i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Mbaŋa nasiye thɨ vaŋguraweya Lolo Nariye gharɨgharɨ e nɨmanji,
40017023	na thɨ tagavamare, ko mbaŋa theghetoniye e tɨne kaero i thuweiruva.” Gharaghambu va thɨ loŋweya iyako nuwanji i tharɨ laghɨye.
40017024	Mbaŋa vama thɨ mena Kapenaom, Ŋgolo Boboma ghatakis gharamban thɨ mena thɨ vaito Pita, “Lemi Ravavagharena thare i vamodo takis Ŋgolo Boboma kaiwae?”
40017025	Pita iŋa, “Ŋgoreiye.” Mbaŋa Pita ve ru e ŋgolo tɨne, Jisas i dagekaiwe iŋa, “Saimon, ŋgoroŋga len renuwaŋa? Mbaŋa yambaneke ghakiŋ thɨ mbana takis, ŋgoroŋga thɨ mban weŋgiya onanarinji o gharɨgharɨ ma lenji bodaboda weŋgi?”
40017026	Pita iŋa, “Gharɨgharɨ ma lenji bodaboda weŋgi.” Jisas iŋa, “Onanarinji mane thɨ vamodo takis. Tembe ŋgoreiyeva, ghino mbala mbe ma ya vamodova Bwebwe le ŋgolo ghatakis.
40017027	Ko ma nuwandaiya ra vakatha Ŋgolo Boboma ghatakis gharamban na gharenji i gaithɨ weinda, ma u wa eŋge e njighɨ na vo liyathu len thiyo. The borogiya u kosikai vara, u wo na u tate ghaena na u vaidiya mani, i ghanagha na ne valɨkaiwae ghen na ghino la takis Ŋgolo Boboma kaiwae. U mban na vo vamodowe.”
40018001	Va e mbaŋako iyako Jisas gharaghambu thɨ menawe na thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Thela idae i laghɨye Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne?”
40018002	I kula weya ŋgama nasiye regha na i ndeghathɨ gharaghambu e tɨnenji,
40018003	amba iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thoŋgo ma hu vɨva ghamithanavu na ŋgoramiya ŋgama nasiye, mane vohu ru Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne.
40018004	Thela thoŋgo ghathanavu i ghenenja ŋgoreiya ŋgamake iyake, iye idae i laghɨye Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne.
40018005	Na thela thoŋgo i kulavatha ŋgama regha ŋgora iyake e idaŋgu, ŋgoreiya i kulavathaŋgo.”
40018006	“Thoŋgo ra wo varɨ laghɨye na ra ŋgara loloko iyako e numwe na ra wokiyathu e ŋambuwoko tɨne, lithɨko iyako i laghɨye. Ko iyemaeŋge Loi ne i giya lolo regha ghalithɨ i laghɨye moli thoŋgo i vakatha ŋgama ŋgoreiyake regha i vakatha tharɨ na ma i loŋweghathɨŋgo.
40018007	O, yambane! Yambaneke i tharɨ kaiwae bigibigi lemoyo inanji e yambaneke i vakathaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ vakatha tharɨ. Emunjoru bigibigike thiyake thɨ yoyomara, ko loloko iya i vakathaŋgi na thɨ yoyomarako Loi ne i lithɨwe laghɨye moli.”
40018008	“Thoŋgo gheghenɨna o nɨmanɨna i vakathaŋge na u vakatha tharɨ, u kitenɨyathu. I thovuye eŋge thoŋgo ma e gheghen na nɨmanɨman na u vaidiya yawalɨ memeghabananiye. Thava nɨmanɨmanɨna theghewona na gheghenɨna theghewona thɨ wokiyathuruwoŋge e ndɨgheko iya i meghabanako e tɨne.
40018009	Na thoŋgo maranɨna regha i vakathaŋge na u vakatha tharɨ, u vovavuthuyathu na u wokiyathu. I thovuye moli maran mbe voghɨra eŋge na u vaidiya yawalɨ memeghabananiye, na thava maramaranɨna voghɨwona thɨ wokiyathuruwoŋge Gehena, iya ndɨghe memeghabananiye e tɨne.”
40018010	“Hu njimbukikiŋga, tha hu njimbunjoŋanjoŋaŋgiya gamagai ŋgoreiye reghake iyake. Ya dage e ghemi lenji nyao thovuthovuye e buruburu, mbaŋake wolaghɨye thiya yaku Bwebwe e ghamwae e buruburu.
40018011	Lolo Nariya Ghino ya mena ya vamoruŋgiya gharɨgharɨ thiya ghawe.”
40018012	“Ŋgoroŋga lemi renuwaŋa? Thoŋgo lolo regha ele sip hothaŋarɨ na regha i ghawe, ne i vakatha budakai? Ne i iteteŋgiya iyesiwo na umbosiwo e ou vwatae na i wa ve tamweya iya me ghaweko.
40018013	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, mbaŋa ne i vaidi, le warari i laghɨye moli i kivwala le warari iyesiwo na umbosiwo kaiwanji iya ma thɨ ghaweko.
40018014	Tembe ŋgoreiyeva Ramami e buruburu ma le renuwaŋa ŋgoreiya nanasiyeke ŋgoranjiyake regha i ghawe.”
40018015	“Thoŋgo ghagha i vakatha thanavu raitharɨ e ghen, u wawe na mbe themighewona eŋge, na u woraŋgiya le tharɨna. Thoŋgo i wovatha len utuna, kaero ghamwami vanaorava wein.
40018016	Ko thoŋgo ma i wovatha ghalɨŋana, u vaŋgwa lolo reghava o theghewo, weinaŋgi, mbala the bigibigi u woraŋgiyawe themighewoko o themigheto hu vaemunjoruŋa, iyake ŋgoreiya Mosese le Mbaro i woraŋgiya weinda.
40018017	Thoŋgo ma i goru weya ghalɨŋanji, u wa vo woraŋgiya weŋgiya ekelesiya, na thoŋgo ma i wovatha ekelesiya lenji renuwaŋa, hu vakathawe ŋgoreiya iye lolo raitharɨ o takis gharamban regha.”
40018018	“Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, the vakatha ne hu dageten e yambaneke Loi ne i dageten e buruburu, na the vakatha ne hu vatomwe e yambaneke Loi ne i vatomwe e buruburu.”
40018019	“Mbowo ya dageva e ghemi, e yambaneke thoŋgo themighewo lemi renuwaŋa regha na hu naŋgo bigi regha kaiwae, Bwebwe e buruburu ne i vakatha kaiwami.
40018020	Kaiwae thoŋgo themighewo o themigheto hu mevathavatha e idaŋgu, ghino mbe inaŋguwe.”
40018021	Amba Pita i mena weya Jisas na i vaito iŋa, “Amalana, thoŋgo ghaghaŋgu i vakatha tharɨ e ghino, mbaŋaviye ne ya nuwoyathu le tharɨko? Mbe mbaŋapirɨ eŋge?”
40018022	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Thava mbe mbaŋapirɨ eŋge, mbaŋathaŋarɨ na mbaŋake wolaghɨye.”
40018023	“Iya kaiwae Loi le ghamba mbaro ŋgora iyake: Kiŋ regha va nuwaiya i tamweya le rakakaiwo ghanjighaga.
40018024	Mbaŋa i woraweya le tamweko rɨghe, thɨ vaŋgumena ghɨmoru reghawe, gheghaga i laghɨye moli ŋgoreiya miliyon Kina.
40018025	Ma va valɨkaiwae i vamodo, ghagiyama iŋa na amalaghɨniye, levo na le ŋgaŋga na lenji bigibigiko wolaghɨye, thɨ vavakuneŋaŋgi na thɨ tabo na rakakaiwobwaga, i mbana maniko na i vamodo gheghagakowe.”
40018026	“Rakakaiwoma i ronja e gheghe vuvuye e ghamwae na i naŋgo vurɨgheghewe iŋa, ‘U ghataŋaghathɨ na wo u roroghagha, tene ya vamodonjoghavao.’
40018027	Ghagiyama i gharevɨrɨ kaiwae amba i rakayathu gheghagama na i dagewe ma tene i vamodova.”
40018028	“Ko mbaŋa rakakaiwoko iyako i raŋgi, i vaidiya mbe le valɨrakakaiwo reghava. Va i ghaga weya amalaghɨniye, iya me raŋgima, ko mava i laghɨye ŋgoreiya Kina ghɨviyeŋge. I yalawe e numwe na iŋa, ‘U vamodo manina va u ghagana weŋgo!’ ”
40018029	“Le valɨrakakaiwoma i ronja e gheghe vuvuye e ghamwae na i naŋgo vurɨgheghewe iŋa, ‘U ghataŋaghathɨ na wo u roroghagha, tene ya vamodonjoghavao.’ ”
40018030	“Ko iyemaeŋge va i botewo na iŋa na thɨ vaŋguruwo e thiyo gheghada i vamodo ghaghagako.
40018031	Rakakaiwoma vavanava thɨ thuweya ghanjiuko le vakatha weya gheuko na nuwanji i tharɨ laghɨye kaiwae. Thɨ wa weya giyama na vethɨ utugiya bigibigiko wolaghɨyewe.”
40018032	“Amba ghanjigiyama i kula ruwo rakaiwoma na iŋa, ‘Ghen rakakaiwo raithara ghen. Ghanɨghagama wolaghɨye e ghino kaero ya nuwoyathu ŋgoreiya me len naŋgo ma e ghino.
40018033	Mbala gharen me nja weya ghanuna ŋgoreiya ghino, ghareŋgu me njaweŋge.’
40018034	Ghagiyama ghare i gaithɨ laghɨye, i vaŋgugiya na ve yaku e thiyo gheghada i vamodavao gheghagako.”
40018035	Jisas iŋa, “Bwebwe e buruburu ne i vakatha ŋgoreiyako weŋga, taulaghɨna ghemi, thoŋgo ma hu numoyathuŋgiya ghamunena lenji tharɨ e gharemina.”
40019001	Mbaŋa Jisas i utuvao utuutuke thiyake, i iteta Galili le valɨvaŋga na i wa Judiya ele valɨvaŋga, e Walaghɨta Jorɨdan valɨvaŋga i vorovoro.
40019002	Wabwi laghɨye thɨ rakambele na i thawariŋgiya ghambweghambwera e wabwiko iyako tɨne.
40019003	Parisi vavana thɨ menawe na thɨ munjeva thɨ mando, thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Thare la mbaro i vatomwe na valɨkaiwae lolo regha i yawo weiye levo na rɨghe mbe amalaghɨniye i ghareghare?”
40019004	I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Mbe hu vaona Buk Boboma iya iŋake, ‘Va i rikowe Ravakavakatha i vakathaŋgiya ghɨmoru na wevo.’
40019005	Tembe iŋava, ‘Iyake kaiwae ghɨmoru i iteteŋgiya ramae na tɨnae, i tubwe weiye levo, na thenjighewoko ŋgoranjiya ririwo regha.’
40019006	Ma methɨ tabona gharɨgharɨ thenjighewo, nandere. Kaero thɨ tabona ririwo regha. Iya kaiwae budakaiya Loi vama i tubwe, thava te lolo reghava i rakayathu.”
40019007	Parisi mbowo thɨ vaitova, thɨŋa, “Ghen mo utuna ŋgorana, buda kaiwae eŋge Mosese va i woraweya mbaro, thoŋgo ghɨmoru nuwaiya i botewo levo, wo i vakathakaiya botewo ghapeipa na i ligiya weya levo, amba muyai i variyeyathu.”
40019008	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi, iŋa “Mosese va i vatomweya yawo kaiwae gharemi i vurɨgheghe. Ko va i rikowe ma va ŋgoreiye.
40019009	Ya dage e ghemi, thoŋgo lolo regha i yawo weiye levo, othembe wevoko ma i yathima, na kaero i vaŋguva wevo togha, amalaghɨniye i yathima.”
40019010	Gharaghambu thɨ dagewe, thɨŋa, “Thoŋgo ghe ghambaro ŋgoreiyako, i thovuye moli thava ra ghe.”
40019011	Jisas i dage weŋgi, “Lemi renuwaŋana iyena ma gharɨgharɨke taulaghɨ kaiwanji, ko mbe iyaeŋge thavala Loi kaero i giya weŋgi.
40019012	Gharɨgharɨ vavana ma valɨkaiwae thɨ ghe kaiwae vambe thɨ virɨghambɨ. Vavana ma thɨ ghe kaiwae gharɨgharɨ thɨ vakathaŋgi na ma valɨkaiwanji. Vavana ma thɨ ghe kaiwae tembe ghanjimberegha thɨ dagetenɨŋgi Loi le ghamba mbaro kaiwae. Thela thoŋgo valɨkaiwae i wo renuwaŋake iyake, amba i wo.”
40019013	Gharɨgharɨ vavana thɨ bigimenaŋgiya gamagai weya Jisas, na i bigirawe nɨmanɨmae weŋgi na i naŋgo kaiwanji, ko iyemaeŋge gharaghambu thɨ ŋaelɨmbiya weŋgiya gharɨgharɨko.
40019014	Jisas iŋa, “Hu vatomweŋgiya gamagai na thɨ rakamena weŋgo, thava hu dagetenɨŋgi, kaiwae Loi le ghamba mbaro ina weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ ŋgoranjiya thiyena.”
40019015	I bigirawe nɨmanɨmae e riwanji na i naŋgo weya Ramae ghare weŋgi amba i iteta ghembako iyako.
40019016	Mbaŋa regha amala regha i mena weya Jisas na i vaito, iŋa, “Ravavaghare, thambo vakatha thovuye ne ya vakatha na ya vaidiya yawalɨ memeghabananiye?”
40019017	Jisas i dagewe, iŋa, “Buda kaiwae u vaitoŋgo thovuye kaiwae? Mbe lolo reghaeŋge vara iye i thovuye. Thoŋgo nuwaniya u vaidiya yawalɨ memeghabananiye, u ghambuŋgiya Loi le mbaro.”
40019018	Amalama i vaito, iŋa, “The mbaroŋgi?” Jisas i gonjoghawe, iŋa, “Tha u gabo, tha u yathima, tha u kaivɨ, tha u wonjowe bwagabwaga,
40019019	u yavwatata wanaŋgiya rama na tɨna, na u gharethovu weya ghanu ŋgoreiya u gharethovu e ghen.”
40019020	Amalama i dagewe, “Mbaroŋgike wolaghɨye thiyake kaero ya ghambuvaoŋgi. Budakai mbowo i kwarava e ghino?”
40019021	Jisas i dagewe, iŋa, “Thoŋgo nuwaniya u rumwaru moli, u wa vo vakuneŋaŋgiya len bigibigina, u giya manina weŋgiya mbinyembinyeŋgu; amba ne u vwenyevwenye e buruburu, na u mena u ghambuŋgo.”
40019022	Mbaŋa i loŋweya utuko iyako, i wa weiye le nuwatharɨ laghɨye, kaiwae le gogomwau i laghɨye moli.
40019023	Jisas i dage weŋgiya gharaghambu, iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ravwenyevwenye le ru ne i vuyowo Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne.
40019024	Mbowo ya dageva e ghemi, i vuyowo moli weya kamel na i komughathara e nyilɨ yathiye, ko i vuyowo laghɨye moli weya ravwenyevwenye le ru Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne.”
40019025	Mbaŋa gharaghambuko thɨ loŋweya iyake, gharenji i yo laghɨye moli na thɨ vaito, thɨŋa, “Thela eŋge ne i vaidiya vamoru?”
40019026	Jisas i vonjimbughathɨŋgi na iŋa, “Iyake, gharɨgharɨ ma valɨkaiwanji, ko Loi iye valɨkaiwae bigibigike wolaghɨye.”
40019027	Pita i dagewe iŋa, “Wo u thuwe, wo iteteŋgiya bigibigike wolaghɨye na wo ghambuŋge. Budakai ne ina gheko kaiwame?”
40019028	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi ne e yambane togha, mbaŋa Lolo Nariye ne i yaku ele ghamba yaku vwenyevwenye ghemi woraghambu themiyaworo na themighewona, ne hu yaku e ghamba yaku theyaworo na theghewo na hu mbaroŋgiya uu theyaworo na theghewo Isirel e tɨne.
40019029	Na thela i iteta le ŋgolo, oghaghae, oloulouye, ramae, tɨnae, le ŋgaŋga, na le thelau idaŋgu kaiwae, ne i vaidiya bigibigiko thiyako laghɨye moli na e vwataeva, na i vaidiya yawalɨ memeghabananiye.
40019030	Ko thavala noroke thɨ laghɨye na thɨ viva ne thɨ muyai na thavala noroke thɨ nasiye na thɨ muyai ne thɨ viva.”
40020001	Loi le ghamba mbaro ŋgoreiyake. Amala regha, vambe mbaŋambaŋa ma i raŋgi na i tamweŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, i naŋgoŋgi na thɨ kaiwo ele waenɨko ghanjiuma.
40020002	Amalama iŋa ne i vamodaŋgi ŋgoreiya mbaŋa regha modae, silva gethɨra. Gharɨgharɨma lenji renuwaŋa ŋgoreiye amba i variyeŋgi waenɨma e ghauma tɨne.
40020003	Mbaŋa ghalughawoghawo ŋgoreiya naen klok amalama mbowo i raŋgiva, i wa e ghamba maket. I vaidiŋgiya gharɨgharɨ vavana thiya yaku bwaga ma e ghanjikaiwo,
40020004	i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Ghemi ŋgoreiye, vou kaiwo elo waenɨko ghanjiuma. Ne ya vamodo wagiyaweŋga ŋgoreiya renuwaŋa iŋa na mane ya vakatha vatharɨ weŋga.”
40020005	Kaero thɨ wa. Ghararaghɨye mboro na tɨri klok i wa na tembe ve vakatha va ŋgoreiye.
40020006	Mbala vama i wo paeb klok, amalama mbowo i wava e ghamba maketɨma na ve vaidiŋgiya gharɨgharɨ vavana thɨ ndendeghathɨ. I vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Buda kaiwae huya ndeghathɨ ghena? Mbaŋake laghɨye mohuya ndebwagabwaga moli.”
40020007	Thɨ gonjoghawe, thɨŋa, “Kaiwae ma lolo regha me giya kaiwo weime.” I dage weŋgi, “Hu wa na vou kaiwo elo waenɨko ghanjiuma.”
40020008	Vama yeghɨyeghɨye moli amba umama tanuwagae i dage weya rakakaiwoko ghanjiranjimbunjimbu iŋa, “U kula weŋgiya rakakaiwoko na u giya modanji. U giyakai weŋgiya ma kula reghambama na vo giyavun weŋgiya ma kulakaiŋgima.”
40020009	Thiye methɨ kaiwo reghambama, ŋgoreiya paeb klok ele valɨvaŋga, thɨ mena na i giya modanji ŋgoreiya mbaŋa regha modae, silva gethɨra iya.
40020010	Mbaŋa thiyema methɨ kaiwokaima thɨ mena, thɨ munjeva ne modanji i divoro, ko iyemaeŋge thɨ mban tembe ŋgoreiyeva mbaŋa regha modae, silva gethɨra iya lolo regha.
40020011	Mbaŋa thɨ mbana modanji, thɨ liya umama tanuwagae ghautu,
40020012	thɨŋa, “Gharɨgharɨke iya mo vaŋguŋgike muyai, methɨ kaiwo mbaŋa ubotu moli na mo giya modanji mboromboro weimaŋgi, ko iyemaeŋge ghime mo vaidiya vuyowo laghɨye, mo vakatha mbaŋa regha ghakaiwo na wo ghataŋaghathɨgha varae le vurɨgheghe weime.”
40020013	Ko umama tanuwagae i dage weya ghanjiu regha iŋa, “Wou, ma ma vakatha vatharɨ e ghen. Mo warariŋa u kaiwo mbaŋa regha na modan silva gethɨra.
40020014	U mbana modana na u wa. Nuwaŋguiya ya giya loloke iya ma vaŋgureghambake modae mboromboro weiye ma giyana e ghen.
40020015	Ko ma valɨkaiwaŋgu wombereghake ya vakatha lo manike ŋgoreiya lo renuwaŋake? Ma valɨkaiwae u yamwanja kaiwae ghino ya mwaewo weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ.”
40020016	Iya kaiwae Jisas i govun, iŋa, “Thavala noroke thɨ viva ne thɨ rereghamba na thavala noroke thɨ rereghamba ne thɨ viva.”
40020017	Jisas i loŋgaloŋga Jerusalem kaiwae, i vaŋguŋgiya gharaghambu na mbe thiye eŋge na i layo utuutu weŋgi iŋa,
40020018	“Kaero ra loŋgaloŋga Jerusalem kaiwae, na gheko ne thɨ vaŋgugiya Lolo Nariye weŋgiya ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na mbaro gharavavaghare. Ne thɨ vakatha ghambaro na i mare,
40020019	na thɨ vaŋgugiya weŋgiya thiye ma Jiu gharɨgharɨniye na thɨ utuvatharɨ kaiwae, thɨ yabɨbɨ na thɨ ŋge e kros vwatae. Ko mbaŋa ne theghetoniye e tɨne kaero i thuweiru na ma e yawayawaliyeva.”
40020020	Amba Sebedi le ŋgaŋgama thenjighewoma tɨnanji i mena weya Jisas weiyaŋgi, i ronja e gheghe vuvuye e ghamwae na i naŋgowe.
40020021	Jisas i dagewe, iŋa, “Nuwaniya budakai?” Iŋa, “Nuwaŋguiya u dagerawe e ghino, mbaŋa ne inan e len ghamba mbaro tɨne, lo ŋgaŋgake thenjighewoke thiyake; regha ne i yaku e unena na regha e moina.”
40020022	Jisas i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Ma hu ghareghare, hu naŋgo weya budakai. Valɨkaiwami ne hu mun e vɨrɨke ghakom iya ghino ne ya munɨkewe?” Thɨ gonjoghawe, thɨŋa, “Ŋgoreiye, valɨkaiwame eŋge.”
40020023	I dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Emunjoru, tene hu mun e wokomuke, ko ma valɨkaiwaŋgu yaŋa thela i yaku e uneŋguke na thela e moiŋguke. Ghamba yakuke thiyake Bwebwe va i vivatharawe, thavala i tuthiŋgi kaiwanji.”
40020024	Mbaŋa gharaghambuma theyaworoma thɨ loŋweya iyake gharenji i gaithɨwanaŋgiya ghewoko na ghaghae.
40020025	Jisas i kula vathaŋgi, mbema taulaghɨko vara na iŋa, “Kaero hu ghareghare, thiye ma Jiu lenji rambarombaro thɨ mbaroŋaŋgi na lenji randeviva lenji vurɨgheghe i varinjoŋaŋgi.
40020026	Ko ghemi, thava ŋgoramiya iyako. Thela thoŋgo nuwaiya iye lolo laghɨye e tɨnemina, iye wo i tabo na lemi rakakaiwo.
40020027	Thela thoŋgo nuwaiya i ndeviva weŋga wo i tabo na lemi rakakaiwobwaga,
40020028	ŋgoreiya Lolo Nariye, mava i mena na mbala thɨ kaiwo kaiwae, ko i mena na i kaiwo gharɨgharɨ kaiwanji na i vatomwe yawaliye i vamodonjoghaŋgi e lenji tharɨ tɨne.”
40020029	Mbaŋa Jisas na gharaghambu thɨ iteta Jeriko, wabwi laghɨye thɨ rakareghamba weŋgi.
40020030	E mbaŋako iyako, gharɨgharɨ thenjighewo, maranji i kwaghe, thɨ yaku e kamwathɨko ghadidiye. Mbaŋa thɨ loŋweya Jisas i mena na ma i vaiteteŋgi, thɨ kula thɨŋa, “Amalana, Deivid Rumbuye, gharen i nja weime.”
40020031	Wabwima thɨ ŋaevwaŋaŋgi na thɨ dage weŋgi thɨ rokubaro. Ko iyemaeŋge thɨ kula na ghalɨŋanji ma laghɨye eŋge, “Amalana, Deivid Rumbuye, gharen i nja weime.”
40020032	Jisas i ndeghathɨ na i kula weŋgi iŋa, “Nuwamiya ya vakatha budakai kaiwami?”
40020033	Thɨ gonjoghawe, thɨŋa, “Amalana, nuwameiya u vakatha maramarameke thɨ thovuye na kaero wo thuweva.”
40020034	Jisas ghare i nja weŋgi na i vɨghathɨgha maramaranji. E mbaŋako iyako kaero thɨ thuweva na thɨ ghambu.
40021001	Jisas na gharaghambu vama thɨ vurɨthaiya Jerusalem, thɨ mena Betepage, Olivɨ ghanji Ou ghembaniye regha; amba i variyeŋgiya gharaghambu thenjighewo e ghamwanji,
40021002	iŋa, “Hu wa na vou ru e ghembana e ghamwamina. Ne hu thuweya doŋɨki regha thɨ ŋgarɨghathɨ weiye nariye. Hu raka ghathiyona na hu vaŋguma weiye nariyena.
40021003	Thoŋgo lolo regha i vaitoŋga, hu dagewe huŋa, ‘Giya nuwaiya,’ na tene i variyeŋgi e mbaŋako iyako.”
40021004	Iyake va i yomara na i vaemunjoruŋa Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu ghalɨŋae iya iŋake:
40021005	Hu giya Saiyon gharɨgharɨniye yanawanji: Wo hu thuwe, lemi kiŋ maiya i ghaona weŋga. Iye ghathanavu i ghenenja, i tha e doŋɨki, i tha doŋɨki nariye e vwatae.
40021006	Gharaghambuma thɨ wa na vethɨ vakatha ŋgoreiya me dagema weŋgi.
40021007	Thɨ vaŋgumenaŋgiya doŋɨkima na nariye, thɨ bigiraweya ghanjikwama ghayaboyabo nariye e vwatae na Jisas i tha.
40021008	Wabwi laghɨye thɨ tateŋgiya ghanjikwama e kamwathɨko mara na vavana thɨ tenɨŋgiya umbwaumbwa ndamwandamwae na thɨ bigirawe.
40021009	Gharɨgharɨko iyava thɨ rakavivako na thiyeko iyava thɨ rakareghambako thɨ kula, thɨŋa: Hosana! Ra taraweŋa Deivid Rumbuye! Loi gharewe iya i mena Giya e idae! Hosana! Ra taraweŋa Loi, iye i mevoro moli!
40021010	Mbaŋa Jisas i ru Jerusalem, gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye gharenji i tagathɨn na thɨ vaito, thɨŋa, “Thelako?”
40021011	Wabwima thɨ gonjogha weŋgi, thɨŋa, “Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, Jisas, i mena Nasaret, Galili ghembaniye regha.”
40021012	Jisas i ru e Ŋgolo Boboma ghayayao tɨne na i vagege raŋgiyaŋgiya rakunekune, i mwanavevewoŋgiya yao gharaten lenji tebol na tembe ŋgoreiyeva thiye va thɨ vakuneŋaŋgiya bunebune, lenji ghamba yaku.
40021013	I dage weŋgi iŋa, “Thɨ rori Buk Boboma e tɨne Loi iŋa, ‘Lo ŋgoloke ne thɨ una idae ŋgolo ghamba naŋgo,’ ko iyemaeŋge ghemi hu vakatha ŋgoreiya rakaivɨ lenji ghamba kubaro.”
40021014	Gharɨgharɨ maramaranji i kwaghe na vavana gheghenji thiya tharɨ thɨ rakamenawe e Ŋgolo Bobomako tɨne na i thawariŋgi.
40021015	Ko mbaŋa ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na mbaro gharavavaghare thɨ thuwe vakathako thovuye i vakathaŋgi na gamagai thɨ kulakula e Ŋgolo Bobomako tɨne, thɨŋa, “Hosana! Ra taraweŋa Deivid Rumbuye,” gharenji i gaithɨwana Jisas.
40021016	Thɨ dagewe, thɨŋa, “Thare u loŋwe, ŋgoroŋga gamagaiko thɨŋa?” Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi, iŋa, “Ŋgoreiye. Mbe hu ndevaona mun bukuke iya iŋake, ‘O Loi, u vavaghareŋgiya gamagai na mbala gamagai nanasiye thɨ taraweŋaŋge.’ ”
40021017	Jisas i iteteŋgi na i raŋgi Jerusalem e tɨne, i wa Betani ve ghenawe.
40021018	Mbaŋambaŋa moli Jisas i njogha Jerusalem. E kamwathɨ mborowa bada i gharɨ.
40021019	I thuweya umbwa regha e kamwathɨko ghadidiye, idae fig, i ru na i yanyi, ko iyemaeŋge ma e uneune mbe ndamwandamwae eŋge. I dage weya umbwama iŋa, “Ma tene mbaŋa reghava u rau!” E mbaŋako iyako umbwama i mareyawowo.
40021020	Mbaŋa gharaghambu thɨ thuwe gharenji i yo. Thɨ vaito, thɨŋa, “Me ŋgoroŋga na umbwako le mare i maya?”
40021021	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thoŋgo hu loŋweghathɨ na ma hu numoghegheiwo, valɨkaiwamiya hu vakatha ŋgoreiya ma vakatha weya umbwako. Ma mbe iyako eŋge, valɨkaiwamiya ne hu dage weya ou, ‘U wa na vo dobu e njighɨko tɨne,’ ne i vakatha ŋgoreiye.
40021022	Thoŋgo hu loŋweghathɨ, the bigiya ne hu naŋgo weya Loi ne hu vaidi.”
40021023	Mbaŋa Jisas i ru e Ŋgolo Boboma ghayayao tɨne na i vavaghare, ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na randevivaŋgi thɨ menawe na thɨ vaito, thɨŋa, “U vata thela ele mbaro vwatae na u vakathaŋgiya bigibigike thiyake? Thela i giya vurɨgheghe e ghen?”
40021024	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ghino tembe ŋgoreiyeva, wo ya vaitoŋga vaito regha na thoŋgo hu wogiya ghathombe e ghino, ghino tembe ŋgoreiyeva ne ya utuŋa e ghemi ya vata thela ele mbaro vwatae na ya vakathaŋgiya bigibigike thiyake.
40021025	Jon le rɨghe na i bapɨtaiso, i mena weya Loi o i mena weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ?” Mbe thiye eŋge thɨ veutu weŋgi, thɨŋa, “Thoŋgo raŋa, ‘I mena weya Loi’ ne iŋa, ‘Buda kaiwae na mava hu loŋweghathɨgha Jon?’
40021026	Ko thoŋgo raŋa, ‘I mena weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ,’ ra mararuŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, kaiwae thɨ ghareghare Jon iye Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu.”
40021027	Iya kaiwae thɨ gonjogha weya Jisas, thɨŋa, “Ma wo ghareghare.” I dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Ghino tembe ŋgoreiyeva, mane ya utuŋa e ghemi, ya vata thela e vwatae na ya vakathaŋgiya bigibigike thiyake.”
40021028	Jisas i gotubwe iŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga lemi renuwaŋa? Amala regha le ŋgaŋga thenjighewo. I wa weya virɨviva na ve dagewe, iŋa ‘Naruŋgu, noroke u wa na vo kaiwo e uma.’
40021029	I gonjogha weya ramae iŋa, ‘Ya botewo,’ ko va muyai i vɨva le renuwaŋa na i wa.
40021030	Amalama i wa weya nariyema regha na ve dagewe tembe ŋgoreiyeva me dage weya virɨvivama. Nariyema iŋa, ‘Ŋgoreiye Bwebwe, tene ya wa,’ ko iyemaeŋge ma va i wa.
40021031	Thenjighewoko, thela i vakatha ŋgoreiya ramanji le renuwaŋa?” Thɨŋa, “Iya virɨvivama.” Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, takis gharamban na wanakau thɨ mbana riwanji modae, thiye hu rerenuwaŋa kaero thɨ vurɨmban Loi le ghamba mbaro e ghakamwathɨ. Valɨkaiwanjiya ne thɨ ru ko iyemaeŋge ghemi mane hu ru.
40021032	Kaiwae Jon Rabapɨtaiso va i mena weŋga, i vaghareŋga thanavu thovuye ghakamwathɨ na ma hu loŋweghathɨ, ko takis gharamban na wanakau thɨ mbana riwanji modae, thiye eŋge thɨ loŋweghathɨ. Othembe va hu thuweŋgi thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiyako, ko mava hu vɨva ghamithanavu na hu loŋweghathɨgha Jon le utuko.”
40021033	Jisas iŋa, “Mbowo ya utuŋava goghaimba regha na hu loŋwe: Lolo regha va i kabu waen ghauma, i gana vaghɨliya, i vakatha doda waen ghamba i imbɨimbɨ, na i vatada ŋgolo regha, umako gharanjimbunjimbu lenji ghamba yaku. I vakatha ŋgoreiyako, amba i vatomwe weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ vavana na thɨ vakaiwoŋa amalaghɨniye kaiwae. Na amalaghɨniye i wa e valɨvaŋga regha.
40021034	“Mbaŋa kaero ghambaŋa thɨ vu, umama tanuwagae i variyeŋgiya le rakakaiwo weŋgiya umama gharanjimbunjimbu na vethɨ mbana uneune amalaghɨniye kaiwae.
40021035	Umama gharanjimbunjimbu thiya laweŋgiya rakakaiwoma, thɨ ŋgeŋgeŋa regha, thɨ tagavamara regha na thɨ biriya regha e varɨ.
40021036	Amalama mbowo i variyeŋgiva le rakakaiwo vavana, seiwo i kivwala me vivama. Thɨ vakatha weŋgi tembe ŋgoreiyeva methɨ vivama.
40021037	Muyai moli i variya nariye weŋgi na iŋa, ‘Ne thɨ yavwatatawana naruŋguke.’
40021038	Ko mbaŋa ranjimbunjimbuma thɨ thuweya nariyeko, thɨŋa, ‘Umake tanuwagae nariya iyako. Amalaghɨniye ne i rombaroŋa umake ramae e ghereiye. Hu mena ra tagavamare na mbalama ra mbaroŋava iya le umake.’
40021039	Thɨ yalawe, thɨ wokiyathuraŋgiya e gana ghereiye na thɨ tagavamare.”
40021040	Jisas i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Mbaŋa ne umama tanuwagae i njoghama, ne i vakatha budakai weŋgiya umako gharanjimbunjimbu?”
40021041	Jiu lenji randevivaŋgima thɨŋa, “Ne i gaboŋgiya gharɨgharɨko raraitharɨ na i vatomweya le umako weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ totogha thɨ njimbukiki, mbala i mweghe na thɨ vu, thɨ vakatha wagiyawe uneuneko amalaghɨniye kaiwae na vethɨ giyawe.”
40021042	Jisas i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Mbe hu ndevaona mun ŋgoroŋga Buk Boboma iŋa? Varɨke iya ŋgoloke gharavatavatad va thɨ botewo na i tabo mbaghɨmbaghɨ. Iyake Giya le vakatha, na ghathuwathuwa i thovuye na i wo nuwanda.”
40021043	Jisas mbowo i dageva weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage e ghemi, Loi ne i wo le ghamba mbarona ghathovuye weŋga na i wogiya weŋgiya the vanautuma gharɨgharɨniye iya ne e yawalinjiko uneune i woraŋgiya i thovuyeŋa Loi le ghamba mbaro.
40021044	Thela ne i dobu e varɨke iyake vwatae ne i tagamunumunuwo, na thoŋgo varɨke iyake i dobu lolo regha e vwatae ne i tagavwathavwatha.”
40021045	Mbaŋa ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Parisi thɨ loŋweya Jisas le goghaimbaŋgiko, thɨ ghareghare i utuutu thiye kaiwanji.
40021046	Thɨ mando na thɨ munjeva thɨ yalawe ko iyemaeŋge thɨ mararuŋgiya wabwiko kaiwae thɨŋa iye Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu.
40022001	Jisas mbowo i goghaimbava weŋgiya gharɨgharɨma methɨ vaitoma iŋa,
40022002	“Loi le ghamba mbaro ŋgoreiya kiŋ regha, i vakatha thaga nariye le ghe kaiwae.
40022003	I variyeŋgiya le rakakaiwo, thɨ wa na vethɨ butu weŋgiya thavala ghanjikula ina e gheko ghathaga rɨghe, ko iyemaeŋge thɨ botewo na thɨ rakamena.”
40022004	“Mbowo i variyeŋgiva le rakakaiwo vavana iŋa, ‘Vou dage weŋgiya thavala mendava ya mwanavathaŋgi, vouŋa ghanɨŋga kaero i vivathavao, burumwaka va thɨ vivatharawe thagake kaiwae kaero thɨ gaboŋgi na bigibigike wolaghɨye kaero thɨko. Ma hu mena eŋge e thagake rɨghe.’ ”
40022005	“Ko thiye ma va thɨ goru weya renuwaŋako iyako na thɨ wa ŋgoreiya lenji renuwaŋa. Regha i wa ele uma tɨne, regha i wa ele sitowa
40022006	na vavana thɨ yalaweŋgiya rakakaiwoŋgima, thɨ gaboŋgi, na thɨ tagavamareŋgi.
40022007	Kiŋɨma i gaithɨ laghɨye moli, i variyeŋgiya le ragagaithɨ, thɨ gaboŋgiya gharɨgharɨko iyava thɨ gaboŋgiya le rakakaiwoma na thɨ woŋambu ghambanjiko.”
40022008	“Amba i dage weŋgiya le rakakaiwo, iŋa, ‘Ghe ghathaga kaero ya vivathavao, ko thavala mendava ya kula weŋgi ma thɨ goru weya lo kulake.
40022009	Hu wa e kamwathɨ ghavwaghavwala na thavala hu vaidiŋgi, hu dage weŋgi na thɨ mena e thagake rɨghe.’
40022010	Rakakaiwoma thɨ wa e kamwathɨŋgiko na gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye iya thɨ vaidiŋgiko, thovuthovuye o raraitharɨ, thɨ vaŋguŋgi, gheko ghathaga ghaŋgolo i riyevanjara.”
40022011	“Ko mbaŋa kiŋɨma i ru thagako e ghaŋgolo tɨne na i thuweŋgiya gharɨgharɨko, i njimbuvaidiya amala regha ma va i njimbo ghe ghakwama.
40022012	I vaito iŋa, ‘Wou, ŋgoroŋga mo mena u ruke na ma mo njimbo ghe ghakwama?’ Amalama ma e ghalɨghalɨŋae.
40022013	Amba kiŋɨma i dage weŋgiya le rakakaiwoma iŋa, ‘Hu ŋgara nɨmanɨmae na gheghe na hu wokiyathuraŋgiya eto e momouwoko tɨne ve randarandawe na i rɨghɨmbiya ŋiŋiye.’ ”
40022014	Jisas i govun iŋa, “Loi i kula weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ lemoyo, ko mbe thegheviye eŋge i tuthiŋgi.”
40022015	Amba Parisi thɨ iteta Jisas na thɨ raka vethɨ rerenuwaŋa ŋgoroŋga ne thɨŋa na thɨ vakatha ghawonjowe ele utuutuko.
40022016	Parisi thɨ variyeŋgiya ghanjiraghambu vavanawe Jisas weinjiyaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ vavana thiye thɨ ghambugha Herod le wabwi gharɨgharɨniye. Thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, wo ghareghare u utuŋa emunjoru na len vavaghare Loi le renuwaŋa gharɨgharɨ kaiwanji i rumwaru. Ma u goru weya ŋgoroŋga gharɨgharɨ lenji renuwaŋa kaiwae ma u goru weya ŋgoroŋga lolo le thimba o le laghɨlaghɨye.
40022017	Ŋgoroŋga ghen len renuwaŋa, wo u utugiyama weime. Mbaro i dage ŋgoreiye na wo vamodo takisi weya Sisa o nandere?”
40022018	Jisas kaero i ghareghareya lenji renuwaŋako raraitharɨ iya kaiwae i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Taukwana ghemi! Buda kaiwae hu munjeva hu mando na hu wonjoweŋgo.
40022019	Wo hu wovatomwe weŋgo manike iya hu vavamodo takisikowe.” Thɨ wo gethɨra na thɨ mena thɨ wogiyawe,
40022020	amba i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Thela ŋgaliŋgaliya na idae iya e manike?”
40022021	Thɨŋa, “Sisa.” Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Sisa le bigibigi hu giyawa Sisa na Loi le bigibigi hu giyawa Loi.”
40022022	Mbaŋa thɨ loŋweya iyake, gharenji i yo, thɨ itete na thɨ rakawa.
40022023	Mbaŋako iyako e tɨne Sadusi, thiye ma thɨ loŋweghathɨgha ramaremare tene thɨ thuweiruva, thɨ mena weya Jisas na thɨ vaito
40022024	thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, Mosese iŋa thoŋgo amala regha i ghe, ma ele ŋgaŋga na i mare, ghaghae ma i rovaŋguva ghɨmbwiyeko. Thoŋgo i ghambɨ weiye, gamagaiko thiyako ghaghaeko va i mareko le ŋgaŋga.
40022025	Amala regha weiyaŋgiya oghaghae, thenjighepirɨ vara, tɨnanji na ramanji regha. Laghɨyeninji va i ghe na i mare, ma ele ŋgaŋga na ghembwiyeko ghaghae kaero i rovaŋguva.
40022026	Ghaghae theghewoniye te vambe ŋgoreiyeva, theghetoninji ŋgoreiye gheghada thenjighepirɨko thɨ vaidi ŋgoreiye.
40022027	Muyai moli elaghɨniye i mare.
40022028	Ne mbaŋa ramaremare thɨ thuweiru na e yawayawalinjiva, thela ne i ghe weiye, kaiwae mbe thenjighepirɨko vara va thɨ vaŋgu?”
40022029	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Kaero hu vurɨthavwiya kamwathɨ, kaiwae ma hu ghareghareya Buk Boboma le woraŋgiya ŋgoroŋga gharumwaru na budakaiya Loi valɨkaiwae i vakatha.
40022030	Kaiwae mbaŋa ne ramaremare thɨ thuweiru na tembe e yawayawalinjiva vama tembene thɨ gheva, thiye ne ŋgoranjiya nyao thovuthovuye e buruburu.
40022031	Ramaremare lenji thuweiru na e yawayawalinji utuniye, ma hu vaona ŋgoroŋga Loi va i utuŋa weŋga? Iŋa,
40022032	‘Ghino Eibraham, Aisake na Jeikob lenji Loi.’ Loi va iŋa ŋgoreiyako mbala ra ghareghare gharɨgharɨke thiyake kaerova thɨ mare ko iyemaeŋge mbe e yawayawalinjiva. Loi, iye ma ramaremare lenji Loi ŋgoreiye, nandere, mbe thiye eŋge e yawayawalinji lenji Loi.”
40022033	Mbaŋa wabwiko thɨ loŋweya iyake, gharenji i yo le vavaghareko kaiwae.
40022034	Ko mbaŋa Parisi thɨ loŋweya Jisas i thombe Sadusi lenji vaito na i vakatha ma e ghalɨghalɨŋanji, thɨ mena thɨ wabwi na regha.
40022035	Ghanjiu regha, mbaro gharavavaghare i munjeva i mando Jisas e vaito regha,
40022036	iŋa, “Ravavaghare, the mbaro i laghɨye vara moli Mosese le mbaro e tɨne?”
40022037	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “ ‘U gharethovu weya Giya len Loi e gharena laghɨye, e unena laghɨye na e len renuwaŋana laghɨye.’
40022038	Iyake mbaro laghɨye na iviva moli.
40022039	Mbaro theghewoniye mbe laghɨyeva ŋgora iyake, iŋa, ‘U gharethovu weya ghanu ŋgoreiya u gharethovu e ghen.’
40022040	Mosese le mbaroko wolaghɨye na Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu lenji vavaghareŋgi, thɨ ndeghathɨwe iya mbaroke theghewoke thiyake.”
40022041	Mbaŋa Parisi thɨ meghɨliŋa Jisas, amba i vaitoŋgi iŋa,
40022042	“Ŋgoroŋga lemi rerenuwaŋa Mesaiya kaiwae? Iye thela rumbuye?” Thɨŋa, “Iye Deivid rumbuye.”
40022043	Jisas mbowo i vaitoŋgiva iŋa, “Ŋgoroŋgaeŋge na Nyao Boboma i vakatha Deivid i wovagiyagiyaŋa Mesaiya? Kaiwae Deivid iŋa,
40022044	‘Giya Loi i dagewe wo Giya iŋa: U yaku valɨvaŋga e uneŋguke ghaghad ne ya biginjoŋaŋgiya ghanɨthɨghɨya e gheghen raberabe.’
40022045	“Thoŋgo Deivid i una Mesaiya ‘wo Giya,’ ŋgoroŋgaeŋge na Mesaiya iye Deivid rumbuye?”
40022046	Ma te lolo reghava valɨkaiwae i thombewe na kaiwae thɨ ghareghare ma valɨkaiwae thɨ kwanɨyaro, ma te mbaŋa reghava lolo regha i giya vaito weya Jisas.
40023001	Amba Jisas i dage weŋgiya wabwima na gharaghambuma, iŋa,
40023002	“Mbaro gharavavaghare na Parisi thiye thɨ ghareghare wagiyawe Mosese le mbaro na valɨkaiwanjiya thɨ vamanjamanjalaŋa.
40023003	Iya kaiwae, hu vandeŋekikiya ghalɨŋanjiko na hu ghambugha lenji utuko wolaghɨye, ko iyemaeŋge thava hu vakatha ŋgoreiya lenji vakathako kaiwae budakaiya thɨ vakatha, ma mboromboro weiye lenji utuko.
40023004	Lenji mbaro i ghanagha moli ne thɨ giya weŋga na hu bigi, ko iyemaeŋge thiye mane nɨmanji gɨgɨra regha i nja na i thalavuŋga na hu wo vuyowoko iyako.”
40023005	“Thɨ vakathaŋgiya bigibigike wolaghɨye mbala gharɨgharɨ thɨ thuweŋgi. Nambonambo ŋgamwaiwo, thɨ vakathaŋgi na i laghɨye moli, Buk Boboma rɨgherɨghe vavana inanjiwe. Ŋgamwara thɨ ŋgarɨ e ghamwanji na ŋgamwara e nɨmanji mborowa. Tembe ŋgoreiyeva, ghanjikwama mbothiye ghabithabitha thɨ vakathaŋgi na molamolao.
40023006	Thaga e tɨne nuwanjiya vethɨ yaku ŋgora gharɨgharɨko laghɨlaghɨye lenji ghamba yaku na e lenji ŋgolo kururu tɨne vethɨ yaku e ghamba yaku thovuye gharɨgharɨ e ghamwanji.
40023007	Thoŋgo gharɨgharɨ thɨ vaidiŋgi e kamwathɨ, nuwanjiya gharɨgharɨko weiye lenji yavwatata thɨ dage mwaewo weŋgi na thɨŋa ‘Ravavaghare’ weŋgi.”
40023008	“Thava ghamunena thɨ dage weŋga na thɨŋa, ‘Ravavaghare’ kaiwae ghami Ravavaghare mbe ghambereghaeŋge na taulaghɨna ghemi mbe oghaghami eŋge iya ghamunena.
40023009	Tha hu una lolo regha e yambaneke na huŋa ramami kaiwae Ramami mbe ghambereghaeŋge ina e buruburu.
40023010	Thava gharɨgharɨ thɨ dage weŋga na thɨŋa, ‘Randeviva’ kaiwae lemi randeviva ghamberegha, iye Mesaiya.
40023011	Thela thoŋgo iye i laghɨye e tɨnemina, iye i tabo na lemi rakakaiwo.
40023012	Thela thoŋgo ghamberegha tembe i wovoreŋa Loi ne i wonjoŋa, na thela i wonjoŋa ghamberegha, Loi ne i wovoreŋa.”
40023013	“Aleu, mbaro gharavavaghare na Parisi! Taukwana ghemi! Nevole hu thovuyaona, kaiwae hu kiya Loi le ghamba mbaro ghakamwathɨ gharɨgharɨ e ghamwanji na hu botewo hu ru na thavala nuwanjiya thɨ ru hu ndegana lenji kamwathɨ.”
40023014	“Aleu, mbaro gharavavaghare na Parisi! Taukwana ghemi! Nevole hu thovuyaona! Hu bigiya bigibigike wolaghɨye weŋgiya wambwiwambwi na hu mbaroŋaŋgi. Lemi naŋgo gharɨgharɨ e maranji i molao mbala thɨ vandeŋeŋga. Lemi vakathake thiyake kaiwanji ne hu vaidiya lithɨ laghɨye moli.”
40023015	“Aleu, mbaro gharavavaghare na Parisi! Taukwana ghemi! Nevole hu thovuyaona! Vou ghɨnagha na hu loŋgatakweya vanautumake wolaghɨye. Hu mando na hu utuvɨva lolo regha nuwae na i kururu weya Loi ŋgoreiya lemi kamwathɨna. Mbaŋa i loŋweghathɨŋga, hu vakatha na i tabona Gehena loloniye moli ŋgoreiye ghemi.”
40023016	“Aleu, ghemi randeviva raraitharɨ na marami i kwaghe! Nevole hu thovuyaona! Ghemi huŋa, ‘Thoŋgo lolo regha i tholo na i una Ŋgolo Boboma, i thovuye eŋge thoŋgo ma i ghambugha dageraweko iyako; ko thoŋgo lolo regha i tholo na i una golɨko e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne, ma i thovuyewe thoŋgo ma i ghambugha dageraweko iyako.’
40023017	Unouna ghemi na marami i kwaghe! Iyaŋganiya bigi laghɨye, gol o Ŋgolo Boboma iya i vakatha golɨko na i boboma?
40023018	Ghemi tembe huŋava, ‘Thoŋgo lolo regha i tholo na i una varɨko iya ghamba vowoko, i thovuyewe eŋge thoŋgo ma i ghambugha dageraweko iyako; ko thoŋgo lolo regha i tholo na i una wogiyako iya vowoko kaiwae, ma i thovuyewe thoŋgo ma i ghambugha dageraweko iyako!’
40023019	Ghemi marami i kwaghe! Iyaŋganiya bigi laghɨye wogiya o ghamba vowoko iya i vakatha wogiyako na i boboma.
40023020	Iya kaiwae, mbaŋa thoŋgo lolo regha i tholo na i una ghamba vowoko, i tholo e ghamba vowoko weiye wogiyako iya vowoko kaiwae.
40023021	Tembe ŋgoreiyeva, mbaŋa thoŋgo lolo regha i tholo na i una Ŋgolo Boboma, i tholo e Ŋgolo Boboma na Loi, ina i yaku gheko.
40023022	Na mbaŋa thoŋgo lolo regha i tholo na i una buruburu, i tholo ele ghamba yaku thovuye na weiye Loi ghamberegha.”
40023023	“Aleu, mbaro gharavavaghare na Parisi! Taukwana ghemi! Nevole hu thovuyaona! Ghanɨŋga ŋgoreiya utha, njambao na sele, hu vakatha wabwi na wabwiyaworo na hu giya wabwira weya Loi lemi mwaewo, ŋgoreiya mbaro i woraŋgiya. Othembe hu ghambu wagiyawe mbaroko iyako, ko iyemaeŋge hu renuwaŋa valaweya mbaro laghɨlaghɨye na ma hu ghambuŋgi. Mbaro ŋgoranjiya thiyake: la vakatha i rumwaru weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, gharenda i njaweŋgiya ghandaune na ra ghambuvao Loi. Mbala hu ghambuŋgiya mbaroke thiyake na tembe ŋgoreiyeva ghanɨŋga ghanjimbaro hu ghambuŋgi.
40023024	Ghemi randeviva raraitharɨ na marami i kwaghe! Mbaro nanasiye hu ghambu wagiyaweŋgi, ko iyemaeŋge mbaro laghɨlaghɨye hu renuwaŋa valaweŋgi. Hu woraŋgiya mbilambila e ghamimbwana, ko iyemaeŋge ma hu thuwe kamel mbe umbwara vara hu kovululu weiye ghamimbwana.”
40023025	“Aleu, mbaro gharavavaghare na Parisi! Taukwana ghemi! Nevole hu thovuyaona! Ghemi ŋgoramiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ thavwi wagiyawe kom na gaeba vwatanji, ko iyemaeŋge ma thɨ thavwiya tɨnenji. Hu vakatha wagiyaweya vwatanji ko votha na kurakura thɨ riyevanjaraŋgo.
40023026	Ghemi Parisi marami i kwaghe! I viva wo hu thavwi wagiyaweya kom na gaeba tɨnenji ambane vwatanji i thɨna.”
40023027	“Aleu, mbaro gharavavaghare na Parisi! Taukwana ghemi! Nevole hu thovuyaona! Ghemi ŋgoramiya ghabubu, thɨ vanamwe vwatae na thɨ kabu jin. Ghayamoyamo i thovuye, ko e tɨneko kaka wokiwokiniye na vwatha i riyevanjara.
40023028	Ghemi ŋgoreiye, eto gharɨgharɨ thɨ thuweŋga ŋgoreiya gharɨgharɨ thovuthovuye, ko e gharemina kwan na thanavu raraitharɨ i riyevanjara.”
40023029	“Aleu, mbaro gharavavaghare na Parisi! Taukwana ghemi! Nevole hu thovuyaona! Hu vatadɨŋgiya Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu ghabubunji na hu vabithabithaŋaŋgiya gharɨgharɨko me vivako, thiye ghanjithanavu va i rumwaru, ghabubunji,
40023030	na huŋa thoŋgova hu yaku orumburumbunda e ghanjimbaŋa, mbala mava hu vakatha ŋgoreiya va thɨ vakatha na ma hu gaboŋgiya Loi ghalɨŋae gharautuŋgi.
40023031	Ko iyemaeŋge tembe ghamimberegha hu woraŋgiyaŋga, mbema gheminani orumburumbumiŋgiya iya thiye va thɨ gaboŋgiya Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu.
40023032	Ko mbema hu rombele eŋge iya thanavuna orumburumbumi va thɨ vakavakathanawe. Na ne hu vaidiya ghamilithɨwe.”
40023033	“Ghemi ŋgoramiya mwata na mwata le ŋgaŋga ghemi! Ma tene hu ghaeruva, ghemi kaero inami Gehena.
40023034	Iya kaiwae ya dage e ghemi, ne ya variyeŋgiya Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, rathimbathimba laghɨlaghɨye na ravavaghare e ghemi. Ne hu gaboŋgiya vavana, hu rokrosiŋgiya vavana, hu yabɨbɨŋgiya vavana e ŋgolo kururu tɨne na hu vagevagege loloŋga weŋgi e ghemba na ghemba.
40023035	Iyake kaiwae, ne hu vaidiya lithɨ gabo gharɨgharɨ thovuthovuye kaiwanji. Va thɨ unɨghɨkaivara Eibol na i mena le ghambako ghemi Jiu hu unɨghɨ Sakaraiya Barakaiya nariye, e Ŋgolo Boboma na ghamba vowo ghanjilughawoghawo e tɨne.
40023036	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, vakathako thiyako wolaghɨye ghalithɨ ne i nja weŋga, ghemi thake iyake.”
40023037	“O, o Jerusalem ee Jerusalem! Ghemi va hu gaboŋgiya Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu na hu tagavavamareŋgi e varɨ thavala Loi va i variyeŋgi weŋga. Mbaŋa i ghanagha nuwaŋguiya ya mbanvathavathaŋgiya ghanɨrayakuyaku ŋgoreiya kamkam manɨwevo i thogaramuramuŋgiya le ŋgaŋga e vineiye, ko iyemaeŋge ma nuwamiya ya vakatha weŋga.
40023038	Loi ne i garaiteta ghambami na ma kokowa eŋge.
40023039	Kaiwae ya dage e ghemi, ma tene hu thuweŋgova gheghada mbaŋa ne huŋa, ‘Loi ghare weya loloke iya i mena Giya Loi e idaeke.’ ”
40024001	Jisas vama i iteteŋa Ŋgolo Boboma ghayayao mbaŋaniye gharaghambu thɨ menawe na thɨ vatomweya Ŋgolo Bobomako ŋgoloŋgoloniyeŋgi.
40024002	Iŋa, “Ŋgoreiye, iya hu thuweŋgiya bigibigiko wolaghɨye. Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, mavole varɨ regha ne i ndeghathɨ ele ghamba ndeghathɨko, wolaghɨyeko nevole thɨ bigiyathuvao bode.”
40024003	Jisas va i yaku Olivɨ e ghanji Ou mbe ghambereghaeŋge na gharaghambu thɨ rakamenawe. Thɨ vaito, thɨŋa, “U utugiya weime ne thembaŋa bigibigike thiyake iya mo utuŋama weime thɨ yomara na thambo nono ne i woraŋgiya weime mbaŋa ne len mena na yambaneke le ghambako?”
40024004	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi, iŋa, “Hu njimbukiki wagiyaweŋga, tha lolo regha i yaroŋga.
40024005	Kaiwae gharɨgharɨ i ghanagha ne thɨ mena e idaŋgu na thɨŋa, ‘Ghino Mesaiya!’ na ne thɨ yaroŋgiya gharɨgharɨ i ghanagha.
40024006	Ne hu loŋweŋgiya vanautuma lenji gaithɨ utuniye na toto gaithɨ kaiwae, ko ne hu ndemararu. Bigibigike thiyake ne thɨ yomara, ko ma ghanjirumwaru ŋgoreiye mbaŋa kaero le ghambako.
40024007	Vanautuma ne thɨ vegaithɨ weŋgi; rambarombaro ne thɨ vegaithɨ weŋgi. Nevole vunuvu na ragheragheghe lemoyo e yambaneke laghɨye.
40024008	Bigibigike wolaghɨye thiyake ŋgoreiya wevo ŋgamoiye i njivunɨkai vara ghambɨ kaiwae.”
40024009	“Nevole thɨ laweŋga na thɨ vaŋgugiyaŋga weŋgiya rambarombaro na thɨ gaboŋga. Gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye ne thɨ botewoyathuŋga idaŋgu kaiwae.
40024010	E mbaŋako iyako gharɨgharɨ lemoyo ne thɨ botewo lenji loŋweghathɨ na ne thɨ vevatomweŋgi na thɨ vebotewoŋgi.
40024011	Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu kwanɨkwan lemoyo ne thɨ rakaraŋgi na thɨ yaroŋgiya gharɨgharɨ lemoyo.
40024012	Kaiwae tharɨ ghavakatha ne i mbuthu na i yala, gharɨgharɨ lemoyo lenji gharethovu ne i nasiye weŋgiya lenji valɨgharɨgharɨ.
40024013	Ko thela ne i ghataŋaghathɨŋgiya vuyowoke thiyake na gheghada le ghambako ne i vaidiya vamoru.
40024014	Na Totoke Thovuye iyake Loi le ghamba mbaro utuutuniye ne thɨ vavaghareŋa e yambaneke laghɨye na gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye thɨ ghareghare amba muyai mbaŋa le ghambako i mena.”
40024015	“Mbaŋa ne hu thuweya bigiko i vambɨghɨya Ŋgolo Boboma na i vakatha gharɨgharɨ thɨ roitetako, na i ndeghathɨ ŋgoreiye ma valɨkaiwae i ndeghathɨwe, iya Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu Daniyel va i utuŋama. (Ghemi bukuke iyake gharavavaona wo hu rerenuwaŋa ghaghadɨ nuwamina i rumwaruŋa utuke iyake!)
40024016	E mbaŋako iyako thavala inanji Judiya e tɨne thɨ rakavo na thɨ wa e ououko rɨgherɨghenji.
40024017	Lolo ina ele ŋgolo vwatae na i nja thava i ru e ŋgolo tɨne na i wo bigi regha. Mbema i vo eŋge.
40024018	Na lolo i kakaiwo e uma tɨne ne i ndenjogha e ghemba na i liya ghakwama ghayaboyabo.
40024019	Ne e mbaŋaŋgiko thiyako, ne i vuyowo laghɨye moli weŋgiya wanakau maramarabo na wanakau weinjiyaŋgiya gamagai amba thɨ thuthu!
40024020	Hu naŋgo weya Loi mbala ma hu vo mbaŋa ne njighɨnjighɨ ghambaŋa o ne Sabat.
40024021	Vuyowo ne e mbaŋako iyako ne i laghɨye, i laghɨye moli. Na vuyowoko ŋgoranjiyako ma mbaŋa regha i yomara e yambaneke va i rikowe gheghada noroke, na ma tene ŋgoreiyeva mbaŋa muyai.
40024022	Thoŋgo ma Loi i wonjoŋa mbaŋa le molamolao, mbala ma lolo regha i moru. Ko le tututhi gharɨgharɨniye kaiwae, Loi ne i wonjoŋa vuyowo ghambaŋa le molamolao.”
40024023	“Thoŋgo lolo regha i dage e ghemi iŋa, ‘Wo hu thuwe, Mesaiya maiya!’ o ‘Maiyako!’ ne hu ndeloŋweghathɨ.
40024024	Kaiwae Mesaiya kwanɨkwan na Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu kwanɨkwan ne thɨ rakaraŋgi na thɨ vakathaŋgiya vakatha ghamba rotaele i ghanagha na thɨ wo gharɨgharɨ nuwanji, na thɨ munje tembe thɨ wova Loi le tututhi gharɨgharɨniye nuwanji.
40024025	Wo hu thuwe, amba ŋgaŋgagha kaero ya giya yanawami.”
40024026	“Thoŋgo lolo regha i dage weŋga iŋa, ‘Maiyako, e njamnjam bwaga!’ Thava hu wa gheko. O thoŋgo iŋa, ‘Mbeiya e ŋgoloke,’ ne hu ndeloŋweghathɨ.
40024027	Kaiwae Lolo Nariye le mena ne ŋgoreiya i vilamema, i vilame yavorowoko na manjamanjalawae i wa ve wo bodeoko.”
40024028	“Bigi maremare aŋga inae ma rawowoidi thɨ rakavathavathawe.”
40024029	“Vuyowo e mbaŋaŋgiko thiyako e ghereiye varae mara ne i momouwo, manjala mane i mbɨle, ghɨtara ne thɨ dobu e buruburu na buruburu matemate ne thiya nyivɨvao.
40024030	Amba Lolo Nariye le mena ghanono ne i yomara e buruburu, na gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye e yambaneke thiya randa, mbaŋa ne thɨ thuweya Lolo Nariye i njama e ŋgalɨlɨ vwatanji, weiye le vurɨgheghe na vwenyevwenye laghɨye.
40024031	Ne thɨ wiya mema na ghalɨŋae laghɨye moli amba i variyeŋgiya le nyao thovuthovuye e yambaneke ghadidiye gethɨvarɨ na thɨ vaŋguvathavathaŋgiya le tututhi gharɨgharɨniye e yambaneke mbothiye regha gheghada valɨmbothiye.”
40024032	“Lemi ghamba ghareghare thovuye hu wo weya umbwa fig. Mbaŋa hu thuwe ndamwandamwa thɨ thalavwara, hu ghareghareya mbaŋa nasiye thuwai ghambaŋa.
40024033	Tembe ŋgoreiyeva, mbaŋa ne hu thuweŋgiya bigibigike thiyake thɨ yoyomara, hu ghareghare le njoghama ghambaŋa ma bwagabwaga, maiyavara.
40024034	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi thake iyake mamba ne thiya marevao ghaghad bigibigike wolaghɨye thiyake thɨ yomara.
40024035	Buruburu na yambane ne thɨko, ko ghalɨŋaŋguke mane iko.”
40024036	“Ma lolo regha i ghareghare thembaŋa na the lughawoghawo Lolo Nariye ne i menawe. Nyao thovuthovuye e buruburu ma thɨ ghareghare, Nariye ma i ghareghare, mbe Ramae ghamberegha eŋge i ghareghare ne thembaŋa.
40024037	Ghaghad thembaŋa Lolo Nariye ne i mena, gharɨgharɨ ne lenji vakatha ŋgoreiya thɨ vakatha Nowa va ghambaŋa.
40024038	Va e mbaŋaŋgiko thiyako amba muyai ŋgonuŋgo i voru na i thotho, gharɨgharɨ thɨ ghanɨŋga na thɨ munumu, ghɨmoghɨmoru na wanakau thɨ ghe, ghaghad vara e mbaŋaniye Nowa i tha e waŋgama.
40024039	Ma va thɨ ghareghare, ŋgonuŋgo na thotho raitharɨ regha maiyavara e ghamwanjina. I mena na i gabovaoŋgi. Iyako ne ŋgoreiye mbaŋa Lolo Nariye ne le mena.
40024040	E mbaŋako iyako ghɨmoghɨmoru thenjighewo ne thɨ kaiwo e uma tɨne: regha ne thɨ yovaŋgu, na regha ne thɨ itete.
40024041	Wanakau theunyiwo ne inanji wit ghamba vakatha thɨ vwaŋgoŋgo wit: eunda ne thɨ yovaŋgu na eunda ne thɨ itete.
40024042	Iya kaiwae hu njaŋanja, kaiwae ma hu ghareghare thembaŋa ghami Giya ne i mena.
40024043	Hu renuwaŋakikiya iyake: thoŋgo ŋgolo tanuwagae va i ghareghareya thembaŋa ghalughawoghawo rakaivɨ ne i vuthawe, ne i njaŋanjaŋa ele ŋgoloko na rakaivɨko tha i ruwe.
40024044	Ghemi tembe ŋgoreiyeva hu vivatha na mbema hu roroghagha eŋge, kaiwae Lolo Nariye ne i mena e lughawoghawo, ma hu ghareghare ne i menawe.”
40024045	“Ghemi mbala ŋgoramiya rakakaiwo i manabu na e ghavareminje iya ghagiya i worawe na i njimbukikiŋgiya rakakaiwo na i giya ghanji, ghanɨŋga e ghambaŋa moli.
40024046	Ne i thovuye moli weya rakakaiwoko iyako thoŋgo ghagiya i vutha na i vaidiya i vakatha ŋgoraiyako.
40024047	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ne i worawe na i mbaroŋaŋgiya le bigibigiko wolaghɨye.
40024048	Ko thoŋgo iye rakakaiwo raitharɨ ne i renuwaŋa e ghare na iŋa, ‘O giyama mane i vutha rukuruku,’
40024049	amba i yabɨbɨŋgiya le valɨrakakaiwoko na i ghanɨŋga na i munumu weiyaŋgiya ramunumu.
40024050	Mbaŋa regha rakakaiwoma ghagiya i njoghama, i vathɨna ghare kaiwae rakakaiwoma mane i ghareghare thembaŋa na the lughawoghawo giyama ne i njoghamawe.
40024051	Ghagiya ne i vutha i ŋge na i tagavotagamenawe, na i vaŋgurawe gharɨgharɨ raraitharɨ na rakwanɨŋgi e lenji lithɨ ghembaniye, ghakaiwo randa na thɨ rɨghɨmbiya ŋiŋiye.”
40025001	Amba i dage weŋgi iŋa, “E mbaŋako iyako Loi le ghamba mbaro le mena ne ŋgoreiyake. Gagamaina theuyawora thɨ bigiya lenji lemp, thɨ wa na vethɨ roghagha ragheghe ghɨmoru ele ŋgolo ghadidiye. Thɨ roroghaghawe gheghada ragheghe ghɨmoru i njoghama weiye ragheghe wevo na i vaŋguruwoŋgi e ŋgolo tɨne.
40025002	Theulima unounoŋgi na theulima thɨ manabu.
40025003	Unounoŋgima thɨ bigiya lenji lemp, ko ma va thɨ guda ghembwa seiwova,
40025004	ko iyemaeŋge manabuŋgima va thɨ bigiŋgiya lenji lemp weiye ghembwa e variye.
40025005	Ragheghe ghɨmoru le vutha va i vuyowo iwaeŋge wanakauma maranji i gaboŋgi na thiya ghenelaŋa.”
40025006	“Vama gougou mboro amba lolo regha i mena i kula iŋa, ‘Ragheghe ghɨmoru ma iyake! Hu mena na hu thuwe.’ ”
40025007	“Gagamainama thɨ rakathuweiru na thɨ vakatha wagiyaweŋgiya lenji lemp.
40025008	Amba unounoma thɨ dage weŋgiya manabuma thɨŋa, ‘Hu giyama lemi mbwana seiwo weime kaiwae lama lempɨŋgike ma ma e ghanjimbwa na kaero iya vara thiya mareke.’ ”
40025009	“Thɨ gonjogha weŋgi thɨŋa, ‘Nandere. Ghemi na ghime ma valɨkaiwanda. Wo hu wa e ghamba vamodoko na vou vamodo kaiwami.’ ”
40025010	“Ko vamba thɨ loŋgaloŋga mbwa ghavamodo kaiwae, ragheghe ghɨmoru kaero i vutha. Gagamainama va thɨ vivatha wagiyawema thɨ ru weinji ragheghema e thaga tɨne, amba thɨ kiya thɨnɨmba.”
40025011	“Muyai gagamaina unounoma thɨ vutha na thɨŋa, ‘Amalana, amalana, u vugha thɨnɨmbana wo ruwo.’ ”
40025012	“Amalama i gonjogha weŋgi, iŋa, ‘Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ma ya ghareghareŋga.’ ”
40025013	“Iya kaiwae hu njimbukikiŋga, kaiwae ma hu ghareghare thembaŋa o the lughawoghawo ghamigiya ne i menawe.”
40025014	“E mbaŋako iyako Loi le ghamba mbaro le mena ne ŋgoreiya amala regha i wareriŋa valɨvaŋga regha. I kula vathaŋgiya le rakakaiwo na i giya le bigibigiko weŋgi thɨ njimbukiki.
40025015	I giyawa regha paeb tausan kina, theghewoniye tu tausan kina na theghetoniye wan tausan kina. I giya ŋgoreiya regha na regha le ghareghare le laghɨlaghɨye, amba muyai i wareri.
40025016	Amalama me mbana paeb tausanɨma i wa e mbaŋako iyako na ve vakaiwoŋa na tembe i vaidiva paeb tausan kina.
40025017	Amalama me mbana tu tausanɨma i vakatha ŋgoreiye na tembe i vaidiva tu tausan kina.
40025018	Ko amalama me mbana wan tausanɨma, i wa ve tɨgha doda e thelau na i beku ghagiyama le maniwe.”
40025019	“Vama mbaŋa molao amba giyama i njogha, i dage weŋgi na thɨ utugiyawe ŋgoroŋga va thɨ vakaiwoŋa na thɨŋa le maniko.
40025020	Amalama iyava i mbana paeb tausanɨma weiye mbowo paeb tausanɨva e vwatae i mena i giyawe na i dagewe iŋa, ‘Amalana, va u giya paeb tausan e ghino. Wo u thuwe, vama ya vaidiva paeb tausan.’ ”
40025021	“Giyama i dagewe, iŋa, ‘I thovuye moli! Rakakaiwo thovuye na emunjoru ghen. Bigibigi ma thɨ ghanagha u njimbukiki wagiyaweŋgi. Ne ya woraweŋge na u njimbukikiŋgiya bigibigi thɨ ghanagha. U mena weiŋgu ghen ra warari.’ ”
40025022	“Amalama va i mbana tu tausanɨma i mena na iŋa, ‘Amalana, va u giya tu tausan e ghino. Wo u thuwe, vama ya rovaidiva tu tausan.’ ”
40025023	“Giyama i dagewe, iŋa, ‘I thovuye moli! Rakakaiwo thovuye na emunjoru ghen. Bigibigi ma thɨ ghanagha u njimbukiki wagiyaweŋgi. Ne ya woraweŋge u njimbukikiŋgiya bigibigi thɨ ghanagha. U mena weiŋgu ghen ra warari.’ ”
40025024	“Amba amalama va i mbana wan tausanɨma i mena iŋa, ‘Amalana, ya ghareghare len mbaro i vurɨgheghe kaiwae thebigiya ma va u ghavo u tɨghɨ na u vathe e len ŋgolo. Gharɨgharɨ vavana lenji kaiwo une ghen u mban.
40025025	Iya kaiwae va ya mararu na ya wa na va beku len manina e thelau. Wo u thuwe len manima mbe iya, ya biginjogha e ghen.’ ”
40025026	“Giyama i dagewe iŋa, ‘Rakakaiwo raitharɨ na njavovo ghen. Kaero u ghareghare, thebigiya ma va ya ghavo ya tɨghɨ na ya vathe elo ŋgolo na gharɨgharɨ vavana lenji kaiwo une ghino ya mban.
40025027	Ko iyake, mbalava vo bigiraweya lo manike e beŋɨk na thɨ vakaiwoŋa na mbaŋa ya njoghama ya mban njogha weiye vavanava e vwatae.’ ”
40025028	“I dage weŋgiya rakakaiwo vavanava, iŋa, ‘Hu bigiya maninawe na hu bigigiya weya amalana iya ten tausana inawe.
40025029	Thela i vakaiwoŋa wagiyaweya ghabebeko, ghino ya vatabowe na iye veimaima. Ko iyemaeŋge weya thela ma e ghavareminje, othembe nasiye moli inawe, ya bigivaowe.
40025030	Ko iya rakakaiwoke raitharɨ iyake, hu wokiyathu eto, e mouwoko tɨne na ghakaiwo randa na i rɨghɨmbiya ŋiŋiye.’ ”
40025031	“Mbaŋa Lolo Nariye ne i mena weiyaŋgi nyaoko thovuthovuye wolaghɨye, na amalaghɨniye i tabo na kiŋ, ne i yaku ele ghamba yaku thovuye na i mbaro.
40025032	Yambaneke laghɨye gharɨgharɨniye ne thɨ mevathavatha e marae na i vaghathaŋgi na wabwi theghewo, ŋgoreiya sip gharanjimbunjimbu i ghathaŋgiya sip na gout tomethi lenji yaku.
40025033	Ne i bigiraweŋgiya sip e une na gout e moiye.”
40025034	“Amba Kiŋ i dage weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ inanji e uneko iŋa, ‘Hu rakamena, thavala ghemi Bwebwe i mwaewo weŋga. Hu mena hu rakaru ele ghamba mbaroke, iyava i vivatharaweke kaiwami mbaŋa va i vakatha yambaneke.
40025035	Kaiwae bada i gharɨŋgo na hu giya ghanɨŋga e ghino, mbwa i gharɨŋgo na hu giya e ghino na ya mun, bobwariya ghino na hu kulavoreŋaŋgo e lemi ŋgolo,
40025036	ya bukabuka na hu giya kwama weŋgo, ya ghambwera na hu njimbukikiŋgo, inaŋgu e thiyo na hu mena hu thuweŋgo.’ ”
40025037	“Amba gharɨgharɨko thovuthovuye ne thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, ‘Amalana, thembaŋa va wo thuweŋge bada i gharɨŋge na wo giya ghanɨŋga na u ghan, o mbwa i gharɨŋge na wo giya mbwa e ghen?
40025038	Na thembaŋa va wo thuweŋge u mebobwari na wo kulavoreŋaŋge, o u bukabuka na wo ligiya kwama na u njimbo?
40025039	Na va thembaŋa wo thuweŋge u ghambwera o inan e thiyo na wo ghaona wo thuweŋge?’ ”
40025040	“Kiŋ ne i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, ‘Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thembaŋa thoŋgo hu vakatha bigi regha weya oghaghaŋguŋgike regha iya idae ma i laghɨye, ŋgoreiya hu vakatha weŋgo.’ ”
40025041	“Amba ne i dage weŋgiya thiye inanji e moiyeko iŋa, ‘Hu rakaiteteŋgo, ghemi iya valɨkaiwae hu vaidiya lithɨ weya Loi. Hu rakawa e ndɨgheko une iya memeghabananiyeko, iyava Loi i vivatharaweko Seitan na le nyao kaiwanji.
40025042	Kaiwae bada i gharɨŋgo na ma hu giya ghanɨŋga weŋgo, mbwa i gharɨŋgo na ma hu giya mbwa weŋgo,
40025043	bobwariya ghino na ma hu kulavoreŋaŋgo e lemi ŋgolo, ya bukabuka na ma hu giya kwama weŋgo, ya ghambwera na inaŋgu e thiyo na ma hu mena hu njimbukikiŋgo.’ ”
40025044	“Thiye tembe thɨ thombeweva thɨŋa, ‘Amalana, va thembaŋa wo thuweŋge bada o mbwa i gharɨŋge, o u mebobwari o u bukabuka o inan e thiyo, na ma wo thalavuŋge?’ ”
40025045	“Ne i thombe weŋgi na iŋa, ‘Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thembaŋa hu botewo hu thalavugha oghaghaŋguŋgike iya nanasiyeke thiyake iya hu yaŋgiwanaŋgike regha ŋgoreiya hu botewo hu thalavuŋgo.’ ”
40025046	“Thiyake ne vethɨ vaidiya vuyowoko iya ma mbaŋa regha ne i koko na gharɨgharɨ thovuthovuye ne vethɨ vaidiya yawalɨ moli.”
40026001	Mbaŋa Jisas i utuvao utuutuko wolaghɨye, i dage weŋgiya gharaghambu, iŋa,
40026002	“Kaero hu ghareghare, mbaŋa ma theghewo eŋge kaero Thaga Valaŋani ghambaŋa, na ne e mbaŋako iyako tɨne thɨ vaŋgugiya Lolo Nariye na thɨ ŋge e kros.”
40026003	E mbaŋako iyako ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Jiu lenji randevivaŋgi thɨ mevathavatha ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva idae Kaiyapas ele ŋgolo
40026004	na thɨ vona Jisas ghae ŋgoroŋga ne thɨŋa na thɨ yalawe thuwele na thɨ tagavamare.
40026005	Thɨŋa, “Thava ra vakatha e thagake iyake tɨne, ne iwaeŋge gharɨgharɨ gharenji i muru na thɨ gaithɨ.”
40026006	Jisas vamba i yaku Betani Saimon ele ŋgolo, iye va i ghataŋa lepelo.
40026007	Wevo eunda i menawe, i thɨna bodɨla alabasita vwarara, bunama butiye thovuye na modae laghɨye inawe. Mbaŋa Jisas vamba i ghanɨŋga, i liŋgiya bunamama e umbaliye.
40026008	Ko mbaŋa gharaghambuko thɨ thuweya iyako gharenji i gaithɨ. Thɨŋa, “Buda kaiwae i vakowana bunamako?
40026009	Thoŋgo ra vakuneŋa bunamako iyako ne ra vaidiya mani laghɨye na ra giya weŋgiya mbinyembinyeŋgu.”
40026010	Jisas i ghareghareya lenji renuwaŋako, amba i dage weŋgi, “Buda kaiwae hu liya wevoke ghautu? Vakatha thovuye moli iya me vakathake weŋgo.
40026011	Mbaŋake wolaghɨye ne weimiyaŋgiya mbinyembinyeŋgu ko ghino mane weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi mbaŋake wolaghɨye.
40026012	Me ruvuya bunamake iyake e riwaŋgu. Iyako ŋgoreiye kaero me vivatha riwaŋgu beku kaiwae.
40026013	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, nevole thembaŋa thɨ vavaghareŋa Totoke Thovuye iyake e yambaneke laghɨye, budakaiya wevoke iyake me vakatha gharɨgharɨ ne thɨ utuŋa na thɨ renuwaŋakikiya elaghɨniye.”
40026014	Amba gharaghambuko theyaworo na theghewoko regha, idae Judas Isakariyot, i wa weŋgiya ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye
40026015	na iŋa, “Ne hu wogiya budakai weŋgo thoŋgo ya vatomweya Jisas weŋga na hu yalawe?” Thɨ vaona silva gethɨyeto (30) na mbala thɨ giya modae.
40026016	E mbaŋako iyako na i voro Judas i tamwetamweya kamwathɨ, ŋgoroŋga ne iŋa na i vatomwe weŋgi na thɨ yalawe.
40026017	Mbaŋa iviva moli Bred ma weiye isɨt ghathaga ghambaŋa, gharaghambu thɨ menawe na thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Nuwaniya wo wa e the valɨvaŋga na vo vivatharaweya Thaga Valaŋani ghanɨŋganiye kaiwan?”
40026018	I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Hu wa vohu ru Jerusalem e tɨne, weya amala regha, na hu dagewe huŋa, ‘Ravavaghare iŋa: Wombaŋa maiyavara. Weiŋguyaŋgiya woraghambuke wo vakatha Thaga Valaŋani ghanɨŋganiye e len ŋgolona.’ ”
40026019	Gharaghambuma thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiya me dagema weŋgi na thɨ vivatharaweya Thaga Valaŋani ghanɨŋganiyewe.
40026020	Vama gougou amba Jisas weiyaŋgiya gharaghambuma theyaworo na theghewoma thiya yaku na thiya ghanɨŋga.
40026021	Ghanɨŋga e tɨne Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, regha ina e tɨnemike ne i vatomweŋgo.”
40026022	Gharenji i vɨrɨ laghɨye na thɨ dagewe, regha na regha iya i vaito iŋa, “Amalana, ma ghino ŋgoreiye, ae?”
40026023	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ghemina regha iya me wouta ghabredɨna weiŋgu e gaeba regha, iye ne i vatomweŋgo.
40026024	Lolo Nariye ne i mare ŋgoreiya Buk Boboma le woraŋgiya, ko loloko iya ne i vatomweya Lolo Nariye ne i vaidiya vuyowae. I thovuye moliwa loloko iyako thoŋgo tɨnae ma va i ghambɨ eŋge.”
40026025	Amba Judas, iya ne i vatomweya Jisas, iŋa, “Ravavaghare, ma ghino ŋgoreiye, ae?” Jisas i dagewe, iŋa, “Kaero mo utuŋa na len utuna emunjoru.”
40026026	Mbaŋa thiya ghanɨŋga, Jisas i wo bred mbumbura, i vata ago weya Loi, i njiviyaviya na i giya weŋgiya gharaghambuma, na iŋa, “Hu wo na hu ghan. Iyake riwaŋgu.”
40026027	Amba i thɨna kom na tembe i vata ago weva Loi, i thɨnɨgiya weŋgi, na iŋa, “Taulaghɨna ghemi hu mun,
40026028	waenɨke iyake madɨbaŋgu iye i vaemunjoruŋa dagerawe togha. I voruraŋgi na mbala Loi i numotena gharɨgharɨ lemoyo lenji tharɨ.
40026029	Ya dage e ghemi, ma tene ya munɨva waenɨke iyake gheghada ne ya munɨva waen togha weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi Bwebwe ele ghamba mbaro tɨne.”
40026030	Mbaŋa thɨ wothuvao wothu yaŋgara, thɨ rakaraŋgi na thɨ raka Olivɨ e ghanji Ou.
40026031	Amba Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Gougouke noroke taulaghɨna ghemi ne hu vo iteteŋgo, kaiwae Buk Boboma iŋa, ‘Ne ya unɨgha sip ghanjiranjimbunjimbu na sip thɨ rakavo.’
40026032	Ko amba Loi ne i vakathaŋgo na ya thuweiru na e yawayawaliŋgu, ne ya viva e ghamwami Galili.”
40026033	Pita i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Othembe taulaghɨke ne thɨ rakavo, ghino mane ya voiteteŋge.”
40026034	Jisas i dagewe, iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghen, noroke gougou amba muyai kamkam i dage mbaŋaiwo, mbaŋato ne uŋa ma u ghareghareŋgo.”
40026035	Pita i dagewe iŋa, “Mane yaŋa ma ya ghareghareŋge, othembe thoŋgo ne ya mare weiŋgu ghen.” Gharaghambuko wolaghɨye thɨ gorereya.
40026036	Jisas weiyaŋgiya gharaghambu thɨ wa e valɨvaŋga idae Getesemani, amba i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Huya yaku gheke, na ya wa na va naŋgo gheko.”
40026037	I vaŋguŋgiya Pita na Sebedi le ŋgaŋgama thenjighewoma. Ghare i vɨrɨ laghɨye moli.
40026038	Amba i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Ghareŋgu i vɨrɨ laghɨye moli, mbalama i tagavamareŋgo. Hu yaku gheke na hu njaŋanjaŋa.”
40026039	I loŋga ghaova seiwo, i dipoumu e thelauko vwatae na i naŋgo iŋa, “Bwebwe, thoŋgo valɨkaiwae, u vakathaŋgo na vuyowoke ghandeghɨ iyake thava i mena weŋgo. Ko iyemaeŋge thava u vakatha ghino lo renuwaŋa, u vakatha eŋge ghen len renuwaŋa.”
40026040	Amba i njogha weŋgiya gharaghambuma thenjighetoma na i vaidiŋgi thiya ghena. I dage weya Pita, iŋa, “Ko ma valɨkaiwae hu njaŋanjaŋa lughawoghawo regha?
40026041	Hu njaŋanjaŋa na hu naŋgo, mbala ma hu ru tanathetha e tɨne. Ghare nuwaiya, ko ririwo i njavovo.”
40026042	Mbowo i wava mbaŋaiwoniye na ve naŋgo iŋa, “Bwebwe, thoŋgo len renuwaŋa ya muna vuyowoke ghakom iyake na ma valɨkaiwae i iteteŋgo, ko mbema u vakatha ŋgoreiye iya len renuwaŋana.”
40026043	Mbaŋa i njoghama, tembe i vaidiŋgiva thɨ ghenelaŋa, kaiwae mara ghenaghena i gaboŋgi.
40026044	I iteteŋgi na mbowo ve naŋgova mbaŋatoninji. I naŋgo na tembe ŋgoreiyeva me naŋgoma.
40026045	Mbowo i njogha weŋgiva gharaghambuma na i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ko amba hu ghenaghena vara mbaŋake molao? Wo hu thuwe, mbaŋa kaero iko; e mbaŋake vara thɨ vaŋguraweya Lolo Nariye tharɨ gharavakatha e nɨmanji ghare.
40026046	Hu yondo na ra raka. Wo hu thuwe, loloma wolilivama maiyavara i menana!”
40026047	Jisas vamba i utuutu kaero Judas, gharaghambuma theyaworo na theghewoma regha, i vutha weiyaŋgiya wabwi laghɨye regha, thɨ mbanɨŋgiya gaithɨ ghaghalithɨ na umbwaumbwa uboubotu. Gharɨgharɨke thiyake, ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Jiu lenji randeviva methɨ variyeŋgi.
40026048	Lilivama vama i giya nono weŋgi, iŋa, “The lolo ne ya vandamo, ee amalaghɨniye; hu yalawe.”
40026049	Judas i vamwandɨ weya Jisas na iŋa, “Ago laghɨye Ravavaghare!” Na i vandamo.
40026050	Jisas i dagewe, “Wou, budakai kaiwae mo menake u vakatha.” Gharɨgharɨma thɨ rakamena na thɨ yalawe.
40026051	Gharaghambuma regha i mwanagita le gaithɨ ghaghalithɨ e ghambae na i gothethe ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva le rakakaiwo regha yanawae.
40026052	Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “U woraweya len gaithɨna ghaghalithɨ e ghambae, kaiwae thela thoŋgo i gaithɨ e ghalithɨ ne thɨ unɨghɨ e ghalithɨ.
40026053	Ko ma hu ghareghare valɨkaiwaŋgu moli ya kula weya Bwebwe thalavu kaiwae na e mbaŋako iyako, i variyeŋgiya le nyao thovuthovuye ghanjiwabwi laghɨlaghɨye kaiwaŋgu?
40026054	Ko thoŋgo ya vakatha ŋgoreiyako mane i vaemunjoruŋa Buk Boboma le utu, iya i woraŋgiya budakaiya kaero i yomara e mbaŋake iyake.”
40026055	E mbaŋako iyako Jisas i dage weŋgiya wabwima iŋa, “Mouŋa eŋge rakaiva ghino iya mohu mbanɨŋgiya gaithɨ na ghaghalithɨ na umbwaumbwa uboubotu na hu mena hu yalaweŋgo? Mbaŋa regha na regha ya yaku e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne na ya vavaghare, ma va hu yalaweŋgo.
40026056	Bigibigike wolaghɨye thiyake thɨ yomara na thɨ vaemunjoruŋa budakaiya Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu va thɨ rori Buk Boboma e tɨne.” E mbaŋako iyako gharaghambu thɨ voiteteŋa.
40026057	Thiyema methɨ yalawe Jisas thɨ yovaŋgu Kaiyapas ele ŋgolo, iye ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva. Mbaro gharavavaghare na Jiu lenji randeviva vama thɨ mevathavatha gheko.
40026058	Pita i rereghamba weya Jisas, vambe ina bwagabwaga, ghaghad thɨ vutha ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva e ghayayao. Pita i ru e yayaoko tɨne na i yaku weiyaŋgiya ragatɨgatɨ. Nuwaiya i thuwe ne thɨ vakatha budakai weya Jisas.
40026059	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye weinjiyaŋgiya Jiu lenji rambarombaro Jiu e lenji kot laghɨye tɨne, thɨ tamweŋgiya utu kwanɨkwan Jisas ghawonjowe kaiwae, mbala lenji rɨghe na thɨ unɨgha Jisas.
40026060	Ko iyemaeŋge ma thɨ ndevaidi mun, othembe rautu kwanɨkwan vavana thɨ mena thɨ utuŋaŋgiya lenji kwanɨŋgi. Muyai amba thenjighewo thɨ mena,
40026061	na thɨŋa, “Amalake iyake iŋava valɨkaiwae ne i rakayathu Loi le Ŋgolo Boboma na mbaŋa thegheto e tɨne kaero i vatadɨva.”
40026062	Amba ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva i yondovirɨ na i dage weya Jisas iŋa, “Ko mane u gonjogha lenji utuko ghathɨthɨ? Ŋgoroŋga lenji utuko gharumwaru e ghen?”
40026063	Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas ma i ndeutu mun. Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva i dagewe iŋa, “Loi e yawayawaliye e idae ya naŋgo e ghen na u dage weime, thoŋgo emunjoru ghen Mesaiya, Loi Nariye.”
40026064	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ŋgoreiye iya moŋana. Ko ya dage e ghemi, mbaŋa i menamenako ne hu thuwe Lolo Nariye, ne i yaku Loi Vurɨgheghe e une na i njama e ŋgalɨlɨko e buruburu.”
40026065	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva i mwanathethe ghakwama ghatemuru kaiwae na iŋa, “I utuvatharɨ Loi kaiwae. Ma te nuwandaiyava gharɨgharɨ vavana thɨ utu kaiwae. Kaero mohu loŋweya le utuko, me utuvatharɨ weya Loi.
40026066	Ŋgoroŋga lemi renuwaŋa?” Thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Valɨkaiwae moliya i mare!”
40026067	Amba thɨ njoŋgovuna ghamwae na thɨ ŋge. Vavana thɨ tagaleva
40026068	na thɨŋa, “Mesaiya ghen? U dage weime thoŋgo Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu ghen, thela me ŋgeŋgeŋaŋgena.”
40026069	Pita vambe ina e yayaoko tɨne amba rakakaiwo eunda i menawe na i dagewe iŋa, “Ghen ŋgoreiye, vambe weinɨva Jisas rara Galili.”
40026070	Gharɨgharɨko taulaghɨ e maranji i roro iŋa, “Ma ya ghareghare budakaiya utuniye u utuutuna.”
40026071	Seiwo i loŋgaraŋgi ŋgoreiya yayaoko ghaghamba ru, rakakaiwo eunda i thuweya Pita i amba i dage weŋgiya gharɨgharɨko inanjiko gheko iŋa, “Amalake iyake va weiye Jisas rara Nasaret.”
40026072	Mbaŋaiwoniye Pita i roro iŋa ma i ghareghare Jisas. I tholo iŋa, “Ma ya ghareghare iya lolona iyana.”
40026073	Mbaŋa ma molao, gharɨgharɨma thiya ndeghathɨma gheko thɨ mena weya Pita na thɨŋa, “Mbema emunjoru Jisas ghauneko regha ghen, kaiwae ghalɨŋanɨna ghaŋgumi i woraŋgiya, ghen rara Galili.”
40026074	Pita i tholomundu iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru. Loloko iyako ma ya ghareghare. Loi i lithɨ e ghino thoŋgo ma ya utuŋa emunjoru.” E mbaŋako iyako kamkam i kula,
40026075	amba Pita i renuwaŋakiki Jisas ghalɨŋaema: “Amba muyai kamkam i kula; mbaŋato ne uŋa ma u ghareghareŋgo.” Pita i raŋgi eto na ve randa laghɨye.
40027001	Vambe mbaŋambaŋa moli ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Jiu ghanjigiyagiya thɨ vakatha lenji mbaro Jisas le mare kaiwae.
40027002	Thɨ ŋgarɨ na thɨ yovaŋgu weya Pailat, Rom ghagawana.
40027003	Mbaŋa Judas, Jisas ghaliliva, i loŋwevaidiya Jisas vama thɨŋa ne i mare, i nuwonjogha na i biginjogha mani gethiyeto weŋgiya ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na giyagiya vavana.
40027004	Judas i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Ma vakatha tharɨ kaiwae ma vatomweya amala ma ele tharɨ na thɨ unɨghɨ.” Thɨ dagewe, thɨŋa, “Ma wo rerenuwaŋa kaiwae. Tembe ghen ghanɨmberegha.”
40027005	Judas i bigiyathu manima e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne na i wa na ve gadesowo.
40027006	Amba ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye thɨ mbana manima na thɨŋa, “Manike iyake madibe inawe na la mbaro i dageten ra bigirawe weiye Ŋgolo Boboma ghamani.”
40027007	Thɨ vakatha manima ghambaro, thɨ mban na thɨ vamodo thelauwe bobwari lenji ghabubu kaiwae. Thɨ vamodo weya uye gharamonjemonje.
40027008	Iya kaiwae thelauko iyako thɨ una idae Madibe Thelauniye gheghada noroke.
40027009	Mbaŋa va thɨ vakatha iyako, Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, Jeremaiya, le utu i tabo na emunjoru, iŋa, “Thɨ mbana silva gethɨyeto (30), Isirel gharɨgharɨniye vavana va thɨ vatomwe na loloko iyako ghavanjo
40027010	na thɨ vamodo uyema gharamonjemonje le thelauwe, ŋgoreiya Loi le utu weŋgo.”
40027011	Jisas i ndeghathɨ Pailat e ghamwae, iye Rom ghagawana, amba i vaito iŋa, “Ghen Jiu lenji kiŋa ghen?” Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ŋgoreiya iya moŋana.”
40027012	Ko iyemaeŋge mbaŋa ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Jiu ghanjigiyagiya methɨ wonjowe ma me ndegolambo mun.
40027013	Amba Pailat i dagewe iŋa, “Thare u loŋwe bigibigi lemoyo kaiwanji iya thɨ wonjoweŋgenawe?”
40027014	Ko Jisas mava i gonjogha lenji utuko mun, iya kaiwae Pailat ghare va i yo.
40027015	Theghathagha regha na regha Thaga Valaŋani e tɨne, rayakuyaku e thiyo regha iya gharɨgharɨ thɨ tuthigiya weya Pailat na i vaŋguraŋgiya kaiwanji.
40027016	E mbaŋako iyako amala regha va ina e thiyo, idae Barabas, amalaghɨniye ghathanavu raitharɨ moli.
40027017	Mbaŋa wabwi laghɨye thɨ mevathavatha amba Pailat i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Thela nuwamiya ya rakayathu kaiwami? Barabas o Jisas iya thɨŋake Mesaiya?”
40027018	I dage ŋgoreiyako kaiwae va i ghareghare wagiyawe Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ yamwakabu Jisas kaiwae iyava thɨ vaŋgugiyakowe.
40027019	Pailat vamba ina e ghamba kot kaero levo i variya toto iŋa: “Lolona iyana ma ele tharɨ. Ne u ndevakatha bigi reghawe kaiwae me gougou ma ghenelola gheneloloniye na i vakathaŋgo ya mararu laghɨye.”
40027020	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Jiu ghanjigiyagiya thɨ vokomukomuŋgi wabwiko laghɨye na thɨ naŋgo weya Pailat i rakayathu Barabas na iŋa na thɨ unɨgha Jisas.
40027021	Pailat i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Iya thenjighewoke, thela nuwamiya ya rakayathu kaiwami?” Thɨŋa, “Barabas.”
40027022	Mbowo i vaitoŋgiva iŋa, “Ne ya vakatha budakai weya Jisas iya thɨŋake Mesaiya?” Taulaghɨko thɨŋa, “U rokros!”
40027023	Pailat i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Ko loloke iyake va i vakatha vara thambo tharɨ?” Ma thɨ kula na ghalɨŋanji laghɨye eŋge thɨŋa, “U rokros!”
40027024	Pailat vama i ghareghare ma te valɨkaiwaeva i vakatha renuwaŋa regha na wabwiko laghɨye mbalavama thɨ vakatha gaithɨ, amba i thɨna mbwa na i thavwiya nɨmae wabwiko laghɨye e maranji na iŋa, “Loloke iyake le mare wonjoweniye thava ne i mena weŋgo. Tembe hu kwalavi.”
40027025	Taulaghɨko thɨŋa, “Le marena wonjoweniye i mena weime na lama ŋgaŋga weŋgi.”
40027026	Amba Pailat i rakayathu Barabas kaiwanji na iŋa na ragagaithɨ thɨ liya thiyo weiye bigibigi vurɨgheghe nanji e thiyoko na thɨ yabɨbɨwe amba i vaŋgugiya weŋgi na thɨ ŋge e kros.
40027027	Pailat le ragagaithɨ thɨ yovaŋguya Jisas e gawana ele ŋgolo ghayayao amba ragagaithɨko wolaghɨye thɨ mevathavatha na thɨ meghɨliŋa Jisas.
40027028	Thɨ bigiraŋgiya ghakwama na thɨ vanjimbo e kwama sosoro na molao, ŋgoreiya kiŋ ghakwama.
40027029	Thɨ vona umbwa ele kinkin yaŋgae na thɨ thɨnɨrawe e umbaliye na thɨ wo umbwa na thɨ worawe e nɨmaeko e uneko, ŋgoreiya kiŋ ghavakavakatha amba thɨ ronja e ghenji vuvuye na thɨ vatabweruŋa thɨŋa, “O Jiu lenji Kiŋ, len mbaro ne i meghabana!”
40027030	Thɨ njoŋgovunɨvun na thɨ wo umbwama na thɨ ŋgeŋgeŋa umbaliye.
40027031	Mbaŋa thɨ vatabweruŋako na e ghereiye, thɨ liraŋgiya kwamama sosoroma na thɨ vanjimbo amalaghɨniye e ghakwamaŋgima. Amba thɨ vaŋguraŋgiya na thɨ yovaŋgu vethɨ rokros.
40027032	Mbaŋa vama vethɨ vaŋguraŋgiya na ma vethɨ loŋgaloŋga amba thɨ lavolevola lolo regha, rara Sairin idae Saimon. Ragagaithɨma thɨ vavurɨghegheŋa na i wo Jisas ghakros.
40027033	Thɨ vutha e valɨvaŋga regha idae Golgota. Golgota gharumwaru ŋgoreiya “Boutouto Ghambae”.
40027034	Bigi regha iye i maŋge thɨ liŋgirawe weiye waen thɨ thɨnɨgiya weya Jisas na i mun. Mbaŋa i ghamɨno na i maŋge, i botewoyathu.
40027035	Mbaŋa thɨ ŋge e krosɨko vwatae, amba thɨ wobwiya ghakwamakwamama. Thɨ mbana varɨvarɨ na thɨ mwadiwo mwadiwo reghawe. Thela thoŋgo i wo varɨko iya e ghanonoko amba i tuthi iyaŋganiya i bigi.
40027036	Amba thiya yaku gheko na thɨ njimbukiki.
40027037	Thɨ liya ghawonjoweko, vama thɨ rori, na thɨ ŋge e umbaliye na yavoro, iŋa, Iyake Jisas, Jiu lenji Kiŋ.
40027038	Thɨ rokrosiŋgiya rakaivɨ thenjighewo weiyaŋgi, regha e une na regha e moiye.
40027039	Gharɨgharɨ thɨ rakarakareŋa evasiwae thɨ wovanukunukuya umbalinji na thɨ goviyaviya ghamwae,
40027040	thɨŋa, “Va uŋa ne u tagarakaraka Ŋgolo Boboma na mbaŋa thegheto e tɨne kaero u vatadɨva. Thoŋgo Loi Nariya ghen, tembe u vamora ghanɨmberegha. U roiteta krosɨna na u njama.”
40027041	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye, mbaro gharavavaghareŋgi na Jiu ghanjigiyagiya vambe thɨ goviyaviyava ghamwae ŋgoreiyake.
40027042	Thɨŋa, “I vamoruŋgiya gharɨgharɨ mbe vavana, ko ma valɨkaiwae i vamoru ghamberegha! Iye Israel lenji Kiŋ, ae? Tembe ghamberegha i njama e krosɨko, ambane wo loŋweghathɨ.
40027043	I vareminja Loi. Wo ra thuweno, thare Loi ne i thalavu, kaiwae iŋa, ‘Loi Nariya Ghino!’ ”
40027044	Rakaivɨŋgiko iyava thɨ rokrosiŋgiko weiyaŋgi, thiye vambe thɨ yaŋgiwanava ŋgora iyako.
40027045	Ghararaghɨye mboro ghaghad tɨri klok, vanautumako laghɨye i mouwo.
40027046	Tɨri klok ele valɨvaŋga Jisas i kula na ghalɨŋae laghɨye iŋa, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakɨtani?” gharumwaru “Lo Loi, Lo Loi, buda kaiwae u iteteŋaŋgo?”
40027047	Gharɨgharɨko iyava thiya ndeghathɨko gheko thɨ loŋweya iyako na vavana thɨŋa, “I kula weya Ilaija iyako.”
40027048	E mbaŋako iyako, regha i ruku na i liya vune i liutu e waen monyomonyo na i lira e umbwa mbothiye, amba i livoreŋa na Jisas i mun.
40027049	Ko iyemaeŋge vavana thɨŋa, “Wo ra roroghagha! Wo ra thuweno, mbwata ne Ilaija i mena na i vamoru.”
40027050	Jisas mbowo i kulava na ghalɨŋae laghɨye amba i vatomweya yawaliye na i mare.
40027051	Amba kwama va i ganatena woluwolu bobomako moli e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne, i mathethe wa yavoro na ve wo bode, thelauko i mbarimbariri na varɨvarɨ thɨ raraviyaviya.
40027052	Ghabughabubu thɨ mavu na Loi le gharɨgharɨ vama thiya marekai thɨ rakathuweiru na e yawayawalinji.
40027053	Thɨ rakaiteteŋgiya ghabughabubu na Jisas le thuweiru mare e ghereiye, vethɨ rakaru Jerusalem na vethɨ rakaraŋgi weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ lemoyo.
40027054	Mbaŋa ragagaithɨko na lenji randeviva, va inanji gheko thɨ njimbukikiya Jisas, thɨ ghamɨnogha ghembako i ragheghe na thɨ thuweŋgiya bigibigiko wolaghɨye iyava thɨ yomarako, thɨ mararu laghɨye na thɨŋa, “Mbema emunjoru iye Loi Nariye.”
40027055	Wanakau i ghanagha vambe inanjiva gheko. Vambe thɨ ndeghathɨ bwagabwaga na thɨ ghewoŋa Jisas. Thiye va thɨ ghambugha Jisas Galili na thɨ njimbukiki.
40027056	E tɨnenji Meri tɨnan Magadala, Meri Jemes na Josep tɨnanji na Sebedi le ŋgaŋga tɨnanji.
40027057	Mbaŋa vama yeghɨyeghɨye amba amala ragogomwau regha i vutha, idae Josep. Amalake iyake i mena Arɨmathiya na iye vambe Jisas gharaghambuva.
40027058	I wa weya Pailat na ve naŋgo Jisas riwaekowe. Amba Pailat iŋa na thɨ wogiyawe.
40027059	Josep i wo na i liya kwama togha i ghavowe,
40027060	amba i worawe ele ghabubu togha tɨne, vamba i tɨghɨruwoeŋge e varɨ e bobokulu regha. I vabulaleya varɨ laghɨye regha na i rogana ghaekowe, amba i iteteŋa.
40027061	Meri tɨnan Magadala na le ghaida Meri eundava inanji gheko, thɨ yaku na ghamwanji i ghemba ghabubuko.
40027062	Mbaŋambaŋa Satade, Jiu lenji Sabat, ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Parisi lenji wabwi thɨ rakawa Pailat.
40027063	Thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Amalana, wo renuwaŋakikiya rakwanɨko iyako, mbaŋa vamba e laghalagha va iŋa, ‘Mbaŋa thegheto e ghereiye kaero ya thuweiruva.’
40027064	U dage na ragagaithɨ vethɨ njimbukikiya ghabubuko ghaghad mbaŋa thegheto, mbala gharaghambuŋgiko ma valɨkaiwanji thɨ wa na vethɨ wokava riwaeko, na thɨ dage weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, thɨŋa, ‘Kaero me thuweiruva e mare.’ Kwanɨke iyake ne i laghɨye kivwala kwanɨma i vivama.”
40027065	Pailat i dage weŋgi iŋa, “I thovuye, hu vaŋguŋgiya lo ragagaithɨna vavana na vou vaŋguraweŋgi na thɨ njimbukiki wagiyaweya ghabubuko.”
40027066	Thɨ wa na vethɨ liya thiyo yaŋgara na thɨ ŋgarɨghathɨgha varɨko weiye ghabubuko ghadidiye na lenji nono ambama thɨ vaŋguraweŋgiya ragagaithɨ na thɨ njimbukiki.
40028001	Jiu lenji Sabat kaero iko na Sande mbaŋambaŋa moli, Meri tɨnan Magadala na le ghaida Meri reghava thɨ wa vethɨ kela e ghabubuko.
40028002	Ragheragheghe laghɨye regha i yomara, na Loi le nyao thovuye regha i mena e buruburu, i vabulaleyathu varɨma na i yaku e vwatae.
40028003	Ghamwae va i ndalandala ŋgora i vilamema na ghakwama i kakaleva ŋgora ghinama ree.
40028004	Ghabubuko gharagatɨgatɨ thɨ mararu laghɨye na thɨ tage thɨ dobu e thelauko vwatae, ma e laghalaghanji ŋgoranjiya thɨ marema.
40028005	Ko nyaoma thovuye i dage weŋgiya wanakauma iŋa, “Tha hu mararu! Ya ghareghare hu tamweya Jisas, iya mendava thɨ rokros.
40028006	Ma ina gheke, kaero me thuweiru, ŋgoreiya va le dagerawema. Wo hu mena hu thuwe menda thɨ worawemawe.
