41013002	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Iya u thuweŋgiya ŋgoloŋgoloko laghɨlaghɨye thiyako, mavole varɨ regha i ndeghathɨ ele ghamba ndeghathɨ. Wolaghɨyeko nevole thɨ bigiyathuvao na iko.”
41013003	Mbaŋa Jisas ve yaku Olivɨ e ghanji Ou, e Ŋgolo Boboma na valɨmbwa amba Pita, Jemes, Jon na Endru, mbe thiye eŋge, thɨ vaito thuwele thɨŋa,
41013004	“U utugiya weime, thembaŋa vara na bigibigiko mo utuŋaŋgiko ne thɨ yomara? Na ghanjinono ne ŋgoroŋga i ghaŋgo?”
41013005	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Hu njimbukiki wagiyaweŋga, tha lolo regha i yaroŋga.
41013006	Kaiwae gharɨgharɨ i ghanagha ne thɨ mena e idaŋgu na thɨŋa, ‘Ghino Mesaiya!’ na ne thɨ yaroŋgiya gharɨgharɨ lemoyo.
41013007	Nono reghava iyake. Ne hu loŋweŋgiya vanautuma lenji gaithɨ utuniye na toto gaithɨ kaiwae, ko hu ndemararu. Bigibigike ŋgoranjiyake ne thɨ yomara, ko iyemaeŋge mbaŋa le ghambako amba mane i mena.
41013008	Vanautuma ne thɨ vegaithɨ weŋgi; rambarombaro ne thɨ vegaithɨ weŋgi. Nevole vunuvu na ragheragheghe lemoyo e yambaneke laghɨye. Vuyowoke thiyake ne thɨ yomara ŋgoreiya ŋgama i vwara ghatambwa na vɨrɨniye.”
41013009	“Ghemi tembe ghamimberegha hu njimbukiki. Ne thɨ yalaweŋga na thɨ vaŋguŋga na vohu kot. Ne vethɨ gaboŋga e lenji ŋgolo kururu tɨne; ne thɨ vakatha na hu ndeghathɨ rambarombaro na kiŋ e ghamwanji idaŋgu kaiwae na hu utuŋa weŋgiya Toto Thovuye.
41013010	Ko amba muyai yambaneke le ghambako wone lo gharɨgharɨ thɨ utuŋa Toto Thovuye e yambaneke laghɨye.
41013011	Na mbaŋa ne thɨ yalaweŋga na thɨ yovaŋguŋga kot kaiwae, gharemi ne i ndegaithɨ lemi utu kaiwae amba muyai kot ghambaŋa. Mbaŋa ne ghamimbaŋa utu, hu utuŋaŋgiya thedage iya ne i yomara e nuwamina. Kaiwae dageŋgina ne hu utuŋaŋgina ma ghanɨmbereghana ghalɨŋami; ne thɨ mena weya Nyao Boboma.
41013012	Amaamala vavana ne thɨ vatomweŋgiya oghaghanji na thɨ gaboŋgi, na gamagai oramanjiŋgi ne thɨ vakatha weŋgiya lenji ŋgaŋga ŋgoreiye. Gamagai vavana ne thɨ ndeghereiye wanaŋgiya otatanji na oramanji na thɨ vakathaŋgi na thɨ gaboŋgi.
41013013	Ghino kaiwaŋgu taulaghɨ ne thɨ botewoyathuŋga. Ko the lolo i ghataŋaghathɨ ghaghada ne le ghambako Loi i vamora yawaliye.”
41013014	“Mbaŋa ne hu thuweya bigiko i vambɨghɨya Ŋgolo Boboma na i vakatha gharɨgharɨ thɨ roitetako, na i ndeghathɨ ŋgoreiye ma valɨkaiwae i ndeghathɨwe.” (Ghemi buk iyake gharavavaona wo hu rerenuwaŋa ghaghadɨ nuwamina i rumwaruŋa utuke iyake!) “Mbaŋaniye thavala inanji Judiya thɨ vo weya e ououko rɨghenji.
41013015	Thoŋgo lolo regha ina ele ŋgolo vwatae ne i nderu ele ŋgolo tɨne, i wo le bigi regha na i yowo weiye.
41013016	Lolo regha ina e uma tɨne ne i ndenjogha ele ŋgolo na i liya ghakwama ghayaboyabo.
41013017	Ne e mbaŋaŋgiko thiyako ne i vuyowo laghɨye moli weŋgiya wanakau thiya marabo na wanakau weinjiyaŋgiya gamagai amba thɨ thuthu.
41013018	Hu naŋgo weya Loi na bigibigike thiyake ne thɨ ndeyomara mbaŋa njighɨnjighɨ ghambaŋa.
41013019	Vuyowo ne e mbaŋako iyako ne i laghɨye, i laghɨye moli. Na vuyowoko ŋgoranjiyako ma mbaŋa regha i yomara e yambaneke va i rikowe gheghada noroke, na ma tene ŋgoreiyeva mbaŋa muyai.
41013020	Thoŋgo ma Loi i wonjaniya mbaŋa le molamolao, mbala ma lolo regha i moru. Ko le tututhi gharɨgharɨniye kaiwae, Loi kaero i wonjoŋa vuyowo ghambaŋa le molamolao.”
41013021	“Thoŋgo lolo regha i dage e ghen, ‘Wo u thuwe, Mesaiya maiya!’ o ‘Wo u thuwe, maiyako!’, ne u ndeloŋweghathɨ.
41013022	Kaiwae Mesaiya kwanɨkwan na Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu kwanɨkwan ne thɨ rakaraŋgi. Ne thɨ vakathaŋgiya vakatha ghamba rotaele, na thɨ wo gharɨgharɨ nuwanji na thɨ munje tembe thɨ wova Loi le tututhi gharɨgharɨniye nuwanji.
41013023	Hu njimbukikiŋga! Kaero ma utuveŋga bigibigike wolaghɨye amba muyai thɨ yomara.”
41013024	“Ko iyemaeŋge ne e mbaŋako thiyako, vuyowoko e ghereiye varae mara ne i momouwo, manjala mane i mbɨle,
41013025	ghɨtara ne thɨ dobu na buruburu matemate ne thɨ nyivɨvao.
41013026	Amba Lolo Nariye i yomara na thɨ thuwe. Ne i njama e ŋgalɨlɨko weiye vurɨgheghe laghɨye na vwenyevwenye.
41013027	Ne i variyeŋgiya le nyao thovuthovuye e yambaneke ghadidiye gethɨvarɨ na thɨ vaŋguvathavathaŋgiya le tututhi gharɨgharɨniye e yambaneke mbothiye regha gheghada valɨmbothiye.”
41013028	“Umbwa fig i woveŋga goghaimba thovuye. Mbaŋa yaŋgayaŋga amba ma thɨ vurɨgheghe na ndamwandamwa togha thɨ thalavwara u ghareghareya thuwai ghambaŋa kaero ma bwagabwaga.
41013029	Tembe ŋgoreiyeva, mbaŋa ne hu thuweŋgiya bigibigike thiyake thɨ yoyomara ne hu ghareghare le njoghama ghambaŋa kaero ma bwagabwaga, maiyavara.
41013030	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thake iyake mamba ne thiya marevao ghaghad bigibigike wolaghɨye thiyake thɨ yomara.
41013031	Buruburu na yambane ne thɨko, ko ghalɨŋaŋguke mane iko.”
41013032	“Ko iyemaeŋge ma lolo regha i ghareghare thembaŋa o the lughawoghawo vara Lolo Nariye ne i menawe. Buruburu nyaoniye thovuthovuye ma thɨ ghareghare na mbe ŋgoreiyeva Loi Nariye; ko mbe Ramae ghamberegha eŋge i ghareghare ne thembaŋa.
41013033	Hu njimbukikiŋga na hu njaŋanjaŋa, kaiwae ma hu ghareghare thembaŋa ne i menawe.
41013034	Ne ŋgoreiya lolo regha i iteta le ŋgolo na i wa ve ghɨnagha. I bigiraweŋgiya le rakakaiwo na thɨ njimbukiki. Regha na regha mbe ghakaiwo amba i dage weya thɨnɨmba gharanjimbunjimbu na i njaŋanjaŋa le njoghama kaiwae.
41013035	Iya kaiwae hu njaŋanja, kaiwae ma hu ghareghare thembaŋa ŋgolo tanuwaga, ne i vutha — ne yeghɨyeghɨyenja, o gougou mborowa, o kamkam i dagedage, o varae i maremuyaghɨ.
41013036	Thoŋgo i vutha vararaŋga, ne i ndevaidiŋga hu ghenelaŋa.
41013037	Budakaiya ya utuveŋga tembe ŋgoreiyeva ya utuveŋgiya gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye: Hu njaŋanjaŋa!”
41014001	Vama mbaŋa theghewo eŋge kaero Thaga Valaŋani na Bred ma weiye isɨt ghanjithaga. Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na mbaro gharavavaghare thɨ vona Jisas ghae na nuwanjiya thɨ yalawe thuwele na thɨ unɨghɨ.
41014002	Thɨŋa, “Ma valɨkaiwae ra vakatha e thagake tɨne ne iwaeŋge gharɨgharɨ gharenji i muru na thɨ gaithɨ.”
41014003	Jisas ina Betani Saimon ele ŋgolo. Amalake iyake va i ghataŋa lepelo. Mbaŋa Jisas i ghanɨŋga weiyaŋgi wevo eunda i menawe, i thɨna bodɨla alabasita vwarara bunama inawe. Bunamake iyake idae nad na modae laghɨye moli. I mwanabeba bodɨlako numwe kaero i liŋgiya bunamako Jisas e umbaliye.
41014004	Ko iyemaeŋge gharɨgharɨ va inanji gheko, vavana weinji lenji ghatemuru thɨ vedage weŋgi thɨŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga ghathovuye bunama modae laghɨye i kaiwo ŋgorako?
41014005	Bunamake mbalava i vakuneŋa na valɨkaiwae modae i lareŋawe theghathegha umbwara modae na i giya weŋgiya mbinyembinyeŋgu.” Mbema thɨ vethowana vara laghɨye moli.
41014006	Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Hu viyathu! Tembe ghamberegha! Buda kaiwae hu liya ghautu? Me vakatha bigi thovuye e ghino.
41014007	Kaiwae mbaŋake wolaghɨye ne weimiyaŋgiya mbinyembinyeŋgu, na thembaŋa nuwamina nuwaiya valɨkaiwae hu thalavuŋgi. Ko iyemaeŋge mane weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi gheke mbaŋake wolaghɨye.
41014008	Kaiwae me vakatha budakaiya me valɨkaiwae, kaero me varuvuŋgo amba muyai ne mbaŋa i mena beku kaiwae.
41014009	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, aŋgavole thɨ vavaghareŋa Toto Thovuye e yambaneke laghɨye, budakaiya wevoke iyake me vakatha gharɨgharɨ ne thɨ utuŋa na thɨ renuwaŋakikiya elaghɨniye.”
41014010	Amba Judas Isakariyot, gharaghambuko theyaworo na theghewoko regha, i wa weŋgiya ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye kaiwae nuwaiya i vatomweya Jisas weŋgi.
41014011	Na mbaŋa thɨ loŋweya iyako nuwanji i loghe na thɨ dagerawa modae. Amba i tamweya kamwathɨ thovuye na i vatomwe weŋgi.
41014012	Mbaŋa iviva moli Bred ma weiye isɨt ghathaga ghambaŋa, mbaŋaniye thɨ gaboŋgiya sip nariye Thaga Valaŋani ghanɨŋganiye kaiwae, gharaghambu thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Nuwaniya aŋga wo wa na vo vivatha Thaga Valaŋani ghanɨŋganiye kaiwan?”
41014013	Jisas i variyeŋgiya gharaghambu theghewo iŋa, “Hu wa vohu ru e ghembana tɨne, na amala i thɨna mbwa e mbwa variye ne i lavolevoleŋga. Hu mbele,
41014014	na the ŋgolo ve ruwe, hu dage weya ŋgolona tanuwagae huŋa, ‘Ravavaghare i vaito: Iyaŋganiya woluwolu bobwari kaiwaŋgu na ne ya ghana Thaga Valaŋani ghanɨŋganiye weiŋguyaŋgiya woraghambuke?’
41014015	Na ne i vatomwe weŋga woluwolu laghɨye ina yavoro na ghanɨŋga bigibiginiye kaero inanjiwe; ghena hu vakatharawa ghanɨŋganawe.”
41014016	Gharaghambuko thɨ wa na vethɨ ru e ghembako tɨne, na vethɨ vaidi ŋgoreiya me dagema weŋgi; na thɨ vivatharaweya Thaga Valaŋani ghanɨŋganiyewe.
41014017	Vama gougou e mbaŋako iyako Jisas i mena weiyaŋgiya gharaghambuko theyaworo na theghewo.
41014018	Ghanɨŋga e tɨne Jisas iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, regha ghemi iya ya ghanɨŋgake weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi, ne i vatomweŋgo.”
41014019	Gharenji i vɨrɨ laghɨye na thɨ dagewe, regha na regha iya i vaito iŋa, “Amalana, ma ghino ŋgoreiye, ae?”
41014020	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ghemina iya themiyaworo na themighewona regha, iya i wouta ghabredɨna weiŋgu e gaeba regha.
41014021	Lolo Nariye ne i mare ŋgoreiya Buk Boboma le woraŋgiya, ko iyemaeŋge loloko iya ne i vatomweya Lolo Nariye ne i vaidiya vuyowae. I thovuye moliwa loloko iyako thoŋgo tɨnae ma va i ghambɨ eŋge.”
41014022	Mbaŋa thiya ghanɨŋga, Jisas i wo bred mbumbura, i vata ago weya Loi, i mwanaviya na i giya weŋgiya gharaghambuko, na iŋa, “Hu wo na hu ghan. Iyake riwaŋgu.”
41014023	Na i thɨna kom na tembe i vata ago weva Loi, i thɨnɨgiya weŋgi na thiya mun.
41014024	Amba i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Waenɨke iyake madɨbaŋgu, iye i vaemunjoruŋa dagerawe togha. I voruraŋgi gharɨgharɨ lemoyo kaiwanji.
41014025	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ma tene ya munɨva waenɨke iyake ghaghada ne ya munɨva waen togha Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne.”
41014026	Mbaŋa thɨ wothuvao wothu yaŋgara thɨ rakaraŋgi na thɨ raka Olivɨ e ghanji Ou.
41014027	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Taulaghɨna ghemi ne hu iteteŋgo, kaiwae Buk Boboma iŋa, ‘Ne ya unɨgha sip ghanjiranjimbunjimbu na sip thɨ rakavo.’
41014028	Ko amba Loi ne i vakathaŋgo na ya thuweiru, na ya viva e ghamwami Galili.”
41014029	Pita i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Othembe taulaghɨke ne thɨ rakavo, ghino ma ŋgoreiye.”
41014030	Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghen, amba muyai kamkam i dage mbaŋaiwo noroke gougou, mbaŋato ne uŋa ma u ghareghareŋgo.”
41014031	Pita i gonjoghawe weiye ghalɨŋae vurɨgheghe iŋa, “Mane yaŋa ma ya ghareghareŋge, othembe thoŋgo ya mare weiŋgu ghen.” Na taulaghɨko thɨ utuŋa ŋgoreiye.
41014032	Mbaŋa Jisas na gharaghambu thɨ mena e Olivɨ ghauma idae Getesemani, i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Huya yaku gheke, na wo va naŋgo.”
41014033	I vaŋguŋgiya Pita, Jemes na Jon weiyaŋgi. Jisas ghare i vɨrɨ laghɨye moli.
41014034	Amba i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ghareŋguke i vɨrɨ laghɨye moli, mbalama i tagavamareŋgo. Hu yaku gheke na hu njaŋanjaŋa.”
41014035	I loŋga ghaova seiwo, i dipoumu e thelauko vwatae na i naŋgo thoŋgo valɨkaiwae thava i ru vuyowoko iyako e tɨne.
41014036	Iŋa, “Bwebwe, Bwebwe! Bigibigike wolaghɨye valɨkaiwan. Thoŋgo nuwaniya, u thɨna vuyowoke ghandeghɨ e ghino. Ko iyemaeŋge thava u vakatha ghino lo renuwaŋa, u vakathaeŋge ghen len renuwaŋa.”
41014037	I njoghama na i vaidiŋgi thiya ghena, na i dage weya Pita iŋa, “Saimon, ko hu ghenelaŋava? Ma valɨkaiwae hu yaku na hu njaŋanjaŋa lughawoghawo regha?”
41014038	Amba i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Hu njaŋanjaŋa na hu naŋgo, mbala ma hu ru tanathetha e tɨne. Ghare nuwaiya, ko ririwo i njavovo.”
41014039	Jisas i wa na mbowo ve naŋgova na i naŋgo na tembe ŋgoreiyeva me naŋgokaima.
41014040	Na mbowo i njoghama weŋgiva gharaghambuma i vaidi tembe thɨ ghenelaŋava kaiwae mara ghenaghena i gaboŋgi. Na ma thɨ ghareghare ŋgoroŋga thɨŋawe.
41014041	Mbaŋa i njoghamava mbaŋatoninji, i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ko amba hu ghenaghena vara mbaŋake molao? Thama ghanjighena! Mbaŋa kaero iko; e mbaŋake vara thɨ vaŋguraweya Lolo Nariye tharɨ gharavakatha e nɨmanji ghare.
41014042	Hu yondo na ra raka. Wo hu thuwe, loloma wolilivama maiyavara i menana!”
41014043	Jisas vamba i utuutu kaero Judas, gharaghambuma theyaworo na theghewoma regha, i vutha weiyaŋgiya wabwi laghɨye regha. Thɨ mbanɨŋgiya gaithɨ ghaghalithɨ na umbwaumbwa uboubotu. Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye, mbaro gharavavaghare na giyagiya vavanava methɨ variyeŋgi.
41014044	Lilivama vama i giya nono weŋgi iŋa, “The lolo ne ya vandamo, ee amalaghɨniye. Hu yalawe na mbe weimi vara hu yovaŋgu.”
41014045	Mbaŋa Judas i vutha, i mwandɨwe Jisas na iŋa, “Ravavaghare!” Na i vandamo.
41014046	Iya kaiwae thɨ yalawe e nɨmanji na thɨ vikiki.
41014047	Ko gharɨgharɨko va thɨ ndeghathɨko regha i mwanagita le gaithɨ ghaghalithɨ e ghambae na i gothethe ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva le rakakaiwo yanawae.
41014048	Jisas i dage weŋgiya wabwima iŋa, “Mohuŋa eŋge rakaiva ghino iya mohu mbanɨŋgiya gaithɨna ghaghalithɨ na umbwaumbwa uboubotu na hu mena hu yalaweŋgo?
41014049	Mbaŋa regha na regha weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi ya vavaghare e Ŋgolo Boboma na mava hu yalaweŋgo. Ko iyemaeŋge iyake i vaemunjoruŋa Buk Boboma.”
41014050	Amba gharaghambuko thɨ voiteteŋa.
41014051	Amala regha, amba tabwagha, vambe i njimbo eŋge kwama yaŋgara. I rereghamba weya Jisas. Wabwiko thɨ munje thɨ yalawe,
41014052	ko i vo bukabuka, na i iteta ghakwama e ghereiye.
41014053	Thɨ yovaŋguya Jisas ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva ele ŋgolo ŋgora vama ravowovowo, giyagiya na mbaro gharavavaghare inanjiwe.
41014054	Na Pita i rereghamba, vambe ina bwagabwaga na ve ru ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva le ŋgolo e ghayayao. I ru na i yaku weiyaŋgiya rakakaiwo na i mwa ndɨghe.
41014055	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na rambarombaro Jiu e lenji kot laghɨye tɨne thɨ mando na thɨ tamweya gharɨgharɨ valɨkaiwanji thɨ utu kaiwae na i mare, ko ma thɨ ndevaidi mun.
41014056	Thɨ ghanagha thɨ utu kwanɨkwan kaiwae, ko lenji utuko ma mboromboro.
41014057	Amba vavana thɨ yondo na thɨ utuŋa kwanɨke iyake kaiwae thɨŋa,
41014058	“Va wo loŋweya iŋa, ‘Ne ya raka Ŋgolo Bobomake iyava gharɨgharɨke thɨ vatad na mbaŋa thegheto e tɨne kaero ya vatadɨva regha ma gharɨgharɨ thɨ vatad e nɨmanji!’ ”
41014059	Ko iyemaeŋge lenji utuko ma mboromboro.
41014060	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva i yondo e maranji na i dage weya Jisas iŋa, “Ko mane u gonjogha lenji utuko ghathɨthɨ? Ŋgoroŋga lenji utuko gharumwaru e ghen?”
41014061	Ko Jisas mava i ndegolambo mun. Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva mbowo i vaitova iŋa, “Ghen Mesaiya, iya taulaghɨke ra yavwatatawanake Nariye?”
41014062	Jisas iŋa, “Ŋgoreiye, na ne hu thuwe Lolo Nariye i yaku Loi Vurɨgheghe e uneko na i njama e ŋgalɨlɨŋgiko e buruburu.”
41014063	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva i mwanathethe ghakwama ghatemuru kaiwae na iŋa, “Ma te nuwandaiyava gharɨgharɨ vavana thɨ utu kaiwae. Kaero mohu loŋweya le utuko, me utuvatharɨ weya Loi.
41014064	Ŋgoroŋga lemi renuwaŋa?” Taulaghɨko thɨŋa: “Valɨkaiwae moliya i mare!”
41014065	Amba vavana thɨ njoŋgovun na thɨ ŋgarɨgana marae na thɨ ŋge e nɨmanji na thɨ vatabweyaruŋa thɨŋa, “Thoŋgo ghalɨŋae gharautu ghen, u dage weime thela me ŋgeŋgena.” Ragagaithɨ thɨ vaŋgu na thɨ levalevaŋa.
41014066	Pita vambe ina bode e ŋgoloko ghayayao amba ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva le rakakaiwo eunda i mena ŋgora Pita inamawe.
41014067	Mbaŋa i thuwe Pita i mwamwa ndɨgheko, mbe i vonjimbughathɨ vara na i dagewe iŋa, “Ghen ŋgoreiye, vambe weinɨva Jisas rara Nasaret.”
41014068	Ko iyemaeŋge Pita i roro iŋa, “Ma ya ghareghare na ma nuwaŋgu i rumwaruŋa budakai utuniya u utuutuna.” Amba i wa iyena ve raŋgi e ghamba raŋgiko. E mbaŋaniye amba kamkam i kula.
41014069	Mbaŋa wevoma vambowo i vaidiva ŋgora ghamba raŋgima na i dage weŋgiya gharɨgharɨko thɨ ndeghathɨ gheko iŋa, “Amalake iyake Jisas gharaghambu regha.”
41014070	Ko iyemaeŋge Pita vambowo i rorova iŋa ma i ghareghare. Mbaŋa ubotu e ghereiye gharɨgharɨma va thɨ ndeghathɨma mbowo thɨ dageweva, “Emunjoru ghen ghanjiu regha ghen, kaiwae rara Galiliya ghen.”
41014071	Pita i tholomundu na iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru Loi e marae ma ya ghareghare iya lolona hu utuuta utuniyena. Thoŋgo ma ya utuŋa emunjoru Loi i lithɨ e ghino.”
41014072	E mbaŋako iyako kamkam i kula mbaŋaiwoniye, na Pita i renuwaŋakiki ŋgoroŋga Jisas meŋamawe, “Amba muyai kamkam i kula mbaŋaiwoniye, mbaŋato ne uŋa ma u ghareghareŋgo.” Amba Pita ghamɨnae i ghenenja moli na i randa laghɨye.
41015001	Vambe mbaŋambaŋa ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye weinjiyaŋgiya Jiu ghanjigiyagiya, mbaro gharavavaghare na ghanjiune vavanava Jiu e lenji kot laghɨye thɨ woraweya lenji mbaro. Thɨ ŋgara Jisas thɨ yovaŋgu weya Pailat.
41015002	Pailat i vaito iŋa, “Ghen Jiu lenji kiŋ?” Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ŋgoreiya iya moŋana.”
41015003	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye thɨ wonjoweya Jisas va i vakathaŋgiya bigibigi raraitharɨ i ghanagha.
41015004	Pailat vambowo i vaitova iŋa, “Mane u thombe? Wo u thuwe, thɨ wonjoweŋge e vakatha raraitharɨ i ghanagha.”
41015005	Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas ma i ndegonjogha mun i vakatha Pailat ghare i yo.
41015006	Theghathagha regha na regha Thaga Valaŋani e tɨne Pailat i vaŋguvaŋguraŋgiya rayakuyaku e thiyo regha iya Jiu thɨ tuthigiyawe.
41015007	E mbaŋako iyako amala regha idae Barabas ina e thiyo tɨne weiyaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ vavanava. Va thɨ gaithɨ weinjiyaŋgiya Rom gharambarombaro na thɨ unɨgha lolo regha.
41015008	Mbaŋa wabwi laghɨye thɨ mevathavatha, kaero thɨ naŋgo weya Pailat i vakatha weŋgi ŋgoreiya i vakavakatha theghathegha regha na regha e mbaŋako iyako.
41015009	Pailat i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Nuwamiya ya rakayathu Jiu lenji kiŋ kaiwami?”
41015010	Pailat i ghareghare wagiyawe ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye thɨ yamwakabu na gharenji i gaithɨwana Jisas kaiwae gharɨgharɨko taulaghɨ nuwanjiya iya kaiwae thɨ vaŋgugiyawe.
41015011	Ko ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye thɨ vokumukumuŋgiya wabwiko laghɨye na thɨ dage weya Pailat na i rakayathu eŋge Barabas.
41015012	Pailat mbowo i vaitoŋgiva wabwiko iŋa, “Ne ya vakatha budakai weya reghake iya huŋake Jiu lenji kiŋ?”
41015013	Thɨ kula njoghawe thɨŋa, “U rokros!”
41015014	Ko Pailat i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Buda kaiwae vara na ne ya vakatha iyako? Va i vakatha the tharɨ?” Thɨ kula na ghalɨŋanji ma i laghɨye eŋge, “U rokros!”
41015015	Kaiwae Pailat nuwaiya i vakathaŋgi na thɨ warari, i vakatha Barabas na i raŋgi e thiyo kaiwanji, amba i vakatha Jisas na thɨ yabɨbɨ na i vaŋgugiya weŋgiya ragagaithɨ na thɨ ŋge e kros.
41015016	Ragagaithɨ thɨ yovaŋguya Jisas gawana ele ŋgolo ghayayao na thɨ kula vathavathaŋgiya ghanjiuneko wolaghɨye thɨ meghɨliŋa Jisas.
41015017	Thɨ liya kwama molao sosoro na thɨ vanjimbowe, na thɨ vona umbwa ele kinkin yaŋgae na thɨ thɨnɨrawe e umbaliye.
41015018	Amba thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiya yavwatata ghavakavakathawe na thɨŋa, “O Jiu lenji Kiŋ, len mbaro ne i meghabana!”
41015019	Thɨ wo umbwa na thɨ ŋgeŋgeŋa umbaliye, thɨ njoŋgovunɨvun na thɨ ronja e ghenji vuvuye thɨ kururu.
41015020	Mbaŋa thɨ vatabweruŋako na e ghereiye, thɨ liraŋgiya kwamako sosoro na thɨ vanjimbo mbe amalaghɨniye ghakwamako. Amba thɨ vaŋguraŋgiya na thɨ yovaŋgu vethɨ rokros.
41015021	E kamwathɨ mborowa thɨ lavolevola amala regha idae Saimon, rara Sairin, va i mena eto na ma i ruma e ghembako tɨne. Ragagaithɨko thɨ vavurɨghegheŋa na i wo Jisas ghakros. Amalaghɨniye le ŋgaŋgaŋgiya Aleksanda na Rupas.
41015022	Thɨ yovaŋguya Jisas e bobokulu idae Golgota (gharumwaru Boutouto Ghambae).
41015023	Thɨ thɨnɨgiya weya waen va thɨ liŋgirawe weiye mbwa regha idae mer, ko mava i mun.
41015024	Mbaŋa thɨ ŋge e krosɨko vwatae, amba thɨ wobwiya ghakwamakwama. Thɨ mbana varɨvarɨ na thɨ mwadiwoŋa mwadiwo reghawe. Thela thoŋgo i wo varɨko iya e ghanonoko amba i tuthi iyaŋganiya i bigi.
41015025	Mbaŋambaŋa, varae vama naen klok thɨ ŋge Jisas e kros vwatae.
41015026	Ghawonjowe rɨghethoru va thɨ rori na thɨ ŋge umbaliye ina yavoro iŋa, Jiu Lenji Kiŋ.
41015027	Vambe thɨ rokrosiŋgiva rakaivɨ theghewo. Regha e une na regha e moiye.
41015029	Gharɨgharɨ thɨ rakarakareŋa evasiwae thɨ wovanukunukuya umbalinji na thɨ goviyaviya ghamwae, thɨŋa, “Ae, va uŋa ne u tagarakaraka Ŋgolo Boboma na mbaŋa thegheto e tɨne kaero u vatadɨva.
41015030	Tembe u vamora ghanɨmberegha. U roiteta krosɨna u njama!”
41015031	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na mbaro gharavavaghare tembe thɨ goviyaviyava ghamwae thɨŋa, “Va i vamoruŋgiya gharɨgharɨ vavana, ko ma valɨkaiwae i vamoru ghamberegha!
41015032	Wo ra thuweno Mesaiya, Isirel lenji kiŋ, i njama e krosɨko ko ambane ra thuwe na wo loŋweghathɨ.”
41015033	Ghararaghɨye mboro vanautumako laghɨye i mouwo. Na i wo ghaghad tɨri klok.
41015034	Vama tɨri klok amba Jisas i kula na ghalɨŋae laghɨye iŋa, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabakɨtani,” gharumwaru ŋgoreiye, “Lo Loi, lo Loi, buda kaiwae u iteteŋaŋgo?”
41015035	Gharɨgharɨ vavana va thiya ndeghathɨ gheko thɨ loŋwethavwiya ghalɨŋae na thɨŋa, “Wo hu vandeŋe, i kula weya Ilaija iyako.”
41015036	Regha i yoruku weiye vune, i liutu e waen monyomonyo, i lirawe e umbwa mbothiye na i livoreŋa Jisas e ghae, na iŋa, “Wo ra roroghagha na ra thuwe thare Ilaija ne i mena na i wonjoŋa e krosɨko!”
41015037	Amba Jisas i randa na ghalɨŋae laghɨye moli, na i liya yawaliye.
41015038	Mbaŋako iyako kwama va i ganatena woluwolu bobomako moli e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne i mathethe wa yavoro na ve wo bode.
41015039	Ragagaithɨ lenji randeviva i ndeghathɨ e ghamwae, i thuweya Jisas le mareko na iŋa, “Mbema emunjoru iye Loi Nariye!”
41015040	Elaela vavana va inanji gheko. Vambe thɨ ndeghathɨ bwagabwaga na thɨ njimbukikiya Jisas. Inanji e tɨnenji Meri tɨnan Magadala, le ghaida Meri Jemes vamba iyovole eŋge na Joses tɨnanji na Salome.
41015041	Wanakauke thiyake va thɨ ghambugha Jisas mbaŋa ina Galili na thɨ thalavu e ghanɨŋga na bigibigi vavanava. Wanakau vavanava va thɨ rakawe weinji Jerusalem vambe inanjiva gheko.
41015042	Vama yeghɨyeghɨye na kaiwae mbaŋa ghamba vivatha Sabat kaiwae,
41015043	Josep rara Arɨmathiya, iye Jiu lenji kot laghɨye loloniye regha. Ghayavwatata i laghɨye na vambe i roroghaghava Loi ghambaŋa mbaro kaiwae. Ghare i matuwo i wa weya Pailat na ve naŋgo weya Jisas riwaekowe.
41015044	Pailat ghare i yo mbaŋa i loŋweya iyako. I kula weya ragagaithɨ lenji randeviva na i vaito thoŋgo Jisas mbe kaero me mare.
41015045	Mbaŋa i loŋweya ragagaithɨko lenji randevivako le utu iŋa Jisas kaero me mare, Pailat i vatomweya riwaeko weya Josep.
41015046	Josep i vamoda kwama kakaleva yaŋgara modae laghɨye, i wonjoŋa Jisas riwaeko na i ghavowe. I wo na ve worawe ele ghabubu va thɨ tɨghɨ e varɨ regha ŋgora maŋgavarɨma. Amba i vabulale varɨ laghɨye regha na i wogana ghaekowe.
41015047	Meri tɨnan Magadala na Meri Joses tɨnae thɨ njimbukiki na thɨ thuwe wagiyawe aŋga methɨ woraweya Jisas riwae.
41016001	Jiu lenji Sabat iko na e ghereiye Meri tɨnan Magadala, Meri Jemes tɨnae na Salome va thɨ vamoda bunama butiye laghɨye na i thovuye. Nuwanjiya thɨ wa na vethɨ varuvo Jisas riwaemawe.
41016002	Vambe mbaŋambaŋa e Sande, varae vama i yovoro amba thɨ wa e ghabubuko.
41016003	E kamwathɨ mborowa thɨ vedage weŋgi thɨŋa, “Thela ne i vabulale varɨma e ghabubuko ghae kaiwanda?”
41016004	Ko iyemaeŋge mbaŋa thɨ vutha thɨ tagathɨna maranji na thɨ thuwe varɨko kaiwae laghɨye moli, kaero methɨ vabulale vakatha.
41016005	Mbaŋa thɨ rakaru e ghabubuko tɨne, vethɨ vaidiya amala regha tabwagha, i yaku e valɨvaŋga une na i njimbo kwama molao kakaleva. Gharenji i tagathɨn laghɨye moli.
41016006	I dage weŋgi, “Gharemi tha i tage. Ya ghareghare hu tamwe Jisas rara Nasaret, iye amba mendake thɨ rokros. Kaero me thuweiru na ma ina gheke. Wo hu thuwe ghambaeke mendava thɨ worakewe!
41016007	Ko hu njogha na vohu dage weŋgiya gharaghambuma na Pita mbe ŋgoreiyeva. Huŋa ‘Kaero i viva e ghamwami Galili. Ne vohu vaidi gheko, ŋgorava le utuutuma weŋga.’ ”
41016008	Thɨ rakaraŋgi na thɨ voiteta ghabubuko weinji lenji mararu na lenji gharelaghɨlaghɨ laghɨye. Ma vethɨ ndeutu mun weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ kaiwae thiya mararu.
41016009	Sande mbaŋambaŋa moli, Jisas le thuweiru e mare e ghereiye, i yomarakai weya Meri tɨnan Magadala, iyava i variye raŋgiyaŋgiya nyaoma raraitharɨ theghepirɨmawe.
41016010	I wa weŋgiya Jisas gharaghambuko iyava weiyaŋgiko na ve utugiya weŋgi. Vambe inanjiwe nuwanji i tharɨ na thiya randa.
41016011	Ko mbaŋa thɨ loŋwe Meri iŋa, “Jisas kaero me thuweiru na ma thuwe e maraŋgu,” ma thɨ loŋweghathɨ.
41016012	Iyake e ghereiye, Jisas i yomara weŋgiya gharaghambu theghewo na ghayamoyamo vambe regha, mbaŋa va mbema vethɨ loŋga eŋge eto.
41016013	Mbaŋa thɨ ghareghare amalaghɨniye amba thɨ njogha na vethɨ utugiya weŋgiya gharaghambuko, ko iyemaeŋge mava thɨ loŋweghathɨ.
41016014	Mbaŋa reghava i yomara weŋgiya gharaghambu theyaworo na regha, mbaŋaniye vara thiya ghanɨŋga. Jisas i ŋaebaruru wanaŋgi kaiwae mava thɨ loŋweghathɨ na mbe ŋgoreiyeva gharenji le vurɨgheghe kaiwae, kaiwae mava thɨ loŋweghathɨŋgiya thavala va thɨ thuwe le thuweiru e ghereiye.
41016015	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Hu rakaraŋgi e yambaneke laghɨye na vohu vavaghareŋa Toto Thovuye weŋgiya gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye.
41016016	Thela ne i loŋweghathɨ na i bapɨtaiso Loi ne i vamora yawaliye, ko thela ma i loŋweghathɨ Loi ne i giya vuyowo weya loloko iyako.
41016017	Thavala ne thɨ loŋweghathɨ, Loi ne i giya vurɨgheghe weŋgi na thɨ vakathaŋgiya vakatha ghamba rotaele i ghanagha. E idaŋgu ne thɨ variye raŋgiyaŋgiya nyao raraitharɨ weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, ne thɨ utu e ghalɨghalɨŋa totogha vavanava.
41016018	Thoŋgo ne thɨ yalaweŋgiya mwatamwata raraitharɨ o thɨ muna mamate, mane i thɨvatharɨŋgi. Ne thɨ bigiraweya nɨmanɨmanji ghambweghambwera e riwanji na riwanji i thovuye.”
41016019	Mbaŋa Giya Jisas i utuvao weŋgi amba Loi i vakatha na i voro e buruburu na i yaku Loi e une e ghamba yavwatata.
41016020	Gharaghambu thɨ rakaraŋgi na vethɨ vavaghareŋa Toto Thovuye weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ e valɨvaŋgake wolaghɨye. Giya Jisas i thalavuŋgi na i vakatha lenji vavaghare emunjoru weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ kaiwae va thɨ thuwe vakathaŋgiko ghamba rotaele thɨ vakathako e maranji.
42001001	Kaiwae gharɨgharɨ lemoyo vama thɨ rorinjoŋa bigibigike wolaghɨye iyava thɨ yomara e tɨnemike kaiwanji.
42001002	Vambe thɨ ghambu vara thavala va thɨ thuwe e maranjiko lenji utuutuko. Na kaiwae va thɨ thuwe e maranji mbaŋaniye va i woraweya le kaiwo rɨghewe, na thiye ŋgoranjiya Loi le utuutu gharakakaiwo, iyava thɨ utugiya utuutuke thiyake weime.
42001003	Iya kaiwae mbe ghino womberegha vara ya ghatha vakatha bigibigike wolaghɨye thiyake va i woraweya rɨghekowe. Nuwaŋguiya ya ghatha na ya bigirawe na vakatha na ya rorinjoŋa ghen giya laghɨye Tiyopilos kaiwan.
42001004	Ya vakatha iyake na mbala u ghareghare bigibigina va thɨ vaghareŋgena i emunjoru.
42001005	Mbaŋa Herod va ghambaŋa kiŋ Judiya, amala regha va ravowovowo idae Sakaraiya na iye i mena Abaija ele wabwi tɨne. Levo idae Elisabet na elaghɨniye Eron rumbuye.
42001006	Vambe theghewo vara ghanjithanavu i rumwaru Loi e marae na va thɨ ghambugha Loi le mbaro na ghathanavu.
42001007	Mava e lenji ŋgaŋga kaiwae Elisabet va i kwama na vama thɨ thanja moli.
42001008	Mbaŋa Sakaraiya le wabwi ghanjimbaŋa kaiwo, amalaghɨniye vambe inawe i vakavakatha ravowovowo ghanjikaiwo Loi e marae.
42001009	Kaiwae ravowovowo mbe ghanjithanavu ŋgoreiye, thɨ mwadiwo e varɨ na i nja weya Sakaraiya, ve ru e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne na i ŋambu inisenɨs na i vowo weya Loi.
42001010	Mbaŋa inisenɨs ghambaŋa ŋambu wabwi laghɨye mbe inanji eto thiya naŋgo.
42001011	Loi le nyao thovuye regha i yomara weya Sakaraiya e mbaŋako iyako na i ndeghathɨ inisenɨs ghaghamba ŋambuŋambuko valɨvaŋga e uneko.
42001012	Mbaŋa Sakaraiya i thuwe nyaoko thovuye ghare i yo weiye le gharelaghɨlaghɨ.
42001013	Ko iyemaeŋge nyaoko thovuye i dagewe iŋa, “Sakaraiya, tha u mararu, kaiwae Loi kaero i wovatha len naŋgona. Len wevo Elisabet ne i vaidiya ŋgama ghɨmoru na ne u rena idae Jon.
42001014	Ne hu warari laghɨye moli weiye lemi nuwathovuye na le ghambɨ ne i vakathaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ lemoyo thɨ warari.
42001015	Na idae ne i laghɨye Loi e marae, na Nyao Boboma ne i riyevanjara mbaŋa amba mane i virɨ, na mane i muna waen o the mbwa i vurɨgheghe.
42001016	Na Isirel gharɨgharɨniye thɨ ghanagha, ne i vaŋgunjoghaŋgi weya Giya lenji Loi.
42001017	Ne i viva Giya e ghamwae, ghathanavu na le vurɨgheghe ne ŋgoreiya Ilaija. Ne i vakathaŋgiya gamagai oramanji gharenji weŋgiya lenji ŋgaŋga na i vabe thavala ma thɨ ghambu Loi le renuwaŋa na thɨ ghambugha gharɨgharɨ rumwarumwaruniye lenji renuwaŋa na i vivathara weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ Giya le mena kaiwae.”
42001018	Amba Sakaraiya i dage weya nyaoko thovuye iŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga ne yaŋa na ya ghareghare iyake emunjoru? Kaiwae kaero ya thanja moli na lo wevoko tembe ŋgoreiyeva.”
42001019	Nyaoko thovuye i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ghino Gaberiyel na ya ndeghathɨ Loi e ghamwae. Me variyeŋgo na ya mena ya utu e ghen na ya utuveŋga totoke thovuye iyake.
42001020	Wo u thuwe kaiwae ma mo loŋweghathɨgha lo utuke, amba mane e ghalɨghalɨŋan na mane valɨkaiwan u utu ghaghada mbaŋaniye bigibigike thiyake ne thɨ yomara ŋgoreiya ma utugiyama e ghen ne e ghanjimbaŋa moli.”
42001021	E mbaŋako iyako gharɨgharɨma thɨ roroghagha weya Sakaraiya na thɨ rerenuwaŋa thɨŋa, “Buda kaiwae i wo mbaŋa molao e Ŋgolo Bobomako tɨne?”
42001022	Mbaŋa i raŋgi, ma valɨkaiwae i utu weŋgi na kaero thɨ ghareghare me vaidiya vatomwe regha e Ŋgolo Bobomako tɨne. Ma vama i utu, vama i vakatha eŋge nono weŋgi e nɨmanɨmae.
42001023	Mbaŋa ghambaŋa kaiwo iko e Ŋgolo Bobomako tɨne, kaero i njogha ele ŋgolo.
42001024	Mava mbaŋa bwagabwaga levo Elisabet i marabo na manjala umbolima e tɨne vambe i rokubaro vara e lenji ŋgoloko tɨne.
42001025	Elisabet iŋa, “E mbaŋake iyake Loi kaero i thalavuŋgo e kamwathɨke iyake. Giya kaero i thalavuŋgo na i wokiyathu lo monjina gharɨgharɨ e maranji.”
42001026	Ghamanjala umbowonaninji e tɨne, Loi i variya nyao thovuye Gaberiyel Nasaret, Galili ele valɨvaŋga tɨne,
42001027	weya thɨnabwethubwethuru eunda vama ghadagerawe weiye amala regha idae Josep iye Deivid rumbuye. Thɨnabwethubwethuruke idae Meri.
42001028	Nyaoko thovuye i wa na ve dagewe iŋa, “Ago Meri, Giya ghare laghɨye e ghen na iye wein.”
42001029	Meri i gharelaghɨlaghɨ laghɨye nyaoko thovuye ghalɨŋaewe na i rerenuwaŋa laghɨye dagemwaewoko iyako kaiwae.
42001030	Ko iyemaeŋge nyaoko thovuye i dagewe iŋa, “Tha u mararu, Meri, Loi i woraweŋge e ghamwae.
42001031	Ne u marabo na u ghamba ŋgama ghɨmoru na ne u rena idae Jisas.
42001032	Ne i laghɨye moli na ne thɨ uno, Ramevoro Moli Nariye. Giya Loi ne i wogiya weya rumbuye Deivid le ghamba yaku,
42001033	na ne i mbaro Jeikob orumburumbuye weŋgi na le ghamba mbaro mane ele ghambako.”
42001034	Meri i vaito nyaoko thovuye iŋa, “Ne ŋgoroŋga na ya vaidiya ŋgama amba thɨnabwethubwethuruya ghino?”
42001035	Nyaoko thovuye i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Nyao Boboma ne i nja e ghen na Ramevoro Moli le vurɨgheghe i yaboŋge. Iya kaiwae ne u ghamba narunɨna boboma, ne idae Loi Nariye.
42001036	Wo u thuwe, u renuwaŋakikiya len bodama Elisabet, kaero i thanja na va thɨŋa i kwama, kaero i marabo na mbaŋake ghamanjala umbowona.
42001037	Kaiwae ma bigi regha i vuyowo weya Loi valɨkaiwae Loi i vakatha.”
42001038	Meri i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Giya le rakakaiwo ghino. Ma i vakathaeŋge ŋgoreiya mo utuŋana e ghino.” Amba nyaoko thovuye i iteteŋa.
42001039	E mbaŋako iyako Meri i vivatha, na i yoruku i wa e ghemba regha e ououniye Judiya e tɨne.
42001040	I vutha na i ru Sakaraiya ele ŋgolo na i dage mwaewo weya Elisabet.
42001041	Mbaŋa Elisabet i loŋweya Meri le dagemwaewo ŋgamako i ghenenyivɨ e ŋgamoiye na Nyao Boboma i riyevanjara Elisabet.
42001042	I dage na ghalɨŋae laghɨye iŋa, “Wanakauke wolaghɨye e tɨnenji Loi ghare e ghen na ghandagemwaewona i kivwala wanakauke wolaghɨye ghanjidagemwaewo, na tembe ghare weva ŋgamana ne u ghambɨna.
42001043	Ko me ŋgoroŋgaeŋge na ghen wo Giya tɨnae mo vakatha wo yavwatata laghɨye na mo mena u thuweŋgo?
42001044	Mbaŋa len dagemwaewona me dimban e yanawaŋgu, ŋgamake e ŋgamoiŋguke i ghenenyivɨ weiye le warari.
42001045	Ŋgoreiye, u warari kaiwae u loŋweghathɨgha ŋgoroŋga Giya le dagerawe e ghen kaero ne i tabo na emunjoru.”
42001046	Meri iŋa, Ghareŋguke i taraweŋa Giya,
42001047	na uneŋguke i warari laghɨye weya Loi wo Ravamoru,
42001048	kaiwae i renuwaŋakikiya le rakakaiwo ma e idaidae. Noroke na mbaŋa thɨ menamenako tha na tha ne thɨ uno idaŋgu, “Wevo warawarariniye”,
42001049	kaiwae Loi Vurɨgheghe i vakatha bigibigi laghɨlaghɨye kaiwaŋgu. Iye ghamberegha i boboma.
42001050	Le ghare vɨrɨ i laghɨye weŋgiya tha na tha thavala thɨ yavwatatawana.
42001051	E nɨmae i vakatha vakatha laghɨlaghɨye moli na i vagegeyathuŋgiya thavala thɨ wovorevoreŋa ghanjimberegha e gharenji.
42001052	Kaerova i wonjoŋaŋgiya giyagiya laghɨlaghɨye e ghambanji na i wovoreŋaŋgiya thavala ma e idaidanji.
42001053	I giya bigibigi thovuthovuye weŋgiya thavala bada i gharɨŋgi na i vathaŋgiya ravwenyevwenye nɨmanɨmanji.
42001054	Kaerova i mena i thalavugha le rakakaiwo wabwi Isirel, na ma i renuwaŋa valawe i gharevɨrɨŋaŋgi,
42001055	ŋgoreiya va le dagerawe weŋgiya orumburumbunda, ŋgoreiya va le dagerawe, iya i gharevɨrɨ weŋgiya Eibraham na orumburumbuye tha na tha.
42001056	Meri va i yaku weiye Elisabet mbaŋa le molamolao ŋgoreiya manjala umboto amba i njogha e ghambae.
42001057	Mbaŋa Elisabet ŋgamoiye i njivun, i ghamba ŋgama ghɨmoru,
42001058	na mbaŋa ghaune na le bodaboda thɨ loŋweya ŋgoroŋga Giya i woraŋgiya le gharevɨrɨ laghɨye weya Elisabet, thɨ warari laghɨye weinji.
42001059	Mbaŋa theghewaninji e tɨne thɨ mena na thɨ kitena ŋgamako riwae njimwae mbothiye na thɨ munje thɨ rena idae Sakaraiya, ramaya idae.
42001060	Ko iyemaeŋge tɨnae ghalɨŋae i maya na iŋa, “Nandere! Idae Jon.”
42001061	Thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Ma lolo regha len bodabodake e tɨnenji idae ŋgora iyana.”
42001062	Thɨ vakatha nono weya ramae na nuwanjiya the ida ne i worawe na ŋgamako idae.
42001063	Sakaraiya i naŋgo weya bigi ghamba rorori na i roriya iyake, “Idae Jon.” Na taulaghɨko gharenji i yo.
42001064	E mbaŋako vara iyako Sakaraiya ghalɨŋae i mavu na mamiye i nyivɨnyivɨ amba i utu na i taraweŋa Loi.
42001065	Ghanjiuneko wolaghɨye thɨ thuwe iyako na i vakatha thɨ gharelaghɨlaghɨ laghɨye moli. Amba bigibigike wolaghɨye thiyake utuninji i lalo ghembaghembako wolaghɨye e ououninji Judiya e tɨne.
42001066	Gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye va thɨ loŋweya totoko iyako thɨ rerenuwaŋa kaiwae na thɨŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga nevole ŋgamako iyako gharerenuwaŋa? Kaiwae vambe weiya vara Giya le vurɨgheghe.”
42001067	Nyao Boboma va i riyevanjara ramae Sakaraiya amba i utuŋa Loi ghalɨŋae iŋa:
42001068	“Ra taraweŋa Giya iye Isirel lenji Loi, kaiwae kaero menda i mena ghinda le gharɨgharɨ kaiwanda, i thalavuinda na i rakayathuinda,
42001069	na i wogiya vamoru ghakin mara mbouye kaiwanda le rakakaiwo Deivid orumburumbuye e tɨnenji.
42001070	Mbaŋa va i vivako ghalɨŋae gharautu boboma thɨ vathiya utuutuke iyake,
42001071	va i dagerawe ghandaravamoru na ne i vamoruinda weŋgiya ghandathɨghɨya, na thavala thɨ botewoinda e nɨmanji ghare.
42001072	Va iŋa ne i gharevɨrɨŋaŋgiya orumburumbunda na i renuwaŋakikiya le dagerawe boboma.
42001073	Va i tholo na i dagerawe weya rumbunda Eibraham
42001074	na iŋa ne i vamoruinda weŋgiya ghandathɨghɨya na i vakathainda rakaiwowe ma weinda la mararu
42001075	e yawalɨ boboma na e thanavu rumwaru e marae e mbaŋake wolaghɨye.
42001076	Ghen, naruŋgu, ne idan Ramevoro Moli ghalɨŋae gharautu, kaiwae ne u viva Giya e ghamwae na u vivatha kamwathɨ kaiwae.
42001077	Na kaiwae ne u vakathaŋgi thɨ ghareghareya Giya le vamoru, na i numotenɨŋgi lenji tharɨ e tɨne,
42001078	kaiwae Loi i gharevɨrɨ laghɨye moli na ghathanavu i udauda kaiwanda, na i vakatha manjamanjala ŋgoreiya varaema i yovoro na manjamanjalawae i njama weinda e buruburuko
42001079	na i giya manjamanjala weŋgiya thavala thɨ yayaku e momouwo na yawalinji i mare, na i vatomwe weinda yawalɨ na vanevane ghanjikamwathɨ.”
42001080	Ŋgamama i tabotabo na une i vurɨvurɨgheghe na ve yaku e njamnjam ghaghada mbaŋa i woraweya le kaiwo rɨghe weŋgiya wabwi Isirel.
42002001	Va e mbaŋaŋgiko thiyako Sisa Ogastas i worawe le mbaro na thɨ wo vavaona Rom ele ghamba mbaro tɨne.
42002002	Vavaonako iyako ambama thɨ wokai vara mbaŋa Koniliyos ghambaŋa gawana Siriya e tɨne.
42002003	Taulaghɨko va thɨ raka, regha na regha vambe i wa e vanarɨghe moli na ve roriya idaewe.
42002004	Josep i ri Nasaret Galili e tɨne na i wa Betɨlehem Judiya e tɨne. Ghembako iyako Deivid vanarɨghe na Josep va i wawe kaiwae iye Deivid rumbuye.
42002005	Josep va ve rorinjoŋa idae weiye Meri, iye vama ghadagerawe weiye Meri vama ghanono ghambɨ.
42002006	Na mbaŋa va inanji gheko, Meri ghambaŋa i ghamba nariyeko.
42002007	I ghambɨkai vara nariye ŋgama ghɨmoru, i ghavo riwae e kwama na i worawe kau e lenji ghamba ghanɨŋga, kaiwae ma vama ŋgolo bobwari regha kokowae ina gheko kaiwanji.
42002008	E valɨvaŋgako iyako sip gharanjimbunjimbu vavana va inanjiwe e ghembako valɨvaŋga regha, thɨ njimbukikiŋgiya lenji sip gougou.
42002009	Giya le nyao thovuye regha i yomara weŋgi, amba Giya le vwenyevwenye manjamanjalawae i vakeke vaghɨliyaŋgi na thɨ mararu laghɨye moli.
42002010	Ko iyemaeŋge nyaoko thovuye i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Thava hu mararu! Wo hu thuwe, ya womena warari laghɨye na wararike iyake ne i womena warari laghɨye weŋgiya gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye.
42002011	E gougouke noroke, Deivid e ghambae ghami Ravamoru i virɨ, iye Mesaiya na Giya.
42002012	Ghanono ŋgoreiyake weŋga: Ne hu thuwe ŋgama gunagunagha regha thɨ ghavo riwae e kwama na i ghena kau e lenji ghamba ghanɨŋga.”
42002013	E mbaŋako iyako rameburuburu lemoyo moli thɨ yomara na thɨ tataraweŋa Loi weinji nyaoma thovuye thɨŋa,
42002014	“Wovavwenyevwenye i voro weya Loi, iye i mevoro moli e buruburu, na e yambaneke Loi le gharemalɨlɨ weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ amalaghɨniye i warariŋaŋgi.”
42002015	Mbaŋa vama nyaoma thovuthovuye thɨ rakaiteteŋgi na thɨ rakanjogha e buruburu, sipɨma gharanjimbunjimbu thɨ vedage weŋgi thɨŋa, “Ra raka Betɨlehem na wo vara thuwe bigike iya me yomarake, iya Giya me utugiya utuniyeke weinda.”
42002016	Vambema ghenji na nɨmanji eŋge vethɨ tamwe vaidiya Meri na Josep na ŋgamama nasiye i ghena kau e lenji ghamba ghanɨŋga.
42002017	Mbaŋa thɨ thuwe ŋgamama tembe thɨ vathigiyava weŋgi budakaiya nyaoma thovuthovuye lenji woraŋgiya weŋgi ŋgamako utuniye.
42002018	Thavala va thɨ loŋwe sipɨko gharanjimbunjimbu lenji utu gharenji i yo laghɨye,
42002019	ko iyemaeŋge Meri ghare i thalavwayaŋa bigibigike thiyake kaiwanji na i worawe e ghare.
42002020	Sip gharanjimbunjimbu thɨ rakanjogha, thɨ wovavwenyevwenyeŋa na thɨ taraweŋa Loi, lenji loŋwe na lenji thuweko kaiwae, ŋgoreiya nyao thovuye le woraŋgiya weŋgi.
42002021	Mbaŋa theghewaniye e tɨne, kaero valɨkaiwae na thɨ kitena ŋgamako riwae njimwae, thɨ rena idae Jisas, ŋgoreiya nyao thovuye va le woraŋgiya weya Meri mbaŋa ma vamba i marabo.
42002022	Mbaŋa vama Josep na Meri ghanjimbaŋa thɨ vakatha riwanji i thɨna ŋgoreiya Mosese le Mbaro i woraŋgiya, thɨ wo ŋgamama na weinji thɨ voro Jerusalem na thɨ vatomwe weya Giya,
42002023	ŋgoreiya Giya le mbaro thɨ rori Buk Boboma e tɨne iŋa, “Gamau ghɨmoghɨmoruna wolaghɨye hu vabobomaŋgi weya Giya.”
42002024	Tembe ŋgoreiyeva thɨ mbana bunebune manyiwo o mbo manyiwo na thɨ vowowe ŋgoreiya Giya le mbaro i woraŋgiya.
42002025	Amala regha va ina Jerusalem idae Simiyon. Iye va i rumwaru na i ghambugha Loi. Nyao Boboma va inawe. Vambe i roroghagha vara thembaŋa Isirel gharɨgharɨniye thɨ vaidiya vamoru.
42002026	Nyaoko Boboma le woraŋgiyawe, mamba ne i vaidiya ghakula ghaghada i thuwe Ravamoru iye Loi va i dagerawe.
42002027	Ŋgoreiya Nyao Boboma le woraŋgiyawe, Simiyon ve ru e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne, na mbaŋa Josep na Meri thɨ woruwo ŋgamako Jisas na thɨ vakathawe ŋgoreiya ghanjithanavu na lenji mbaro le woraŋgiya weŋgi,
42002028	Simiyon i wo ŋgamako na i worawe e nɨmanɨmae amba i tarawe Loi iŋa,
42002029	“O Giya Laghɨye, kaero ŋgoreiya len dagerawema, e mbaŋake iyake u vatomweya len rakakaiwo na i garalawa weiye gharemalɨlɨ,
42002030	kaiwae e maraŋguke kaero ya thuwe len vamoru,
42002031	va u vivatharawe gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye e maranji.
42002032	Iye manjamanjala na ne i woya weŋgiya thiye ma Jiu, na ne i vavwenyevwenyaŋgiya len gharɨgharɨ Isirel.”
42002033	Ŋgamako ramae na tɨnae thɨ ndetaele budakaiya Simiyon va i utuŋa ŋgamako kaiwae.
42002034	Amba Simiyon i naŋgo weya Loi na ghare weŋgi na i dage weya Meri iŋa, “Ŋgamake iyake gharerenuwaŋa ŋgoreiya ne i vakathaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ lemoyo thɨ dobu na gharɨgharɨ lemoyo thɨ yondovirɨ Isirel e tɨne. Iye ne nono i mena weya Loi na gharɨgharɨ lemoyo ne thɨ utuvatharɨwe,
42002035	na amalaghɨniye kaiwae gharɨgharɨ lemoyo lenji renuwaŋa thuwele ne thɨ rakaraŋgi e manjamanjala. Ne vɨrɨ ghamɨnae ŋgoreiya gaithɨ ghaghalithɨ ne i vweya gharena.”
42002036	Yalaghɨsarɨ eunda idae Ana, Penuwel yawarumbuye na i mena Asa e gheuu tɨne. Iye Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu. Le ghe e ghereiye, theghathegha vambe umbopirɨ eŋge i yaku weiye le ghɨmoru
42002037	kaero i wambwiva ghaghada mbaŋako iyako ghatheghathegha kaero i wo ghwewa na umbovarɨ. Ma mbaŋa regha i iteta Ŋgolo Boboma, ghararaghɨye na gougou i kururu weya Loi, i mbeya ghanɨŋga na i naŋgonaŋgo.
42002038	Va e mbaŋako iyako i vuthawe, i vata ago weya Loi na i utuŋa ŋgamako utuutuniye weŋgiya gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye thiye va thɨ roroghagha thembaŋa Loi ne i unuyathu Jerusalem e vuyowo tɨne.
42002039	Mbaŋa Josep na Meri thɨ vakathavao bigibigiko wolaghɨye ŋgoreiya Giya le Mbaro gharerenuwaŋa, kaero thɨ njoghava e ghambanji, Nasaret, Galili e tɨne.
42002040	Ŋgamako i tabo na laghɨye na i vurɨgheghe, thimba i riyevanjara na Loi le gharemwaewo inawe.
42002041	Theghathagha regha na regha e tɨne tɨnae na ramae thɨ wawa Jerusalem Thaga Valaŋani kaiwae.
42002042	Mbaŋa vama ghatheghathegha hoyaworo na umboiwo, tembe thɨ wava ŋgoreiye thɨ vakavakathama.
42002043	Thaga e ghereiye, tɨnae na ramae thɨ wareriŋa ghambanji, ko iyemaeŋge Jisas vambe ina Jerusalem. Tɨnae na ramae mava thɨ ghareghare iyako.
42002044	Lenji renuwaŋa thɨŋa eŋge vama weinji. Mbaŋako iyako yeghɨyeghɨyeniye amba thɨ tamwe. Thɨ tamwe weŋgiya lenji bodaboda na ghanjiune vavana.
42002045	Ko iyemaeŋge ma thɨ vaidi, iya kaiwae tembe thɨ njoghava Jerusalem na vethɨ tamwewe.
42002046	Mbaŋa thegheto e ghereiye amba thɨ vaidi e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne weiyaŋgiya mbaro gharavavaghare vavana i vandeŋeŋgi na i giyagiya vaito weŋgi.
42002047	Taulaghɨko gharenji i yo le ghareghare na le gonjoghako kaiwae.
42002048	Tɨnae na ramae gharenji i yo mbaŋa thɨ vaidi. Tɨnae i dagewe iŋa, “Naruŋgu, buda kaiwae u vakatha weime ŋgorako? Ghino na rama wo rerenuwaŋa laghɨye kaiwan, wo tamwetamwe e ghen.”
42002049	I dage weŋgi iŋa, “Buda kaiwae hu tamwetamwe weŋgo? Ma hu ghareghare valɨkaiwae inaŋgu bwebwe ele ŋgolo?”
42002050	Ko iyemaeŋge ma nuwanji i manjamanjala ŋgoroŋga meŋako weŋgi.
42002051	Amba i wa weiyaŋgi, thɨ njogha Nasaret na i ghambugha ghalɨŋanji. Ko tɨnae vambe i renuwaŋakiki vara bigibigiko thiyako na i worawe e ghare.
42002052	Jisas i tabo na laghɨye, i thimba na i vakatha Loi i warari kaiwae na tembe ŋgoreiye thavala thɨ ghareghare.
42003001	Taibiriyas Sisa ghambaŋa mbaro, theghathegha hoyaworo na umbolimaninji e tɨne, Pontiyas Pailat iye Judiya ghagawana, Herod iye Galili gharambarombaro na ghaghae Pilip i mbaro Itureya na Tɨrokonitis e lenji valɨvaŋga na Lisaniyas iye i mbaro Abilini,
42003002	na e mbaŋako iyako Anas na Kaiyapas thiye ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randevivaŋgi. E mbaŋako iyako Loi ghalɨŋae i mena weya Jon, Sakaraiya nariye, ina e njamnjam.
42003003	Va i vaghɨliya Jorɨdan ele valɨvaŋgako tɨne na i vavaghare weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ uturaŋgiya lenji tharɨ na thɨ roiteteŋgi na Loi i numotena lenji tharɨ. Amba thɨ bapɨtaiso,
42003004	ŋgoreiya Aiseya, Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu va i rori ele utu iŋa, “Lolo regha i kulakula e njamnjam, ‘Hu vivatha kamwathɨ Giya kaiwae, na hu varumwaru na mbala i reŋawe!
42003005	Tholowo regha na regha hu tɨghɨyomuŋgi, na ouou na bobokulu hu mbunɨyathuŋgi na i rumwaru. Kamwathɨ thɨ godugodu hu vanamweŋgi na gotɨthaŋarɨ hu laloŋgi,
42003006	na gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye mbala thɨ vaidiya Loi le vamoru.’ ”
42003007	I dage weŋgiya wabwiko laghɨye va thɨ rakamenakowe bapɨtaiso kaiwae iŋa, “Ghemi mwata raraitharɨ ghemi! Thela i dage e ghemi na hu munjeva ne hu voiteta Loi le ghatemuruko vuyowae iya i menamenako?
42003008	Hu vaemunjoruŋa e lemi vakathana kaero hu uturaŋgiya lemi tharɨ na hu roiteteŋgi na thava huŋa, ‘Loi mane i giya vuyowo weime. Ghime Eibraham orumburumbuya ghime.’ Ya dage e ghemi, Loi valɨkaiwae i mbanɨŋgiya varɨvarɨke thiyake na i vakathaŋgiya Eibraham orumburumbuye.
42003009	E mbaŋake iyake kelumo kaero ina vara e umbwaumbwa rɨgherɨghenji. Umbwa regha na regha ma i rau na thovuye ne i ikuyathu na i bigiyathu e ndɨghe une.”
42003010	Wabwiko thɨ vaito, thɨŋa, “Ko ne wo vakathaeŋge budakai?”
42003011	Jon i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Thela ghakwama ghayaboyabo yaŋgaiwo, valɨkaiwae i ligiya yaŋgara weya thela ma e ghakwama ghayaboyabo, na thela e ghae tembe i vakatha ŋgoreiyeva.”
42003012	Takis gharamban vavana thɨ rakamena bapɨtaiso kaiwae, thɨ govaito thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, ne wo vakatha budakai?”
42003013	I dage weŋgi iŋa, “Thava hu mban na hu kivwala ŋgoreiya ghamighadɨna.”
42003014	Ragagaithɨ vavana tembe thɨ vaitova thɨŋa, “Naka ghime? Ne wo vakatha budakai?” I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Tha hu rovurɨgheghe na hu vakaivɨŋa lolo regha na hu wonjowebwagaŋgi tharɨ e ghavakatha mbala hu kaivɨŋgi. Nuwamina i loghe eŋge modamina kaiwae.”
42003015	Gharɨgharɨ kaero thɨ rerenuwaŋa na lenji renuwaŋa e gharenjiko kaero i ruku, thɨŋava Jon iye mbwata Mesaiya.
42003016	Jon i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ghino ya bapɨtaisoŋga e mbwa, ko iyemaeŋge loloko iya i menamenako iye i vurɨgheghe kivwalaŋgo. Ghino ma elo thovuye na valɨkaiwaŋgu ne ya rakayathu gheghe ghae. Iye ne i bapɨtaisoŋga e Nyao Boboma na e ndɨghe une.
42003017	Le savɨrɨ wit kaiwae kaero ina e nɨmae, ne i ghatha mbombouyeko weiye wokiwokiniyeko. Ne i mbana mbombouyeko na i vathe e ghaŋgolo na wokiwokiniyeko i ŋambu e ndɨgheko iya ma mbaŋa regha ne i mareko.”
42003018	E utuutu ŋgoranjiyako i ghanagha Jon i vakaiwoŋaŋgi na i vavurɨghegheŋgiya gharɨgharɨ na i vavaghare weŋgiya Toto Thovuye.
42003019	Ko iyemaeŋge Jon i goviya Herod ghamwae, kaiwae i vaŋgwa Herodiyas ghaghae levo, na kaiwae vambe i vakathaŋgiva tharɨ lemoyo.
42003020	Tharɨŋgiko thiyako e vwatanji, Herod tembe i vakathava tharɨ laghɨye regha, i woruwo Jon e thiyo.
42003021	Mbaŋa gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨyeko va thɨ bapɨtaiso na Jisas tevambe i bapɨtaisova. Mbaŋa va i naŋgonaŋgo, buruburu i mavu,
42003022	na Nyao Boboma i njawe ŋgoreiya bunebune. Amba ghalɨghalɨŋa regha i njama e buruburu iŋa, “Ghen naruŋgu gharegharethovuniye, u vakatha ya warari laghɨye moli.”
42003023	Mbaŋa Jisas ghatheghathegha vama ŋgoreiye ghweto amba i woraweya le kaiwo rɨghe. Gharɨgharɨ thɨ renuwaŋa amalaghɨniye ramaya Josep, Josep ramaya Heli,
42003024	Heli ramaya Matat, Matat ramaya Livai, Livai ramaya Melɨki, Melɨki ramaya Janai, Janai ramaya Josep,
42003025	Josep ramaya Matataiyas, Matataiyas ramaya Emos, Emos ramaya Neiham, Neiham ramaya Esli, Esli ramaya Nagai,
42003026	Nagai ramaya Maathɨ, Maathɨ ramaya Matataiyas, Matataiyas ramaya Semein, Semein ramaya Josek, Josek ramaya Joda,
42003027	Joda ramaya Joanan, Joanan ramaya Risa, Risa ramaya Serubabol, Serubabol ramaya Salatiyel, Salatiyel ramaya Niri,
42003028	Niri ramaya Melɨki, Melɨki ramaya Adi, Adi ramaya Kosam, Kosam ramaya Elmadam, Elmadam ramaya Erɨ,
42003029	Erɨ ramaya Josuwa, Josuwa ramaya Eliyesa, Eliyesa ramaya Jorim, Jorim ramaya Matat, Matat ramaya Livai,
42003030	Livai ramaya Simiyon, Simiyon ramaya Juda, Juda ramaya Josep, Josep ramaya Jonam, Jonam ramaya Ilaiyakim,
42003031	Ilaiyakim ramaya Meliya, Meliya ramaya Mena, Mena ramaya Matatha, Matatha ramaya Neitan, Neitan ramaya Deivid,
42003032	Deivid ramaya Jese, Jese ramaya Obedi, Obedi ramaya Bowasa, Bowasa ramaya Salmon, Salmon ramaya Nason,
42003033	Nason ramaya Aminadab, Aminadab ramaya Adɨmin, Adɨmin ramaya Anai, Anai ramaya Hesɨron, Hesɨron ramaya Peres, Peres ramaya Juda,
42003034	Juda ramaya Jeikob, Jeikob ramaya Aisake, Aisake ramaya Eibraham, Eibraham ramaya Tira, Tira ramaya Neiho,
42003035	Neiho ramaya Serug, Serug ramaya Riu, Riu ramaya Peleg, Peleg ramaya Eberɨ, Eberɨ ramaya Sila,
42003036	Sila ramaya Keinan, Keinan ramaya Apaksad, Apaksad ramaya Sem, Sem ramaya Nowa, Nowa ramaya Lemek,
42003037	Lemek ramaya Metuisela, Metuisela ramaya Inok, Inok ramaya Jered, Jered ramaya Malaliyel, Malaliyel ramaya Keinan,
42003038	Keinan ramaya Inos, Inos ramaya Set, Set ramaya Adam, Adam ramaya Loi.
42004001	Jisas, Nyao Boboma i riyevanjara, i njoghama e Walaghɨta Jorɨdan na Nyao Boboma i yovaŋgu e njamnjam vurɨvurɨ vwatavwata,
42004002	amba Seitan ve vatanathethaŋawe gheneyevarɨ e tɨne. E mbaŋako thiyako mava i ndeghanɨŋga mun, na gheneyevarɨko e ghereinji amba bada i gharɨ.
42004003	Seitan i dagewe iŋa, “Thoŋgo Loi Nariya ghen, u ŋaerambeya varɨke i gharavɨ na bred.”
42004004	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Buk Boboma iŋa, ‘Lolo ma mbene bred eŋge i ndewo lolo yawaliye.’ ”
42004005	Mbaŋa ubotu Seitan i vaŋguvoreŋa ghemba yavoro moli, na i vatomwe weya ghamba mbaroko wolaghɨye e yambaneke,
42004006	na i dagewe iŋa, “Ne ya vatomwe e ghen ghamba mbaroko wolaghɨye thiyako na u mbaroŋaŋgi weiye lenji vwenyevwenyeko wolaghɨye. Kaerova i vatomwe weŋgo, na ne ya vatomwe weya the lolothan nuwaŋguiya ya vatomwewe.
42004007	Iya kaiwae thoŋgo u kururu e ghino, wolaghɨyeko ne ya vatomwe e ghen.”
42004008	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Gharorori ŋgoreiyake, ‘U kururu weya Giya len Loi ghamberegha na ghamberegha moli u ghambu.’ ”
42004009	Amba Seitan i yovaŋgu Jerusalem na i vaŋgurawe vara e Ŋgolo Boboma vwatae yavoro moli, na i dagewe iŋa, “Thoŋgo Loi Nariya ghen, u pito ghena.
42004010	Kaiwae Buk Boboma iŋa: ‘Loi ne i variyeŋgiya le nyao thovuthovuye kaiwan na thɨ njimbukiki wagiyaweŋge,
42004011	ne thɨ mwanavairɨŋge e nɨmanji mbala ma vo ŋge gheghen e varɨ.’ ”
42004012	Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “Buk Boboma iŋa, ‘Tha lolo regha i mando na i woraweya Giya le Loi mando e tɨne.’ ”
42004013	Mbaŋa Seitan vama le tanathethako iko weya Jisas, amba i iteteŋa ghaghad ghambaŋa thovuye reghava.
42004014	Amba Jisas i ghambu Nyao Boboma ghalɨŋae na i njogha Galili ele valɨvaŋga Nyao Boboma i riyevanjara, na toto amalaghɨniye kaiwae i lalo valɨvaŋgako laghɨye.
42004015	Va i vavaghare Jiu e lenji ŋgolo kururu tɨnenji na gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye thɨ taraweŋa.
42004016	I mena Nasaret, va i tabowe, na Sabat ghambaŋa i ru Jiu e lenji ŋgolo kururu tɨne ŋgoreiya vambe i vakavakatha. I yondovirɨ na i vaona buk,
42004017	thɨ thɨnɨgiya weya Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, Aiseya le buk. I tate na i vaidiya utuutuke thiyake:
42004018	“Giya Une ina e ghino, kaiwae kaerova i tuthiŋgo na ya womena Toto Thovuye weŋgiya mbinyembinyeŋgu. Va i variyeŋgo na ya uturaŋgiya unuyathu utuniye weŋgiya thavala thɨ vanɨŋgi, na thavala maranji thɨ tharɨ kaero thɨ thuweva na ya unuyathuŋgiya thavala thɨ njimbu njoŋanjoŋaŋgi,
42004019	na ya uturaŋgiya mbaŋake Giya ne i vamoruŋgiya le gharɨgharɨ.”
42004020	Jisas i vaonavao, i vona bukuko na i thɨnɨgiya njogha weya ŋgolo kururu gharanjimbunjimbu amba i ronja. Gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye e ŋgoloko tɨne mbe thɨ vonjimbughathɨ vara.
42004021	I dage weŋgi iŋa, “Utuutuke iya e bukuke iyake kaero i tabona emunjoru e mbaŋake noroke ŋgoreiya me lemi loŋwena.”
42004022	Taulaghɨko thɨ wovathovuthovuyeŋa na gharenji i yo laghɨye utuutuko thovuthovuye thɨ raŋgiraŋgi e ghaeko. Thɨŋa, “Ma Josep nariyeko, ae?”
42004023	I dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ya ghareghare ne hu guveŋgwa goghaimbake iyake, ne huŋa, ‘Rathawathawari, tembe u thawariya ghanɨmbereghana.’ Vakavakatha ghamba rotaele wo loŋwe va u vakatha Kapenaom, tembe u vakathava gheke, e ghambanɨke moli.”
42004024	Jisas i gotubwe iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, gharɨgharɨ thɨ botewo Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu thoŋgo iye ghambanji loloniye.
42004025	Ya vaemunjoruŋa e ghemi, Ilaija va e ghambaŋa tɨne, theghathegha umboto na vaŋgothiye mava i ndeuye mun Isirel e tɨne. Iyake va i vakatha vunuvu laghɨye e valɨvaŋgako iyako. Othembe raŋama wambwiwambwi lemoyo va inanji Isirel e mbaŋako iyako,
42004026	ko iyemaeŋge Loi mava i variya Ilaija weya eunda Isirel e tɨne, ko vambe i variye eŋge weya wambwi eunda, va ina Jerepat, Saidon ele valɨvaŋga, iye ma Isirel wevoniye.
42004027	Na gharɨgharɨ lemoyo va inanji Isirel, thɨ ghataŋa lepelo, Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, Ilaisa ghambaŋa e tɨne, ko iyemaeŋge Ilaisa mava i thawari mun regha, vambe i thawari eŋge Naaman rara Siriya.”
42004028	Mbaŋa gharɨgharɨko e ŋgolo kururuko tɨne thɨ loŋwe iyako, gharenji i gaithɨ laghɨye moli.
42004029	Thɨ rakayondo, thɨ lawe Jisas e nɨmanji na thɨ vaŋguiteta ghembako. Thɨ yovaŋgu e ou vwatae, iyava thɨ vatada ghembakowe. Lenji renuwaŋa va thɨŋa eŋge ne thɨ du na i yonjoŋa ouko ghadidiye.
42004030	Ko iyemaeŋge va i ghathara wabwiko e tɨnenji na kaero i waova.
42004031	Amba Jisas i wa Kapenaom, Galili ghembaniye regha na e Sabat i vavaghare weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ.
42004032	Gharenji va i yo le vavaghareko kaiwae, kaiwae i utu weiye mbaro.
42004033	E ŋgolo kururuko tɨne amala regha nawe, nyao raitharɨ va inawe. I kula na ghalɨŋae laghɨye,
42004034	iŋa, “Aee! Jisas rara Nasaret, nuwaniya budakai weime? Mo mena gheke na u vakowanaime? Ya ghareghare thela ghen, ghen Raboboma Loi va i variye.”
42004035	Jisas i ŋaevwaŋa iŋa, “Tha ghadage! U raŋgi weya amalana!” Nyaoma raitharɨ i vakatha amalama i dobu e ghamwanji na i raŋgi ko mava i vakowana mun riwae regha.
42004036	Gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye gharenji i yo laghɨye na thɨ vedage weŋgi thɨŋa, “Wo hu thuwe! Loloke iyake weiye le mbaro na le vurɨgheghe na i utu weŋgiya nyao raraitharɨ na kaero thɨ rakaraŋgi.”
42004037	Jisas utuutuniye i lalo valɨvaŋgako iyako.
42004038	Jisas i iteta ŋgolo kururu na i wa Saimon ele ŋgolo. Saimon mboriyae va i ghambwera na riwae i dayagha. Thɨ naŋgo weya Jisas na i thalavu.
42004039	I wa ve ndeghathɨ e ghadidiye na i ŋaevwaŋa ghambwerako na i iteta elako. E mbaŋako iyako i thuweiru na i vaŋamweŋgi.
42004040	Varae vama ve ronja amba gharɨgharɨ thɨ bigimenaŋgiya thavala tomethi ghambwera va ina weŋgi na Jisas i bigiraweya nɨmanɨmae regha na regha e vwatanji na riwanji kaero i thovuyeva.
42004041	Nyao raraitharɨ vambe thɨ rakaraŋgi weŋgiva gharɨgharɨ na thiya kula, thɨŋa, “Ghen Loi Nariya ghen!” Ko iyemaeŋge i ŋaebaruru wanaŋgi na i vakathaŋgi ma thɨ ndeutu mun, kaiwae va thɨ ghareghare iye Mesaiya.
42004042	Mbaŋambaŋa vena Jisas i iteta ghembako na i wa e valɨvaŋga ma gharɨgharɨ nanjiwe. Gharɨgharɨ thɨ tamwe mbele na mbaŋa thɨ vaidi, thɨ mando na thɨ laweghathɨ na thava i iteteŋgi.
42004043	Ko iyemaeŋge i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Nuwaŋguiya mbe va utuŋava Toto Thovuye Loi le ghamba mbaro utuutuniye e ghembaghemba vavanava, kaiwae iyake iyava Loi i variyeŋgoko na ya vakatha.”
42004044	Iya kaiwae va i vavaghare e ŋgolo kururu tɨnenji Judiya laghɨyeko.
42005001	Mbaŋa regha Jisas va i ndeghathɨ e Njighɨ Genesaret ghadidiye amba gharɨgharɨ thɨ rakavathavatha e ghadidiye na thɨ vandeŋe i utuŋa Loi le utu.
42005002	I thuweŋgiya waŋgawaŋga waŋgaiwo thɨ mwanavoreŋaŋgi. Raboroborogi methɨ mwanavoreŋaŋgi na vethɨ thavwiŋgiya lenji ghina.
42005003	Jisas i tha e waŋgara, Saimon le waŋga, na i dagewe na i yambiraŋgiya seiwo eto. I yakuwe na i vavaghare weŋgiya gharɨgharɨko.
42005004	Mbaŋa i utuvao, i dage weya Saimon iŋa, “U voraŋgi e waŋgake ŋgora dumwagako ghadidiye, na ghen na ghanunena hu da lemi ghinana na borogi thɨ wona.”
42005005	Saimon i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Amalana, me gougou mo rovurɨgheghe moli ko iyemaeŋge ma mo ndekosi mun. Ko kaiwae u dagena e ghino ne ya vakatha ŋgoreiya ghalɨŋana.”
42005006	Mbaŋa thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiyako, borogi lemoyo moli thɨ wona na mbalama thɨ tenɨŋgiya ghinako.
42005007	Thɨ yawalo weŋgiya ghanjiuneko e waŋgako waŋgarako na thɨ mena thɨ thalavuŋgi. Thɨ mban vanjaraŋgiya waŋgaiwoko e borogiko na mbalama thɨ dama.
42005008	Mbaŋa Saimon Pita i thuwe iyako i mena i ronja e gheghe vuvuye Jisas e ghamwae na iŋa, “U roiteteŋgo, Giyana, kaiwae lolo raithara ghino.”
42005009	Weiyaŋgiya ghauneko gharenji i yo borogiko lenji ghanaghanagha kaiwae
42005010	na tembe ŋgoreiyeva Jemes na Jon, Sebedi le ŋgaŋgama, thiye Saimon le vɨghathɨŋgi. Jisas i dage weya Saimon iŋa, “Tha u mararu, e mbaŋake noroke na i ghaoko ghen gharɨgharɨ ghanjirakosi.”
42005011	Thɨ livoreŋa lenji waŋgawaŋgako, thɨ iteta bigibigiko wolaghɨye na thɨ ghambugha Jisas.
42005012	Mbaŋa Jisas vamba ina e ghemba regha, amala regha i menawe i ghataŋa lepelo. Mbaŋa i thuwe Jisas, i dobu e ghamwae na ghamwae i nja e thelauko vwatae amba i naŋgowe iŋa, “Giyana, thoŋgo nuwaniya u vakathaŋgo na ya thovuye.”
42005013	Jisas i livamomoya nɨmae na i vɨghathɨgha amalako na iŋa, “Nuwaŋguke nuwaiya, riwana i thovuye!” E mbaŋako iyako lepeloko i kowe.
42005014	Jisas i dage vavurɨgheghewe iŋa, “Tha u utugiya weya lolo regha. Wo u wakai vara weya ravowovowo, vo vatomweŋge ghanɨmberegha na vo vowo ŋgoreiya Mosese le mbaro, na iyake i vaemunjoruŋa weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ riwana kaero i thovuye.”
42005015	Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas utuutuniye ma i laghɨye eŋge na wabwi lemoyo thɨ mena thɨ vandeŋe na i thawariŋgiya thavala e ghanjighambwera.
42005016	Ko mbaŋa vavana i wa e valɨvaŋga ma gharɨgharɨniye na ve naŋgowe.
42005017	Mbaŋa regha Jisas i vavaghare, Parisi na Mbaro gharavavaghare vavana va inanji gheko thiya yaku, thɨ rakamena e ghembaghemba regha na regha Galili e tɨne na Judiya na Jerusalem. Giya le vurɨgheghe va inawe na valɨkaiwae i thawariŋgiya ghambweghambwera.
42005018	Amaamala vavana thɨ womena amala regha na e ghambae ghavwarara, i kuvokuvo. Thɨ munje thɨ woruwo e ŋgolo tɨne na thɨ worawe Jisas e ghamwae,
42005019	ko kaiwae wabwi laghɨye va inanji e ŋgoloko tɨne mava valɨkaiwanji thɨ woruwo, ma thɨ wovoro eŋge e ŋgoloko vwatae, thɨ vakatha doda na thɨ vakwatenjoŋawe e ghambaeko wabwiko e ghanjilughawoghawo Jisas e ghamwae.
42005020	Mbaŋa Jisas i thuwe lenji loŋweghathɨko, i dage weya amalako iŋa, “Wou, len tharɨna kaero ya numoten.”
42005021	Parisi na mbaro gharavavaghare thɨ rerenuwaŋa mbe thiye eŋge, thɨŋa, “The lolo idayake iya i utuvatharɨke weya Loi? Loi mbe ghambereghaeŋge valɨkaiwae i numotena tharɨ!”
42005022	Jisas vama i ghareghare lenji renuwaŋako iya kaiwae i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Buda kaiwae hu rerenuwaŋa bigibigike thiyake e gharemina?
42005023	Iyaŋganiya ghautuutu i maya, ‘Len tharɨna kaero ya numoten,’ o yaŋa, ‘U yondovirɨ na u loŋga’?
42005024	Ya vaemunjoruŋa e ghemi, Lolo Nariye ele mbaro e yambaneke na valɨkaiwae i numotena tharɨ.” I dage weya kuvokuvoko iŋa, “Ya dage e ghen, u bigiya ghambana ghavwarara na u wa e len ŋgolo!”
42005025	E mbaŋako iyako i yondovirɨ taulaghɨko e ghamwanji, i mbana vwararako me ghenakowe, i wa ele ŋgolo na i taraweŋa Loi.
42005026	Taulaghɨko gharenji i yo na thɨ taraweŋa Loi thɨŋa, “Ma ra thuweŋgiya bigibigi vavana na ghamba numowo noroke!”
42005027	Iyake e ghereiye Jisas i raŋgi e ŋgoloko na i vaidiya takis gharamban regha idae Livai, i yaku ele ghamba kaiwo tɨne. Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “U ghambuŋgo.”
42005028	Livai i yondovirɨ, i iteta bigibigiko wolaghɨye na i ghambu.
42005029	Amba Livai i vakatha ghanɨŋga laghɨye ele ŋgoloko tɨne Jisas kaiwae. E tɨnenji wabwi laghɨye takis gharamban na gharɨgharɨ vavanava thiya ghanɨŋga weinjiyaŋgi.
42005030	Ko iyemaeŋge e tɨnenji Parisi vavana na mbaro gharavavaghare vavana, thiye Parisi, thɨ liya Jisas gharaghambu ghanjiutu thɨŋa, “Buda kaiwae huya ghanɨŋga weimiyaŋgiya takis gharamban na gharɨgharɨke raraitharɨ?”
42005031	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Thavala riwanji i thovuye ma nuwanjiya rathawathawari, mbe ghambweghambwera eŋge nuwanjiya.
42005032	Ma ya mena na ya kula weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ rumwaru ko mbe ya kula weŋgi eŋge tharɨ gharavakatha na thɨ uturaŋgiya lenji tharɨ na thɨ roiteteŋgi.”
42005033	Amba Parisi na lenji mbaro gharavavaghare thɨ dage weya Jisas thɨŋa, “Jon gharaghambu mbaŋa vavana thɨ mbeya ghanɨŋga na thiya naŋgo, na Parisi ghanjiraghambu mbe ŋgoreiyeva, ko iyemaeŋge ghen ghanɨraghambu thɨ ghanɨŋga na thɨ munumu.”
42005034	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Thare valɨkaiwae u vakathaŋgiya ghe gharaghaghayawo thɨ mbeya ghanɨŋga mbaŋa ragheghe ghɨmoru mbe inawe vara weiyaŋgi? Nandere!
42005035	Ko iyemaeŋge mbaŋa tene i mena na ne e mbaŋako iyako thɨ vaŋgu weŋgiya ragheghe ghɨmoru, ko amba thɨ mbeya ghanɨŋga.”
42005036	Jisas tembe i utuŋava goghaimbake iyake weŋgi iŋa, “Ma lolo regha ne i mwanathethe ghakwama ghayaboyabo togha na i li na i ŋgiya kwama ghayaboyabo teuyewe. Thoŋgo i vakatha ŋgoreiyako, mbaŋa i thavwi na i livamo toghako ne i mathethe na toghako mane mboromboro weiye teuyeko.
42005037	Na mane lolo regha i liŋgiya waen togha e variye teuye thɨ vakatha e thetheghan njimwae. Thoŋgo i vakatha ŋgoreiyako, waenɨko togha ne i vakatha na i topo na waenɨko i maliŋgi na i vakowana variyeko.
42005038	Iya kaiwae waen togha tembe i liŋgiva e variye togha.
42005039	Na ma lolo regha nuwaiya waen togha thoŋgo kaero me muna waen teuye, kaiwae ne iŋa, ‘Waenɨko teuye ghamɨnae thovuye’.”
42006001	Va Sabat regha Jisas na gharaghambu thɨ ghathara wit e ghanjiuma. Gharaghambuko thɨ vugha witɨko uneune, thɨ ŋwi vwaravwara e nɨmanɨmanji na thɨ ghana mbombouyeko.
42006002	Parisi vavana thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Buda kaiwae hu vakatha budakaiya la Mbaro ma i vatomwe weinda na ra vakatha e Sabat?”
42006003	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Mbe hu ndevaona mun budakaiya Deivid va i vakatha mbaŋa weŋgiya ghaune na bada i gharɨŋgi?
42006004	Va i ru Loi ele ŋgolo tɨne na i wo bred boboma na i ghan, na tembe i wogiya weŋgiva ghauneko na thɨ ghan. Iyake la Mbaro ma i vatomwe na lolo regha ve wo na i ghan, mbe ravowovowo eŋge vara thɨ ghan.”
42006005	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Lolo Nariye iye Sabat ghagiya.”
42006006	Sabat reghava Jisas i ru e ŋgolo kururu tɨne na i vavaghare. Amala regha va ina gheko, nɨmaeko iya uneko va i kuvokuvo.
42006007	Mbaro gharavavaghare vavana na Parisi vambe thɨ vonjimbughathɨ vara kaiwae va nuwanjiya thɨ thuwe Sabat e tɨne thoŋgo i thawariya amalako mbala lenji rɨghe na thɨ wonjowe.
42006008	Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas vama i ghareghare lenji renuwaŋako, amba i dage weya amalako nɨmaeko i mare iŋa, “U yondovirɨ na u mena u ndeghathɨ e ghamwameke.” Amalako i yondo na ve ndeghathɨ gheko.
42006009	Amba Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Wo ya vaitoŋga, iyaŋganiya la Mbaro i vatomwe weinda na ra vakatha e sabat, ra vakatha thovuye o ra vakatha tharɨ, ra vamora lolo yawaliye o ra vakowana?”
42006010	I thuwevaoŋgi regha na regha amba i dage weya amalako iŋa, “U livamomoya nɨmanɨna.” I vakatha ŋgoreiye na nɨmaeko kaero i thovuyeva.
42006011	Ko iyemaeŋge gharenji i muru laghɨye moli na mbe thiye eŋge thɨ veutu weŋgi, ne thɨ vakatha budakai weya Jisas.
42006012	Mbaŋa regha e mbaŋaŋgiko thiyako e tɨne Jisas i voro e ou regha na ve naŋgowe. Va gougouko iyako i naŋgonaŋgo weya Loi.
42006013	Mbaŋa ighɨviya rakaraka i kula vathaŋgiya gharaghambu na i tuthiŋgiya theyaworo na theghewo. I rena idanji ghalɨŋae gharaghambɨ:
42006014	Saimon, vambe i unova Pita, na ghaghae Endru, Jemes, Jon, Pilip, Batolomiu,
42006015	Matiu, Tomas, Jemes Alipiyos nariye, Saimon va thɨ uno iye Jilot,
42006016	Judas Jemes nariye, na Judas Isakariyot, iye Jisas ghaliliva.
42006017	Mbaŋa Jisas i njama weiyaŋgiya ghalɨŋae gharaghambɨ, na i ndeghathɨ e malamo regha na gharaghambu wabwi laghɨye va inanji gheko. Gharɨgharɨ lemoyo moli inanji gheko thɨ rakamena Judiya laghɨyeko na Jerusalem na ghembaghemba e njighɨ ghadidiye Taiya na Saidon e lenji valɨvaŋga.
42006018	Va thɨ rakamena na thɨ vandeŋe na thavala e ghanjighambwera thɨ naŋgowe na i thawariŋgi. Thavala nyao raraitharɨ va thɨ vakatha vuyowo weŋgi vambe thɨ menaweva na i thawariŋgi.
42006019	Gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye thɨ mando na thɨ vɨghathɨ, kaiwae vurɨgheghe va i raŋgiraŋgiwe na i thawarivaoŋgi.
42006020	Jisas marae i ghembeŋgiya gharaghambu amba iŋa, “Hu warari, thavala ghemi mbinyembinyeŋgu, kaiwae Loi le ghamba mbaro kaero ina weŋga.
42006021	Hu warari, thavala ghemi bada i gharɨŋga e mbaŋake iyake, kaiwae ne i mban vanjaraŋga. Hu warari, thavala ghemi hu numotharɨ e mbaŋake iyake, kaiwae ne i vawarariŋaŋga.
42006022	Hu warari, thavala ghemi, mbaŋa gharɨgharɨ thɨ botewoyathuŋga, na thɨ kitenɨyathuŋga e lenji wabwi tɨne, na thɨ utuvatharɨ e ghemi na thɨŋa idamina i tharɨ, kaiwae hu ghambugha Lolo Nariye.
42006023	Hu warari laghɨye e mbaŋako iyako hu thari weiye lemi warari, kaiwae modami laghɨye mbe ina e buruburu. Hu renuwaŋakiki gharɨgharɨke iya thɨ vakatha vuyowoke e ghemi, orumburumbunji vambe thɨ vakathava ŋgoreiye weŋgiya Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu.
42006024	“Ko iyemaeŋge ghemi ravwenyevwenye mbaŋake, nevole hu thovuyaona, kaiwae lemi yakuyakuna thovuye kaero hu vaidivao.
42006025	Thavala ghemi hu ghan talabwayaŋa e mbaŋake iyake, nevole hu thovuyaona, kaiwae nevole hu bada. Thavala ghemi mbaŋake hu vavɨrɨ, nevole hu thovuyaona, kaiwae nevole hu raŋinumoumu laghɨye moli.
42006026	Thoŋgo gharɨgharɨ thɨ wovathovuthovuyeŋaŋga, nevole hu thovuyaona. Orumburumbunji vambe thɨ vakathava thanavuko iyako weŋgiya ghalɨŋae gharautu kwanɨkwan.”
42006027	“Ko iyemaeŋge ya dage e ghemi thavala hu vandeŋeŋgo. Hu gharethovu weŋgiya ghamithɨghɨya, ghamithanavu i thovuye weŋgiya thavala thɨ botewoyathuŋga,
42006028	gharemi weŋgiya thavala thɨ guraŋga na thavala thɨ vakatha vatharɨ e ghemi hu naŋgo kaiwanji.
42006029	Thoŋgo lolo regha i tagaleva galagalan, u vatomweya valɨgalagalanɨna tembe i tagalevava. Thoŋgo lolo regha i liya ghanɨkwama ghayaboyabo tembe u vatomwe weva iya yaŋgarana e tɨnena na i li.
42006030	Thela i naŋgo weya bigi regha e ghen u wogiyawe, na thoŋgo lolo regha i wo bigi regha e ghen, thava tembe u vavurɨghegheŋa na i wonjoghava e ghen.
42006031	Budakaiya nuwamiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ vakatha e ghemi, hu vakathava weŋgi.”
42006032	“Thoŋgo mbe hu gharethovu weŋgi eŋge thavala thɨ gharethovu e ghemi, ŋgoroŋga na hu renuwaŋa na hu munjeva Loi ne i vamodaŋga? Nandere, kaiwae othembe thavala ma thɨ ghambugha Loi le mbaro, thɨ gharethovu njogha weŋgiya thavala thɨ gharethovu weŋgi.
42006033	Na thoŋgo mbe hu vakatha eŋge vakatha thovuye weŋgiya thavala thɨ vakatha vakatha thovuye e ghemi, ŋgoroŋga na hu renuwaŋa na hu munjeva Loi ne i vamodaŋga? Nandere, kaiwae othembe thavala ma thɨ ghambugha Loi le mbaro thɨ vakatha tembe ŋgoreiye iyako.
42006034	Na thoŋgo mbe hu giya eŋge bigibigi weŋgiya thavala hu ghareghare ne thɨ giya njogha modae e ghemi, ŋgoroŋga na hu renuwaŋa na hu munjeva Loi ne i vamodaŋga? Othembe thavala ma thɨ ghambugha Loi le mbaro thɨ giya bigibigi weŋgiya thavala ma thɨ ghambugha Loi le mbaro, na thɨ mban njogha tembe ŋgoreiyeva lenji giyako le ghanaghanagha.
42006035	Ko iyemaeŋge hu gharethovu weŋgiya ghamithɨghɨya na ghamithanavu i thovuye weŋgi. Hu giya bigibigi weŋgi na tha hu rerenuwaŋa modae i njogha weŋga. Amba modami ne i laghɨye moli, na ghemi ne hu tabona Loi Ramevoro Moli le ŋgaŋga, kaiwae iye ghare weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ ma thɨ vata agowe na gharɨgharɨ ghanjithanavu raitharɨ.
42006036	Gharemi mbe i nja weŋgiya gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye, ŋgoreiya Loi Ramami, ghare i nja weŋgiya gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye.”
42006037	“Tha hu wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋgiya ghamune mbala Loi ma i wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋga. Thava huŋa thiye gharɨgharɨ raraitharɨ, mbala Loi tembe i utuva ŋgoreiyako kaiwami. Hu numoyathuŋgiya ghamune lenji tharɨ, na Loi mbala i numotena lemi tharɨ.
42006038	U giya weŋgiya ghanune na Loi mbala i giya e ghen. U mban wagiyawe na tha i njimbenjimbe, i riyevanjara na ve yarayarethu, Loi ne i liŋgi e ghen. Ŋgoroŋga lemi giyana le laghɨlaghɨye Loi tembene i vakathava e ghen ŋgoreiye.”
42006039	Jisas vambe i utuŋava goghaimbake iyake weŋgi iŋa, “Thare valɨkaiwae amala marae i kwaghe i viva weya amala tembe marae i kwagheva? Ma valɨkaiwae mbene theghewoko vara vethɨ dobu e goga.
42006040	Ma ravavaona regha ne i kivwala le ravavaghare, ko iyemaeŋge ravavaona regha na regha, mbaŋa ne i vavaonaŋa kaiwoko iyako iye i tabo na ŋgoreiye le ravavaghareko.”
42006041	“Buda kaiwae u thuwe ŋuthuŋuthu ghanuna e marae ko iyemaeŋge ma u thuwe umbwana laghɨye iya ghen e maranɨna?
42006042	Ŋgoroŋgaeŋge na u dage weya ghanuna, ‘Ae wou, wo ya woraŋgiya ŋuthuŋuthuna e maranɨna,’ ko ghen ghanɨmbereghana ma u thuwe umbwana laghɨye e maranɨna? Taukwana ghen! I viva wo u woraŋgiya umbwana ghen e maranɨna na maranɨna i manjamanjala amba valɨkaiwae ne u woraŋgiya ŋuthuŋuthuna ghanuna e marae.”
42006043	“Umbwa thovuye mane i rau na une raitharɨ. Tembe ŋgoreiyeva, umbwa raitharɨ mane i rau na une thovuye.
42006044	Umbwa regha na regha ghayamoyamo ve raŋgi e uneko. Kaiwae kopi uneune mane vo vugha e kavwala tɨnetɨne o vo vugha mbathɨ e tatata tɨnetɨne.
42006045	Lolo thovuye uneya thanavu thovuye, ŋgoreiya thovuyeko i mbanɨvathavatha e ghareko. Lolo raitharɨ uneya thanavu raitharɨ, ŋgoreiya tharɨko i mbanɨvathavatha e ghareko. Kaiwae budakaiya i riyevanjara gharendake, iya thɨ rakaraŋgi e ghaendake.
42006046	“Buda kaiwae hu dage e ghino na huŋa, ‘Giya, Giya,’ na ma hu vakatha budakaiya ya utuŋa?
42006047	Thela thoŋgo i mena e ghino na i vandeŋe lo utuke na i vakatha ŋgoreiye, loloko iyako ŋgoreiye iyake.
42006048	Iye ŋgoreiya amala regha i vatada ŋgolo. I tɨgha doda molao i wa bode na ghatuŋgiko vethɨ ndeghathɨ e varɨ vurɨghegheniye vwatae. Mbaŋa vorughala i raŋgi na i vatad e ŋgoloko ghetu, ma i vandindiya ŋgoloko, kaiwae ghatuŋgiko nanji e varɨ vwatae.
42006049	Ko iyemaeŋge thela i loŋwe lo utuke na ma i vakatha ŋgoreiye, amalaghɨniye ŋgoreiya amala i vatada ŋgolo na ghatu thɨ ndeghathɨ e thelau na ma e ghambaghɨmbaghɨ. Mbaŋa vorughala i voro na i vatad e ŋgoloko, i mbun na mbaŋara i dobu na i raka vawowona.”
42007001	Mbaŋa Jisas i vavagharevao weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ amba i wa Kapenaom.
42007002	Rom lenji ragagaithɨ gharandeviva va ina gheko, le rakakaiwo na va gharewe moli, i ghambwera na ma thɨ tagayobonjoŋa eŋge.
42007003	Ragagaithɨko lenji randeviva i loŋwe Jisas utuniye ina Kapenaom, i variyeŋgiya Jiu lenji randeviva vavana na vethɨ naŋgowe na i mena i thawariya le rakakaiwoko.
42007004	Mbaŋa thɨ menawe thɨ naŋgo vurɨgheghewe, thɨŋa, “Amalake iyake valɨkaiwae moli u thalavu.
42007005	I gharethovu weŋgiya la bodaboda na va i vatada ŋgolo kururu kaiwame.”
42007006	Iya kaiwae Jisas i wa weiyaŋgi. Mbaŋa vama i vurɨthaiya ŋgoloko ghadidiye, ragagaithɨma lenji randeviva i variyeŋgiya ghaune vavana na vethɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Amalana, len ghavalɨgiya ghalɨŋae ŋgora iyake iŋa, ‘Tha u rovurɨghegheŋa lo ŋgoloke. Ma lolo thovuya ghino na valɨkaiwae u ru elo ŋgoloke.
42007007	Iya kaiwae ma renuwaŋa ghino ma elo thovuye na wombereghake ma ghaona e ghen. Mbema uŋaeŋge na lo rakakaiwoke kaero riwae i thovuye.
42007008	Ghino ŋgoreiye, ya ghambugha rambarombaro e vwataŋgu lenji renuwaŋa, na lo ragagaithɨ tembe thɨ ghambuva ghino lo renuwaŋa. Ya dage weya regha yaŋa, “U wa,” na i wa; na ya dage weya regha yaŋa, “U mena,” na i mena; na ya dage weya lo rakakaiwoke yaŋa, “U vakatha iyake,” na i vakatha ŋgoreiye.’ ”
42007009	Jisas ghare i yo mbaŋa i loŋwe iyake. I ndevaghɨle na i dage weŋgiya wabwiko thɨ rakambeleko iŋa, “Ma mbaŋa regha ya vaidi mun lolo regha le loŋweghathɨ ŋgoreiyake, othembe Isirel e tɨne!”
42007010	Utu gharawo thɨ njogha ragagaithɨma lenji randeviva ele ŋgolo na thɨ thuwe le rakakaiwoma kaero riwae i thovuye.
42007011	Iyako e ghereiye Jisas i wa e ghemba regha idae Nein. Gharaghambu na wabwi laghɨye regha vambe weinjiva.
42007012	Vama i vurɨthai vara ghembako ghakamwathɨ ruru, kaero thɨ woworaŋgima amala regha kaero i mare. Amalake iyake wambwi eunda nariye, vambe iyaeŋge vara ghambereghako na wabwi laghɨye e ghembako tɨne va thɨ ghambugha elako.
42007013	Mbaŋa Giya Jisas i thuwe wambwiko, ghare i njawe na i dagewe iŋa, “Tha u randa.”
42007014	Amba i loŋga ghembe, i vɨghathɨgha gheneromboromboko na rawowoko thɨ ndeghathɨ. Jisas iŋa, “Amalana! Ya dage e ghen, u thuweiru.”
42007015	Amalako i thuweiru na kaero i utuutuva. I vaŋgu na i vaŋgunjogha weya tɨnae.
42007016	Taulaghɨko weinji lenji mararu laghɨye na thɨ taraweŋa Loi thɨŋa, “Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu laghɨye regha kaero menda i yomara e tɨnendake. Loi kaero i mena i thalavuŋgiya le gharɨgharɨ.”
42007017	Gharɨgharɨ thɨ ndethɨna Jisas utuutuniye na i lalo Judiya laghɨyeko na vanautuma e ghadighadidiyeva.
42007018	Jon gharaghambu thɨ utugiyavaowe bigibigike thiyake utuninji,
42007019	amba i kula weŋgiya gharaghambu theghewo na thɨ menawe. I variyeŋgi na thɨ wa weya Giya weinji govaitoke iyake, “Ghen mbema iyava thɨŋake tene i mena, o wo roroghaghaweva lolo regha?”
42007020	Mbaŋa thɨ mena weya Jisas thɨŋa, “Jon Rabapɨtaiso me variyeime na wo mena wo vaitoŋge, ‘Ghen mbema iyava thɨŋake tene i mena, o wo roroghaghaweva lolo regha?’ ”
42007021	E mbaŋako vara iyako Jisas i vamoruŋgiya gharɨgharɨ lemoyo e ghanjigida, ghambwera na nyao raraitharɨ ina weŋgi, na i tateŋgiya thavala maranji thiya kwaghe.
42007022	I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Hu njogha na vohu utugiya weya Jon, budakaiya mohu thuwe na mohu loŋwe: maramaranji i kwaghe kaero thɨ thuwe, kuvokuvo kaero thɨ loŋga, thavala thɨ ghataŋa lepelo kaero riwanji i thovuye, yanawanji i kule kaero thɨ loŋwe, ramaremare thɨ thuweiru na mbinyembinyeŋgu kaero thɨ loŋweya Toto Thovuye iya thɨ vavaghare weŋgi.
42007023	Na tembe hu utugiyaweva iyake: Loi ghare weya loloko iya ma i roiteta amalaghɨniye ghino kaiwaŋgu.”
42007024	Jon gharaghambuko ma methɨ wa na e ghereinji amba Jisas i utu weŋgiya wabwiko Jon kaiwae. Iŋa, “Mbaŋa va hu wa weya Jon e njamnjam, va nuwamiya hu thuwe budakai? Wuŋgiwuŋgi ndewendeweko i uvathowo?
42007025	Thoŋgo nandere, va hu wa eŋge na vohu thuwe budakai? Amala regha i njimbo kwama ghayamoyamo i thovuye? Nandere, thavala thɨ njimbo kwama thovuye na thɨ yaku e ghamba yaku thovuye inanji kiŋ e lenji ŋgolo.
42007026	Ko va vohu thuwe eŋge budakai? Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu? Ŋgoreiye, na ya dage e ghemi, iye Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu na ma e vwatanjiwova.
42007027	Amalaghɨniye iya utuniye bukuma i woraŋgiya iya iŋake, ‘Ya variya ghalɨŋaŋgu gharawo e ghamwan na amalaghɨniye ne i vivatharaweya kamwathɨ kaiwan.’ ”
42007028	“Ya dage e ghemi, Jon iye i kivwalaŋgi vara gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye va thɨ yomara e mbunɨma na madibe, ko iyemaeŋge thela iye i nasiye moli, Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne, iye i kivwala Jon.”
42007029	Gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye na takis gharamban iyava thɨ loŋwe Jisas le vavaghareko, thɨ wovathovuthovuyeŋa Loi le kamwathɨ kaiwae thiye va thɨ bapɨtaiso weya Jon.
42007030	Ko iyemaeŋge Parisi na mbaro gharavavaghare thɨ botewo Loi le renuwaŋa, kaiwae thɨ botewo thɨ bapɨtaiso weya Jon.
42007031	Jisas i gotubwe iŋa, “Ne ya vamboromboroŋaŋgiya thake iyake weiye budakai? Ŋgoranjiya budakai?
42007032	Ghemi ŋgoramiya gamagai thiya yaku e ghamba maket na thɨ vekula weŋgi: “ ‘Mo wiya igo kaiwami, ko ma mohuya thari, mo wothuŋa nuwatharɨ ghawothu ko ma huya randa.’ ”
42007033	Ghemi ŋgoramiya gamagaiko thiyako mbaŋa Jon i mena va i mbeya ghanɨŋga na mava i muna waen, na huŋa, “Nyao raitharɨ inawe.”
42007034	Lolo Nariye i mena, nuwanuwaiya ghanɨŋga na waen ghamun, na huŋa, “I butu e ghanɨŋga na i butu e munumu, na ghauneŋgiya takis gharamban na thiye gharɨgharɨ raraitharɨ.”
42007035	“Ko iyemaeŋge Loi le thimba i woraŋgi thavala thɨ goruwe thɨ vaemunjoruŋa iye thimba emunjoru.”
42007036	Wabwi Parisi regha i naŋgo weya Jisas na i mena i ghanɨŋga weiye. Jisas i ru ele ŋgoloko na i yaku e ghamba yaku.
42007037	E ghembako iyako wevo eunda, elaghɨniye va rayathiyathima, mbaŋa kaero i ghareghare Jisas ina i ghanɨŋga Parisi ele ŋgoloko, i thɨnɨmena bodɨla vwarara bunama butiye thovuye inawe.
42007038	I ndeghathɨ Jisas e ghereiye ŋgora ghegheko, i randa na i vaŋguthiya ghegheŋgiko e maralumuye. Amba i ivamo e umbaliye ndamwandamwa, i vandamoŋgi na i liŋgiya bunamako e ghegheko.
42007039	Mbaŋa Parisiko, iya me naŋgomawe na i ru ele ŋgoloko, i thuwe iyako, i dage weya mbe ghamberegha iŋa, “Thoŋgo amalake iyake iye Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, mbala i ghareghare the wevo iya i vɨvɨghathɨkowe na the wevo elaghɨniye, kaiwae elaghɨniye rayathiyathima.”
42007040	Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “Saimon, nuwaŋguiya ya utuŋa bigi regha e ghen.” I gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ŋgoreiye Ravavaghare, u utugiyama.”
42007041	“Amaamala theghewo va e ghanjighaga weya mani gharagiya regha. Regha ghaghaga gethɨseriyelima (500) na regha gethɨyelima (50).
42007042	Ma regha valɨkaiwae i vamodo njogha, iya kaiwae amalama i kiten weŋgi na thava thɨ vamodo njogha. Theghewoko, iyaŋganiya ne i gharethovu laghɨye?”
42007043	Saimon i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ya renuwaŋa iya amalama ghaghagama i laghɨye.” Jisas iŋa, “Len renuwaŋana i emunjoru moli.”
42007044	Jisas i rovɨ na ghamwae i ghemba elama amba i dage weya Saimon iŋa, “Thare u thuwe wevoke iyake? Ma mena e len ŋgoloke tɨne ma mo thɨnɨgiya mbwa e ghino na ya thavwiya ghegheŋguke. Ko iyemaeŋge me vaŋguthiya ghegheŋgu e maralumuye na i ivamo e umbaliye ndamwandamwa.
42007045	Ma mo vandamoŋgo, ko iyemaeŋge wevoke iyake mbaŋa ma ruma na ghaghada mbaŋake ma i viyathu ghegheŋguke ghanjivandamo.
42007046	Ma mo liŋgiya bunama e umbalɨŋgu, ko iyemaeŋge elaghɨniye eŋge me liŋgiya bunama e ghegheŋguke.
42007047	Iya kaiwae ya dage e ghen, le gharethovuko laghɨye i woraŋgiya, le tharɨko wolaghɨye kaero Loi i numoten. Ko thela thoŋgo Loi i numotena le tharɨ seiwo, iyake i woraŋgiya le gharethovu seiwo.”
42007048	Amba Jisas i dage weya elako iŋa, “Len tharɨna kaero i numotenɨŋgi.”
42007049	Amba thavala va inanji e ghanɨŋgako rɨghe thɨ veutu weŋgi thɨŋa, “Thelake, iya valɨkaiwae i numotenɨŋgiya tharɨke?”
42007050	Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas i dage weya elako iŋa, “Len loŋweghathɨna kaero i vamoruŋge, u wa wein len gharemalɨlɨ.”
42008001	Iyake e ghereiye Jisas i ru na i raŋgi e ghembaghemba nanasiye na laghɨlaghɨye, i vavaghareŋa Toto Thovuye Loi le ghamba mbaro utuutuniye. Gharaghambu theyaworo na theghewo vambe weiyaŋgi,
42008002	na tembe ŋgoreiyeva wanakau vavana, va i variye raŋgiyaŋgiya nyao raraitharɨ weŋgiya vavana na i thawariŋgiya vavana e ghanjighambwera. Wanakauke thiyake: Meri, va thɨ uno tɨnan Magadala, elaghɨniye nyao raraitharɨ theghepirɨ va thɨ rakaraŋgiwe,
42008003	Jowana, le ghɨmoru Kusa, iye Herod le ŋgolo gharakakaiwo lenji randeviva, Susana vavana na e vwataeva. Wanakauke thiyake va thɨ thalavuŋgiya Jisas na ghalɨŋae gharaghambɨ na thalavuko iyako vambe i raŋgi vara thiye e nɨmanji ghare.
42008004	Gharɨgharɨ lemoyo vambe thɨ rakarakamena e ghembaghemba regha na regha, na mbaŋa wabwi laghɨye thɨ mevathavatha amba Jisas i utuŋa goghaimbake iyake weŋgi iŋa,
42008005	“Mbaŋa regha amala regha i wa na ve yathu weiwo. Mbaŋa i yathu vavana thɨ unja e kamwathɨ mara, gharɨgharɨ thɨ vurɨvala e vwatanji na ma thɨ mena thɨ ghanɨŋgi.
42008006	Vavana thɨ unja e thelau ele varɨvarɨ, na mbaŋa thɨ yovoro kaero thɨ mareva kaiwae thelauko mava e thɨthiye.
42008007	Weiwo vavana thɨ unja e tatata tɨnetɨne, thɨ mbuthuvoro weinjiyaŋgi na thɨ vwariŋgi.
42008008	Na weiwo vavana thɨ unja e thelau thovuye. Thɨ mbuthu na thɨ rau wagiyawe. Weiwo voghɨra uneune voghɨthaŋarɨ (100).” Jisas i govuna le utuko iŋa, “Thoŋgo e yanayanawami hu vandeŋe wagiyaweya ghalɨŋaŋguke.”
42008009	Gharaghambu thɨ govaito ŋgoroŋga goghaimbako iyako gharumwaru.
42008010	I dage weŋgi iŋa, “Loi le ghamba mbaro ghaghareghare emunjoru i rothuwele, Loi kaero i vakathaŋa na hu ghareghare. Ko gharɨgharɨke taulaghɨ weŋgi thɨ loŋwe e goghaimba, mbala othembe thɨ thuwe ko iyemaeŋge ma thɨ vaidi na othembe thɨ vandeŋe ko iyemaeŋge ma thɨ loŋwe na thɨ ghareghare.”
42008011	“Goghaimbake iyake gharumwaru ŋgoreiyake: Weiwo iye Loi ghalɨŋae.
42008012	Weiwoko iya thɨ unja e kamwathɨko mara ŋgoreiya thavala thɨ loŋweya Loi ghalɨŋae, ko Seitan i mena i vakathaŋgi na thɨ renuwaŋa vaghalawe, ma thɨ worawe e gharenji na ma thɨ loŋweghathɨ na thɨ vamora yawalinji.
42008013	Weiwoma iyava thɨ unja e thelauma ele varɨvarɨma ŋgoreiya thavala thɨ loŋweya utuko thovuye na weinji lenji warari thɨ wovatha, ko ma e rɨgherɨghenji. Mbaŋa ubotu thɨ loŋweghathɨ na mbaŋa mando i mena weŋgi kaero thɨ dobu.
42008014	Weiwoma iya vethɨ unja ŋgora nana raraitharɨ inanjiwe, thiyake ŋgoranjiya thavala thɨ loŋweya utu thovuye, ko lenji loŋweghathɨko bigibigike iyake thɨ vakowana: vuyowo ghanjirerenuwaŋa, bigibigi ghanjiwarari na yawalɨ ghawarari i vagaghala nuwanji na unenjiko ma thɨ mweghe.
42008015	Ko iyemaeŋge weiwoma va vethɨ unja e thelauma thovuye ŋgoreiya thavala thɨ loŋwe utu thovuye na kaiwae gharenji i ghenenja na ghanjithanavu i thovuye moli, thɨ worawe e gharenji na thɨ renuwaŋakiki na thɨ rau na thovuye kaiwae thɨ ghataŋaghathɨ.”
42008016	“Ma lolo regha i rɨmba kadɨŋeŋe na i thɨnɨrawe e gaeba raberabe o i thɨnɨrawe e ghambae raberabe. Ko iyemaeŋge i thɨnɨvakwate yavoro mbala thavala thɨ ru e ŋgoloko na i woya lenji kamwathɨ.
42008017	Kaiwae the bigiya i rothuwele tene i raŋgi e manjamanjala na the bigiya i yabonjoŋa tene i vaidi na i woraŋgiya eto na e ghaghareghare.
