42019019	“Ghagiyako i gonjoghawe iŋa, ‘Ghen ne u mbaroŋaŋgiya ghembaghemba ghembalima.’ ”
42019020	“Rakakaiwoko reghava i mena na iŋa, ‘Amalana, u wonjoghao len golɨke. Va ya wothuwele e kwama tɨne.
42019021	Va ya mararuŋge kaiwae ghanɨthanavu i vurɨgheghe. U woraŋgiya budakaiya mava u worawe na u tɨgha budakaiya mava u kabu.’ ”
42019022	“Ghagiyako i gonjoghawe iŋa, ‘Rakakaiwo raithara ghen! Ghalɨŋana tembe i njogha na i wonjoŋaŋgeva. Kaero u ghareghare ghino wothanavu i vurɨgheghe, ya mbana budakaiya ghino mava ya bigirawe na ya tɨgha mava ghino ya kabu.
42019023	Buda kaiwae mava u bigiraweya lo manina e beŋɨk na mbala menda ya njoghama na ya mban njogha weiye vavanava na e vwataeva?’ ”
42019024	“Amba i dage weŋgiya iyava thiya ndeghathɨko gheko iŋa, ‘Hu mbana maninawe na hu giyawa rakakaiwona iya gethɨyaworona inawe.’ ”
42019025	“Ko iyemaeŋge thɨ dagewe, thɨŋa, ‘Amalana, gethɨyaworo kaero inawe!’ ”
42019026	“I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, ‘Ya dage e ghemi, thela i vakaiwoŋa wagiyaweya ghabebeko, ghino ya vatabowe, ko thela ma e ghavareminje, othembe nasiye moli inawe, ya bigivaowe.
42019027	Ko iyemaeŋge, iya thiyema wothɨghɨyaŋgima, iya thɨ botewo ya tabo na lenji kiŋɨma, hu vaŋgumenaŋgi gheke na hu gaboŋgi e maraŋgu.’ ”
42019028	Jisas i utuŋa iyake na e ghereiye, i viva weŋgi thɨ voro Jerusalem.
42019029	Mbaŋa i vurɨthaiŋgiya Betepage na Betani, Olivɨ e ghanji Ou, amba i variyeŋgiya gharaghambu theghewo e ghamwanji,
42019030	i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Hu wa e ghembana e ghamwamina. Mbaŋa ne vohu ru, ne hu vaidiya doŋɨki nariye, thɨ ŋgarɨrawe na ma mbaŋa regha lolo i thawe. Hu raka ghathiyona na hu vaŋgumena gheke.
42019031	Thoŋgo lolo regha i vaitoŋga, ‘Buda kaiwae hu raka doŋɨkina nariye?’ hu dagewe, huŋa, ‘Giya nuwaiya.’ ”
42019032	Me variyeŋgima thɨ wa na vethɨ vaidi ŋgoreiya me dagema weŋgi.
42019033	Mbaŋa thɨ rakaraka ghathiyoma, tatanuwaganji thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Buda kaiwae hu raka doŋɨkina nariye?”
42019034	Thɨ gonjogha weŋgi, thɨŋa, “Giya nuwaiya.”
42019035	Thɨ yovaŋguya doŋɨkiko nariye weya Jisas, thɨ bigiraweya ghanjikwama ghayaboyabo e vwatae, na thɨ vaŋguvoreŋa Jisas i yakuwe.
42019036	E le loŋga tɨne, gharɨgharɨ thɨ yevɨŋgiya ghanjikwamakwama e kamwathɨko.
42019037	Mbaŋa kaero inanji Jerusalem ghadidiye, ŋgora kamwathɨ i nja Olivɨ e ghanji Ou, gharaghambu ko ghanjiwabwi laghɨye thɨ vata ago weya Loi na thɨ tarawe e ghalɨŋanji laghɨye, le vakatha ghamba rotaele laghɨlaghɨye iyava thɨ thuwe e maranjiko kaiwae:
42019038	thɨŋa, “Loi ghare weya kiŋɨke iya i mena Giya e idaeke. Ra wovavwenyevwenyeŋa Loi e buruburu na le gharemalɨlɨ i mena weinda.”
42019039	Parisi vavana e wabwiko tɨne thɨ dage weya Jisas thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, u dage tenɨŋgiya ghanɨraghambu na thɨ loŋga kubaro.”
42019040	I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage e ghemi, thoŋgo thiyeke thɨ loŋga kubaro, varɨvarɨke ne thɨ yaro.”
42019041	Mbaŋa vama i mena Jerusalem ghadidiye na i thuwe ghembako, i randa kaiwae,
42019042	na iŋa, “Thoŋgo mbema u ghareghare vara noroke budakai ne i womena gharemalɨlɨ, ko iyemaeŋge mane u thuwe kaiwae i rothuwele e ghen.
42019043	Mbaŋa tene i mena mbaŋaniye ne ghanɨthɨghɨya thɨ meghɨliŋaŋge, ne thɨ gana tenɨŋge, thɨ ndetenɨtenɨŋge na thɨ ndembiyeŋge e valɨvaŋga regha na regha.
42019044	Mbema ne thɨ mukuwaŋge vara na thɨ gabovaoŋgiya gharɨgharɨ nanji e tɨnena. Mane te varɨ reghava i ndendeghathɨ e ghambae, kaiwae ma menda u ghareghare mbaŋa Loi le mena e ghen.”
42019045	Amba Jisas ve ru e Ŋgolo Boboma ghayayao tɨne na i vagege raŋgiyaŋgiya rakunekune,
42019046	na i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Gharorori ŋgoreiye, ‘Lo ŋgoloke iye ŋgolo ghamba naŋgo,’ ko iyemaeŋge hu vakatha ŋgoreiya rakaivɨ lenji ghamba kubaro.”
42019047	Mbaŋa regha na regha Jisas i vavaghare e Ŋgolo Boboma ghayayao tɨne. Ko iyemaeŋge ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye, mbaro gharavavaghare na gharɨgharɨ lenji randeviva nuwanjiya thɨ unɨghɨ;
42019048	iyemaeŋge mava thɨ vaidiya lenji kamwathɨ thovuye regha na valɨkaiwanji thɨ vakathawe, kaiwae gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye nuwanjiya moli thɨ vandeŋe le utuko.
42020001	Mbaŋa regha Jisas ina e Ŋgolo Boboma ghayayao tɨne i vavaghare weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ na i utuŋa Toto Thovuye. Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na mbaro gharavavaghare, weinjiyaŋgiya randeviva, thɨ rakamena
42020002	na thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “U utugiya weime, u vata thela ele mbaro vwatae na iya u vakathaŋgiya bigibigike thiyake? Thela i giya vurɨgheghe e ghen?”
42020003	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Wo ya vaitoŋga vaito regha; Wo hu utugiyama e ghino,
42020004	Jon le rɨghe na i bapɨtaiso, i mena weya Loi o i mena weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ?”
42020005	Mbe thiye eŋge thɨ veutu weŋgi, thɨŋa, “Thoŋgo raŋa, ‘I mena weya Loi,’ ne iŋa, ‘Buda kaiwae na mava hu loŋweghathɨgha Jon?’
42020006	Ko thoŋgo raŋa, ‘I mena weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ,’ wabwike laghɨye thiyake ne thɨ gaboinda e varɨvarɨ, kaiwae thɨ loŋweghathɨ Jon iye Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu.”
42020007	Iya kaiwae thɨ gonjoghawe, thɨŋa, “Ma wo ghareghare aŋga i mena.”
42020008	Amba Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Iya kaiwae, mane ya utugiya e ghemi, ya vata thela e vwatae na ya vakathaŋgiya bigibigike thiyake.”
42020009	Amba Jisas i utugiya goghaimbake iyake weŋgi iŋa, “Amala regha va i kabu waen ghauma regha, i mwanavathaŋgiya ghɨmoghɨmoru vavana na thɨ njimbukiki, amba i iteta ghemba na i wa ve ghɨnagha mbaŋa molao.
42020010	Mbaŋa kaero ghambaŋa thɨ vu, i variya le rakakaiwo regha kaiwae nuwaiya thɨ giyawe umako uneune vavanawe. Ko iyemaeŋge ranjimbunjimbuko thɨ tagavotagamenawe na thɨ variye njogha nɨmanɨmae.
42020011	Mbowo i variyeva rakakaiwo regha, ko iyemaeŋge ranjimbunjimbuma tembe thɨ tagavotagamenaweva, thɨ vakatha monjina laghɨyewe na thɨ variye njogha nɨmanɨmae.
42020012	Na mbowo i variyeva rakakaiwo theghetoninji. Thɨ tagathethe riwariwae na thɨ wokiyathuraŋgiya eto.
42020013	Amba umako tanuwagae iŋa, ‘Ne ya vakatha budakai? Wo ya variyeno naruŋguke iya ghareŋgukewe. Mbwata ne thɨ yavwatatawana.’
42020014	Ko iyemaeŋge, mbaŋa ranjimbunjimbuma thɨ thuwe, thɨ vedage weŋgi thɨŋa, ‘Iyako umake tanuwagae nariye. Ra tagavamare na le umake mbala ghinda la uma.’
42020015	Thɨ yalawe na thɨ wokiyathuraŋgiya eto na thɨ tagavamare.” “Umako tanuwagae ne i vakatha budakai weŋgi?
42020016	Ne i mena na i gaboŋgiya ranjimbunjimbuko na i vatomwe weŋgiya ranjimbunjimbu totogha.” Mbaŋa gharɨgharɨ thɨ loŋwe utuutuko iyako thɨŋa, “Thava ŋgoreiye! Thava Loi i vatomwe iyako!”
42020017	Jisas i vonjimbughathɨŋgi na i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga iya bukuke le utuke iyake gharumwaru? ‘Varɨke iya ŋgoloke gharavatavatad va thɨ botewo kaero i tabo ghambaghɨmbaghɨ.’
42020018	Thela thoŋgo i dobu na i unja e vwatae ne i tagamunumunuwo, na thoŋgo varɨko iyako i dobu thela e vwatae ne i tagavwathavwatha.”
42020019	Mbaro gharavavaghare na ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye thɨ mando na thɨ yalaweya Jisas e mbaŋako iyako, kaiwae thɨ ghareghare me goghaimba thiye ghanjigoghaimba. Ko iyemaeŋge thɨ mararuŋgiya gharɨgharɨ.
42020020	Iya kaiwae mbe maranjiwe vara na thɨ tamwetamweya ghakamwathɨ thovuye regha. Thɨ liŋgiya ghɨmoghɨmoru vavana na thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiya gharɨgharɨ thovuthovuye lenji vakatha. Thɨ variyeŋgi na thɨ mando na thɨ vaito yaro Jisas na mbala i gothavwi. Na mbala iyako kaiwae thɨ vaŋgugiya weya Rom lenji rambarombaro, iye gawana i mbaroŋa.
42020021	Gharɨgharɨko thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, wo ghareghare budakaiya u utuŋa na u vavaghareŋa, iyena emunjoru. Ma mbe u rerenuwaŋa eŋge ŋgoroŋga lolo le thimba o le laghɨlaghɨye kaiwae, ko iyemaeŋge u vavaghareŋa budakaiya emunjoru Loi le renuwaŋa gharɨgharɨ kaiwanji.
42020022	Ŋgoroŋga, mbaro i dage ŋgoreiye na wo vamodo takis weya Sisa o nandere?”
42020023	Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas kaero i thuwe lenji kwanɨko iya kaiwae i dage vurɨgheghe weŋgi iŋa,
42020024	“Hu wo vatomwe mani gethɨra e ghino. Thela ŋgaliŋgaliya na idaya e vwataeke?” Thɨ gonjoghawe, thɨŋa “Sisa.”
42020025	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Sisa le bigibigi hu wogiya weya Sisa, Loi le bigi hu wogiya weya Loi.”
42020026	Gharɨgharɨ e maranji ma valɨkaiwanji thɨ yalawe le utuko kaiwae, ko iyemaeŋge gharenji i yo le thombeko kaiwae na thiya rokubaro.
42020027	Amba Sadusi vavana, thiye thɨŋa ramaremare ma tene thɨ thuweiruva, thɨ mena weya Jisas,
42020028	na thɨ vaito, thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, Mosese va i roriya mbaroke iyake kaiwanda, iya iŋake, ‘Thoŋgo amala regha i mare iteta levo, ko ma i ghambɨ weiye, ghaghae ma i rovaŋguva ghɨmbwiyeko. Thoŋgo i ghambɨ weiye, gamagaiko thiyako ghaghaeko va i mareko le ŋgaŋga.’
42020029	Mbaŋa regha ghɨmoghɨmoru theghepirɨ, tɨnanji na ramanji regha. Ghaghanji laghɨyeninji va i ghe, ko iyemaeŋge ma thɨ ghambɨ weiye levo kaero i mare.
42020030	Ghaghae theghewoniye kaero i rovaŋguva ghembwiyeko,
42020031	na theghetoninji tembe ŋgoreiyeva. Mbema ŋgoreiye eŋge vara theghepirɨko, va thɨ ghe weinji na ma thɨ ghambɨ weinji kaero thiya mare.
42020032	E le ghambako elaghɨniye i mare.
42020033	Ko mbaŋa ne ramaremare thɨ thuweiru na kaero e yawayawalinjiva, thela ne i ghe weiye, kaiwae mbe theghepirɨko vara va thɨ vaŋgu.”
42020034	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Yambaneke gharɨgharɨniye thiya ghe,
42020035	ko iyemaeŋge thavala Loi ne i tuthiŋgi na thɨ thuweiru na tembe e yawayawalinjiva e yawalɨko i menamenako, ma tene thiya gheva.
42020036	Ŋgoreiye, mane te thiya mareva kaiwae thiye ŋgoranjiŋgiya nyao thovuthovuye. Thiye ne Loi le ŋgamaŋgamaŋgi, kaiwae kaero thɨ thuweiru na tembe e yawayawalinjiva.
42020037	Mosese emunjoru i vatomwe ramaremare tembe ne thɨ thuweiru na e yawayawalinjiva. Ina e utuutuma iyava ndɨghema i ra e umbwaumbwama ndamwandamwa, va i una Giya idae na iŋa, ‘Eibraham le Loi, Aisake le Loi na Jeikob le Loi.’
42020038	Iye gharɨgharɨ e yawayawalinji lenji Loi, ma ramaremare lenji Loi, kaiwae amalaghɨniye le renuwaŋa e tɨne, thiye mbe e yawayawalinji.”
42020039	Mbaro gharavavaghare vavana thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, len thombena i thovuye!”
42020040	Kaiwae thɨ ghareghare ma valɨkaiwae thɨ kwanɨyaro, weinji lenji mararu ma te lolo regha i vaitova vaito reghawe.
42020041	Jisas i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga na iya thɨŋake Mesaiya iye Deivid nariye?
42020042	Kaiwae Deivid ghamberegha i woraŋgiya, Buk Sam e tɨne iŋa, ‘Giya Loi i dage weya wo Giya: U yaku valɨvaŋga e uneŋguke
42020043	ghaghad ne ya biginjoŋaŋgiya ghanɨthɨghɨya e gheghen raberabe.’
42020044	Deivid i una Mesaiya ‘wo Giya,’ ko ne ŋgoroŋga eŋge na Mesaiya iye Deivid rumbuye?”
42020045	Mbaŋa gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye mbe thɨ vandevandeŋawe, kaero i dage weŋgiya gharaghambu iŋa,
42020046	“Hu njimbukiki wagiyaweŋga weŋgiya mbaro gharavavaghare. Thiye nuwanjiya thɨ njimbo ghanjikwama molamolao na thiya ndeloŋga, na nuwanjiya gharɨgharɨ weiye lenji yavwatata thɨ dage mwaewo weŋgi e ghamba maket. E ŋgolo kururu tɨne thɨ tuthiya ghamba yaku thovuthothuye moli na e thaga tɨne ghamba yakuko iya gharɨgharɨ laghɨlaghɨye e lenji ghamba yaku.
42020047	Thɨ mbaro lawalawa wambwiwambwi lenji bigibigi e lenji ŋgoloŋgolo tɨne na ghanjiyamoyamo kaiwae thɨ vakatha naŋgo molamolao. Loi ne i giya vuyowo laghɨye moli weŋgi.”
42021001	Jisas va ina e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne i ghewaŋgiya ravwenyevwenye thɨ bigibigirawe lenji mwaewo e Ŋgolo Boboma ghamani ghamba bigirawe.
42021002	Vambe i thuweva wambwi eunda, iye mbinyembinyeŋgu, i bigiraweya le mwaewo, toeya gethiwo.
42021003	Iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, wambwike iyake mbinyembinyeŋgu, ko iyemaeŋge me bigiraweko i kivwalaŋgiya taulaghɨko,
42021004	kaiwae thiye methɨ bigirawe ŋgoreiya lenji vwenyevwenyeko le woveŋgi, ko iyemaeŋge elaghɨniye, mbinyembinyeŋgu moli, me giyavao budakaiya mbema elaghɨniyeko vara le yakuyaku kaiwae.”
42021005	Gharaghambu vavana va thɨ utuutu Ŋgolo Bobomako kaiwae, varɨvarɨko ghanjiyamoyamo thovuye na tembe ŋgoreiyeva mwaewoko iyava thɨ giya Loi kaiwaeko. Jisas i dage iŋa,
42021006	“Iya vara bigibigiko wolaghɨye iya hu thuweŋgiko, mbaŋa nevole i mena mane regha i yakuyaku e ghambaeko, nevole thɨ bigiyathuvao bode.”
42021007	Thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, ne thembaŋa vara bigibigike thiyake thɨ yomara, na ne ghanjinono budakai amba muyai thɨ yomara?”
42021008	Jisas iŋa, “Hu njimbukiki wagiyaweŋga, tha lolo regha i yaroŋga. Kaiwae gharɨgharɨ lemoyo ne thɨ mena e idaŋgu na thɨŋa, ‘Ghino Mesaiya,’ na ‘Mbaŋa maiyavara!’ Ne hu nderakambeleŋgi.
42021009	Mbaŋa ne hu loŋweŋgiya vanautuma lenji gaithɨ na vanautuma regha thɨ vegaithɨweŋgi utuutuninji, ne hu ndemararu, kaiwae thiyake ne thɨ yomarakai, ko iyemaeŋge ma ghanjirerenuwaŋa ŋgoreiye mbaŋa le ghambako maiyavara.”
42021010	Na mbowo i dageva weŋgi iŋa, “Vanautuma ne thɨ vegaithɨ weŋgi; rambarombaro ne thɨ vegaithɨ weŋgi.
42021011	Ragheragheghe laghɨlaghɨye na vunuvu na ghambwera raitharɨ lemoyo ne thɨ yomara e yambaneke. Bigibigi e maramararuwanji na nonoŋgi ghamba rotaele ne thɨ rakamena e buruburu.”
42021012	“Amba muyai bigibigike thiyake thɨ yomara, ne thɨ yalaweŋga na thɨ vakatha vuyowo weŋga; ne thɨ vaŋgugiyaŋga weŋgiya rambarombaro e ŋgolo kururu tɨne na thɨ vakatha ghamimbaro na hu ru e thiyo. Ne vohu ndeghathɨ kiŋ na rambarombaro e maranji idaŋgu kaiwae.
42021013	Iyake ne i woveŋga ghamimbaŋa thovuye moli na hu utuŋa Toto Thovuye weŋgi.
42021014	Mbaŋake hu vatada lemi renuwaŋa na tha hu rerenuwaŋa ŋgoroŋga ne vohu utu na huŋa weŋgiya ghamirawonjowe,
42021015	kaiwae ghino ne ya giya utuutu na thimba e ghemi, na mbala ghamithɨghɨyaŋgina ma valɨkaiwanji thɨ wovakwanɨkwanɨŋga e lemi utuna.
42021016	Otɨnatɨnami na oramami, oghaghami, lemi bodaboda na ghamune ne thɨ vaŋgugiyaŋga, na ne thɨŋa na vavana ghemi huya mare.
42021017	Idaŋgu kaiwae gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye ne thɨ botewoyathuŋga.
42021018	Ko iyemaeŋge mane umbalimina vulivuliye yaŋgara i ghawe.
42021019	Hu ghataŋaghathɨ na mbala hu vaidiya yawalɨ memeghabananiye.”
42021020	“Mbaŋa ne hu thuweya ghamithɨghɨya thɨ meghɨliŋa Jerusalem, ne hu ghareghare mbaŋa nasiye thɨ rakavawowona.
42021021	Iya kaiwae thavala inanji Judiya tɨne thɨ rakavo na i wa e ououko rɨgherɨghenji. Thavala inanji Jerusalem tɨne thɨ rakavo, na thavala inanji eto ne thɨ nderakanjogha e ghembako tɨne.
42021022	Kaiwae thiyako nevole Loi le lithɨ ghambaŋa na i vaemunjoruŋa ŋgoroŋga Buk Boboma le woraŋgiya.
42021023	Nevole i vuyowo laghɨye moli weŋgiya maramarabo na wanakau weinjiyaŋgiya gamagai amba thɨ thuthu. Vuyowo laghɨye ne i mena e vanautumake iyake kaiwae Loi le gaithɨ laghɨye ne i mena weŋgiya gharɨgharɨke thiyake.
42021024	Vavana ne thɨ gaboŋgi e gaithɨ ghaghalithɨ, na vavana ne thɨ yovaŋguŋgi e vanautuma vavana vethɨ yaku e thiyo na thɨ vakaiwoŋaŋgi, na gharɨgharɨ thiye ma Jiu gharɨgharɨniye thɨ vurɨnjoŋanjoŋa Jerusalem ghaghada lenji mbaro ghambaŋa iko.”
42021025	“Nevole nono vavana thɨ yomara e varaeko, e manjalako na e ghɨtaraŋgiko. E yambaneke bagodu ne i vairɨ vavatha na thɨ bebe na lainji laghɨye, ne i vakatha gharɨgharɨ thɨ numounouno na thɨ mararu laghɨye.
42021026	Gharɨgharɨ maranji ne i ndeghathɨ na thɨ dobu mararu kaiwae, kaiwae thɨ ghareghare bigibigi raraitharɨ ghanjimbaŋa thɨ yomara e yambaneke, na kaiwae buruburu matemate ne thiya nyivɨvao na iko.
42021027	Ko amba muyai Lolo Nariye i yomara na i njama e ŋgalɨlɨko weiye le vurɨgheghe na le vwenyevwenye laghɨye.
42021028	Mbaŋa bigibigike thiyake ne thɨ yoyomara hu rakayondo na hu ghɨmara voro, kaiwae ghamivamoru ghambaŋa kaero i ghenetha.”
42021029	Amba Jisas i utuveŋgiya goghaimbake iyake. Iŋa, “Hu ghewoŋa umbwa fig na umbwaumbwake wolaghɨye.
42021030	Mbaŋa ne hu thuwe kaero thɨ thalavwara, hu ghareghare thuwai ghambaŋa maiyavara.
42021031	Tembe ŋgoreiyeva, mbaŋa ne hu thuwe bigibigike thiyake thɨ yoyomara, ne hu ghareghare Loi le ghamba mbaro mbaŋa nasiye i mena.”
42021032	“Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thake iyake mamba ne thiya marevao ghaghad bigibigike wolaghɨye thiyake thɨ yomara.”
42021033	“Buruburu na yambane ne thɨko, ko ghalɨŋaŋguke mane iko.”
42021034	“Hu njimbukikiŋga ghamimberegha na tha hu vatomweŋga moli e thagathaga, e munumu na yawalɨke iyake gharerenuwaŋa kaiwae, ne iwaeŋge mbaŋako iyako i vathɨna gharemi na hu dimbanɨwe. Ŋgoreiya i ghathɨ,
42021035	kaiwae ne i mena weŋgiya gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye e yambaneke laghɨye.
42021036	Iya kaiwae mbaŋake wolaghɨye hu njaŋanjaŋa na hu naŋgonaŋgo, mbala hu vurɨgheghe na hu ghataŋaghathɨŋgiya vuyowoko thiyako, vohu raŋgi na vohu ndeghathɨ Lolo Nariye e marae mbaŋa i mena i ghatha.”
42021037	E mbaŋaŋgiko thiyako Jisas i vavaghare e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne, ko iyemaeŋge yeghɨyeghɨye iya i raŋgi na i wa ve ghenaghena Olivɨ e ghanji Ou.
42021038	Mbaŋambaŋa moli mbaŋa regha na regha gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye thɨ rakaraka e Ŋgolo Boboma na vethɨ vandeŋe le vavaghareko.
42022001	Mbaŋa vama i ghenetha, kaero Bred ma weiye isɨt ghathaga, idae regha Thaga Valaŋani.
42022002	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na mbaro gharavavaghare thɨ mararuŋgiya gharɨgharɨ iya kaiwae thɨ vakatha thuwele kamwathɨ na thɨ vakatha Jisas na i mare.
42022003	Amba Seitan i ru weya Judas, thɨ uno Isakariyot, iye ghalɨŋae gharaghambuko theyaworo na theghewoko regha.
42022004	Judas i wa na ve utu weiyaŋgiya ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Ŋgolo Boboma gharagatɨgatɨ lenji randevivaŋgi na i utuŋa ŋgoroŋga ne iŋa na i vatomwe Jisas weŋgi.
42022005	Thɨ warariŋa le renuwaŋako na thɨ dagerawe modae kaiwae.
42022006	Judas i varae na i tamweya kamwathɨ thovuye moli na i vaŋgugiya weŋgi mbala thava gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye thɨ ghareghare.
42022007	Mbaŋa iviva moli Bred ma weiye Isɨt ghambaŋa, mbaŋaniye thɨ gaboŋgiya sip nariye Thaga Valaŋani ghanɨŋganiye kaiwae.
42022008	Jisas i variyeŋgiya Pita na Jon na i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Hu wa na vohu vivatharaweya Thaga Valaŋani ghanɨŋganiye kaiwanda na mbala ra ghan.”
42022009	Thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Nuwaniya aŋga wo wa na vo vivatharawe ghanɨŋgakowe?”
42022010	I gonjogha weŋgi, iŋa, “Mbaŋa ne hu ru e ghembana tɨne, amala regha i thɨna mbwa variye, ne i lavolevoleŋga. Hu mbele na vohu ru e ŋgolona iya ve runawe
42022011	na hu dage weya ŋgolona tanuwagae huŋa, ‘Ravavaghare i vaito: Iyaŋganiya woluwolu bobwari kaiwaŋgu na ne ya ghana Thaga Valaŋani ghanɨŋganiye weiŋguyaŋgiya woraghambuke?’
42022012	Ne i vatomwe woluwolu laghɨye regha ina e toutou. Ghanɨŋga bigibiginiye kaero inanjiwe, na gheko vo hu vakatharawa bigibigina wolaghɨyewe.”
42022013	Thɨ wa na vethɨ vaidi ŋgoreiya me dagema weŋgi, na thɨ vivatharaweya Thaga Valaŋanima ghanɨŋganiyewe.
42022014	Mbaŋa ghanɨŋga ghambaŋa i yaku weiyaŋgiya ghalɨŋae gharaghambɨ na thiya ghanɨŋga.
42022015	I dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Nuwaŋguke nuwaiya moli ya ghana Thaga Valaŋani ghanɨŋganiyeke iyake weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi amba muyai ya vaidiya vuyowo.
42022016	Kaiwae ya dage e ghemi, ma tene mbaŋa reghava ya ghan Thaga Valaŋa ghanɨŋganiye ghaghada ne ghambaŋa emunjoru moli i yomara mbaŋa Loi le ghamba mbaro ne i mena.”
42022017	Amba Jisas i thɨna kom, i vata ago weya Loi, na iŋa, “Hu thɨna iyake na hu mun taulaghɨna ghemi.
42022018	Ya dage e ghemi, ma tene ya munɨva waenɨke iyake, ghaghada Loi le ghamba mbaro ne i mena.”
42022019	Amba i wo bred mbumbura, i vata ago weya Loi, i mwanaviya na i giya weŋgi gharaghambuma iŋa, “Iyake riwaŋgu, ya vatomwe ghemi kaiwami. Hu vakatha valaŋa iyake wo renuwaŋakiki kaiwae.”
42022020	Na tembe ŋgoreiyeva, ghanɨŋga e ghereiye i thɨna komuma na i thɨnɨgiya weŋgi, na iŋa, “Waenɨke iyake madɨbaŋgu iya i vaemunjoruŋa dagerawe togha. I voruraŋgi ghemi kaiwami.
42022021	Ko iyemaeŋge wo hu thuwe, thela iya wo lilivako, iye ina e ghanɨŋgake iyake tɨne.
42022022	Kaiwae Lolo Nariye ne i mare ŋgoreiya Loi le renuwaŋa, ko iyemaeŋge vuyowo laghɨye moli ne i wa weya loloko iya ne i vatomweko!”
42022023	Gharaghambu thɨ vevaitoŋgi thɨŋa, “Thela ina e tɨnendake ne i vakatha kamwathɨko iyako?”
42022024	Gharaghambu mbe thiye eŋge thɨ wogaithɨ thela i laghɨye moli e tɨnenjiko.
42022025	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Thiye ma Jiu gharɨgharɨniye lenji kiŋ thɨ mbaroŋaŋgi e vurɨgheghe laghɨye na ghanjimberegha thɨ wovoreŋaŋgi na thɨ uno idanji ‘Gharɨgharɨ ghanjirathalavu’.
42022026	Ko e ghemi ma ŋgoreiyako, iyemaeŋge thela iye i laghɨye moli e tɨnemina, valɨkaiwae iye ŋgoreiya lolo tabwagha moli i gharenja, na randeviva iye ŋgoreiya rakakaiwo.
42022027	Thela i laghɨye moli, loloko iya i yaku e ghamba ghanɨŋga na i ghanɨŋgako o loloko iya i kaiwo kaiwaeko?” “Ŋgoreiye, e yambaneke lenji renuwaŋa tɨne loloko iya i yakuko. Ko iyemaeŋge ghino e tɨnemina lemi rakakaiwo.”
42022028	“Ghemi vambe weiŋguyaŋgi vara ghemi e wovuyowoke wolaghɨye tɨnenji;
42022029	na ŋgoreiye Bwebwe va i vatomwe e ghino na ya mbaro ŋgoreiye kiŋ, ghino tembe ŋgoreiyeva ya vatomwe e ghemi na hu mbaro.
42022030	Iya kaiwae ne hu yaku elo ghamba ghanɨŋga na hu ghanɨŋga na hu munumu elo ghamba mbaro tɨne, na ne hu yaku e ghamba yaku thovuthovuye na hu mbaroŋaŋgiya uu theyaworo na theghewo Isirel e tɨne.”
42022031	Jisas iŋa, “Saimon, Saimon! Wo u vandeŋe! Loi kaero va i vatomwe weya Seitan na ne i mandoŋga i ghathaŋga ŋgoreiya uma gharakakaiwo i ghatha wit mbombouye weiye varivariye.
42022032	Ko iyemaeŋge kaero ya naŋgo Saimon ghen kaiwan mbala len loŋweghathɨna ma i dobu, na mbaŋa u numonjogha e ghino, amba u vavurɨghegheŋaŋgiya oghaghana.”
42022033	Pita i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Giyana, ya vatomweŋgo na weiŋgu ghen e thiyo na ya mare weiŋgu ghen.”
42022034	Jisas i gonjoghawe, iŋa, “Ya dage e ghen, Pita, kamkam mane amba i kula gougouke noroke, ghaghad ne mbaŋato uŋa ma u ghareghareŋgo.”
42022035	Amba Jisas i vaitoŋgiya gharaghambu, iŋa, “Mbaŋa va ya variyeŋga na hu rakaraŋgi, va e mbaŋako iyako mava e lemi vethe nasiye, ma e lemi nambo na ma e gheghemi ghae, thare va bigi reghava i kwara e ghemi?” Thɨ gonjoghawe, thɨŋa, “Nandere moli.”
42022036	I dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ko, e mbaŋake iyake, thela vethe nasiye inawe o nambo, i thɨn, na thela ma gaithɨ ghaghalithɨ inawe i vakuneŋa ghakwama ghayaboyabo na i vamodo regha.
42022037	Kaiwae ya dage e ghemi, Buk Boboma i woraŋgiya iya iŋake, ‘Vambe thɨ govatabova weiyaŋgiya tharɨ gharavakatha,’ iyake ghino utuniŋgu, na bigibigike wolaghɨye Buk Boboma i woraŋgiya ghino kaiwaŋgu emunjoru kaero thɨ yoyomara.”
42022038	Gharaghambu thɨ dagewe, thɨŋa, “Giyana, wo u thuwe, gaithɨ ghaghalithɨ munyiwo mathiyake!” I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Hu viyathu utuutuna iyena!”
42022039	Jisas i raŋgi na i wa Olivɨ e ghanji Ou, ŋgoreiya mbe i vakavakathama na gharaghambuko thɨ ghambu.
42022040	Mbaŋa i vutha gheko, i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Hu naŋgo, mbala ma hu ru tanathetha e tɨne.”
42022041	I iteteŋgi na le bwagabwaga ŋgoreiya ra du varɨ na ve unjawe, i ronja e gheghe vuvuye na i naŋgo.
42022042	Iŋa, “Bwebwe, thoŋgo nuwaniya, u thɨna vuyowoke ghandeghɨ e ghino. Ko iyemaeŋge thava u vakatha ghino lo renuwaŋa, u vakathaeŋge ghen len renuwaŋa.”
42022043	Nyao thovuye i mena e buruburu i yomarawe na i vavurɨghegheŋa.
42022044	Weiye gharevɨrɨ laghɨye i naŋgo vurɨgheghe na ghaghairo i thɨ dobudobu ŋgoreiya madibe e thelauko vwatae.
42022045	Mbaŋa i yondovirɨ naŋgo e ghereiye, i njogha weŋgiya gharaghambu, va thiya ghene sawowori gharevɨrɨ kaiwae.
42022046	I dage weŋgi iŋa, “Buda kaiwae huya ghenelaŋa? Hu raka thuweiru na hu naŋgo mbala ma hu ru tanathetha e tɨne.”
42022047	Mbaŋa vamba Jisas i utuutu wabwi regha kaero thɨ rakavutha, Judas i viva weŋgi, iye gharaghambu theyaworo na theghewoma regha. I mena na i vandamo Jisas;
42022048	ko amba Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “Ko ana u vatomweya Lolo Nariye iya u vandamoke?”
42022049	Mbaŋa gharaghambuko va weiyaŋgiko, thɨ thuwe budakaiya ne thɨ vakatha, thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Giyana, thare valɨkaiwame ne wo vakaiwoŋa lama gaithɨke ghaghalithɨ?”
42022050	Regha i mwanavairɨ le gaithɨ ghaghalithɨ kaero i gothethe ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva le rakakaiwo yanawae e uneke.
42022051	Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “Meiyevarana!” I vɨghathɨgha amalako yanawae na kaero i thawariva.
42022052	Amba Jisas i dage weŋgiya ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye, Ŋgolo Boboma gharagatɨgatɨ lenji randevivaŋgi na giyagiya iŋa, “Ko ana mo hu menava weiye lemi gaithɨ ghaghalithɨ na umbwaumbwa uboubotu, hu munjeva rakaivɨ ghino?
42022053	Mbaŋako wolaghɨye va weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne ma hu yalaweŋgo. Ko iyake ghamimbaŋa moli, mbaŋa momouwo le vurɨgheghe i mbaroŋaŋga.”
42022054	Amba thɨ yalaweya Jisas na thɨ yovaŋgu ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva ele ŋgolo tɨne, na Pita mbe i rereghamba bwagabwaga.
42022055	E ŋgoloko ghayayao tɨne, yamoe moli ragatɨgatɨ thɨ rumbwa ndɨghewe na thiya mwa. Pita i ru na i yaku weiyaŋgi.
42022056	Amba rakakaiwoko eunda i thuwe Pita i mwamwa ndɨgheko na i njimbughathɨ, amba iŋa, “Mbe ŋgoreiyeva, va weiye Jisas!”
42022057	Ko iyemaeŋge Pita i roro iŋa, “Elana, mbema ma ya ghareghare vara iya lolona iyena!”
42022058	Mbaŋa ubotu e ghereiye, amala regha i thuwe na iŋa, “Ghen tembe ŋgoreiyeva, ghanjiu regha.” Pita i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Amalana, ma ghino!”
42022059	Ŋgoreiya lughawoghawo regha e ghereiye, amala regha i rovurɨgheghe na i utumbele iŋa, “Ma te ghamba numoghegheiwova, amalake iyake va weiye Jisas kaiwae iye rara Galili ŋgoreiya amalaghɨniye.”
42022060	Ko iyemaeŋge Pita i gonjoghawe, iŋa, “Amalana, ma ya ghareghare budakai utuniya u utuutuna!” E mbaŋako iyako, vamba i utuutu, kamkam kaero i kula.
42022061	Giya i ndevɨ na i njimbughathɨgha Pita. Pita i renuwaŋakikiya Giya ghalɨŋamawe, va iŋama, “Amba muyai kamkam ne i dage, noroke gougou, mbaŋato ne uŋa ma u ghareghareŋgo.”
42022062	Pita i raŋgi eto na i randa laghɨye moli.
42022063	Ghɨmoghɨmoruko va thɨ njimbukikiya Jisas, thɨ vatabweruŋa na thɨ ŋgeŋgeŋa.
42022064	Thɨ ŋgarɨgana marae na thɨŋa, “Thoŋgo ghalɨŋae gharauta ghen, u dage weime thela i ŋgeŋgena.”
42022065	Na tembe thɨ utuvatharɨweva i ghanagha moli.
42022066	Mbaŋa ighɨviya rakaraka, Jiu e lenji kot laghɨye thɨ mevathavatha weinjiyaŋgiya ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na mbaro gharavavaghare, amba thɨ vaŋgumena Jisas weŋgi,
42022067	thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Thoŋgo Mesaiya ghen, u utugiyama weime.” Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Thoŋgo ya utugiya weŋga mane hu loŋweghathɨŋgo;
42022068	na thoŋgo ya giya vaito weŋga mane hu thombe.
42022069	Ko iyemaeŋge e mbaŋake iyake na i ghaoko Lolo Nariye ne i yaku Loi Vurɨgheghe e nɨmaeke uneke.”
42022070	Thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Loi Nariya ghen, ae?” I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Maiya huŋanani.”
42022071	Amba thɨŋa, “Ma te nuwandaiyava gharɨgharɨ vavana thɨ utu kaiwae. Mbe ghinda vara mara loŋwe ghalɨŋae e yanawandake.”
42023001	Taulaghɨko e wabwiko iyako tɨne thɨ rakayondo na thɨ yovaŋguya Jisas weya Pailat,
42023002	amba thɨ wonjowe thɨŋa, “Wo vaidiya amalake iyake i vavaghare weŋgiya la gharɨgharɨ na thɨ thɨghɨyawana ghamba mbaroke iyake. I dage weŋgi na thava thɨ vamodo takis weya Sisa, na iŋava iye ghamberegha Mesaiya na kiŋ.”
42023003	Pailat i vaito, iŋa, “Emunjoru ghen Jiu lenji kiŋ?” Jisas i gonjoghawe, iŋa “Ŋgoreiya iya moŋana.”
42023004	Amba Pailat i dage weŋgiya ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na wabwiko iŋa, “Ma ya vaidi mun tharɨ weya amalake iyake.”
42023005	Ma thɨ kula mbelembele eŋge na ghalɨŋanji laghɨye thɨŋa, “Le vavaghare e tɨne i vakatha ghatemuru gharɨgharɨ e tɨnenji Judiya laghɨyeke e tɨne. Vambe i vakatha weya Galili na mbaŋake kaero menda i menava gheke.”
42023006	Mbaŋa Pailat i loŋwe iyake i vaito, iŋa, “Amalake iyake rara Galili?”
42023007	Mbaŋa i ghareghare Jisas i mena e valɨvaŋgako iyako, na Herod iye le ghamba mbaro, i variye na i wawe. Amalaghɨniye vambe inava Jerusalem tɨne e mbaŋako iyako.
42023008	Herod va i warari laghɨye moli mbaŋa i thuwe Jisas, kaiwae vama i loŋwe utuutuniye na mbaŋa molao i roroghaghawe na nuwaiya i thuwe. Va nuwaiya i thuwe Jisas i vakatha vakatha ghamba rotaele regha.
42023009	Iya kaiwae Herod i giya vaito i ghanagha, ko iyemaeŋge Jisas ma i thombeŋgi.
42023010	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na mbaro gharavavaghare thɨ ndeghembeŋgi na thɨ rovurɨgheghe thɨ wonjowekika Jisas.
42023011	Herod weiyaŋgiya le ragagaithɨ thɨ vatabweruŋa Jisas na thɨ vakatha monjinawe. Thɨ liya kwama thovuye ŋgoreiye kiŋ thɨ njimbo na thɨ vanjimbo, na thɨ variye njogha weya Pailat.
42023012	E mbaŋako vara iyako Herod na Pailat thɨ yaku na ghamwanji vanaora, ko va i viva thɨ vethɨghɨya wanaŋgi.
42023013	Pailat i kula vathavathaŋgiya ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye, randeviva na gharɨgharɨ,
42023014	na i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Mo hu vaŋgumena amalake iyake e ghino, na huŋava iye i vakatha gharɨgharɨ thɨ thɨghɨyawana ghamba mbaroke iyake. Kaero ma tamwe wagiyawe e marami, na ma ma ndevaidi mun emunjoru i vakathaŋgiya tharɨna iya hu wonjowenawe.
42023015	Herod tembe ŋgoreiyeva iya kaiwae me variye njoghama weinda. Amalake iyake ma i ndevakatha mun tharɨ na mbala kaiwae i mare.
42023016	Iya kaiwae mbema ne yaŋa eŋge na thɨ yabɨbɨ na thɨ rakayathu.”
42023017	Thaga Valaŋani ghambaŋa regha na regha Pailat iŋa na thɨ vaŋguraŋgiya raruru e thiyo regha kaiwanji.
42023018	Taulaghɨko e ghalɨŋanji laghɨye thɨ kula thɨŋa, “U tagavamare, na u vaŋguraŋgiya Barabas kaiwame!”
42023019	Va thɨ vaŋguruwo Barabas e thiyo kaiwae iye va wabwiko regha thɨ thɨghɨyawana ghamba mbaroke iyake Jerusalem e tɨne na i unɨgha lolo regha.
42023020	Kaiwae Pailat va nuwaiya i rakayathu Jisas, iya kaiwae mbowo i dage weŋgiva wabwiko,
42023021	ko iyemaeŋge thɨ kula njoghawe thɨŋa, “U rokros! U rokros!”
42023022	Pailat mbowo i dage weŋgiva mbaŋatoninji, iŋa, “Ko va i vakatha vara the tharɨ? Ma ya vaidi mun tharɨ regha va i vakatha na valɨkaiwae i mare. Iya kaiwae ne yaŋa na thɨ yabɨbɨ na thɨ rakayathu.”
42023023	Ko iyemaeŋge thɨ kula mbelembele e ghalɨŋanji laghɨye na Jisas eŋge i mare e kros vwatae, ghaghada i vamboromboroŋa lenji renuwaŋako.
42023024	Pailat iŋa na thɨ rokros Jisas na i vamboromboroŋa lenji renuwaŋako.
42023025	Iŋa na thɨ vaŋguraŋgiya amalama va nuwanjiyama, iya va thɨ thɨghɨyawana ghamba mbaroko iyako na i unɨghɨ lolo regha thɨ vaŋguruwo e thiyo, na i vaŋgugiya Jisas weŋgi na thɨ vamboromboro ŋgoreiya lenji renuwaŋako.
42023026	Mbaŋa ragagaithɨ thɨ yovaŋguya Jisas thɨ lavolevola amala regha i mena Sairin idae Saimon. Iye va i mena eto na ma i ruruma. Thɨ yalawe, thɨ wogiya krosɨkowe na thɨ vavurɨghegheŋa na i woreghamba Jisas e ghereiye.
42023027	Wabwi laghɨye thɨ rakambele, na e tɨnenjiko wanakau vavana, thɨ ghare vɨrɨwe na thɨ randa kaiwae.
42023028	Jisas i matavɨ na i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Jerusalem wanakauniye, thava hu randa ghino kaiwaŋgu, hu randa eŋge ghemi na lemi ŋgaŋga kaiwami.
42023029	Kaiwae vuyowo ghambaŋa i menamenake, mbaŋaniye gharɨgharɨ ne thɨŋa, ‘Wanakau thɨ kwama, ma thɨ ghamba gamagai na wanakau ma e lenji ŋgaŋga nanasiye, thɨ warari kaiwae ma mbaŋa regha e lenji ŋgaŋga na ma mbaŋa regha thɨ vavathu ŋgama.’
42023030	E mbaŋako iyako gharɨgharɨ ne thɨ dage weŋgiya ououko, ne thɨŋa, ‘Hu dobuma e vwatame’ na ‘Bobokulu hu roganaime.’
42023031	Ya dage ŋgoreiyake kaiwae thoŋgo gharɨgharɨ thɨ vakathaŋgo na ya vaidiya vuyowoke iyake, othembe ghino lolo rumwaru, amba Loi ne i vakatha vuyowo laghɨye moli weŋgiya tharɨko gharavakavakatha.”
42023032	Amaamala theghewo, thiye tharɨ gharavakathaŋgi, vambe thɨ vaŋguŋgi na vethɨ rokrosɨŋgi weinji Jisas.
42023033	Mbaŋa thɨ vutha e valɨvaŋgako iyako, thɨ uno idae “Boutouto,” thɨ rokros Jisas gheko na tharɨma gharavakathaŋgi theghewoma; regha e une na regha e moiye.
42023034	Jisas iŋa, “Bwebwe, u numotenɨŋgi, kaiwae budakaiya thɨ vakavakatha ma thɨ ghareghare.” Amba thɨ wobwiya ghakwamakwamama. Thɨ mbana varɨvarɨ na thɨ mwadiwo mwadiwo reghawe. Thela thoŋgo i wo varɨko iya e ghanonoko amba i tuthi iyaŋganiya i bigi.
42023035	Gharɨgharɨ thiya ndeghathɨ na thɨ njimbukiki, na Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ goviyaviya ghamwae thɨŋa, “Va i vamoruŋgi eŋge gharɨgharɨ vavana, ko mbaŋake wo i vamora tembe ghamberegha, thoŋgo iye Mesaiya, Loi le tututhi loloniye!”
42023036	Ragagaithɨ te vambe ŋgoreiyeva, va thɨ vatabweruŋa, thɨ mena thɨ ndevorowe na thɨ thɨnɨgiya waen monyomonyowe,
42023037	na thɨŋa, “U vamora ghanɨmberegha thoŋgo Jiu lenji kiŋ ghen!”
42023038	E umbaliye na yavoro va thɨ roriya utuutuke iyakewe: Iyake Jiu lenji Kiŋ.
42023039	Tharɨko gharavakathaŋgi regha iya thɨ kwateko e njawanjawaŋgiko, i utuvatharɨ na ive iŋa, “Ghen Mesaiya ghen, ae? U vamoruŋge na u vamoruime!”
42023040	Ko iyemaeŋge reghako i ŋaevwaŋa iŋa, “Ko ma u mararu Loi? Mbe thaghetoke vara ra vaidiya vuyowoke iyake,
42023041	ko iyemaeŋge thaghewoke i thovuye moli, kaiwae ghinda ra vaidiya budakaiya la vakatha vuyowae, ko iye mava i ndevakatha mun tharɨ regha.”
42023042	Amba i dage weya Jisas iŋa, “Jisas, u renuwaŋakikiŋgo mbaŋa ne u tabona kiŋ!”
42023043	Jisas i gonjoghawe, iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghen, noroke weiŋgu ghen e ghemba thovuye Paradais.”
42023044	-
42023045	Mbaŋa va ŋgoreiya raŋgila thiyo, mbaŋaniye varae ma i mbɨle na vanautumako iyako i momouwo ghaghad tɨri klok, na kwama molao thɨ livakwate na i vakatha woluwolu theghewo e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne, i mathethe na yaŋgaiwo.
42023046	Amba Jisas i kula na ghalɨŋae laghɨye, iŋa, “Bwebwe, e nɨmanɨna ghare ya woraweya uneŋguke.” I utuvao iyako amba i liya yawaliye.
42023047	Mbaŋa ragagaithɨ lenji randeviva i thuwe budakaiya me yomara, i taraweŋa Loi iŋa, “Emunjoru iye va lolo rumwarumwaruniye! Ma i ndevakathamun tharɨ!”
42023048	Mbaŋa gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye iyava thɨ mevathavathako thɨ ghewo budakaiya i yomara, thɨ rakanjogha e ghambaghambanji na thɨ ghambɨghamba gharenji nuwatharɨ kaiwae.
42023049	Taulaghɨŋgiko iyava thɨ ghareghare Jisas e gharenji, weinjiyaŋgiya wanakau, thiye va thɨ ghambu Galili e tɨne, vambe thiya ndeghathɨ eto na thɨ ghewo.
42023050	-
42023051	Amala regha idae Josep rara Arɨmathiya, ghemba regha Judiya e tɨne. Iye lolo rumwarumwaruniye na i roroghagha Loi le ghamba mbaro thembaŋa ne i mena. I ghambugha mbaro na Jiu lenji kot laghɨye loloniye regha, ko iyemaeŋge mava i wovatha lenji mbaro na lenji vakathako Jisas kaiwae.
42023052	I wa weya Pailat na i naŋgo weya Jisas riwaekowe.
42023053	Amba i wonjoŋa Jisas riwae, i ghavo e kwama na i worawe e ghabubu va thɨ tɨghɨ e varɨ na ma mbaŋa regha lolo riwa i ghenawe.
42023054	Iyako va Pɨraide na vama mbaŋa ubotu eŋge kaero Sabat.
42023055	Wanakauma iyava thɨ ghambuma Jisas Galili e tɨne, thɨ wa weinji Josep na vethɨ thuwe ghabubuko na ŋgoroŋga Jisas riwae ghawoworawe.
42023056	Amba thɨ njogha e ghemba na vethɨ vivathaŋgiya merisin bunama butinji thovuye Jisas riwaeko kaiwae. Sabat e tɨne thɨ towowe ŋgoreiya lenji mbaro le woraŋgiya.
42024001	Sande vambe mbaŋambaŋa moli, wanakauma thɨ wa e ghabubuko, thɨ bigiya bunamama menda thɨ vivatharawema.
42024002	Thɨ thuwe varɨko menda thɨ tagagana ghabubuko ghaekowe, kaero me thɨ vabulale vakatha
42024003	na thɨ mwandɨ e ghabubuko tɨne, ko iyemaeŋge ma thɨ vaidiya Giya Jisas riwae.
42024004	Thɨ ndeghathɨ gheko na ma e ghalɨghalɨŋanji. E mbaŋako vara iyako ghɨmoghɨmoru theghewo ghanjikwama i ndalandala thɨ ndeghathɨ e vasiwanji.
42024005	Weinji lenji gharelaghɨlaghɨ, wanakauko thɨ ndekururu na ghamwanji i nja e thelauko vwatae. Ghɨmoghɨmoruko thɨ dage weŋgi thɨŋa, “Buda kaiwae hu tamweya lolo e yawayawaliye ŋgora ramaremare e lenji ghamba yaku?
42024006	Ma ina gheke! Kaero me thuweiru. Hu renuwaŋakikiya va le utuma weŋga mbaŋa va ina Galili e tɨne.
42024007	Va iŋa, ‘Ne thɨ vaŋgugiya Lolo Nariye weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ raraitharɨ, ne thɨ tagavamare e kros vwatae na mbaŋa theghetoniye e tɨne kaero i thuweiru na e yawayawaliyeva.’ ”
42024008	Amba wanakauko thɨ renuwaŋakikiya le utuma,
42024009	thɨ iteta ghabubuko na tembe thɨ loŋgaloŋgaŋava ghereinji na vethɨ utugiya weŋgiya gharaghambuma theyaworo na reghama na tembe taulaghɨkova weŋgi.
42024010	Wanakauko, va Meri tɨnan Magadala, Jowana, Meri Jemes tɨnae na wanakau vavanava va weinjiyaŋgi iyava thɨ utugiya utuutuke iyake weŋgiya ghalɨŋae gharaghambɨ.
42024011	Ko iyemaeŋge ghalɨŋae gharaghambɨ lenji renuwaŋa thɨŋaeŋge wanakauko lenji utuko utu kwanɨkwan iya kaiwae mava thɨ loŋweghathɨ.
42024012	Ko iyemaeŋge Pita i yondovirɨ na i rukuŋa ghabubuko, i ndekururu na i thuwe ghabubuko tɨne, kwama kokowa. I njogha e ŋgolo na i rerenuwaŋa laghɨye weiye le numoghegheiwo bigibigiko thɨ yomarako kaiwanji.
42024013	E mbaŋako regha iyako tɨne, Jisas gharaghambu theghewo, thɨ ri Jerusalem na thɨ wa e ghemba regha idae Emaus. Ghanji lughawoghawo ŋgoreiya kilomita theyaworo na regha.
42024014	Lenji loŋga e tɨne thɨ veutu weŋgi bigibigiko wolaghɨye menda thɨ yomarako kaiwanji.
42024015	Mbaŋa lenji utuutu e tɨne Jisas ghamberegha i vurɨten reghamba weŋgi na mbe i loŋga vara weiyaŋgi.
42024016	Thɨ thuwe, ko iyemaeŋge Loi i vakatha mava thɨ ghareghare thela amalaghɨniye.
42024017	Jisas i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Ko budakai utuniya hu veutuna weŋga e lemi loŋgana tɨne?” Thɨ ndekubaro weinji lenji nuwatharɨ.
42024018	Regha idae Kleopas, i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ko mbe ghen eŋge vara ghanɨmbereghana menda inan Jerusalem na ma menda u ghareghare iya bigibigike menda thɨ yoyomarake mbaŋake mendamba thɨkoke e tɨnenji?”
42024019	I vaitoŋgi, iŋa, “Ko the bigibigi?” Thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Bigibigike iya menda thɨ yomara weya Jisas rara Nasaret. Amalake iyake iye va Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu. Iye va i vurɨgheghe ele vakatha na ele utu Loi na gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye e maranji.
42024020	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na la rambarombaro mendava thɨ vaŋgugiya weya Rom lenji Gawana amba i vakatha ghambaro le mare kaiwae na thɨ tagavamare e kros vwatae.
42024021	Va lama renuwaŋa woŋa iye ne i rakayathuŋgiya Isirel gharɨgharɨniye. Gharerenuwaŋa ŋgoreiyako, na noroke kaero mbaŋa theghetoninji mbaŋa menda bigibigiko thiyako thɨ yomara.
42024022	Wanakau vavana e lama wabwiko tɨne thɨ vathɨna ghareme; methɨ wa e ghabubu mbaŋambaŋa moli,
42024023	ko iyemaeŋge ma methɨ vaidiya riwae e ghabubuko tɨne. Methɨ njoghama na thɨŋa methɨ vaidiŋgiya nyao thovuthovuye, methɨ dage weŋgi thɨŋa, ‘Kaero me thuweiru na ma e yawayawaliyeva.’
42024024	Ghamaune vavana methɨ wa e ghabubuko na vethɨ vaidi ŋgoreiya wanakauko methɨ utuŋa, ko iyemaeŋge ma methɨ thuwe.”
42024025	Amba Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ma e umbaumbalɨmi! Mbema hu vuyowo vara moli e loŋweghathɨgha ŋgoroŋga Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu lenji utu.
42024026	Thare va valɨkaiwae na Mesaiya i vaidiya vuyowoŋgike thiyake ko amba muyai i vaidiya Ramae le vwenyevwenye?”
42024027	Jisas i vamanjamanjalaŋa weŋgi budakaiya Buk Boboma va i woraŋgiya amalaghɨniye kaiwae. I ri Mosese ele buk na i wa Loi ghalɨŋae gharautuko wolaghɨye lenji rorori e tɨnenji.
42024028	Mbaŋa thɨ vurɨthaiya ghembako thɨ ghembeko, Jisas le vakatha ŋgoreiya ne i vamwandɨ,
42024029	iyemaeŋge thɨ naŋgo vurɨgheghewe thɨŋa, “Wo ra laghena weime ghen gheke, kaiwae mbaŋa nasiye i gou.” I ru na i laghena weiyaŋgi.
42024030	Mbaŋa ina e ghamba ghanɨŋga, i wo bred mbumbura, i vata ago weya Loi, i njiviya na i giya weŋgi.
42024031	E mbaŋako iyako ambama Loi i vakatha na thɨ ghareghare, ko mbema i ghawe eŋge vara e maranji.
42024032	Thɨ vedage weŋgi thɨŋa, “Thare me utuko weinda na ŋgoreiya ndɨghema me rara e gharenda mbaŋa mara loŋgama weinda e kamwathɨko na me vamanjamanjalaŋa Bukuma Boboma le utuutu weinda?”
42024033	Thɨ yondovirɨ e mbaŋako iyako na thɨ njogha Jerusalem, na gheko thɨ vaidiŋgiya gharaghambu theyaworo na regha, thɨ mevathavatha weinjiyaŋgiya wanakau vavanava,
42024034	na gharaghambu thɨŋa, “Giya emunjoru kaero me thuweiru! Me yomara weya Saimon!”
42024035	Theghewoko thɨ vamanjamanjalaŋa weŋgi budakai menda i yomara weŋgi e loŋga mborowa, na me ŋgoroŋga na thɨ ghareghare iye Giya mbaŋa me njiviya bredɨma.
42024036	Mbaŋa theghewoko amba thɨ utuutu weŋgi Jisas ghamberegha i ndeghathɨ e ghanjilughawoghawo na i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Weimi lemi gharemalɨlɨ.”
42024037	Gharenji i yo na thiya mararu kaiwae lenji renuwaŋa thɨŋaeŋge kaka.
42024038	Ko iyemaeŋge i dage weŋgi, iŋa, “Buda kaiwae huya gharelaghɨlaghɨ, na buda kaiwae hu numoghegheiwo?
42024039	Wo hu thuweŋgiya nɨmanɨmaŋguke na ghegheŋguke na hu ghareghare ghino. Hu vinogha riwaŋguke na mbala hu ghareghare, kaiwae kaka ma e mbunɨmbunɨmaniye na e wokiwokiniye, ŋgoreiya hu thuwe ghino riwaŋguke.”
42024040	I utuvao iyako amba i vatomwe weŋgiya nɨmanɨmae na gheghe.
42024041	Gharenji i warari na gharenji i yo ko iyemaeŋge mava thɨ loŋweghathɨ, amba i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Thare bigi regha ina gheke na ne hu ghan?”
42024042	Thɨ wogiyawe borogi ŋambuŋambu vuvura,
42024043	i wo na i ghan e maranji.
42024044	Amba i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Bigibigike vara thiyake iyava ya utuutuma weŋga mbaŋa vamba weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi. Bigibigiko wolaghɨye va thɨ rori kaiwaŋgu, Mosese ele mbaro tɨne, Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu lenji buk e tɨne na Sam e tɨne wone thɨ vamboromboro.”
42024045	Amba i vakatha na nuwanji i raravwara na thɨ ghareghare Buk Boboma le utuutu,
42024046	na i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Gharorori ŋgoreiyake: Mesaiya ne i vaidiya vuyowo na i mare na mbaŋa theghetoniye e tɨne kaero i thuweiru na e yawayawaliyeva.
42024047	Amalaghɨniye e idae gharaghambu thɨ vavaghareŋa e vanautumake wolaghɨye gharɨgharɨ thɨ uturaŋgiya lenji tharɨ na thɨ roiteteŋgi mbala Loi ne i numotenɨŋgi. Thɨ woraweya rɨghe Jerusalem.
42024048	Budakaiya va hu thuweŋgi e marami gharauta ghemi.
42024049	Ghino ne va variye weŋga iye Bwebwe va le dagerawe. Iya kaiwae mbe huya yaku vara Jerusalem e tɨne na hu roroghagha ghaghada vurɨghegheko iya ne i menako e buruburu i nja na i ru e ghemi.”
42024050	Amba i vaŋgu raŋgiyaŋgi Jerusalem e tɨne na weiyaŋgi ghaghad Betani. I bigivaira nɨmanɨmae na i giya ghanjidage mwaewo weŋgi.
42024051	Mbaŋa i vakavakatha iyako, i iteteŋgi na Loi i vaŋguvoro e buruburu.
42024052	Thɨ kururuwe na kaero thɨ rakanjoghava Jerusalem weinji lenji warari laghɨye,
42024053	na e mbaŋake wolaghɨye thɨ rakarakaru e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne thɨ tarataraweŋa Loi.
43001001	Va i rikowe Utu kaerova inawe, na Utuko iyako va weiye Loi, na Utuko iye Loi.
43001002	Ma vamba i vakatha yambaneke Utuko iyako vama inawe, weiye Loi.
43001003	Loi va i vakaiwoŋa Utu na i vakatha bigibigike wolaghɨye. Mava i vakatha bigi regha na ma weiye Utu.
43001004	Yawalɨ rɨghethora amalaghɨniye, na yawalɨke iyake gharɨgharɨ lenji manjamanjala.
43001005	Manjamanjalake iyake i woya e momouwo, ko momouwo ma valɨkaiwae i vun.
43001006	Loi va i variya amala regha idae Jon.
43001007	Va i mena na i utuŋa manjamanjalako iyako utuniye, mbala gharɨgharɨ thɨ loŋwe utuko iyako na thɨ loŋweghathɨ.
43001008	Iye ma i womena manjamanjala weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, nandere, mbema i mena i utuŋa eŋge manjamanjalako utuniye weŋgi.
43001009	Iyake manjamanjala emunjoru, manjamanjalaniye i mena e yambaneke na i giya manjamanjala weŋgiya gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye.
43001010	Va ina e yambaneke, na othembe va i vakatha yambaneke, yambaneke mava i ghareghare.
43001011	Va i mena i yaku e ghambae, ko iyemaeŋge ghambae gharɨgharɨniye mava thɨ kulavatha.
43001012	Ko iyemaeŋge taulaghɨko iya thavala thɨ vaŋguvatha na thɨ loŋweghathɨ, i vakathaŋgi na valɨkaiwanji thɨ tabo Loi le ŋgaŋga.
43001013	Mava thɨ tabo na Loi le ŋgamaŋgama ŋgoreiya gharɨgharɨ ghinda ra vwara e mbunɨma na madibe, ŋgoreiya raŋa thɨ virɨ e yambaneke gamagaiŋgi na e ramaramanji. Ko iyake Loi ghamberegha i vakathaŋgi na le ŋgaŋga.
43001014	Utu kaero i tabo na lolo, gharethovu na Loi ghaghareghare emunjoru i riyevanjara na i mena i yaku weinda. Wo thuwe le vwenyevwenye na Ramae va i vakatha na ghamba rerenuwaŋa kaiwae nariye mbe ghamberegha eŋge ŋgama ghedighedi.
43001015	Jon va i utuŋa amalaghɨniye utuniye. I kula na iŋa, “Loloke iyake iya utuniya va yaŋama, ‘Loloko iya i rereghamba e ghereiŋguko iye i laghɨye kivwalaŋgo kaiwae amalaghɨniye vama inawe amba muyai ghino.’ ”
43001016	Kaiwae ghare weinda, mbema i thovuye moli vara weinda, iya kaiwae le giya bwagabwaga ma i motomoto.
43001017	Loi va i giya Mbaro weya Mosese amba Mosese i giya weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, ko iyemaeŋge Loi le gharethovu na ghaghareghare emunjoru i mena we Jisas Krais.
43001018	Ma lolo regha i thuwathuwa weya Loi. Nariye mbe ghamberegha eŋge ŋgama ghedighedi, kaiwae iye mboromboro weiye Loi na iye ina Ramae ele valɨvaŋga, ee, iye i woraŋgiya weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ ŋgoroŋga Loi ghaghareghare.
43001019	Iyake Jon ghalɨŋae mbaŋa Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ variyeŋgiya ravowovowo vavana weinjiyaŋgiya na ghanjirathalavu vavana na vethɨ vaito Jon thɨŋa, “Thela ghen?”
43001020	Mava i wothuwele bigi regha weŋgi, i uturaŋgiya bigibigike wolaghɨye weŋgi iŋa, “Emunjoru, ma Mesaiya ghino.”
43001021	Thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Ko thela eŋge ghen? Ilaija ghen?” Jon i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Nandere, ma Ilaija ghino.” “Loi ghalɨŋaema gharauta ghen?” I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Nandere.”
43001022	Thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Ko thela eŋge ghen? Nuwameiya wo wonjogha na wo giya thombe thovuye weŋgiya thavala methɨ variyeime. Ŋgoroŋga uŋa ghen kaiwan?”
43001023	Jon i gonjogha weŋgi, i vathiya Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, Aiseya le utu, iya iŋake, “Ghino ghalɨŋaŋgu ŋgoreiya lolo regha ghalɨŋae i kulakula e njamnjam: ‘U varumwara kamwathɨ Giya kaiwae.’ ”
43001024	Ravandavandaŋama Parisima va thɨ variyeŋgi,
43001025	thɨ vaito Jon thɨŋa, “Thoŋgo ma Mesaiya ghen, o Ilaija, o Loi ghalɨŋaema gharautu, buda kaiwae eŋge u bapɨtaiso?”
43001026	Jon i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ya bapɨtaisoŋgiya gharɨgharɨ e mbwa, ko lolo regha ina e tɨnemina i ndeghathɨ, iye ma hu ghareghare,
43001027	iye i rereghamba e ghino. Ko iyemaeŋge ghino ma elo thovuye na valɨkaiwaŋgu ne ya raka gheghe ghae.”
43001028	Bigibigike wolaghɨye thiyake va thɨ yomara Betani e Walaghɨta Jorɨdan valɨghadidiye i vorovoro, iya Jon va i bapɨbapɨtaisoŋgiya gharɨgharɨkowe.
43001029	Mbaŋambaŋa vena Jon i thuwe Jisas i loŋga menawe, amba iŋa, “Wo hu thuwe, iyako Loi le Sip Nariye na iye i thavwiyatha yambaneke lenji tharɨ.
43001030	Iyake iyava ya utuuta utuniyema, iyava yaŋama, ‘Lolo regha iya i menamenako, i rereghamba e ghino, ko iyemaeŋge iye i laghɨye kivwalaŋgo kaiwae vama inawe amba ghino ya virɨ.’
43001031	Ghino womberegha mava ya ghareghare, ko ghino ya mena ya bapɨtaisoŋga e mbwa. Ya vakatha iyake na mbala Isirel gharɨgharɨniye thɨ ghareghare thela amalaghɨniye.”
43001032	Jon i uturaŋgiya wagiyawe iŋa, “Ya thuwe Une i njama e buruburu ŋgoreiya bunebune na i yaku Jisas e vwatae.
43001033	Ma mbalava ya ghareghare, ko Loi, iya va i variyeŋgo na ya bapɨtaiso e mbwa, amalaghɨniye i dage weŋgo iŋa, ‘The lolo ne u thuweya Nyao i nja na i yakuwe, iyena iya ne i bapɨtaisoŋgiya gharɨgharɨ e Nyao Boboma.’
43001034	Kaerova ya thuwe na ya dage weŋga na yaŋa iye Loi Nariye.”
43001035	Mbaŋambaŋa vena Jon va mbowo inava gheko i ndeghathɨ weiyaŋgiya gharaghambu theghewo.
43001036	Mbaŋa i thuwe Jisas i loŋga valawe ghamwanji, mbe i njimbukiki vara, amba iŋa, “Wo hu thuwe, iyako Loi le Sip Nariye.”
43001037	Mbaŋa gharaghambu theghewoma thɨ loŋwe iyake, kaero thɨ ghambugha Jisas.
43001038	Jisas i ndevɨ na i thuweŋgi thɨ rereghambawe, i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Nuwamiya budakai?” Thɨŋa, “Rabai (gharumwaru Ravavaghare), aŋga u yaku?”
43001039	I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Hu mena hu thuwe.” Amba thɨ wa weinji na vethɨ thuwe aŋga i yaku, na vethɨ yaku weinji e mbaŋako iyako tɨne, kaiwae mbaŋa vamba ŋgoreiye po klok.
43001040	Gharɨgharɨke iya thenjighewoke iyava thɨ loŋwe Jon ghalɨŋae, regha idae Endru, Saimon Pita ghaghae na thɨ rereghambawe Jisas.
43001041	I viva moli, Endru i vaidikaiya ghaghae Saimon na i dagewe iŋa, “Kaero mo vaidiya Mesaiya” (gharumwaru Krais).
43001042	Amba i vaŋgumenawe Jisas. Jisas i thuwe na i dagewe iŋa, “Ghen Saimon, rama idae Jon. Ghen ne idan Sipas.” (Idake iyake ŋgoreiya Pita, gharumwaru “varɨ.”)
43001043	Mbaŋambaŋa vena Jisas nuwaiya i wa Galili ele valɨvaŋga. Ko amba muyai i wa gheko i lavolevoleya Pilip na i dagewe iŋa, “U ghambuŋgo.”
43001044	Pilip iye ŋgoreiya Endru na Pita ghambanji regha, Betɨsaida.
43001045	Pilip i vaidiya Nataniyel na i dagewe iŋa, “Kaero wo vaidiya loloma iya Mosese va i roriya utuniyema Mbaro e gha Buk tɨne na Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu vambe thɨ rororiva kaiwae. Iye Jisas, Josep nariye, i mena Nasaret.”
43001046	Nataniyel i vaito iŋa, “Nasaret! Mbene bigi thovuye regha i mena gheko?” Pilip iŋa, “U mena u thuwe.”
43001047	Mbaŋa Jisas i thuwe Nataniyel amba i menamenako kaero i utuŋa utuniye iŋa, “Loloke iyake Isirel ŋgamaniye moli. Ma mbaŋa regha i utu kwan.”
43001048	Nataniyel i vaito iŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga uŋa na u ghareghareŋgo?” Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ma thuweŋge menan e umbwa idae ‘fig’ raberabe amba muyai Pilip i kula e ghen.”
43001049	Nataniyel i dagewe iŋa, “Rabai, ghen Loi Nariye ghen na ghen Isirel lenji Kiŋ!”
43001050	Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “U loŋweghathɨ kaiwae ma dage e ghen maŋa ma thuweŋge e umbwa ida fig raberabe. Tene u thuweŋgi bigibigi laghɨlaghɨye na thɨ kivwala iyake!”
43001051	Mbowo i dageweva iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ne hu thuwe buruburu i mavu na Loi le nyao thovuthovuye thɨ rakavoro na thɨ rakanjawe Lolo Nariye.”
43002001	Mbaŋa mbaŋaiwo e ghereiye, thɨ vakatha ghe ghathaga regha, e ghemba regha idae Kena Galili e tɨne. Jisas tɨnae va ina gheko,
43002002	na Jisas na gharaghambu vambe ghanjikula nava e thagako iyako rɨghe.
43002003	Mbaŋa waen vama i ko, Jisas tɨnae i dagewe amalaghɨniye iŋa, “Waen kaero i ko weŋgi.”
43002004	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Nava, buda kaiwae len renuwaŋa ina e ghino? Wo mbaŋa ya vakatha bigi ŋgora iyako mamba i mena.”
43002005	Tɨnae i dage weŋgiya rakakaiwo iŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga iŋa weŋga hu vakatha ŋgoreiye.”
43002006	Mbwa varivariye, thɨ vakathaŋgi e varɨ, vwarawona, va thɨ bigiraweŋgi. Thiyako thɨ vakaiwoŋaŋgi kaiwae thɨ ghambugha Jiu lenji kururu ghakamwathɨ. Vwarara mbwako e tɨneko le ghanaghanagha mbwata i wo vwaramonyi vwaraiwo o vwarato.
43002007	Jisas i dage weŋgiya rakakaiwoma iŋa, “Hu gudumbana mbwa e mbwake varivariye.” Thɨ gudu vanjaraŋgi moli.
43002008	Amba i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Mbaŋake iyake hu guda vavana e mbwana variye na hu giyawe amalako iya i ndeviva e thagako.” Thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiye,
43002009	na amalako iyako i mando mbwako iyama me vɨvɨna waenɨko. Ma i ghareghare waenɨke iyake aŋga me mena, ko iyemaeŋge rakakaiwoma iya methɨ guduma thɨ ghareghare. Iyake kaiwae i kulawe ragheghe ghɨmoruma
43002010	na iŋa, “Thaga tanuwagae me giyakaiya waen thovuye, na mbaŋa ma methɨ muna i laghɨye moli, kaero i giyava waenɨma ma modae laghɨye. Ko iyemaeŋge mo vikikighathɨgha waen thovuye moli ghaghada mbaŋake iyake.”
43002011	Jisas va i vakathakai vara vakathake ghamba rotaele iyake Kena Galili e tɨne. Le vakathako ghamba rotaele iyako i woraŋgiya le vwenyevwenye na gharaghambu thɨ loŋweghathɨ.
43002012	Thaga e ghereiye, kaero Jisas weiyaŋgiya tɨnae, oghaghae na gharaghambu thɨ raka e ghemba Kapenaom, na mbowo vethɨ yaku gheko mbaŋa vavana.
43002013	Thaga Valaŋani ghambaŋa ma vama bwagabwaga, Jisas i voro Jerusalem.
43002014	E Ŋgolo Boboma ghayayao tɨne i vaidiŋgiya gharɨgharɨ vavana thɨ vakuneŋaŋgiya lenji burumwaka, sip na bunebune na vavana thiya yaku e lenji tebol na thɨ tenɨto yao.
43002015	Jisas i tarailaila yao gharaten lenji mani na i mwanavevewoŋgiya lenji tebol. I mbana thiyothiyo vavana na i vakatha gheyabɨyabɨbɨwe, na i vagege raŋgiyaŋgiwe, weinjiyaŋgiya lenji sip na burumwaka.
43002016	I dage weŋgiya va thɨ vakuneŋaŋgiya bunebuneko iŋa, “Hu bigiraŋgiya bigibigike thiyake eto. Tha hu vakatha Bwebwe le ŋgolo na ŋgoreiya ghamba maket.”
43002017	Gharaghambuko thɨ renuwaŋakikiya buk le utu iŋa, “Len ŋgolo ghagharethovu i ra e ghareŋguke ŋgoreiya ndɨghe.”
43002018	Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Thambovakatha ghamba rotaele ne u vakatha na i vaghareime e len rɨghe na u vakatha iyake?”
43002019	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Hu rakayathu Ŋgolo Bobomake iyake na mbaŋa thegheto eŋge e tɨne kaero ya vatadɨvaova.”
43002020	Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Ŋgolo Bobomake iyake va i wo theghathegha ghwevarɨ na umbowona amba thɨ vatadɨvao, na mbene mbaŋa thegheto eŋge kaero u vatadɨvaova?”
43002021	Ko ŋgolo bobomako va i utuutu kaiwaeko amalaghɨniye riwae mbe utuniye.
43002022	Mbaŋa vama ve thuweiruva na e ghereiye ambama gharaghambu thɨ renuwaŋakikiya ghalɨŋaeke iyake na thɨ loŋweghathɨgha buk le utu na utuutu Jisas va i utuŋaŋgi.
43002023	Mbaŋa vamba ina Jerusalem Thaga Valaŋani kaiwae, gharɨgharɨ lemoyo va thɨ thuwe le vakathaŋgiko ghamba rotaele na thɨ loŋweghathɨgha amalaghɨniye.
43002024	Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas mava le renuwaŋako i wa weŋgi na i vareminjeŋgi, kaiwae va i ghareghare gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye lenji renuwaŋa.
43002025	Le ghareghareko ma i tubo na valɨkaiwae lolo regha i utugiyawe gharɨgharɨ lenji renuwaŋa kaiwae, ko kaiwae vama i ghareghare budakai ina gharɨgharɨ e gharenji.
43003001	Jiu lenji randeviva regha idae Nikodimos, iye i mena Parisi e lenji wabwi.
43003002	Gougou regha i menawe Jisas na i dagewe iŋa, “Ravavaghare, wo ghareghare ravavaghara ghen u menawe Loi. Kaiwae i vakathana u vakathaŋgina ma lolo regha valɨkaiwae thoŋgo ma weiye Loi.”
43003003	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghen, ma lolo regha valɨkaiwae na ne i thuwe Loi le ghamba mbaro thoŋgo ma i ghambɨ togha.”
43003004	Nikodimos i vaito iŋa, “Thoŋgo lolo kaero i thamatowo, ne ŋgoroŋga iŋa na i virɨ togha? I thovuyewe loloko iyako na tembe i njoghava tɨnae e ŋgamoiye mbowo i ghambɨva mbaŋaiwoniye?”
43003005	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghen, ma lolo regha ne i ru Loi ele ghamba mbaro tɨne thoŋgo ma i virɨ e mbwa na Nyao Boboma.
43003006	Lolo tɨnae na ramae thɨ ghambɨ e yawayawaliye, ko iyemaeŋge thoŋgo Nyao Boboma i vakatha lolo na i ghambɨ togha loloko iyako une ne e yawayawaliye.
43003007	Thava gharen i yo kaiwae ya dage e ghen yaŋa, ‘Hu ghambɨ togha,’
43003008	ndewendewe i rowo na i uu na i reŋa the valɨvaŋga nuwaiya i reŋawe. U loŋwe laiye, ko iyemaeŋge ma u ghareghare aŋga i uu na i mena o aŋga i uu na i reŋa. Iyako ŋgoreiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ virɨ e Nyao Boboma.”
43003009	Nikodimos i vaito iŋa, “Ne ŋgoroŋga na kamwathɨke iyake i yomara?”
43003010	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ghen Isirel lenji ravavaghare laghɨye regha ghen, na nuwana ma mba i manjamanjalaŋa bigibigike thiyake?
43003011	Ya dage emunjoru e ghen, wo utuŋa budakaiya wo ghareghare na wo woraŋgiya weŋga budakaiya wo thuwe e marame, ko iyemaeŋge ma hu wovatha lama utu.
43003012	Thoŋgo ma hu loŋweghathɨŋgo mbaŋa ya utuŋa yambaneke bigibiginiye utuninji, ŋgoroŋga ne huŋa na hu loŋweghathɨŋgo mbaŋa ne ya utuŋa weŋga buruburu bigibiginiye utuninji?
43003013	Ma lolo regha mun va i wa e buruburu; mbe ghamberegha eŋge Lolo Nariye, iye i njama e buruburu.
43003014	Kaiwae Mosese va i livaira mwata e njamnjam, Lolo Nariye tembene ŋgoreiyeva ne thɨ mwanavairɨ
43003015	mbala thavala thɨ loŋweghathɨ ne thɨ vaidiya yawalinji memeghabananiye.”
43003016	“Kaiwae Loi emunjoru i gharethovu yambaneke, i vatomwe Nariye ŋgama ghedighedi, thela thoŋgo i loŋweghathɨ mane i mare, ne i vaidiya yawaliye memeghabananiye.
43003017	Kaiwae Loi mava i variye Nariye e yambaneke na i wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ na thɨ ghataŋa vɨrɨ, nandere, ko i vamoruŋgi eŋge gharɨgharɨ.
43003018	Thela thoŋgo i loŋweghathɨ mane i vaidiya wovatharɨtharɨko iyako, ko thela ma i loŋweghathɨ, wovatharɨtharɨko iyako kaiwae kaero i vaidiya vɨrɨniye, kaiwae ma i loŋweghathɨ Loi Nariye, mbe ghambereghaeŋge, ŋgama ghedighedi.
43003019	Thiyake iya kaiwae ne thɨ vaidiya vɨrɨniye: Manjamanjala kaerova i mena e yambaneke, ko iyemaeŋge gharɨgharɨ nuwanjiko i ghaŋgowa momouwo na ma thɨ goruwe manjamanjala kaiwae lenji vakathako mbe tharɨ eŋge.
43003020	Thavala thɨ vakatha tharɨ thɨ botewo manjamanjala na mane thɨ mena e manjamanjala, kaiwae thɨ mararu lenji vakathako raraitharɨ i raŋgi e manjamanjala.
43003021	Ko thela i vakatha budakaiya emunjoru i mena e manjamanjala, mbala thɨ thuwe wagiyawe le vakathako i vakatha ŋgoreiye Loi le renuwaŋa.”
43003022	Iyake e ghereiye Jisas na gharaghambu thɨ rakaraŋgi na thɨ raka Judiya ele valɨvaŋga regha na vethɨ yaku weiyaŋgi gheko na i bapɨtaisoŋgiya gharɨgharɨ.
43003023	Jon vambe i bapɨtaisoŋgiva gharɨgharɨ e ghemba regha idae Anon, Salim ghadidiye, kaiwae mbwa va i ghanagha gheko na gharɨgharɨ lemoyo va thɨ rakarakamenawe na i bapɨtaisoŋgi.
43003024	Va e mbaŋako iyako Jon mamba i ru e thiyo.
43003025	Jon gharaghambu vavana thɨ wogaithɨ weinji Jiu regha thavwithavwi kaiwae, kaiwae iyake thiye Jiu lenji kururu thanavuniye.
43003026	Thɨ mena eŋge thɨ utuutu weya Jon thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, amalama iya mendava weinɨma Jorɨdan valɨvaŋga i vorovoro, iya mendava u utuŋa iye Mesaiya; ee amalaghɨniye i bapɨtaisoŋgiya gharɨgharɨ na gharɨgharɨ lemoyo moli thɨ rakarakawe.”
43003027	Jon i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ma lolo regha ne i wo bigi regha thoŋgo ma Loi i wogiyawe.
43003028	Ghemi kaero hu ghareghare iyava yaŋake, ‘Ghino ma Krais ŋgoreiye,’ ko iyemaeŋge Loi va i variyeŋgo na ya viva e ghamwae.
43003029	Ragheghe ghɨmoru iye i vaŋgwa ragheghe wevo, ko iyemaeŋge ragheghe ghɨmoru gheu i roroghagha weya ragheghe ghɨmoru weiye ragheghe wevo thɨ vutha, na iye mbe inawe i vandevandeŋa. Mbaŋa i loŋwe ragheghe ghɨmoru ghalɨŋae, i warari laghɨye moli. Ghino lo warari ŋgoreiyako, na lo warariko kaero i mboromboro.
43003030	Amalaghɨniye idae mbe i laghɨlaghɨye vara na ghino idaŋgu mbe i didinja vara.”
43003031	Iye i mena e buruburu ee i laghɨye kivwalaŋgi gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye. Thela i mena e yambaneke iye ŋgoreiya yambaneke gharɨgharɨniye, na i utu ŋgoreiya rameyambane. Thela i mena e buruburu i laghɨye na i mevoro moli.
43003032	I utuŋaŋgiya budakaiya va i thuwe na i loŋwe, ko iyemaeŋge ma lolo regha i wovatha le utuko.
43003033	Ko thela thoŋgo i wovatha le utuko, i wovaemuemunjoruŋa na iŋa Loi mbema emunjoru moli.
43003034	Kaiwae thela Loi va i variye, i utuŋa Loi ghalɨŋae, kaiwae Loi i giya valawewe Nyao Boboma na ma ele moto.
43003035	Ramanda Loi i gharethovu weya Nariye na i bigirawe bigibigike wolaghɨye e nɨmae ghare.
43003036	Thela thoŋgo i loŋweghathɨgha Nariye i vaidiya yawaliye memeghabananiye, ko thela thoŋgo i botewo Nariye mane i vaidi yawalɨko iyako, ko iyemaeŋge Loi le ghatemuru laghɨye moli inawe.
43004001	Parisi thɨ loŋwevaidiya Jisas i vaŋguŋgi na i bapɨtaisoŋgiya gharaghambu lemoyo, i kivwala Jon,
43004002	othembe raŋa Jisas, iye mava i vakatha bapɨtaiso, vambe gharaghambuŋgiko eŋge,
43004003	mbaŋa va i ghareghare iyake iteta Judiya na mbowo i njoghava Galili.
43004004	Le njoghako iyako va i ghathara Sameriya ele valɨvaŋga.
43004005	Iwaeŋge i mena i vutha e ghembaniye regha idae Saika, e thelau regha ghadidiye. Thelauko iyako Jeikob va i vamodo na i wogiyawe nariye Josep.
43004006	E valɨvaŋgako iyako Jeikob ghe mbwa, mborowou va thɨ do, mbe inaweva. Jisas, loŋgako kaiwae na riwae va i bane, i ronja e ghadidiye. Mbaŋa va ŋgoreiya ghararaghɨye mboro.
43004007	Mbaŋa tɨnan Sameriya eunda i mena i guda mbwa, Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “U gudugiyama mbwana ya mun.”
43004008	Gharaghambu vama thɨ wao e ghemba na vethɨ vamoda ghanɨŋga.
43004009	Elama i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Kaiwae mbe Jiuwa ghen na mbe Sameriya ghino, ŋgoroŋga na u naŋgo mbwa e ghino?” Kaiwae Jiu na Sameriya thɨ veroghereiye wanaŋgi.
43004010	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Thoŋgo u ghareghare Loi le giya e ghen na thela iya i naŋgo mbwana e ghen, mbala mo naŋgowe na i giya mbwa e yawayawaliye e ghen.”
43004011	Elama i dagewe iŋa, “Amalana, ma bigi regha ina e ghen na mbala u guduwe kaiwae mbwake na bode moli. Aŋga ne vo wo iya mbwake e yawayawaliyeke?
43004012	Ghen u laghɨye kivwala rumbume Jeikob, iyava i vatomwe mbwake iyake weime? Amalaghɨniye weiyaŋgiya le ŋgaŋga na le thetheghan va thɨ muna iyake.”
43004013	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Thela i muna mbwake iyake tene mbwa i gharɨva,
43004014	ko thela thoŋgo i muna mbwake ghino ya giyakewe, ma tene mbwa i gharɨva. Ŋgoreiye, mbwake iya ne ghino ya giyakewe ne i tabona mborowou, i voru valaŋa na i giya yawaliye memeghabananiye.”
43004015	Elama i dagewe iŋa, “Amalana, u giyama mbwana iyana weŋgo, mbala ma tene mbwa i gharɨŋgo na ya mena ya guduguduva mbwa gheke.”
43004016	Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “U wa, vo vaŋgwa len ghɨmoru na u njoghama gheke.”
43004017	I gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ma elo ghɨmoru.” Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “U utuŋa emunjoru iya uŋana ma e len ghɨmoru.
43004018	Ko emunjoru iyake: va u vaŋguŋgiya ghɨmoghɨmoru theghelimana, ghɨmoru na iya weina e mbaŋake iyake ma len ghɨmoru. Emunjoru iya moŋana.”
43004019	Elama iŋa, “Amalana, kaero ya thuweŋge, Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu ghen.
43004020	Orumburumbume va thɨ kururu weya Loi e ouke iyake, ko ghemi Jiu huŋa ghamba kururu mbe regha eŋge Jerusalem.”
43004021	Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “U wo lo renuwaŋake elana, mbaŋa i menamenake mane hu kururuwe Bwebwe e ouke iyake o Jerusalem.
43004022	Ghemi Sameriya gharɨgharɨniye ma hu ghareghare hu kururuwe thela; ko ghime Jiu wo ghareghare Loike wo kururukewe, na ne i vakaiwoŋaime na i vamoru yambaneke.
43004023	Ko iyemaeŋge mbaŋa maya i menamenake na kaero ina gheke. Mbaŋa thavala thɨ kururu emunjoru ne thɨ kururuwe Bwebwe weiye lenji gharevatomwe emunjoru kaiwae thiye Bwebwe i tamwetamwe weŋgi na thɨ kururuwe.
43004024	Loi iye Nyao na thavala thɨ kururuwe, thɨ kururuwe e unenji weiye lenji gharevatomwe emunjoru ŋgoreiya Loi ghaghareghare emunjoru.”
43004025	Elama iŋa, “Ya ghareghare Mesaiya iye thɨ uno Krais tene i mena. Mbaŋa ne i mena amba i vamanjamanjalaŋa bigibigike wolaghɨye weime.”
43004026	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Lolona iya u utuutu kaiwaena mbema iya ghinokeni, iya vara ya utuutuke e ghen mbaŋake iyake.”
43004027	E mbaŋako iyako gharaghambuma thɨ rakanjoghawe, na gharenji i yo laghɨye moli kaiwae thɨ thuwe i utuutu weiye wevo eunda. Ko ma regha mun i vaito iŋa, “Nuwaniya budakai?” o “Buda kaiwae u utu wein elake?”
43004028	Elama i iteta mbwama variye, i njogha thotho na i dage weŋgiya ghembako gharɨgharɨniye iŋa,
43004029	“Wo hu rakamena na vohu thuwe amala regha, me utugiyavao weŋgo bigibigima wolaghɨye va ya vakathaŋgi na i rereya. Mbwata mbema Mesaiya amalaghɨniye?”
43004030	Thɨ rakaraŋgi na thɨ rakarakamenawe Jisas.
43004031	E mbaŋaniye gharaghambu thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, wo u ghanɨŋga.”
43004032	Ko iyemaeŋge i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ghaŋgu kaero ma ghan, ko ghemi ma hu ghareghare mun.”
43004033	Gharaghambuma thɨ veutu weŋgi thɨŋa, “Mbwata lolo regha me bigimena ghanɨŋgawe?”
43004034	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ghaŋgu mbe regha eŋge, ya ghambugha thela va i variyeŋgo le renuwaŋa na ya vakathavao kaiwoke iyava i woveŋgoke na ya kaiwoŋa.
43004035	Thare hu ghareghare utuke iya huŋake, ‘Manjala ma umbovarɨ eŋge kaero uloulo ghambaŋa.’ Ko ya dage e ghemi hu tateya maramina na hu thuwe umako tɨne. Ghanɨŋgako kaero thɨ mweghe na kaero nuwaiya tɨtɨvoreŋa.
43004036	Ratɨtɨko i mbana modae na i vatha yawalɨ memeghabananiye ghanɨŋganiye, iya kaiwae rakabukabu na ratɨtɨ ne thɨ warari na regha.
43004037	Iyake kaiwae utuutuke iyake emunjoru, iya iŋake, ‘Regha i kabughathɨ na regha i tɨghathɨ.’
43004038	Ma variyeŋga na vohu tɨghɨ e uma mava hu kabu. Gharɨgharɨ vavana lenji ghairo une na ghemi hu vaidiya ghathovuye.”
43004039	Sameriya gharɨgharɨniye lemoyo e ghembako iyako tɨne thɨ loŋweghathɨgha Jisas kaiwae wevoko meŋa, “Me utugiyavao e ghino bigibigike wolaghɨye va ya vakatha na i rereya.”
43004040	Iya kaiwae mbaŋa thɨ rakamenawe, mbe thɨ naŋgowe na wo thɨ yaku weinji. Mbaŋa theghewo i yaku,
43004041	na le vavaghareko kaiwae gharɨgharɨ lemoyo thɨ loŋweghathɨ.
43004042	Thɨ dagewe elama thɨŋa, “Kaero wo loŋweghathɨ mbaŋake, ma lama rɨghe kaiwae budakaiya mo utugiya weime, nandere, ko kaiwae mbe ghime vara ghamamberegha mo loŋwe e yanawameke, na wo ghareghare mbema emunjoru amalaghɨniye yambaneke gha Ravamoru.”
43004043	Le yaku mbaŋa theghewoko e ghereiye, kaero i wareriva, i wa Galili.
43004044	Jisas ghamberegha ghalɨŋae, va iŋa, “Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, iye le vanautuma gharɨgharɨniye mane thɨ yavwatatawana.”
43004045	Mbaŋa i vutha Galili, gharɨgharɨ e valɨvaŋgako iyako thɨ vaŋguvatha, kaiwae va thɨ thuwe le vakathaŋgiko ghamba rotaele wolaghɨye Thaga Valaŋani va ghambaŋa Jerusalem e tɨne, kaiwae thiye vambe inanjiva gheko.
43004046	E le loŋgako tɨne i wa Kena Galili e tɨne. E ghembake iyake iyava i vɨva mbwama na i tabo na waen. Giyanduŋenduŋe regha va ina gheko, nariye i ghambwera, ina Kapenaom.
43004047	Mbaŋa amalake iyake i loŋwe Jisas kaero i iteta Judiya na ma ina Galili, i wa na ve naŋgowe na weiye thɨ wa Kapenaom na ve thawariya nariye, yawaliye ma vama molao.
43004048	Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “Ghemi thoŋgo ma hu thuwe vakatha ghamba rotaele regha e maramina na i wo nuwami, mane hu loŋweghathɨ.”
43004049	Amalama i gonjoghawe iŋa, “O amalana, u mena ra wa, ne iwaeŋge naruŋguko i mare.”
43004050	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ma u wa eŋge, narunɨna kaero riwae i thovuyeva.” Amalama i loŋweghathɨgha Jisas ghalɨŋaeko kaero i njoghava.
43004051	Vamba i loŋgaloŋga e kamwathɨ mborowa, le rakakaiwo kaero thɨ lavolevole, thɨ womena totowe thɨŋa, “Naruma kaero riwae i thovuye.”
43004052	I govaitoŋgi thembaŋa vara riwae kaero me thovuye, thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Menda wan klok yeghɨyeghɨye ghambwera kaero i kowe.”
43004053	Amalama kaero i renuwaŋakiki menda e mbaŋako vara iyako i dagewe iŋa, “Naruna mane i mare.” Iya kaiwae amalaghɨniye na le ŋgoloko gharayakuyakuko wolaghɨye thɨ loŋweghathɨ.
43004054	Jisas le vakathake vakatha ghamba rotaele theghewoniye le njoghama Judiya e ghereiye na i mena Galili.
43005001	Iyake e ghereiye Jisas i voro Jerusalem Jiu lenji thaga regha kaiwae.
43005002	Ghambaru regha ina Jerusalem idae Sip le ghamba ru. E ghamba ruke iyake ghadidiye mbwa regha, weiye yaŋavaŋgavaŋga ŋgolo lima inanji mbwako ghadidiye. Vaŋa Hibru thɨ uno Betɨsaida.
43005003	Gharɨgharɨ lemoyo va e ghanjighambwera lenji ghamba yaku. Ghambwera ŋgoranjiŋgiya mara kwaghe, kuvokuvo na riwanji i gheroro. Va thɨ roghagha mbwako na the valɨvaŋga i bobovirɨ,
43005004	kaiwae mbe ghambaŋa, ŋgoreiya mbaŋa theghewo iya e ghereiye amba Giya le nyao thovuye i nja e mbwako tɨne na i vakatha mbwako i bobovirɨ. The ghambweghambwera regha i vivakai i nja e mbwako tɨne iyako e ghereiye na the ghambwera inawe kaero i kowe na riwae i thovuye.
43005005	Amala regha va ina gheko, iye va i ghambweravoreŋa theghathegha ghweto na umbowa.
43005006	Mbaŋa Jisas i vaidi gheko, na i ghareghare vambe tamwarau i vaidiya ghambwerako iyako, i dagewe iŋa, “Thare nuwaniya riwana i thovuye?”
43005007	Ghambweghambwerama i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Amalana, ma lolo regha ina gheke na i thalavuŋgo ya nja e mbwake tɨne mbaŋa i bobovirɨ. Mbaŋa amba ya rorovurɨgheghe kaiwae lolo regha kaero i njakai e ghamwaŋgu.”
43005008	Amba Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “U yondovirɨ! U bigivaira ghambana ghavwarara na u loŋga.”
43005009	E mbaŋako iyako amalama riwae kaero i thovuye, i bigivaira ghambaema ghavwarara na i loŋga. Mbaŋako iyava bigiko iyako i yomarawe Jiu ghanjimbaŋa kururu Sabat.
43005010	Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ dagewe amalama iya riwaema kaero i thovuye thɨŋa, “Noroke mbaŋa kururu na ma mbaro i vatomwe e ghen na u mbana ghambana ghavwarara.”
43005011	Ko iyemaeŋge i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Amalake iya me vakathaŋgo na ya thovuye me dage e ghino meŋa, ‘U mbana ghambana ghavwarara na u loŋga.’ ”
43005012	Thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Thela iya loloke me dageke e ghen na u mbana ghambana ghavwarara na u loŋga?”
43005013	Amalama mava i ghareghare thela iya me dagekowe, kaiwae wabwiko va i laghɨye na Jisas vama i ruwo tɨnenji.
43005014	E ghereiye vena Jisas ve vaidi e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne na iŋa, “Wo u thuwe, riwana kaero i thovuyeva. Thama te u vakavakathava tharɨ ne iwaeŋge u vaidiya vuyowo laghɨye moli.”
43005015	Amalama i wa na ve utuutu weŋgiya Jiu lenji randeviva, iŋa Jisas iya mendava i vakathaŋgo na riwaŋguke i thovuye.
43005016	Kaiwae Jisas va i vakathaŋgiya bigibigike thiyake e ghanjimbaŋa kururu, Jiu lenji randeviva va thɨ vakatha na i vaidiya vɨrɨniye.
43005017	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Bwebwe iye i kaiwo valaŋa na ghino tembe ŋgoreiyeva, ya vakatha kaiwoke iyake.”
43005018	Le utuko ŋgoreiyako kaiwae Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ rovurɨgheghe, nuwanjiya thɨ unɨghɨ. Ma mbe e ghanjimbaŋa kururu eŋge kaiwae ko kaiwae vambe iŋava amalaghɨniye ramaya Loi na i munjeva mboromboro weiye Loi.
43005019	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, Loi Nariya ghino ma valɨkaiwaŋgu na ne ya vakatha bigi regha mbe ghino eŋge elo renuwaŋa; mbe ya vakatha eŋge budakaiya ya thuwe Bwebwe i vakavakatha, kaiwae the bigiya Bwebwe i vakatha ghino tembe ya vakathava.
43005020	Kaiwae Bwebwe i gharethovuŋgo na i vatomwe e ghino bigibigike wolaghɨye amalaghɨniye i vakavakatha. Ŋgoreiye, gharemi ne i yo kaiwae ne i vatomwe weya Nariye ghino vakatha laghɨlaghɨye na ya vakathaŋgi na ne i kivwalaŋgiya thiyake.
43005021	Bwebwe iŋa na ramaremare thɨ rakathuweiru na i giya yawalinji; iyake tembe ŋgoreiyeva Nariyeke ghino ya giya yawalɨwa thela lo renuwaŋake nuwaiya ya giyawe.
43005022	Bwebwe ma i ghatha lolo regha, ko vama i wogiya ghathako ghambaroko wolaghɨye e ghino,
43005023	mbala gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye thɨ yavwatata wanaŋgo ŋgoreiya thɨ yavwatatawana Bwebwe. Thela thoŋgo ma i yavwatata wanaŋgo, ma i yavwatatawana Bwebwe, iye va i variyeŋgo.”
43005024	“Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thela thoŋgo i loŋwe lo utuŋgike na i loŋweghathɨgha thela iyava i variyeŋgoke, kaero i vaidiya yawaliye memeghabananiye. Loi mane i ghatha, ko kaero i iteta mare le valɨvaŋga na kaero ina yawalɨ ele valɨvaŋga.
43005025	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, mbaŋa maiya i menamenake, ko kaero ina gheke, mbaŋa thavala yawalinji i mare ne thɨ loŋwe Loi Nariye ghalɨŋae, na thavala ne thɨ loŋwe na thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiye, ne e yawayawalinji.
43005026	Kaiwae Bwebwe iye yawalɨ rɨghethoru, tembe ŋgoreiyeva va i vakathaŋgo Nariyeke ghino na yawalɨ rɨghethoru.
43005027	Na kaiwae Lolo Nariya ghino, kaerova i vatomwe e ghino ghatha ghambaro.”
43005028	“Gharemi thava i yo utuutuke iyake kaiwae: kaiwae mbaŋa maiya i menamenake, mbaŋa thavala kaerova thiya mare ne thɨ loŋwe ghalɨŋae
43005029	na thɨ rakathuweiru e ghabubunji. Thavala lenji vakatha va i thovuye ne thɨ thuweiru na e yawayawalinji, na thavala lenji vakatha va i tharɨ ne thɨ thuweiru na thɨ wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋgi.
43005030	Mbe wombereghake eŋge ma valɨkaiwaŋgu na ne ya vakatha bigi regha. Ya ghatha lolo ŋgoreiya Bwebwe le woveŋgo, iya kaiwae thoŋgo ya ghatha lolo mbe ya dageŋa vara emunjoru kaiwae ma nuwaŋguiya ya vakatha ŋgoreiya ghino lo renuwaŋa nandere, ko ya vakatha eŋge ŋgoreiya thela i variyeŋgo le renuwaŋa.”
43005031	“Thoŋgo mbe ya utuŋa vara wombereghake utuniŋgu tha hu wovatha lo renuwaŋake na huŋa emunjoru,
43005032	ko lolo regha mbe inawe, iye i utuutu ghino kaiwaŋgu, ya ghareghare budakaiya i utuŋa ghino kaiwaŋgu, iyake utu emunjoru.
43005033	Hu variyeŋgiya lemi ravandevandeŋa weya Jon na budakaiya i utuŋa ghino kaiwaŋgu iyake utu emunjoru.
43005034	Ma ya ndeghathɨ gharɨgharɨ lenji utu ghino kaiwaŋgu, ko ya ravairɨ eŋge na mbala hu vaidiya vamoru weya Loi.
43005035	Jon iye va ŋgoreiya theŋgi i ra na i woya. Iya kaiwae va hu yavovoŋa le utuko mbaŋa ubotu.”
43005036	“Lo vakatha i woraŋgiya mbema emunjoru thela ghino, na iyake i laghɨye kivwala budakaiya Jon va i woraŋgiya mbaŋa i utuutu ghino kaiwaŋgu. Kaiwae iya vara kaiwoke Bwebwe va i wogiyake e ghino na ya vakatha vun, i woraŋgiya mbema emunjoru Bwebwe va i variyeŋgo.
43005037	Na Bwebwe, iye va i variyeŋgo, tembe ghambereghava i utuŋava emunjoru ghino kaiwaŋgu. Mava hu ndeloŋwe mun ghalɨŋae na mava hu ndethuwe mun ghayamoyamo,
43005038	na le utuko ma i yaku e gharemina, kaiwae ma hu loŋweghathɨ thela va i variye.
43005039	Hu thuweghatharaŋa Buk Boboma, kaiwae hu renuwaŋa na huŋa ne hu vaidiya yawalɨ memeghabananiye. Ŋgoreiye, utuutuŋgiko thiyako thɨ utuutu ghino kaiwaŋgu.
43005040	Ko hu botewo hu loŋweghathɨŋgo na hu vaidiya yawalimi memeghabananiye.”
43005041	“Ma yaŋa gharɨgharɨ mbala thɨ taraweŋaŋgo,
43005042	ko iyemaeŋge ya ghareghare wagiyaweŋga. Ya ghareghare, Loi ghagharethovu ma ina e gharemina.
43005043	Va ya mena Bwebwe e idae, na ma hu wovathaŋgo, ko thoŋgo lolo regha i mena mbe ghamberegha e idae, ne hu vaŋguvatha.
43005044	Ŋgoroŋga ne huŋa eŋge na hu loŋweghathɨ, thoŋgo hu warariŋa mbe ghemi eŋge hu vetarataraweŋga, ko ma hu rovurɨghegheŋa hu vaidiya tarawa i mena weya Loi mbe ghamberegha eŋge?”
43005045	“Thava lemi renuwaŋa huŋava ghino ne ya utuŋa lemi tharɨŋgina Bwebwe e marae. Lemi rawonjowe iye Mosese kaiwae iye hu woraweya ghamidi.
43005046	Ko iyemaeŋge thoŋgo hu loŋweghathɨgha Mosese ne hu loŋweghathɨŋgo kaiwae iye va i rorori ghino kaiwaŋgu.
43005047	Ko kaiwae ma hu loŋweghathɨ budakaiya va i rorinjoŋa, ŋgoroŋga ne huŋa na hu loŋweghathɨgha budakaiya ghino ya utuŋa?”
43006001	Mbaŋa vavana e ghereiye, Jisas i womalawa Galili Njighɨniye valɨvaŋga. Idae mbe reghava Njighɨ Taibiriyas.
43006002	Wabwi laghɨye regha thɨ rakareghambawe kaiwae va thɨ thuwe le vakathako ghamba rotaele weŋgiya ghambweghambwera.
43006003	Amba Jisas i voro e ou nasiye regha na i yaku weiyaŋgiya gharaghambu.
43006004	(Thaga Valaŋani ghambaŋa ma vama bwagabwaga.)
43006005	Iya kaiwae mbaŋa Jisas i tagathɨna marae na i thuwe wabwi laghɨye thɨ rakarakamena, i dagewe Pilip iŋa, “Aŋga ne vara vamoda bred gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye thiyake kaiwanji?”
43006006	I utu ŋgoreiyako na i mando Pilip, kaiwae amalaghɨniye vama i ghareghare ne i vakatha budakai.
43006007	Pilip i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Othembe silva gethɨseriyeiwo (200) ne ra mban na ra vamodo bred, na ra viya na nanasiye iya thɨ ghan ne laghɨyeninjiya bada.”
43006008	Gharaghambuko regha, Endru, Saimon Pita ghaghae, iŋa,
43006009	“Ŋgama ghɨmoru regha ina gheke, ghabred mbumbulima i mena e ghanɨŋga regha idae bali, na borogi nanasiye umboiwo. Ko ŋgoroŋgako gharerenuwaŋa weŋgi vara gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye?”
43006010	Jisas iŋa, “Hu dage weŋgi na thiya yaku.” E valɨvaŋgako iyako nana va i pokuwe. Gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye thiya yaku; ghɨmoghɨmoru lenji ghanaghanagha va ŋgoreiya paeb tausan.
43006011	Jisas i mbana bredɨma, i vata ago weya Loi ghanɨŋgako kaiwae, na i giya weŋgiya gharɨgharɨko va thiya yakuko. I vakatha borogima tembe ŋgoreiyeva. Thiya ghanɨŋga ŋgoreiya ghanjighad.
43006012	Mbaŋa vama thiya ghanɨthigha, Jisas i dage weŋgiya gharaghambu iŋa, “Hu mbanɨvathavathaŋgiya methɨ ghanɨvareŋgina na thava ra vakowana.”
43006013	Thɨ mbanɨvanjaraŋgiya nambonambo ŋgamwayaworo na ŋgamwaiwo, iya bredɨma mbumbulima vaŋgovaŋgothiye gharɨgharɨma methɨ ghanɨvareŋgi.
43006014	Mbaŋa thɨ thuwe le vakathako ghamba rotaele iyako thɨŋa, “Mbema emunjoru, amalaghɨniye Loi ghalɨŋaema gharautu, iya bukuma i woraŋgiya, ne i njama e yambaneke.”
43006015	Jisas kaero i ghareghare thɨ munjeva thɨ mena thɨ vaŋgu na thɨ vavurɨghegheŋa na thɨ vakatha na kiŋ, i iteteŋgi na mbowo i njoghava e ouko ghamberegha moli.
43006016	Mbaŋa vama ilimomouwo gharaghambu vethɨ rakanja e njighɨko ghadidiye na thɨ roroghagha Jisas.
43006017	Ko iyemaeŋge mbaŋa i gou na Jisas mamba i mena weŋgi, vethɨ rakatha e waŋga, thɨ womalawa na thɨ wa Kapenaom.
43006018	Ndewendewe i rowo vurɨgheghe na njighɨko tɨne i robagodu.
43006019	Vama vethɨ wodowodo na lenji bwagabwaga kaero ŋgoreiya kilomita theghelima o kilomita theghewa, amba thɨ thuwe Jisas i loŋga ghembeŋgi e njighɨko vwatae. I vakathaŋgi na thɨ mararu laghɨye.
43006020	Ko amba i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Tha huya mararu; ghino Jisas.”
43006021	Thɨ warari na weinji e waŋgako na e mbaŋako vara iyako vethɨ govutha vanatɨna, e ghembako iya methɨ ghembeko.
43006022	Mbaŋambaŋa vena wabwima vambe thiya yakuma e valɨvaŋgako iyako, kaero thɨ renuwaŋa waŋga mbe waŋgara eŋge menda ina gheko, na Jisas ma menda i thawe weiyaŋgiya gharaghambu, ko menda mbe thiye eŋge vara thɨ raka.
43006023	Amba waŋgawaŋga vavana thɨ rakaru, thɨ rakamena e ghemba idae Taibiriyas. Thiya goru valɨghadidiye regha ŋgora menda gharɨgharɨma thɨ ghana bredɨma mbaŋa menda Giya i vata agowe kaiwae.
43006024	Mbaŋa wabwiko kaero thɨ ghareghare Jisas na tembe ŋgoreiye gharaghambu ma ma inanji gheko, thɨ rakatha e waŋgawaŋgako thiyako na thɨ raka Kapenaom, thɨ tamwembela amalaghɨniye.
43006025	Mbaŋa gharɨgharɨma thɨ vaidiya Jisas e njighɨko valɨvaŋga, thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, thembaŋa mo menake gheke?”
43006026	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, lemi tamwe mbeleŋgo ma rɨghethoru kaiwae hu ghareghare vakathaŋgiko ghamba rotaele ya vakathaŋgi, nandere, ko rɨghethoru kaiwae menda hu ghanɨŋgiya bredɨma na kaero valɨkaiwami moli.
43006027	Tha hu rovurɨgheghe ghanɨŋgake iya le yakuke ma molao kaiwae, ko iyemaeŋge hu rovurɨgheghe ghanɨŋga e yawayawaliye na ne i meghabana kaiwae. Ghanɨŋgako iyako Lolo Nariye ghino ne ya giya weŋga, kaiwae Loi Ramanda kaerova i giya mbarowe na i vakatha.”
43006028	Amba thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Ne wo vakatha budakai na wo kaiwoŋa the kaiwo Loi nuwaiya wo vakatha?”
43006029	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Loi le kaiwo iyake: hu loŋweghathɨgha iye amalaghɨniye va i variye.”
43006030	Thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “The vakatha ghamba rotaele ne u vakatha na wo thuwe e marameke ambane valɨkaiwae wo loŋweghathɨŋge? Ne u vakatha budakai?
43006031	Orumburumbume me vivako moli methɨ ghana ghanɨŋga regha idae ‘manna’ e njamnjam, ŋgoreiya buk le utu iŋa, ‘I giya bred weŋgi i mena e buruburu na thɨ ghan.’ ”
43006032	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ma Mosese ŋgoreiye iyava i giya bredɨna weŋga i mena e buruburu, ko iyemaeŋge Bwebwe, iye iya i giya bredɨna emunjoru weŋga i mena e buruburu.
43006033	Kaiwae bred i mena weya Loi iya amalaghɨniye va i variye na i njama e buruburu. Iye i giya yambaneke yawaliye.”
43006034	Thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Amalana, u giya bredɨke iyake weime mbaŋake wolaghɨye.”
43006035	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ghino ghanɨŋga e yawayawaliye. Thela thoŋgo i mena e ghino mane bada i gharɨ, na thela thoŋgo i loŋweghathɨŋgo mane mbwa i gharɨ.
43006036	Kaero ya dage weŋga, othembe va hu thuweŋgo mamba hu loŋweghathɨŋgo.
43006037	Taulaghɨko iya Bwebwe i giyako e ghino ne thɨ mena e ghino, na thela thoŋgo i mena e ghino mane ya botewoyathu.
43006038	Kaiwae va ya njama e buruburu ma ya mena ya vakatha ghino lo renuwaŋa, nandere, ya mena ya vakatha thela i variyeŋgo le renuwaŋa.
43006039	Iyava i variyeŋgoke le renuwaŋa iyake, mbala thava ya thɨvaiya regha iyava i giyake e ghino, ko ya vaŋguthuweiruvaoŋgi na e yawayawalinji mbaŋa ne ele ghambako.
43006040	Kaiwae Bwebwe le renuwaŋa ŋgoreiye, thela thoŋgo i thuwe Nariye na i loŋweghathɨ, ne i vaidiya yawaliye memeghabananiye, na ne ya vaŋguvairɨŋgi na e yawayawalinji mbaŋa ne ele ghambako.”
43006041	Jiu lenji randeviva mbe thiye eŋge thɨ liya ghautu kaiwae va iŋa, “Ghino bred ya mena e buruburu.”
43006042	Thɨŋa, “Emunjoru iye Jisas, Josep nariye. Ra ghareghareŋgiya ramae na tɨnae. Ŋgoroŋga eŋge na iya meŋake, ‘Ya mena e buruburu?’ ”
43006043	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Tha ghanjiliutu mbe ghemi eŋge.
43006044	Ma lolo regha valɨkaiwae i mena e ghino, thoŋgo Bwebwe iyava i variyeŋgoke ma i vaŋgumena e ghino; na ne ya vaŋguthuweiru na e yawayawaliye mbaŋa ne ele ghambako.
43006045	Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu regha va i roriya iyake: ‘Loi tene i vavaghareŋgiya taulaghɨko.’ Thela i vandeŋe Bwebwe na i thuwe valawe, iye i mena e ghino.
43006046	Ma gharerenuwaŋa ŋgoreiye lolo regha i thuwathuwa weya Bwebwe; ko mbe loloko eŋge iya i mena weya Loi, mbe amalaghɨniye eŋge va i thuwathuwa weya Bwebwe.
43006047	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thela i loŋweghathɨ ne i vaidiya yawaliye memeghabananiye.
43006048	Ghino ghanɨŋga e yawayawaliye.
43006049	Orumburumbumi va thɨ ghana manna e njamnjam, ko iyemaeŋge tevambe thɨ mareva.
43006050	Ko ghanɨŋgake iya i menake e buruburu mbe regha, thoŋgo thela i ghan ne yawaliye i meghabana.
43006051	Ghino ghanɨŋga e yawayawaliye na va ya mena e buruburu. Thoŋgo thela i ghana ghanɨŋgake iyake ne i vaidiya yawalɨ memeghabananiye. Ghanɨŋgake iyake mbunɨmaniŋguke, ne ya vatomwe yambaneke yawaliye memeghabananiye kaiwae.”
43006052	Jiu mbe thiye eŋge weinji lenji ghatemuru thɨ veutu weŋgi thɨŋa, “Ne ŋgoroŋga na amalake i giya mbunɨmaniye weinda na ra ghan?”
43006053	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thoŋgo ma hu ghan Lolo Nariye mbunɨmaniye na ma hu mun madɨbae, ghemi mane e yawayawalimi.
43006054	Thela thoŋgo i ghana mbunɨmaniŋgu na i muna madɨbaŋgu i wo yawaliye memeghabananiye, na ne ya vaŋguthuweiru mbaŋa ele ghambako.
43006055	Kaiwae mbunɨmaniŋguke iye ghanɨŋga moli na madɨbaŋgu iye mbwa moli.
43006056	Thela thoŋgo i ghana mbunɨmaniŋgu na i muna madɨbaŋgu, iye i yaku e ghino na ghino ya yakuwe.
43006057	Bwebwe e yawayawaliye va i variyeŋgo, iya kaiwae ghino tembe e yawayawaliŋguva. Tembe ŋgoreiyeva thela i vaŋamwe ghamberegha e ghino ne ya wogiya yawalɨ memeghabananiyewe.
43006058	Ghanɨŋgake iyake iyava i menama e buruburu. Orumburumbunda va thɨ ghana manna, ko iyemaeŋge va thɨ mare, ko thela thoŋgo i ghana ghanɨŋgake iyake mane i mare ne yawaliye i meghabana mbaŋake wolaghɨye.”
43006059	Va i utuŋa iyake mbaŋa va i vavaghare Kapenaom e ŋgolo kururu tɨne.
43006060	Mbaŋa gharaghambuko vavana thɨ loŋwe iyake thɨŋa, “Vavaghareke iyake i vurɨgheghe. Thela ne valɨkaiwae i wovathako?”
43006061	Va i ghareghare gharaghambu thɨ liliya utu renuwaŋake iyake utuniye, amba i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga, mbwata lo utuutuke i varerenuwaŋaŋga na i vakatha na hu ndenjogha.
