43006062	Ne ŋgoroŋga gharerenuwaŋa thoŋgo hu thuwe Lolo Nariye i njogha na tembe ve yakuva e buruburu?
43006063	Loi Une i giya yawalɨ; vurɨgheghe i mena lolo mane i giya bigi regha. Utuutuŋgiko iyava ya utuŋako weŋga i vakathaŋga na hu wo Loi Une na iye i giya yawalɨ.
43006064	Ko iyemaeŋge vavana ghemi ma hu loŋweghathɨ.” Kaiwae Jisas va i ghareghare ŋgora vambe i rikowe, thavala mava thɨ loŋweghathɨ na thela ghaliliva.
43006065	I gotubwe iŋa, “Iyake iyava kaiwae ya dage e ghemi, ma valɨkaiwae lolo regha i mena e ghino thoŋgo ma Bwebwe iŋa valɨkaiwae i vakatha ŋgoreiye.”
43006066	Iyako e ghereiye gharaghambuko lemoyo thiya ronjogha na ma thɨ ghambu.
43006067	I vaitoŋgiya theyaworo na theghewoma iŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga ghemi, nuwamiya tembe hu iteteŋgova?”
43006068	Saimon Pita i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Giyana, ne wo wa weya thela? Utuutu e yawayawaliye na ne i meghabana inanji e ghen.
43006069	Kaero wo loŋweghathɨ na wo ghareghare ghen Raboboma na u mena weya Loi.”
43006070	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Va ya tuthiŋga themiyaworo na themighewona iyemaeŋge ghemina regha iye seitan.”
43006071	Iyako Judas, iye Saimon Isakariyot nariye utuniye. Othembe amalaghɨniye gharaghambuko theyaworo na theghewoko regha, muyai tembe i vatomweva.
43007001	Iyake e ghereiye, Jisas i vaghɨliya e ghemba na ghemba Galili e tɨne. Mava nuwaiya i vaghɨliya Judiya kaiwae Jiu lenji randeviva va nuwanjiya thɨ unɨghɨ.
43007002	Yoŋathowathowa gha Thaga vama i ghenethai.
43007003	Iya kaiwae Jisas oghaghae thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “U iteta valɨvaŋgake iyake na u wa Judiya na mbala ghanɨraghambuko thɨ thuweya len vakathaŋgina ghamba rotaele.
43007004	Ma lolo regha i wothuwela le vakatha thoŋgo nuwaiya idae i laghɨye. Ko iyake, kaiwae u vakathaŋgiya bigibigike thiyake, tembe u woraŋgiyaŋge ghanɨmberegha gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye weŋgi e yambaneke laghɨye na thɨ thuwe.”
43007005	Othembe oghaghaeko ma lenji loŋweghathɨ va inawe.
43007006	Iya kaiwae Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Wo mbaŋa moli mamba i mena. Ko ghemi mbema ghamimbaŋa eŋge mbaŋake wolaghɨye.
43007007	Ghemi rameyambane mane thɨ botewoŋga, ko ghino eŋge thɨ botewoŋgo, kaiwae ya utuŋa lenji tharɨ utuninji.
43007008	Ghemi eŋge hu wa e thagako iyako. Ghino amba mane ya wa kaiwae ghino wo mbaŋa moli mamba i mena.”
43007009	I utuvao iyake weŋgi, ko iyemaeŋge amalaghɨniye mbowo i reyakuva Galili.
43007010	Mbaŋa oghaghae vama thɨ wa e thagako rɨghe, amalaghɨniye tembe i rereghambava weŋgi, ko iyemaeŋge mava lolo regha i ghareghare, va i loŋga thuwethuwele.
43007011	E mbaŋako iyako Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ tamwetamwewe e thagako iyako tɨne na thɨ vavaito thɨŋa, “Amalake iyake aŋga inae?”
43007012	E wabwiko tɨne gharɨgharɨ thɨ vevaŋaewi weŋgi Jisas kaiwae, vavana thɨŋa, “Amalaghɨniye lolo thovuye,” na vavana thɨŋa, “Nandere, i yaroŋgiya gharɨgharɨ.”
43007013	Ko iyemaeŋge ma lolo regha i uturaŋgiya utuniye kaiwae va thɨ mararuŋgiya Jiu lenji randeviva.
43007014	Thagako iyako vama e mborowa amba Jisas i wa e Ŋgolo Boboma ghayayayao tɨne na ve vavagharewe.
43007015	Jiu lenji randeviva gharenji i yo laghɨye na thɨŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga na amalake iyake le ghareghare i laghɨye? Ra munje va i ru e ghamba vavaona regha e tɨne.”
43007016	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Lo vavaghareke ma i mena weŋgo wombereghake, ko i menawe thela iye va i variyeŋgo.
43007017	Thoŋgo thela i vatomwe ghare na i vakatha Loi le renuwaŋa, ne i vaidiya lo vavaghareke aŋga i mena, i menawe Loi o i mena wombereghake elo renuwaŋa tɨne.
43007018	Thela thoŋgo i utuŋa ghamberegha le renuwaŋa, i vakatha ŋgoreiyako na mbala gharɨgharɨ thɨ wovorevoreŋa idae. Ko thela thoŋgo nuwaiya gharɨgharɨ thɨ wovorevoreŋa thela va i variye idae iye lolo emunjoru na ma kwan regha inawe.
43007019	Mava Mosese i giya mbaro weŋga? Ko iyemaeŋge ma regha i vikikiya mbaroko iyako. Budakai kaiwae na nuwamiya hu unɨghɨŋgo?”
43007020	Wabwiko thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Nyao raitharɨ ina e ghen. Thela i mando na i unɨghɨŋge?”
43007021	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Mendava ya vakatha vakatha ghamba rotaele regha na gharemi i yo laghɨye.
43007022	Mosese va iŋa na hu tenɨŋgiya lemi ŋgaŋga ghɨmoghɨmoru riwanji mbothiye (emunjoru iyake mava i ri weya Mosese, va i ri weŋgiya olemi elaghɨ). Iyake hu vakatha Sabat e tɨne.
43007023	Thoŋgo thɨ kitena ŋgama ghɨmoru regha riwae mbothiye Sabat e tɨne, mbala ma thɨ raka Mosese le mbaro, na buda kaiwae eŋge na hu gaithɨ wanaŋgo kaiwae ya thawariya amala na riwae i thovuye e Sabat?”
43007024	“Tha hu thuweŋgiya ghamune ghanjiyamoyamo na hu ghathaŋgiwe, mbe hu ghathaŋgi iyaŋganiye i thovuye Loi e marae.”
43007025	E mbaŋako iyako gharɨgharɨ vavana Jerusalem e tɨne thɨŋa, “Amalake iya nuwanjiya thɨ unɨghɨ iya amalaghɨniyeko?
43007026	Wo hu thuwe, i utu gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye e maranji na la randevivake thiya rotaele na ma e ghalɨghalɨŋanji. Mbwata kaero thɨŋa mbema emunjoru amalaghɨniye Mesaiya, ae?
43007027	Ko iyemaeŋge taulaghɨke ghinda ra ghareghare amalake iyake aŋga i mena. Mbaŋa Mesaiya ne i mena, ma lolo regha ne i ghareghare aŋga i mena.”
43007028	Iya kaiwae mbaŋa Jisas amba i vavaghare e Ŋgolo Boboma ghayayao tɨne, i dage na ghalɨŋae laghɨye iŋa, “Emunjoru, hu ghareghareŋgo na hu ghareghare aŋga ya mena. Ma vambe wombereghake eŋge elo renuwaŋa na ya mena gheke, ko thela va i variyeŋgo iye valɨkaiwae lemi vareminje laghɨye inawe. Ghemi ma hu ghareghare thela amalaghɨniye,
43007029	ko iyemaeŋge ghino ya ghareghare wagiyawe kaiwae ghino ya menawe na amalaghɨniye va i variyeŋgo.”
43007030	E mbaŋako iyako thɨ mando na thɨ munje thɨ yalawe, ko ma lolo regha i lirawe nɨmaewe kaiwae ma vamba ghambaŋa moli.
43007031	Ko iyemaeŋge gharɨgharɨ lemoyo e wabwiko tɨne vamba ma thɨ loŋweghathɨ. Va thɨŋa, “Mbaŋa Mesaiya ne i mena, mbene le vakathaŋgiko ghamba rotaele i kivwala amalake iyake?”
43007032	Parisi vavana thɨ loŋwevaidiya gharɨgharɨ mbema thɨ vaŋaewiŋa eŋge bigibigike thiyake Jisas kaiwae, iwaeŋge ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Parisi thɨ variyeŋgiya Ŋgolo Boboma gharagatɨgat na vethɨ yalawe.
43007033	Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ma mbaŋa ubotu eŋge weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi kaero ya wa weya thela va i variyeŋgo.
43007034	Ne hu tamweŋgo ko iyemaeŋge mane hu vaidiŋgo. The valɨvaŋga ghino ne va yakuwe ma valɨkaiwami ne hu wawe.”
43007035	Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ vedage weŋgi thɨŋa, “Ko ne i wa e thevalɨvaŋga iya iŋake mane ra vaidi? Ne i wa weŋgiya Jiu thiye thɨ mebobwari Grik e tɨnenji na i vavaghare weŋgiya thiye ma Jiu?
43007036	Ŋgoroŋga gharerenuwaŋa iya meŋake, ‘Ne hu tamweŋgo, ko iyemaeŋge mane hu vaidiŋgo’ na iŋa, ‘The valɨvaŋga ghino ne va yakuwe ghemi mane valɨkaiwami hu wawe’?”
43007037	Mbaŋa kaero le ghambako na thagako ghambaŋa laghɨye moli, Jisas i ndeghathɨ na i dage e ghalɨŋae laghɨye iŋa, “Thela thoŋgo mbwa i gharɨ, valɨkaiwae i mena e ghino na i mun.
43007038	Ŋgoreiya Buk Boboma le woraŋgiya iya iŋake, ‘Thela thoŋgo i loŋweghathɨŋgo mbwa e yawayawaliye ne i voru raŋgima e yawaliye.’ ”
43007039	Jisas va iŋa ŋgoreiyako, va i utuuta Nyao Boboma kaiwae. Thavala ne thɨ loŋweghathɨgha Jisas Nyao Boboma ne i ru weŋgi. E mbaŋako iyako ma vamba i nja weŋgi kaiwae Jisas mamba i voro ele ghamba vwenyevwenye tɨne.
43007040	Gharɨgharɨ vavana e wabwiko tɨne, mbaŋa thɨ loŋwe Jisas i utuŋa ŋgoreiyako thɨŋa, “Mbema emunjoru amalake iyake Loi ghalɨŋaema gharautu.”
43007041	Vavana thɨŋa, “Iye Mesaiya.” Ko vavana thɨŋa, “Emunjoru Mesaiya ne i mena Galili? Nandere moli.
43007042	Buk Boboma kaero i woraŋgiya, Mesaiya iye Deivid rumbuye na ne i virɨ Betɨlehem, Deivid ghambae moli.”
43007043	Amalaghɨniye kaiwae wabwi i yomara.
43007044	Vavana nuwanjiya thɨ yalawe, ko iyemaeŋge ma lolo regha i vɨghathɨgha riwae.
43007045	Mbaŋa Ŋgolo Boboma gharagatɨgat thɨ rakanjogha, ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Parisi thɨ vaitoŋgi thɨŋa, “Buda kaiwae ma mohu vaŋgumena?”
43007046	Thɨ gonjogha weŋgi thɨŋa, “Amalake iyake le utu ma ŋgora vara gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye lenji utu.”
43007047	Parisi mbowo thɨ vaitoŋgiva thɨŋa, “Le utuko me wo nuwami, ae?
43007048	Thare randeviva ghime Parisi regha i loŋweghathɨgha lolona iyana? Nandere moli!
43007049	Ko wabwike laghɨye iyake ma thɨ ghareghare bigi regha Mosese le mbaro e tɨne. Loi tene i lithɨ ghatharɨ weŋgi.”
43007050	Parisi lenji wabwi loloniye regha idae Nikodimos, iye va gougou regha i wa weya Jisas, i dage weŋgiya ghauneko
43007051	iŋa, “La mbaro i woraŋgiya weinda ma valɨkaiwae iviva ra wovatharɨtharɨŋa lolo ko amba muyai i utu na ra vandeŋe na ra tamweya budakaiya me vakatha vatharɨ.”
43007052	Thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Ghen tembe u menava Galili, ae? U vaona Buk Boboma na u thuwe; mane Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu regha tene i menava Galili.”
43007053	Regha na regha thɨ rakanjogha e ghambaghambanji.
43008001	Ko Jisas va i wa Olivɨ e ghanji Ou.
43008002	Ighɨviya vena, vambe mbaŋambaŋa moli, Jisas i njogha e Ŋgolo Boboma ghayayao tɨne. Gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye thɨ meghɨliŋa, amba i yaku na i vavaghare weŋgi.
43008003	Mbaro gharavavaghare na Parisi thɨ vaŋguruwo wevo eunda. Thɨ vaidi i yathima. Thɨ vandeghathɨŋa e ghamwanji
43008004	na thɨ dagewe Jisas thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, wevoke iyake kaero wo vaidi i yathima weiye amala regha.
43008005	Ghinda la mbaro i menawe Mosese iŋa thoŋgo ra vaidiya wevo ŋgorake ra tagavamare e varɨ. Ghen ŋgoroŋga len renuwaŋa?”
43008006	Va thɨ utu na ŋgoreiyako kaiwae va nuwanjiya thɨ vaidiya le kwan amba ghawonjowe i menawe. Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas va i kururu na i rorori e thelauko vwatae e nɨmae kɨkiye,
43008007	na thiye mbe lenji vaito eŋge. Jisas i yondovirɨ amba i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Thoŋgo ghemina regha ma ele tharɨ, amalaghɨniye i dukai vara varɨwe.”
43008008	Mbowo i kururuva na i rorori e thelauko vwatae.
43008009	Mbaŋa thɨ loŋwe utuutu iyako, regha iya i raŋgi; matuwoŋgiko thɨ rakaraŋgikai. Jisas ghamberegha moli thɨ itete weiye wevoma mbe i ndendeghathɨ.
43008010	I wovaira ghamwae na i dagewe iŋa, “Elana, aŋgama inanji? Ma regha me ronjogha na i wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋge, ae?”
43008011	Iŋa, “Amalana, ma regha.” Jisas iŋa, “Ghino tembe ŋgoreiyeva, ma ya wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋge. U wa, thava tene mbaŋa reghava u vakatha tharɨ.”
43008012	Jisas mbowo i utuva weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ iŋa, “Ghino rameyambaneke lenji manjamanjala. Thela thoŋgo i ghambuŋgo, ne i vaidiya yawaliye ghamanjamanjala, ko mane mbaŋa regha i loŋga e momouwo.”
43008013	Parisi thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Tembe ghanɨmbereghava u utuŋa utunin. Iya kaiwae len utuna ma i emunjoru.”
43008014	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Othembe ya utuŋa wombereghake utuniŋgu, ko iyemaeŋge budakaiya ya utuŋa iye utu emunjoru, kaiwae ya ghareghare aŋgava ya mena na aŋgane ya reŋa. Ko ghemi ma hu ghareghare aŋgava ya mena o aŋgane ya reŋa.
43008015	Ghemi hu ghathaŋgo ŋgoreiya gharɨgharɨ lenji renuwaŋa, ko ghino ma ya ghatha lolo regha.
43008016	Ko iyemaeŋge thoŋgo ghino ya ghatha lolo na yaŋa i tharɨ lo ghathako iyako emunjoru kaiwae ma ghino womberegha ya ghatha, Bwebwe iye va i variyeŋgo, amalaghɨniye weiŋgu.
43008017	E lemi Mbarona tɨne va thɨ rori ŋgoreiye, thoŋgo gharɨgharɨ theghewo thɨŋa ŋgoreiye, lenji utuko utu emunjoru.
43008018	Regha maiyavara ghinoke, ya utu wombereghake kaiwaŋgu, na Bwebwe, iye va i variyeŋgo tembe i utuva ghino kaiwaŋgu.”
43008019	Thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Rama aŋga inae?” Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ma hu ghareghareŋgo na tembe ma hu ghareghareva Bwebwe. Thoŋgo hu ghareghareŋgo mbala tembe hu ghareghareva Bwebwe.”
43008020	Va i utuŋa utuutuŋgike thiyake mbaŋa va i vavaghare e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne, e valɨvaŋga ŋgora gharɨgharɨ lenji mwaewo mani ghaghamba bigirawe. Ko iyemaeŋge ma lolo regha i mando na i yalawe kaiwae ma vamba ghambaŋa.
43008021	Jisas mbowo i dageva weŋgi iŋa, “Nevole ya wareri, na nevole hu tamweŋgo, ko nevole huya mare lemi tharɨna kaiwanji. Ma valɨkaiwami hu wa ŋgora ghino ya wakewe.”
43008022	Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ vedage weŋgi thɨŋa, “Mbwatane i unɨgha ghamberegha iya kaiwae iŋake, ‘Ma valɨkaiwami hu wa ŋgora ghino ya wakewe’?”
43008023	I gotubwe iŋa, “Ghemi hu mena e ghembake iyake, ko ghino ya mena e ghembake yavoroke e buruburu. Ghemi hu mena e yambaneke, ko ghino ma ya mena e yambaneke.
43008024	Iya kaiwae ma dage weŋga na maŋa ne hu mare lemi tharɨ kaiwanji, thoŋgo ma hu loŋweghathɨ ghino, mbema iya ya utuŋaŋgoke, ne hu mare lemi tharɨ kaiwanji.”
43008025	Thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Thela ghen?” Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ghino mbema iyava ya utuuta utuniŋguma weŋga mbaŋa va ra rikowe na ra menake.
43008026	Renuwaŋa i ghanagha moli ina weŋgo na ya utuŋa kaiwami na ya wovatharɨtharɨŋaŋga. Ko thela iye va i variyeŋgo, iye vareminje inawe. Budakaiya va ya loŋwewe ya utuŋa weŋgiya rameyambane.”
43008027	Mava nuwanjiko i manjamanjala Jisas va i utuuta Ramae utuniye.
43008028	Iya kaiwae va iŋa, “Mbaŋa ne hu mwanavaira Lolo Nariye, amba ne hu ghareghare Ghino mbema iya ya utuŋaŋgoke. Ma ya vakatha bigi regha wombereghake, ko ya utuŋa budakaiya Bwebwe i vaghareŋgo na ya utuŋa.
43008029	Thela va i variyeŋgo iye weiŋgu; ma i roiteteŋgo na womberegha moli, kaiwae lo vakatha mbaŋake wolaghɨye i vakatha na i warari.”
43008030	Mbaŋa va i utuŋa utuutuŋgike thiyake, gharɨgharɨ lemoyo thɨ loŋweghathɨ.
43008031	Jisas i dage weŋgiya Jiu, iya thavala va thɨ loŋweghathɨ iŋa, “Thoŋgo hu vikikiya lo vavaghareke, emunjoru woraghambugha ghemi.
43008032	Ambane hu ghareghare emunjoru Loi kaiwae na i rakayathuŋga.”
43008033	Thiye thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Ghime Eibraham orumburumbuya ghime, na ma mbaŋa regha lolo regha le mbaro i variime. Ŋgoroŋga gharumwaru iya uŋake, ‘Ne i rakayathuŋga’?”
43008034	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thavala thɨ vakatha tharɨ, thɨ tabo tharɨko le rakakaiwobwaga.
43008035	Rakakaiwobwaga mane i roghabana giyako i kaiwokowe ele ŋgolo tɨne, ko iyemaeŋge nariye ne i roghabana moli e tɨne.
43008036	Iya kaiwae thoŋgo Loi Nariye i rakayathuŋga, ghemi rakarakayathuŋga moli.
43008037	Ya ghareghare Eibraham orumburumbuya ghemi, ko iyemaeŋge hu munjeva hu unɨghɨŋgo kaiwae lo utuke ma e ghambaghambae e gharemina.
43008038	Ghino ya utuŋa weŋga budakaiya va ya thuwe weya Bwebwe na ghemi hu vakatha budakaiya va hu loŋwe weya ramami.”
43008039	Thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Ghime ramameya Eibraham.” Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Thoŋgo emunjoru Eibraham le ŋgaŋga ghemi, mbala hu vakatha ŋgoreiya amalaghɨniye va i vakatha.
43008040	Wo hu thuwe, va ya utuŋa emunjoru budakaiya ya loŋwe weya Loi, ko iyemaeŋge hu munjeva hu unɨghɨŋgo. Eibraham mava i vakatha bigi regha ŋgoreiya iyake.
43008041	Budakaiya hu vakavakatha ŋgoreiya ramami le vakatha.” Thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Ma ŋgamawobuna ghime! Ghime ramame mbe regha eŋge, Loi.”
43008042	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Thoŋgo mbema emunjoru ramamiya Loi, valɨkaiwami hu gharethovu e ghino, kaiwae ghino Loi va i variyeŋgo na ya mena gheke. Mava ya mena mbe wombereghake eŋge elo renuwaŋa, nandere, va i variyeŋgo.
43008043	Buda kaiwae nuwamina ma i manjamanjalaŋa budakaiya ya utuŋa weŋga? Rɨghethoru kaiwae hu botewo hu vandeŋe lo utuke weŋga.
43008044	Ghemi ŋgoramiya ramami Seitan na nuwamiya hu vakatha ŋgoreiya ramami le vakatha. Va i menakowe na ghaghada noroke, iye ghakaiwo i gaboŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, na ma mbaŋa regha ina emunjoru ele valɨvaŋga, kaiwae ma mbaŋa regha i utuŋa emunjoru. Iye i butu e utu kwan, mbe ghathanavu vara iyako mbaŋake wolaghɨye kaiwae iye taukwan na kwanɨŋgike wolaghɨye ramanji.
43008045	Ko ghino kaiwae ya utuŋa utu emunjoru, iya kaiwae ma hu loŋweghathɨŋgo.
43008046	Thela regha e tɨnemina valɨkaiwae i woraŋgiya wothanavu raitharɨ? Thoŋgo ghino ya utuŋa utu emunjoru, buda kaiwae ma hu loŋweghathɨŋgo?
43008047	Thela Ramaya Loi, i loŋweya Loi ghalɨŋae. Ko iyemaeŋge kaiwae ma hu loŋwe Loi, iyake i vaemunjoruŋa ghemi ma Loi le ŋgaŋga.”
43008048	Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Mbema emunjoru va wo utuŋama mbaŋa va woŋa, ‘Ghen rara Sameriya ghen na nyao raitharɨ ina e ghen.’ ”
43008049	Jisas iŋa, “Ma nyao raitharɨ ina e ghino. Ghino ya yavwatatawana Bwebwe, ko iyemaeŋge ghemi ma hu yavwatata wanaŋgo.
43008050	Ghino ma nuwaŋguiya ya wovorevoreŋa wombereghake idaŋgu. Ko iyemaeŋge lolo regha mbe inawe, iye nuwaiya thɨ wovorevoreŋa idaŋgu na iye raghatha thovuye moli.
43008051	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thela thoŋgo i ghambugha lo utuke mane i mare.”
43008052	Jiu thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Mbaŋake wo ghareghare mbema emunjoru nyao raitharɨ ina e ghen! Eibraham va i mare na tembe ŋgoreiyeva Loi ghalɨŋae gharautuŋgi, ko iyemaeŋge uŋa, ‘Thela thoŋgo i ghambugha lo utuke mane i mare.’
43008053	Ghen u munjeva u laghɨye kivwala ramame Eibraham, ae? Kaerova i mare na tembe ŋgoreiyeva Loi ghalɨŋae gharautuŋgi. Ko thela ida ghen?”
43008054	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Thoŋgo ghino wombereghake ya taraweŋaŋgo, wo tarawako iyako ma e ghathovuye. Ko wo ratarawa mbe ghamberegha eŋge Bwebwe — amalaghɨniye iya huŋana lemi Loi.
43008055	Ghemi ma hu ghareghare Loi, ghino eŋge ya ghareghare. Thoŋgo yaŋa ma ya ghareghare Loi ne taukwana ghino ŋgoreiya ghemi; ko iyemaeŋge ya ghareghare amalaghɨniye na ya ghambugha ghalɨŋae.
43008056	Ramami Eibraham va i warari, le renuwaŋa va nuwaiya i thuwe wo mbaŋa; kaerova i thuwe na i warari laghɨye.”
43008057	Jiu thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Ghanɨtheghathegha mamba i wo ghwelima na uŋava va u thuwathuwa weya amalaghɨniye.”
43008058	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, amba muyai Eibraham va i virɨ ghino vama inaŋguwe.”
43008059	Iyake kaiwae thɨ bigiya varɨvarɨ na thɨ munjeva thɨ unɨghɨwe, ko iyemaeŋge va i kubaroŋgi na i iteta Ŋgolo Boboma.
43009001	Mbaŋa Jisas i loŋgaloŋga e kamwathɨko, i vaidiya amala regha, maramarae vambe thɨ kwaghe vara tɨnae e ŋgamoiye.
43009002	Gharaghambu thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, thela le tharɨ i vakatha na maramaraeke vambe thɨ kwaghe vara tɨnae e ŋgamoiye? Amalaghɨniye o ramae na tɨnae lenji tharɨ?”
43009003	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ma amalaghɨniye le tharɨ o ramae na tɨnae. Ko va ŋgoreiyako na mbala gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye thɨ thuwe Loi le vurɨgheghewa amalaghɨniye.
43009004	Thela va i variyeŋgo ra vakatha le kaiwo varae i mbɨlembɨle, kaiwae gougou ne i mena ma te lolo reghava ne valɨkaiwae i kaiwo.
43009005	Mbaŋa amba inaŋgu e yambaneke, yambaneke ghamanjamanjala ghino.”
43009006	I utuvao iyake, i njoŋgo e thelauko vwatae na i vakatha thɨkathɨka weiye njoŋgonjoŋgoko. I vaghana thɨkathɨkako amalako e maramarae
43009007	na i dagewe iŋa, “U wa na vo thavwiyathu e mbwa regha idae Sailowam.” (Sailowam gharumwaru “variye”.) Amalako i wa na ve thavwiyathu na kaero i tateya maramarae na i thuwe amba i njoghama.
43009008	Ghaune na gharɨgharɨ vavana, va thɨ thuwathuwawe i naŋgonaŋgo thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Amalama iya mbaŋake wolaghɨye i yaku na i naŋgonaŋgoma iya amalaghɨniyeko, ae?”
43009009	Vavana thɨŋa, “Mbema amalaghɨniye,” ko vavana thɨŋa, “Nandere, ko mbema ghayamoyamoko eŋge ŋgoreiya amalaghɨniye.” Amalaghɨniye iŋa, “Mbema ghinokeni.”
43009010	Thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Me ŋgoroŋga na kaero u tateva maramaranɨna?”
43009011	I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Amala regha idae Jisas, me vakatha thɨkathɨka na i vaghan e maramaraŋguke, amba i dage weŋgo na ya wa Sailowam na va thavwiyathu. Mbaŋa ma wa na va thavwiyathu, kaero ya tateva maramaraŋguke na ya thuwe.”
43009012	Thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Aŋga inae amalaghɨniye?” Iŋa, “Ma ya ghareghare.”
43009013	Thɨ yovaŋguya amalama maramaraema va i kwaghe weŋgiya Parisi,
43009014	kaiwae va Sabat e tɨne iyava i vakatha thɨkathɨka na i vaghan e maramaraeko na kaero i tate.
43009015	Iya kaiwae Parisi vambe thɨ vaitova, va ŋgoroŋga na kaero i thuweva. Amalama i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Jisas me vaghana thɨkathɨka e maramaraŋgu, va thavwiyathu e mbwa na ya tate, na mbaŋake kaero ya thuwe.”
43009016	Parisi vavana thɨŋa, “Lolona iya me vakatha iyana weŋge iye ma i menawe Loi, kaiwae ma i ghambugha Sabat ghambaro.” Vavana thɨŋa, “Ne ŋgoroŋga na lolo, iye tharɨ gharavakatha, i vakatha vakatha ghamba rotaele ŋgoranjiya iyake?” E mbaŋako iyako thɨ vakatha wabwi.
43009017	Iya kaiwae Parisi mbowo thɨ vaitova amalama thɨŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga ghen len renuwaŋa iya loloko me vakatha maramaranɨna thɨ thovuye kaiwae?” I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Iye Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu regha.”
43009018	Ko iyemaeŋge Jiu lenji randeviva mava thɨ loŋweghathɨ amalako iyako maramarae vambe thɨ kwaghe vara tɨnae e ŋgamoiye na mbaŋake kaero i thuwe. Iya kaiwae thɨ variya utu ramae na tɨnae kaiwanji na wo thɨ mena weŋgi
43009019	na thɨ vaitoŋgi thɨŋa, “Narumiya iya loloke iyake? Amalaghɨniyeke iyava huŋake vambe i virɨghambɨ vara maramaraeke thɨ kwaghe? Ŋgoroŋga eŋge na mbaŋake kaero i thuwe?”
43009020	Ramae na tɨnae thɨ gonjogha weŋgi thɨŋa, “Wo ghareghare amalaghɨniye narume na wo ghareghare va i virɨghamba maramarae thɨ kwaghe.
43009021	Ko iyemaeŋge ma wo ghareghare ŋgoroŋga na mbaŋake kaero i thuwe, na thela me tateŋgi tembe ma wo ghareghareva. Hu vaito, kaero ele ghareghare na valɨkaiwae tembe ghambereghana i utugiya weŋga.”
43009022	Ramae na tɨnae thɨ utu na ŋgoreiyako kaiwae thɨ mararuŋgiya lenji randeviva, thiye Jiu, kaiwae kaerova lenji renuwaŋa ŋgoreiye, thoŋgo thela i utuŋa weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ, Jisas iye Mesaiya, ma i ru e lenji ŋgolo kururu kaiwae thɨ dagetenɨwe.
43009023	Iyake kaiwae ramae na tɨnae thɨŋa, “Hu vaito, kaero ele ghareghare.”
43009024	Mbowo thɨ kula ruwova amalama maramaraema va thɨ kwaghe na thɨŋa, “U dagerawe Loi e marae na ne u utuŋa emunjoru weime, kaiwae wo ghareghare lolona iyana tharɨ gharavakatha.”
43009025	I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ma ya ghareghare iye tharɨ gharavakatha o nandere. Bigi reghaeŋge ya ghareghare, maramaraŋgu va thɨ kwaghe ko mbaŋake kaero ya thuwe.”
43009026	Thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Me vakatha budakai e ghen na ŋgoroŋga meŋana kaero u thuwe?”
43009027	I gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Kaero ma utuŋa weŋga ko iyemaeŋge ma mohu loŋwe ghalɨŋaŋgu. Buda kaiwae nuwamiya mbowo hu loŋweva? Nuwamiya hu tabona tembe gharaghambuva?”
43009028	Ghalɨŋanji e larɨmbiya na thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Ghen lolona iyana gharaghambu, ko ghime Mosese gharaghambu,
43009029	kaiwae kaero wo ghareghare Loi va i utu weya Mosese, ko iyemaeŋge lolona iyana ma wo ghareghare aŋga i mena.”
43009030	Amalama i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Emunjoru lemi utuna i wo nuwaŋgu, kaiwae huŋa ma hu ghareghare aŋga i mena, ko iyemaeŋge me vakatha maramaraŋguke na kaero ya thuwe.
43009031	Kaero ra ghareghare Loi ma i goruwe tharɨ gharavakatha ghalɨŋanji, ko thela thoŋgo i yavwatatawana Loi na i vakatha le renuwaŋa, ne i goruwe le renuwaŋa.
43009032	Va i menakowe na ghaghada noroke ma lolo regha i ndeloŋwe mun amala regha maramarae va thɨ kwaghe tɨnae e ŋgamoiye na lolo regha i vakatha na kaero i thuwe.
43009033	Thoŋgo loloke iyake ma i menawe Loi, ma valɨkaiwae i vakatha bigi regha.”
43009034	Parisima thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Ghen mbema tharɨ loloniya ghen mbaŋa va u virɨ na ghaghada noroke na u munjeva u vavaghare weime, ae?” Amba thɨ variyeraŋgiya e ŋgolo kururu tɨne na thɨ dageten moli.
43009035	Mbaŋa Jisas i loŋwevaidiya amalama thɨ variyeraŋgiya e ŋgolo kururu tɨne na thɨ dageten moli, i wa ve tamwe na ve vaidi. I dagewe iŋa, “Thare u loŋweghathɨgha Lolo Nariye?”
43009036	Amalako iŋa, “Amalana, thela iya lolona iyana? U utugiyama e ghino na mbala ya loŋweghathɨ.”
43009037	Jisas iŋa, “Kaero mendava u thuwe, na amalaghɨniye mbema iya vara i utuutuna e ghen mbaŋake iyake.”
43009038	Amalako iŋa, “Giyana, kaero ya loŋweghathɨ.” Na i kururuwe.
43009039	Jisas iŋa, “Va ya mena e yambaneke na ya ghathaŋga, mbala thavala maranji thɨ kwaghe thɨ thuwe na thavala thɨ thuwe maranji thɨ kwaghe.”
43009040	Parisi vavana va inanji gheko thɨ loŋwe i utuŋa iyako thɨŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga, ghime tembe ŋgoreiye marame i kwaghe, ae?”
43009041	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Thoŋgo ghemi marami thiya kwaghe, ghamiwonjowe ma i monje e riwami, ko kaiwae mbaŋake huŋa marami thiya thovuye ghamiwonjowe i monje e riwami.”
43010001	“Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thela thoŋgo i ru sip e ghanjigana ko ma i reŋa ŋgora ghamba ruko, ko iyemaeŋge i valaŋaniya ma e kamwathɨ reghava iye rakaivɨ.
43010002	Thela thoŋgo i ru e mbwaŋaŋgila iye sip gharanjimbunjimbu.
43010003	Mbwaŋaŋgila gharanjimbunjimbu i vu kaiwae na sip gharanjimbunjimbu i ru; na sip thɨ loŋwe ghalɨŋae mbaŋa i una idaidanji. I viva e ghamwanji na i vaŋgu raŋgiyaŋgi eto.
43010004	Mbaŋa kaero thɨ rakaraŋgivao, i viva e ghamwanji na thɨ rakareghambawe kaiwae thɨ ghareghare wagiyawe ghalɨŋae.
43010005	Mane thɨ ghambugha bobwari, ne thɨ voitete kaiwae ma thɨ ghareghare ghalɨŋae.”
43010006	Jisas i utuŋa goghaimbake iyake weŋgi, ko iyemaeŋge mava i manjamanjala weŋgi budakaiya va nuwaiya i utuŋa weŋgi.
43010007	Jisas mbowo i dageva weŋgi iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ghino mbwaŋaŋgila sip kaiwanji.
43010008	Thavala va thɨ rakaviva e ghamwaŋgu, thiye rakaivɨ, ko iyemaeŋge sipɨko mava thɨ loŋweghathɨŋgi.
43010009	Ghino mbwaŋaŋgila. Thela thoŋgo i ru e ghino mane i vaidi tharɨ. Ne i ru na i raŋgi na i vaidiya nana thovuye.
43010010	Rakaivɨ i mena kaivɨ, unɨghɨ na vakowana kaiwanji. Ko ghino ya mena na mbala gharɨgharɨ thɨ vaidiya yawalinji thovuye na veimaima na ndendewo.”
43010011	“Ghino sip gharanjimbunjimbu thovuye. Sip gharanjimbunjimbu thovuye i vatomwe yawaliye sip kaiwanji.
43010012	Thela thɨ vamodo na i njimbukikiya sip iye ma sip tanuwagae. Kaiwae iye i kaiwo mani kaiwae, mbaŋa ne i thuwe mbugha lavalavarɨ i mena sipɨko e tɨnenji, i iteteŋgiya sipɨko na i vo; amba mbugha lavalavariko i unɨgha sipɨko regha na i vakathaŋgiya vavanako thiya maraka.
43010013	Loloko i vo kaiwae mbema i kaiwo eŋge mani kaiwae na ma i goru weŋgiya sipɨko.”
43010014	“Iyemaeŋge, ghino sip gharanjimbunjimbu thovuye. Ya ghareghareŋgiya lo sip na lo sip thɨ ghareghareŋgo,
43010015	ŋgoreiya Bwebwe i ghareghareŋgo na ghino ya ghareghareya Bwebwe — na ya vatomwe yawaliŋgu sip kaiwanji.
43010016	Lo sip vavana mbe inanjiweva, thiye ma inanji e wabwike iyake tɨne. Nuwaŋguiya moli tembe ya bigimenaŋgiva na thiya yaku na ghanjiranjimbunjimbu regha. Thɨ loŋwe ghalɨŋaŋgu na thɨ wabwi na regha.
43010017	Bwebwe ghare weŋgo kaiwae ya vatomweyathu yawaliŋgu mbala tembe ya vaidiva.
43010018	Mane lolo regha i li e ghino. Mbe ghino vara wombereghake ya vatomweyathu. Valɨkaiwaŋgu ya vatomwe yawaliŋgu mare kaiwae na valɨkaiwaŋgu ya njogha na tembe e yawayawaliŋguva. Mbaroke iyake Bwebwe le renuwaŋa na vama i vatomwe e ghino.”
43010019	Utuutuke iyake kaiwanji Jiu thɨ wogaithɨ kaiwae na thɨ vakatha wabwi.
43010020	Gharɨgharɨ lemoyo thɨŋa, “Nyao raitharɨ inawe na i unouno. Buda kaiwae hu vandeŋe?”
43010021	Ko vavana thɨŋa, “Lolo nyao raitharɨ inawe mane i utuŋa ŋgora iyake. Nyao raitharɨ valɨkaiwae i tate lolo maramarae thɨ kwaghe?”
43010022	E mbaŋa reghava njighɨnjighɨ ghambaŋa, thɨ vakatha thaga regha Jerusalem. Thɨ renuwaŋakikiya Ŋgolo Boboma va ghavaboboma.
43010023	Jisas va ina e Ŋgolo Boboma tɨne i ndendeloloŋga e valɨvaŋga regha ida thɨŋa Solomon le Nakanaka.
43010024	Jiu thɨ meghɨliŋa na thɨŋa, “Ghen mbaŋake wolaghɨye u vakatha numovuvura weime, ko tene thembaŋa amba u utugiya emunjoru weime, mbema emunjoru Mesaiya ghen?”
43010025	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Kaerova ya utugiya weŋga, ko iyemaeŋge ma hu loŋweghathɨ. Vakathaŋgike ghamba rotaele ya vakathaŋgi Bwebwe e idae thɨ vaemunjoruŋa thela ghino;
43010026	ko iyemaeŋge ma hu loŋweghathɨ kaiwae ma lo sip ŋgoreiya ghemi.
43010027	Ghino lo sip thɨ loŋwe ghalɨŋaŋgu. Ya ghareghareŋgi na thɨ rakambeleŋgo.
43010028	Ya giya yawalinji memeghabananiye na mane thɨ mare. Mane lolo regha i unɨghɨ kavɨ regha e ghino.
43010029	Bwebwe iye va i giya thiyake weŋgo na iye, kaiwae i laghɨye kivwalaŋgiya bigibigike wolaghɨye ma tene lolo regha i unɨghɨ kavɨva regha e nɨmae ghare.
43010030	Bwebwe na ghino mbe regha eŋge ghime.”
43010031	Amba Jiu mbowo thɨ bigiva varɨvarɨ na thɨ munjeva thɨ unɨghɨwe,
43010032	ko Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Vakatha ghamba rotaele i ghanagha thɨ menawe Bwebwe kaero ya vakathaŋgi e marami. Iyaŋganiye vara kaiwae na iya nuwamiya hu unɨghɨŋgoke e varɨvarɨŋgina?”
43010033	Jiu thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Ma woŋa wo unɨghɨŋge len vakatha ghamba rotaele kaiwanji, ko kaiwae ghen mbema lolokeni ŋgorana ghimeke, u utuvatharɨ weya Loi na uŋava Loi ya ghen.”
43010034	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Gharorori ŋgoreiyake e lemi mbarona ghabuk tɨne Loi i dage weŋgiya lemi randeviva iŋa, ‘Ghemi loiŋgi.’
43010035	Loi va i utuŋa utuutuke iyake weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ iyava iŋake thiye loiŋgi, na Buk Boboma le utuutu i emunjoru mbaŋake wolaghɨye.
43010036	Iya kaiwae ŋgoroŋga gharerenuwaŋa loloke iya Loi va i tuthike na i vabobomaŋa amalaghɨniye kaiwae na i variye e yambaneke? Buda kaiwae hu dage e ghino na huŋava ya utuvatharɨ weya Loi kaiwae yaŋa, ‘Loi Nariye ghino’?
43010037	Tha hu loŋweghathɨŋgo thoŋgo hu renuwaŋa ma ya vakatha ŋgoreiya Bwebwe le vakatha.
43010038	Ko thoŋgo ya vakathaŋgi na ma hu loŋweghathɨŋgo, mbema hu loŋweghathɨ eŋge vakathaŋgiko ghamba rotaele, mbala hu ghareghare na nuwamina i manjamanjalaŋa Bwebwe ina e ghino na ghino inaŋgu weya Bwebwe.”
43010039	E mbaŋako iyako mbowo thɨ mandova thɨ munje thɨ yalawe, ko iyemaeŋge i iteteŋgi.
43010040	Jisas mbowo i njoghava na i lawa Jorɨdan ŋgora Jon va i bapɨtaiso mbaŋa va i vivako na ve yakuwe.
43010041	Gharɨgharɨ lemoyo thɨ rakamenawe na thɨŋa, “Jon mava i ndevakatha mun vakatha ghamba rotaele regha, ko bigibigike wolaghɨye va i utuŋa loloke iyake kaiwae mbema emunjoru.”
43010042	E valɨvaŋgako iyako gharɨgharɨ lemoyo thɨ loŋweghathɨgha Jisas.
43011001	Amala regha idae Lasarus, i ghambwera. Va i yaku Betani weiyaŋgiya olouye Meri na Mata.
43011002	(Merike iyake iya va i liŋgiya bunama Jisas e ghegheŋgima na i ivamoŋgi e umbaliye ndamwandamwae. Louye Lasarus iyava i ghambwerako.)
43011003	Oloulouye thɨ variya toto thɨŋa, “Amalana, amalama valɨgharegharenɨma i ghambwera.”
43011004	Mbaŋa Jisas i loŋwe iyake iŋa, “Ghambwerake iyake mane le ghambako Lasarus le mare. Nandere, iyake Loi ghatarawa kaiwae, na mbala thɨ taraweŋa Loi Nariye.”
43011005	Jisas i gharethovu weŋgiya Mata na ghaghae Meri na lounji Lasarus.
43011006	Ko iyemaeŋge mbaŋa i loŋwe totoma, Lasarus i ghambwera, Jisas mbowo i yakuva mbaŋa theghewo e ghembako inakowe.
43011007	Amba i dage weŋgiya gharaghambuma iŋa, “Wo ra rakanjogha Judiya.”
43011008	Gharaghambuma thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Ravavaghare, mendamba gharɨgharɨ gheko nuwanjiya thɨ unɨghɨŋge e varɨ, na buda kaiwae nuwaniya u njogha gheko?”
43011009	Jisas iŋa, “Mbaŋa ghalughawoghawo theyaworo na theghewo, ŋgoreiye? Thela ne i loŋga varae i mbɨlembɨle mane i lirawe vatharɨ gheghe kaiwae i thuwe yambaneke ghamanjamanjala.
43011010	Ko thoŋgo ne i loŋga gougou ne i tɨvatɨva, kaiwae ma ele manjamanjala.”
43011011	Jisas i utuŋaŋgiya thiyake na e ghereiye mbowo i dageva weŋgi iŋa, “Ghandauma Lasarus i ghenelaŋa, ko ne ya wa na va yavairɨ.”
43011012	Gharaghambuma thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Amalana, thoŋgo i ghenelaŋa, tembene riwae i thovuye.”
43011013	Jisas emunjoru moli i utuŋa Lasarus le mare kaiwae, ko gharaghambuma thɨŋaeŋge i utuŋa ghena utuniye.
43011014	Jisas i uturaŋgiya moli weŋgi iŋa, “Lasarus iye i mare,
43011015	na ghemi kaiwami ya warari kaiwae ma inaŋgu gheko, iyake kaiwae ne hu ghareghare na hu vareminjeŋgo. Mbaŋake ra rakawawe.”
43011016	Tomas, vambe thɨ unova ghaida unouno Gamwaruwo, i dage weŋgiya ghauneko iya Jisas gharaghambuko weiyaŋgi iŋa, “Taulaghɨke ghinda ra raka weinda Ravavaghareko, mbala vara mare weinda.”
43011017	Mbaŋa Jisas i vutha, i loŋwevaidiya Lasarus thɨ beku na ghenevarɨ vama ve ghena e ghabubu.
43011018	Betani na Jerusalem ghanjilughawoghawo mbalama i wo kilomita thegheto.
43011019	Iya kaiwae gharɨgharɨ lemoyo thɨ ri Jerusalem na thɨ vawarariŋaŋgiya Mata na Meri lounjiko le mare na nuwatharɨniye kaiwae.
43011020	Mbaŋa Mata i loŋwe toto Jisas maiya i menamenake, i raŋgi na ve lavolevole, ko Meri vambe i reyaku e ŋgolo tɨne.
43011021	Mata i dagewe Jisas iŋa, “Thoŋgo mendava inan gheke, Amalana, louŋguma mbala ma menda i mare!
43011022	Ko ya ghareghare othembe mbaŋake, budakaiya u naŋgo weya Loi na i vakatha, ne i vakatha kaiwan.”
43011023	Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “Lounɨna ne i thuweiru na tembe e yawayawaliyeva.”
43011024	Mata i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ya ghareghare, ne i thuweiru na e yawayawaliye mbaŋa nevole ele ghambako.”
43011025	Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “Ghino thuweiru na yawalɨ. Thela ne i loŋweghathɨŋgo ne e yawayawaliye, othembe ne i mare;
43011026	na thela e yawayawaliye na i loŋweghathɨŋgo ma vole i mare. Thare u loŋweghathɨgha iyake?”
43011027	Mata i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ŋgoreiye Amalana! Ya loŋweghathɨgha ghen Mesaiya, Loi Nariye, iye Loi va i dagerawe ne i mena e yambaneke.”
43011028	Mata i utuvao na e ghereiye, i njogha na i kulavatha ghaghae Meri na i vaŋaewiwe iŋa, “La Ravavaghare maina gheke na nuwaiyaŋge.”
43011029	Mbaŋa Meri i loŋwe iyake, i yondo na i yorukuwe.
43011030	Jisas ma vamba i vutha e ghemba, ko vamba ina ŋgora Mata me vaidimawe.
43011031	Gharɨgharɨma va inanjima e ŋgoloko tɨne weinjima Meri, thɨ vawarariŋama nuwatharɨma kaiwae, thɨ rakambele mbaŋa thɨ thuwe i yondo vɨrɨ na i rukuraŋgi. Lenji renuwaŋa thɨŋaeŋge i wa e ghabubuko na ve randawe.
43011032	Meri ve vutha ŋgora Jisas inamawe na mbaŋa i thuwe, i dobu e gheghe na i dagewe iŋa, “Amalana, thoŋgo mendambe inan gheke, louŋguma mbala ma mendava i mare!”
43011033	Jisas i thuwe Meri i randa na gharɨgharɨma weiyaŋgima mbe ŋgoreiyeva, ghare i tage laghɨye moli,
43011034	na i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Aŋga ina menda hu worawe?” Thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Amalana, u mena vara thuwe.”
43011035	Jisas i randa.
43011036	Gharɨgharɨma thɨ ve dage weŋgi thɨŋa, “Wo u thuwe, ŋgoroŋga ghare weya Lasarus!”
43011037	Ko vavana thɨŋa, “Va i vakatha amala marae i kwaghe na kaero i thuwe, na buda kaiwae ma i vikiki Lasarus na thava i mare?”
43011038	Ghare i vɨrɨ laghɨye, Jisas i wa e ghabubuma, va maŋgavarɨ, na va thɨ wogana ghae e varɨ.
43011039	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Hu wovakatha varɨna!” Amalama mendamba i marema louye Mata i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Amalana, kaero e butibutiye na ghenevarɨ kaero ve ghena.”
43011040	Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “Mendambe ya dage e ghen ne u thuwe ŋgoroŋga Loi le vurɨvurɨgheghe thoŋgo u loŋweghathɨ?”
43011041	Thɨ mwanavakatha varɨma. Jisas i ghɨmara voro e buruburu na iŋa, “Ya vata ago e ghen, Bwebwe, kaiwae u vandeŋeŋgo.
43011042	Ya ghareghare mbaŋake wolaghɨye u vandeŋeŋgo, ko ya utuŋa iyake gharɨgharɨke thiyake kaiwanji na mbala thɨ loŋweghathɨgha iya ghen va u variyeŋgo.”
43011043	I naŋgo na ŋgoreiyako e ghereiye amba i kula na ghalɨŋae laghɨye iŋa, “Lasarus, u raŋgima!”
43011044	I raŋgi, ghegheŋgi na nɨmanɨmae mbe weiye vara ghavoghavo na ghamwae vambe ŋgoreiyeva. Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Hu rakayathuŋgiya riwaena ghaghavoghavo na hu viyathu i wa.”
43011045	Jiu iyava thɨ mena thɨ thuwe Meri, thɨ ghanagha va thɨ loŋweghathɨgha Jisas mbaŋaniye thɨ thuwe budakai va i vakatha e maranji.
43011046	Ko vavana thɨ rakanjogha na vethɨ utugiya weŋgiya Parisi budakaiya Jisas va i vakatha.
43011047	Amba ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Parisi thɨ kula vathavathaŋgiya Jiu lenji kot laghɨye giyagiyaniye na thɨ niva. Thɨŋa, “Ne ra vakatha budakai? Wo hu thuwe vakathaŋgike ghamba rotaele wolaghɨye amalake iyake i vakathaŋgi!
43011048	Thoŋgo ra gheneviyathu na i rombeleya kamwathɨke iyake, gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye ne thɨ loŋweghathɨ iyake, amba Rom gharambarombaro thɨ mena thɨ vakowana la Ŋgolo Bobomake na la ghamba mbaroke.”
43011049	Amba regha, idae Kaiyapas, iye va ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva e theghatheghako iyako e tɨne i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Ma hu ghareghare bigi regha.
43011050	Thare hu thuwe ghakamwathɨ? Ne i thovuye moli e ghemi thoŋgo lolo regha moli i mare gharɨgharɨ kaiwanji na thava vanautumako laghɨye thɨ vaidiya vuyowo.”
43011051	Iyake mava i utuŋa ghamberegha ele renuwaŋa, ko kaiwae amalaghɨniye va Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva e theghatheghako iyako, iyava i utuŋakai amba muyai i yomara, iyava iŋake Jisas ne i mare Jiu kaiwanji.
43011052	Ma mbe Jiu eŋge kaiwanji, ko tembe ŋgoreiyeva Loi le ŋgaŋga e yambaneke laghɨye, i mbanɨvathavathaŋgi na regha.
43011053	Va e mbaŋako iyako na i ghaoko Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ worawe lenji renuwaŋa rɨghewe na nuwanjiya thɨ vona Jisas ghae le mare kaiwae.
43011054	Iya kaiwae Jisas ma vama i reŋa ŋgora gharɨgharɨ lemoyo inanjiwe Judiya e tɨne. Ko iyemaeŋge i iteta valɨvaŋgako iyako na i wa e ghemba regha idae Ipɨreim, e njamnjam ghadidiye, na ve yakuwe weiyaŋgiya gharaghambu.
43011055	Mbaŋa vama Thaga Valaŋani i ghenetha, na gharɨgharɨ lemoyo vama thiya wareri e ghembaghemba na thɨ raka Jerusalem na vethɨ vanamwe riwanji ŋgoreiye ghanjimbaroko, amba muyai Thaga Valaŋaniko ghambaŋa.
43011056	Va thɨ tamwetamweya Jisas, na mbaŋa thɨ mevathavatha e Ŋgolo Boboma le valɨvaŋga, thɨ ve vaitoŋgi thɨŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga lemi renuwaŋa? Ne i mena e thagako o nandere?”
43011057	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Parisi thɨ dage weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ na thoŋgo thela i ghareghare Jisas aŋga inae, i wa ve utugiya weŋgi na mbala thɨ yalawe.
43012001	Mbaŋa ma ghenewona eŋge kaero Thaga Valaŋani, Jisas i wa Betani, Lasarus ghambae. Amalake iyake Jisas va iŋa na tembe i thuweiru na e yawayawaliyeva.
43012002	Yeghɨyeghɨyeko iyako thɨ vakatha ghanɨŋga Jisas kaiwae. Mata i vaŋamweŋgi na Lasarus weiyaŋgiya gharɨgharɨko thiya ghanɨŋga weinji Jisas.
43012003	Amba Meri i thɨna bunama vwarara e bodɨla. Modae laghɨye moli na le vuyovuyowo lita vaŋgothiye. Va thɨ bunamaŋa umbwa regha idae nad. Meri i liŋgi Jisas e gheghe na i ivamo e umbaliye ndamwandamwa. Butiyeko thovuye i riyevanjara ŋgoloko tɨne.
43012004	Ko Judas Isakariyot, Jisas gharaghambu regha ne ghaliliva iŋa,
43012005	“Buda kaiwae ma thɨ vakuneŋa na thɨ mbana modae gethɨseriyeto (300) na thɨ giya weŋgiya mbinyembinyeŋgu?”
43012006	I utu ŋgoreiyako kaiwae iye rakaivɨ, ko mava i utuŋa ŋgoreiyako kaiwae i rerenuwaŋa mbinyembinyeŋgu kaiwanji, nandere. Kaiwae iye va i njimbukikiya mani ghambae, mbaŋa vavana va i thalavugha ghambereghawe iya thalavuko iyako.
43012007	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Tha u vautuŋa! U viyathu na i vikikighathɨ mbala i vakatha le renuwaŋana na i vanamwe nonowo riwaŋgu beku kaiwae.
43012008	Mbaŋake wolaghɨye ne weimiyaŋgiya mbinyembinyeŋgu, ko ghino mane weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi mbaŋake wolaghɨye.”
43012009	Wabwi laghɨye regha, thiye Jiu, thɨ vandeŋe vaidi Jisas ina Betani, amba thɨ rakawe. Ma vambe thɨ raka eŋge gheko Jisas kaiwae ko vambe nuwanjiyava thɨ thuwe Lasarus, iye Jisas va iŋa na i thuweiru na tembe e yawayawaliyeva.
43012010	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye vambe thɨ tamwetamweva kamwathɨ na nuwanjiya thɨ unɨghɨva Lasarus,
43012011	kaiwae amalaghɨniye kaiwae Jiu lemoyo thɨ botewoŋgiya ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na thɨ loŋweghathɨgha Jisas.
43012012	Ighɨviyava, wabwi laghɨye, iyava thɨ rakamena Thaga Valaŋaniko kaiwae, thɨ loŋwevaidiya Jisas maiya i menamenana Jerusalem kaiwae.
43012013	Thɨ tenɨŋgiya manjemanje ŋgora bwadɨbwadɨ ndamwandamwanji na thɨ raka na vethɨ lavolevole; thɨ yaro thɨŋa, “Hosana!” “Loi ghare weya loloke iye i mena Giya e idaeke!” “Loi ghare weya Isirel lenji Kiŋ!”
43012014	Jisas i vaŋgwa doŋɨki na i thawe, ŋgoreiya va thɨ rori thɨŋa,
43012015	“Tha huya mararu ghemi Jerusalem gharɨgharɨniye, wo hu thuwe lemi kiŋ maiya i menamenake, i tha doŋɨki e nariye.”
43012016	E mbaŋako iyako gharaghambu mava nuwanji i manjamanjalaŋa bigibigike thiyake lenji yomara kaiwae na ŋgoroŋga ghanjirumwaru. Ko iyemaeŋge mbaŋa Loi ne i vaŋguthuweiru Jisas na i vavwenyevwenye na e ghereiye, ko amba the renuwaŋa Buk Boboma le woraŋgiya ŋgoreiyako Jisas kaiwae amba thɨ renuwaŋakikiya bigibigiko iya thɨ vakathakowe.
43012017	Wabwiko iyava weinji Jisas mbaŋa va i kularaŋgiya Lasarus e ghabubu na i thuweiru na kaero e yawayawaliyeva, thiye vethɨ ndethɨna utuutuko iyako.
43012018	Iyake kaiwae iyava wabwi laghɨye thɨ raka na vethɨ lavolevole, kaiwae va thɨ loŋwe le vakathako ghamba rotaele iyako utuniye.
43012019	Parisi thɨ vedage weŋgi thɨŋa, “Wo hu thuwe! Ma valɨkaiwandava na ra vakatha bigi regha. Gharɨgharɨko wolaghɨye thɨ rakarakawe.”
43012020	E mbaŋako iyako Grik vavana va inanji e wabwiko tɨnenji, iyava thɨ rakavoroko Jerusalem, kururu kaiwae Thaga Valaŋani e tɨne.
43012021	Thɨ wa weya Pilip, iye rara Betɨsaida, Galili e tɨne, na thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “Amalana, nuwameiya wo thuwe Jisas.”
43012022	Pilip i wa na ve dagewe Endru na theghewoko vara thɨ wa na vethɨ dagewe Jisas.
43012023	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Mbaŋa kaero ina gheke na Loi i vavwenyevwenye Lolo Nariye.
43012024	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thoŋgo wit mbouye voghɨra ma i dobu e thelauko vwatae na i mare mbemane iyaeŋge vara voghɨrana rere. Ko thoŋgo i mare ambane i mbuthu na i rau na uneune lemoyo moli.
43012025	Thela thoŋgo i gharethovu weya yawaliye ne i thɨvaghawe. Ko thela thoŋgo i botewoyathu yawaliye e yambaneke, ne i vikikighathɨ yawaliye na i vaidiya yawalɨ memeghabananiye.
43012026	Thela thoŋgo nuwaiya i kaiwo kaiwaŋgu, mbe i ghambuŋgo vara, na the valɨvaŋga ghino inaŋguwe amalaghɨniye tembe inaweva. Na loloko iya i kaiwo kaiwaŋguko Bwebwe ne i wovoreŋa idae.”
43012027	“E mbaŋake iyake ghareŋguke i vɨrɨ na ŋgoroŋga ne yaŋa? Ne yaŋa, ‘Bwebwe, u thalavuŋgo na thava ya ru vuyowoke iyake e tɨne?’ Nandere, iyake kaiwae vara iyava ya menake.
43012028	Bwebwe, u wovoreŋa idan na u vwenyevwenye.” Amba ghalɨghalɨŋa regha i mena e buruburu iŋa, “Vama ya vwenyevwenye idaŋgu, na mbowone ya vwenyevwenyeva.”
43012029	Wabwima va inanjima gheko thɨ loŋwe na thɨŋava mbɨlerɨ, na vavana thɨŋa, “Nyao thovuye me utuwe.”
43012030	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ma ghino kaiwaŋgu iya ghalɨghalɨŋako iyako me mena, ghemi kaiwami.
43012031	Mbaŋake Loi ghambaŋa i ghathaŋgiya yambaneke gharɨgharɨniye ghanjithanavu na i vanamwe ghanjimbaro, na ne e mbaŋake iyake Loi ne i kivwala yambaneke ghagiya Seitan na i tagaraŋgiya.
43012032	Ko ghino, mbaŋa ne thɨ mwanavairɨŋgo e yambaneke ne ya vakathaŋgiya gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye thɨ rakamena e ghino.”
43012033	I utuŋa ŋgoreiyako na i woraŋgiya ŋgoroŋga ne iŋa na i mare.
43012034	Iya kaiwae wabwiko thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “La Mbaro i woraŋgiya weime, Krais ne i meghabana. Ŋgoroŋga na iyava uŋake, ‘Ne thɨ mwanavaira Lolo Nariye’? Thela iya Loloke Nariye?”
43012035	Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Manjamanjala ne ina weŋga mbaŋa seiwo molao. Hu loŋga mbaŋa amba e lemi manjamanjalake, ne iwaeŋge momouwo i garubuŋga; kaiwae thela i loŋga e momouwo ma i ghareghare aŋga i reŋa.
43012036	Hu loŋweghathɨgha manjamanjalana mbaŋa amba ina weŋga, ghemi mbala hu tabona manjamanjala gharɨgharɨniye.” Mbaŋa i utuvao iyake i iteteŋgi na i rothuwele weŋgi.
43012037	Othembe Jisas vama i vakathaŋgiya vakatha ghamba rotaele i ghanagha e maranji, ma vamba thɨ loŋweghathɨ.
43012038	Iyake i vaemunjoruŋa Loi ghalɨŋae gharautu, Aiseya le utu iŋa, “Giyana, thela i loŋweghathɨgha totoke iya wo utuŋake? Giya va i woraŋgiya le vurɨgheghe weŋgiya thavala?”
43012039	Iya kaiwae mava thɨ loŋweghathɨ, kaiwae Aiseya va mbowo iŋava,
43012040	“Loi i vakatha na maranji i kwaghe na gharenji i vurɨgheghe, mbala ma thɨ thuwe e maranji, na thɨ ghareghare e gharenji, na thɨ numonjogha e ghino na ya thawariŋgi.”
43012041	Aiseya va i utuŋa iyake kaiwae va i thuwekai amba muyai i yomara ŋgoroŋga Jisas le vwenyevwenye.
43012042	Othembe iyako gharɨgharɨ lemoyo na Jiu lenji randeviva vavana thɨ loŋweghathɨgha Jisas. Ko kaiwae va thɨ mararuŋgiya Parisi, mava thɨ utuŋa gharɨgharɨ e maranji na ne iwaeŋge thɨ kitenɨyathuŋgi moli e wabwiko iya thɨ rakarakaru e ŋgolo kururu tɨne,
43012043	kaiwae nuwanjiya thiye ghanjitarawa i mena weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ na i laghɨye kivwala ghanjitarawa i mena weya Loi.
43012044	Jisas i dage na ghalɨŋae laghɨye iŋa, “Thela thoŋgo i loŋweghathɨŋgo, ma mbe i loŋweghathɨŋgo eŋge, ko tembe ŋgoreiyeva i loŋweghathɨgha thela va i variyeŋgo.
43012045	Thela thoŋgo i thuweŋgo tembe ŋgoreiyeva i thuwe thela va i variyeŋgo.
43012046	Va ya mena e yambaneke ŋgoreiya manjamanjala, iya kaiwae thela thoŋgo i loŋweghathɨŋgo mane i yaku e momouwo.”
43012047	“Thela thoŋgo i loŋwe lo utuke na ma i worawe e ghare, mane ya wovatharɨtharɨŋa. Kaiwae va ya mena ma ya wovatharɨtharɨŋa yambaneke, ko iyemaeŋge ya vamoru.
43012048	Thela thoŋgo i botewoŋgo na ma i wovatha lo utu, mbaŋa ne ele ghambako i wovatharɨtharɨŋa. Wovatharɨtharɨko iyako mane i mena e ghino, ko kaiwae i botewo lo utu.
43012049	Iyake emunjoru kaiwae budakaiya ya utuŋaŋgi ma i mena wombereghake elo renuwaŋa tɨne, ko iyemaeŋge Bwebwe, iye va i variyeŋgo, i dage e ghino budakaiya ya utuŋa na ŋgoroŋga ya utuŋa na yaŋa.
43012050	Ya ghareghare le utuutuke iyake i womena yawalɨ memeghabananiye. Iya kaiwae budakaiya ya utuŋa Bwebwe i dage e ghino na ya utuŋa.”
43013001	Vama mbaŋa regha eŋge kaero Thaga Valaŋani ghambaŋa Jisas vama i ghareghare kaero ghambaŋa i iteta yambaneke na i njoghawe Ramae. Vambe ghare weŋgi vara gharaghambu inanji e yambaneke, na vambe i gharethovuŋgi vara ghaghada ve mare.
43013002	Vama yeghɨyeghɨye Jisas na gharaghambu vama inanji e ghanɨŋga mborowa, na Seitan le renuwaŋa raitharɨ vama ina Judas Isakariyot e ghare, iye Saimon nariye, na ne i vatomwe Jisas.
43013003	Jisas va i ghareghare Ramae vama i giya vurɨgheghewe na i vakatha bigibigike wolaghɨye, na va i mena weya Loi na tembe ne i njoghaweva Loi.
43013004	Ghanɨŋga e tɨne Jisas i yondovirɨ e ghamba ghanɨŋgama, i liraŋgiya ghakwama ghayaboyabo na i ŋgara tauli e mborowae.
43013005	Amba i liŋgiya mbwa e gaeba na i thavwiya gharaghambuko gheghenji. I liya taulima e mborowaema na i vamowe.
43013006	Mbaŋa i mena weya Saimon Pita amba i dagewe iŋa, “Amalana, buda kaiwae u thavwiya ghegheŋguke?”
43013007	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “E mbaŋake iyake mamba u ghareghare budakaiya ya vakavakatha, ko mbaŋa i menamenako amba u ghareghare wagiyawe.”
43013008	Pita iŋa, “Ma valɨkaiwae, ma tene mbaŋa reghava u thavwiya ghegheŋguke.” Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Thoŋgo ma ya thavwiŋge, len ghamba yakuyaku ma ina e ghino.”
43013009	Amba Pita iŋa, “Amalana, thambe ghegheŋguke eŋge, ko nɨmanɨmaŋguke na umbalɨŋguke tembe ŋgoreiyeva.”
43013010	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Thela kaero me thithu mbema i thavwi eŋge gheghe kaiwae riwaeko laghɨye i thɨna. Ghemi kaero hu thɨna, ko iyemaeŋge ma taulaghɨna ghemi.”
43013011	Vama i ghareghare ghaliliva thela iya kaiwae va iŋa taulaghɨna ghemi ma hu thɨna.
43013012	Mbaŋa vama i thavwivao gheghenji, i njimbo ghakwamama ghayaboyabo na i njogha ve yaku ele ghamba yaku. I vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Thare nuwamina i manjamanjala budakaiya ma vakatha weŋga?”
43013013	“Mbaŋa hu utu e ghino hu una idaŋgu Ravavaghare na Giya, emunjoru ŋgoreiye, kaiwae ghino iyana.
43013014	Ghino, ghami Giya na lemi Ravavaghare, kaero ma thavwiya gheghemi, iya kaiwae ghemi tembe ŋgoreiyeva regha na regha tembe hu vethavwiva gheghemi.
43013015	Kaero ma vakatha ghamba thuwathuwa weŋga. Tembe hu vevakavakathava weŋga ŋgoreiya ma vakatha weŋga.
43013016	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ma rakakaiwo regha i laghɨye kivwala ghagiya, na ghevarivariye ma i laghɨye kivwala giyako iya me variyeko.
43013017	Mbaŋake iyake kaero hu ghareghareŋgiya bigibigike thiyake. Thoŋgo hu vakaiwoŋa ne hu vaidiya ghawarari.”
43013018	“Ma ya utuutu taulaghɨna ghemi kaiwami. Ya ghareghareŋga regha na regha iyava ya tuthiŋgana. Ko iyake i vaemunjoruŋa buk le utu, iya iŋake, ‘Thela i ghanɨvuŋgo ghaŋgu iye i ndeghereiye wanaŋgo!’ ”
43013019	“Ya utuŋa iyake weŋga e mbaŋake iyake amba muyai i yomara, mbala mbaŋa ne i yomara, ne hu loŋweghathɨ ghino mbema iya varana.
43013020	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thela thoŋgo i kulavatha the lolo ya variye, ŋgoreiye i kulavathaŋgo; na thela thoŋgo i kulavathaŋgo ŋgoreiya i kulavatha thela va i variyeŋgo.”
43013021	Mbaŋa Jisas i utuvao iyake, i vakatha ghare i vɨrɨ, iya kaiwae i uturaŋgiya iŋa, “Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ghemina regha ne i vatomweŋgo.”
43013022	Gharaghambu thɨ venjimbunjimbuŋgi, nuwanji i unouno thela utuniya i utuutuko.
43013023	Regha e tɨnenjiko, gharaghambuma iyava i gharethovuma va i yaku evasiwae.
43013024	Saimon Pita i tagayavunyiya marae na i ve na iŋa, “U vaito, thela utuniya i utuutuna.”
43013025	Gharaghambuko iyako i roghemba Jisas na i vaito iŋa, “Thela, Amalana?”
43013026	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Amalaghɨniye iya ne ya wogiya bredɨkewe mbaŋa ne ya woutu e gaebake.” Jisas i wouta bredɨma gethɨra e gaebama na i wogiyawa Judas Isakariyot, iye Saimon nariye.
43013027	Mbaŋa vara Judas i vilambo bredɨma Seitan i ru e ghare. Jisas i dagewe iŋa, “The renuwaŋa nuwaniya u vakatha, u yoruku na u vakatha.”
43013028	Ghauneko va inanji e ghanɨŋgako iyako rɨghe mava nuwanji i manjamanjala buda kaiwae Jisas va i dagewe ŋgoreiyako.
43013029	Kaiwae Judas va i njimbukikiya mani ghambae, vavana va lenji renuwaŋa thɨŋava Jisas i dagewe na ve bayama budakaiya nuwanjiya thagako iyako kaiwae, o i giya bigi regha weŋgiya mbinyembinyeŋgu.
43013030	Mbaŋa Judas i vilambo bredɨma, i raŋgi eto. Vama i gou.
43013031	Mbaŋa Judas vama i wa na e ghereiye, amba Jisas iŋa, “E mbaŋake iyake Loi i vatomwe weŋgiya gharɨgharɨ na thɨ thuwe Lolo Nariye le vwenyevwenye, na weya amalaghɨniye tembene thɨ thuweva Loi le vwenyevwenye.
43013032	Kaiwae Loi Nariye ne i vatomwe gharɨgharɨ na thɨ thuwe Loi le vwenyevwenye, Loi tembene ghamberegha i vavwenyevwenye Lolo Nariye, na ne i vamayaŋa iya le vakathako iyako.”
43013033	“Lo ŋgaŋga, ma mbaŋa ubotu eŋge weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi. Ne hu tamweŋgo; ko iyemaeŋge, ya dage e ghemi e mbaŋake iyake ŋgoreiya va ya dage weŋgiya Jiu lenji randeviva. Iya ghino ya wakewe ma valɨkaiwami hu menawe.”
43013034	“Iya kaiwae ya giya ghamimbaro togha e mbaŋake iyake: Hu vegharethovu e ghemi regha na regha. Ŋgoreiye ghino ya gharethovu e ghemi, ghemi hu vegharethovuva weŋga.
43013035	Thoŋgo hu vegharethovu weŋga regha na regha, gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye ne thɨ ghareghare ghemi woraghambu.”
43013036	Saimon Pita i vaito iŋa, “Amalana, aŋga u wa?” Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Mbaŋake ma valɨkaiwan ne u mbeleŋgo na u mena e valɨvaŋgako iya ne ya wakowe, ko iyemaeŋge mbaŋa muyai tene u mbeleŋgo.”
43013037	Pita i vaito iŋa, “Amalana, buda kaiwae ma valɨkaiwaŋgu ya mbeleŋge mbaŋake? Ne ya vatomweya yawaliŋgu kaiwan.”
43013038	Amba Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga na uŋa ne u vatomweya yawalina kaiwaŋgu? Ya dage emunjoru e ghen, amba muyai kamkam i dage, mbaŋato ne uŋa ma u ghareghareŋgo.”
43014001	Jisas i dage weŋgiya gharaghambu iŋa, “Tha hu gharelaghɨlaghɨ hu vareminja Loi na hu vareminjeŋgo.
43014002	Bwebwe ele ŋgolo tɨne woluwolu i ghanagha. Thoŋgo ma ŋgoreiye mbala ma ya utuŋa weŋga. Iya kaiwae ya wa gheko na va vivatharaweya lemi ghamba yaku.
43014003	Na kaiwae ya wa na va vivatharaweya lemi ghamba yaku, ne ya njoghama ya vaŋguŋga na weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi, the valɨvaŋga ne va yakuwe ghemi tembene vo hu yakuweva.
43014004	Hu ghareghare iya ghembako ya wareriŋako ghakamwathɨ.”
43014005	Tomas i dagewe iŋa, “Giyana, ma wo ghareghare aŋga u wa, na ŋgoroŋga ne woŋa na wo ghareghare kamwathɨna iya u reŋanawe?”
43014006	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ghino kamwathɨ, dage emunjoru na yawalɨ. Mane regha i mena weya Bwebwe thoŋgo ma i mena e ghino.
43014007	Thoŋgo mbema emunjoru hu ghareghareŋgo, ambane hu ghareghare Bwebwe. E mbaŋake iyake na i ghaoko kaero hu ghareghare na kaero hu thuwe.”
43014008	Pilip iŋa, “Giyana, u vatomwe Rama weime na mbala valɨkaiwame.”
43014009	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Mbaŋa molao ya yaku weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi, ko iyemaeŋge ambama u ghareghareŋgo, Pilip? Thela kaero i thuweŋgo kaero i thuwe Bwebwe. Buda kaiwae uŋa, ‘U vatomwe Rama weime’?
43014010	Ko mamba u loŋweghathɨ ghino inaŋgu weya Bwebwe na Bwebwe ina e ghino? Utuutuŋgike iya ya utuŋake e ghemi ma ghino ghalɨŋaŋgu, Bwebwe, iye ina i yaku e ghino, iya i vakatha kaiwoŋgike thiyake ghamberegha.
43014011	Hu loŋweghathɨgha iya yaŋake ghino inaŋgu weya Bwebwe na Bwebwe ina e ghino. Thoŋgo nandere, vakathaŋgiko ghamba rotaele ya vakathaŋgiko kaiwanji ma hu loŋweghathɨ eŋge.
43014012	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, thela thoŋgo i loŋweghathɨŋgo, ne i vakatha budakaiya ghino ya vakathaŋgi. Ŋgoreiye, na ne i vakathaŋgiya vakatha laghɨlaghɨye, ne i kivwalaŋgiya thiyake, kaiwae kaero ya wa na va yaku weya Bwebwe.
43014013	Na budakaiya ne hu naŋgo e idaŋgu ne ya vakatha mbala lo vakathako e tɨne i vakatha gharɨgharɨ thɨ thuwe Bwebwe iye ravwenyevwenye.
43014014	The bigithan ne hu naŋgo e idaŋgu ne ya vakatha ŋgoreiye.
43014015	“Thoŋgo hu gharethovu e ghino, hu ghambuŋgiya lo mbaro.
43014016	Na ne ya naŋgo weya Bwebwe na i wogiya ghami Rathalavu reghava na ne i yaku weŋga mbaŋathɨ mbaŋalaoke.
43014017	Iye Nyao na ne i woraŋgiya emunjoru moli weŋga Loi kaiwae. Gharɨgharɨ mane thɨ vaŋguvatha e yawalinjiko na ghanjirathalavu kaiwae ma thɨ thuwathuwawe na ma thɨ ghareghare. Ko ghemi hu ghareghare kaiwae i yaku weŋga na ina weŋga.
43014018	Mane ya iteteŋaŋga na ghemi ŋgoramiya ŋgama theghetheghe; tene ya njoghamava weŋga.
43014019	Mbaŋa ubotu yambaneke mane i thuweŋgo, ko ghemi tembene hu thuweŋgova, na kaiwae e yawayawaliŋgu ghemi tembe ŋgoreiye e yawayawalimi.
43014020	Ne e mbaŋako iyako hu ghareghare ghino inaŋgu weya Bwebwe na ghemi inami e ghino na ghino inaŋgu weŋga.
43014021	Thela thoŋgo i wovatha lo mbaro na i ghambuŋgi iye i gharethovuŋgo. Thela i gharethovuŋgo, Bwebwe ne i gharethovu, na ghino tembe ŋgoreiyeva ne ya gharethovu na womberegha ne ya vatomweŋgowe.”
43014022	Amba Judas (ma Judas Isakariyot ŋgoreiye) i dagewe iŋa, “Ko, Giyana, buda kaiwae mbene u vatomweŋge eŋge e ghime na yambaneke nandere?”
43014023	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Thoŋgo thela i gharethovuŋgo ne i ghambugha lo vavaghare. Bwebwe ne i gharethovu na ne wo menawe na wo yaku weime.
43014024	Thela ma i gharethovuŋgo mane i ghambu lo vavaghare. Utuutuŋgike iya hu loŋweŋgike ma ghalɨŋaŋgu, Bwebwe ghalɨŋae kaiwae amalaghɨniye i variyeŋgo.”
43014025	“Ya utuŋaŋgiya thiyake mbaŋa amba ghino weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi.
43014026	Ko ghami Rathalavu, Nyao Boboma, iye Bwebwe ne i variye ghino e idaŋgu, ne i vavaghareŋga bigibigike wolaghɨye na ne i vanuwovɨrɨŋga bigibigike wolaghɨye va ya utugiya weŋga.
43014027	Ya iteta gharemalɨlɨ weŋga, ghino wombereghake lo gharemalɨlɨ ya giya weŋga. Ma ya giya weŋga gharemalɨlɨ ŋgoreiya yambaneke le gharemalɨlɨ. Tha gharemi i laghɨlaghɨye na tha hu mararu.”
43014028	“Hu loŋwe yaŋa, ‘Kaero ya iteteŋga, ko tene ya njoghamava’. Thoŋgo hu gharethovuŋgo, valɨkaiwami hu warari kaiwae ya wa weya Bwebwe iye i laghɨye kivwalaŋgo.
43014029	Kaero ya dage weŋga e mbaŋake iyake amba muyai i yomara, mbala mbaŋa i yomara, ma hu loŋweghathɨ eŋge.
43014030	Mane ya utu weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi mbaŋa molao, kaiwae yambaneke gharambarombaro maiya i menamenake; ma valɨkaiwae ne i mbaroŋaŋgo.
43014031	Ko ya vakatha budakai Bwebwe i dage e ghino ya vakatha mbala yambaneke i ghareghare ya gharethovu weya Bwebwe.” “Hu rakayondo e mbaŋake iyake na ra rakawe.”
43015001	“Ghino umbwa waen emunjoru, na Bwebwe iye uma gharanjimbunjimbu.
43015002	I tenɨyathu yaŋgayaŋgae inanji e ghino thoŋgo ma thɨ rau, ko iyemaeŋge i tenɨvathavathaŋgiya yaŋgayaŋgaeko thiya rauko na i manjamanjala, mbala thɨ rau wagiyawe.
43015003	Ghemi kaero hu manjamanjala kaiwae lo utuko weŋga i vakathaŋga na hu thɨna.
43015004	Hu yaku e ghino na ghino ya yaku e ghemi. Umbwa Waen yaŋgae mane i rau mbe ghamberegha eŋge thoŋgo ma ina e umbwaniyeko. Ghemi tembe ŋgoreiyeva, mane hu rau na e uneunemi thoŋgo ma hu yaku e ghino.”
43015005	“Ghino vaen na ghemi yaŋgayaŋga. Thoŋgo thela i yaku e ghino na ghino ya yakuwe ne i rau laghɨye, kaiwae mane hu vakatha bigi regha thoŋgo ghino nandere.
43015006	Thela thoŋgo ma i yaku e ghino, iye ŋgoreiya yaŋgae, thɨ liyathu na i mareyawowo amba thɨ liyathu e ndɨghe une na i nda.
43015007	Thoŋgo hu yaku e ghino na lo utuke i yaku e ghemi, ambane hu naŋgo weya thebigiya nuwamiya ne hu vaidi.
43015008	Mbaŋa hu rau i laghɨye na hu woraŋgiyaŋga emunjoru ghemi woraghambu, ne thɨ tarawe Bwebwe e buruburu.”
43015009	“Ya gharethovuŋga ŋgoreiya Bwebwe i gharethovuŋgo. Mbaŋake wo hu yaku elo gharethovu tɨne.
43015010	Thoŋgo hu ghambu ghalɨŋaŋgu ne hu yaku elo gharethovu tɨne ŋgoreiya ghino ya ghambu Bwebwe ghalɨŋae na ya yaku ele gharethovu tɨne.
43015011	Kaero ya utuŋa bigibigike thiyake weŋga na mbala lo wararike i yaku e ghemi na lemi wararina i laghɨye moli.
43015012	Lo mbaro laghɨye iyake: Hu vegharethovu weŋga ŋgoreiya ghino ya gharethovuŋga.
43015013	Ma lolo regha le gharethovu le laghɨlaghɨye ŋgoreiye thoŋgo i vatomwe yawaliye ghaune kaiwanji.
43015014	Ghemi wouneŋgiya ghemi thoŋgo hu vakatha ŋgoreiya lo renuwaŋa.
43015015	Ma yaŋa lo rakakaiwo ghemi, kaiwae rakakaiwo ma i ghareghare ghagiyako le vakatha rɨghe. Ko iyemaeŋge yaŋa wouneŋgiya ghemi, kaiwae bigibigike wolaghɨye ya loŋwe weya Bwebwe, ya utugiyavao weŋga.
43015016	Ghemi mava hu tuthiŋgo, ko ghino eŋge va ya tuthiŋga, ghamikaiwo hu raka vohu rau, na unemiko i meghabana. Amba ne budakaiya hu naŋgo weya Bwebwe e idaŋgu ne Bwebwe i giya weŋga.
43015017	Lo mbaro e ghemi iyake: hu vegharethovu weŋga.”
43015018	“Mbaŋa yambaneke i botewoŋga, hu renuwaŋakiki, ghino va i botewokaiŋgo.
43015019	Thoŋgo emunjoru ghemi yambaneke gharɨgharɨniye, ne thɨ gharethovuŋga ŋgoreiya ghemi ghanjiune. Ko iyemaeŋge va ya ghatha raŋgiyaŋga e tɨnenji na kaero ma inami e tɨnenji, iya kaiwae yambaneke gharɨgharɨniye thɨ botewoyathuŋga.
43015020	Hu renuwaŋakikiya utuutuma va ya utugiyama e ghemi: ‘Ma rakakaiwo regha i kivwala giyako.’ Thoŋgo thɨ vakatha vuyowo e ghino, ghemi tembene ŋgoreiyeva ne thɨ vakatha vuyowo e ghemi. Thoŋgo va thɨ ghambu ghalɨŋaŋguke, tembene thɨ ghambuva ghalɨŋamina.
43015021	Ne thɨ vakatha ŋgoreiyako weŋga kaiwae hu ghambuŋgo na ma thɨ ghareghare loloko iyava i variyeŋgoko.
43015022	Thoŋgo mava ya mena na ya utu weŋgi mbala ma tharɨ ghawonjowe i monja riwanji, ko mbaŋake ma e lenji varɨvoru lenji tharɨ kaiwae.
43015023	Thela i botewoŋgo tembe ŋgoreiyeva i botewo Bwebwe.
43015024	Mbala ma tharɨ ghawonjowe i monja riwanji thoŋgo mava ya vakatha bigi regha e tɨnenjiko, iya mava mbaŋa regha lolo i vakatha weŋgi. Ko iyake othembe kaerova thɨ thuwe budakaiya va ya vakatha, ko iyemaeŋge thɨ botewoime weiŋgu Bwebwe.
43015025	Ko iyake i vaemunjoruŋa budakaiya va thɨ rori e lenji Mbaro tɨne iŋa, ‘Ma e lenji rɨghe na thɨ botewoŋgo.’ ”
43015026	“Ko mbaŋa ghami Rathalavu, iye Nyao Boboma, ne i njama weya Bwebwe, na i woraŋgiya emunjoruko moli Loi kaiwae, ghino ne ya variye e ghemi. Ne i njama weya Bwebwe na i utuŋa utuniŋgu.
43015027	Na ghemi tembe ŋgoreiyeva ne hu utuŋa utuutuniŋgu kaiwae vambe weŋguyaŋgi vara ghemi va i rikowe.”
43016001	“Ya utuŋa utuutuke thiyake weŋga mbala ma hu vathavwiya loŋweghathɨ ghakamwathɨ.
43016002	Ne thɨ vaŋgu raŋgiyaŋga e ŋgolo kururu tɨne, na mbaŋa maiya i menamenake, mbaŋa thoŋgo lolo regha ne i gaboŋga na le renuwaŋa iŋava i vakatha iyako na i thalavugha Loi.
43016003	Ne thɨ vakatha bigi ŋgoreiyako kaiwae amba ma thɨ ghareghare Bwebwe na tembe ŋgoreiyeva ghino.
43016004	Kaero ya utuŋa iyake weŋga mbala mbaŋa i mena ne hu renuwaŋakiki kaerova ya giya vanuwovɨrɨ weŋga. Mava ya utugiya weŋga ŋgorava ra menakowe kaiwae vamba weiŋguyaŋgiya ghemi.”
43016005	“Mbaŋake kaero ya wa weya thela va i variyeŋgo, ko iyemaeŋge ma regha e tɨnemina i vaitoŋgo na iŋa, ‘Aŋga u wa?’
43016006	Ko kaiwae kaero ya utuŋa thiyake weŋga nuwatharɨ kaero i riyevanjaraŋga.
43016007	Ko iyemaeŋge ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ghemi lemi thovuye kaiwae iya ya wake, kaiwae thoŋgo ma ya wa, Rathalavu mane i mena weŋga. Ko thoŋgo ya wa ambane ya variye weŋga.
43016008	Mbaŋa ne i mena ne i vaemunjoruŋa weŋgiya yambaneke gharɨgharɨniye, thiye lenji renuwaŋa tharɨ kaiwae ma i rumwaru, Loi le thovuye ŋgoreiye na ghambaŋa ne i ghatha weŋgi tembe ŋgoreiyeva.
43016009	Lenji renuwaŋa ma i rumwaru tharɨ kaiwae, kaiwae thɨ botewo thɨ woraweya lenji vareminje e ghino.
43016010	Lenji renuwaŋako ma i rumwaru budakaiya thovuye kaiwae mane tembe hu thuwathuwava e ghino.
43016011	Lenji renuwaŋa ma i rumwaru ghatha kaiwae, kaiwae Loi kaerova i wovatharɨtharɨŋa yambaneke gharambarombaro.”
43016012	“Lo renuwaŋa i ghanagha moli mbe iyake kaiwami, ko kaero i ghanagha moli na ma valɨkaiwami e mbaŋake iyake.
43016013	Ko mbaŋa Nyao emunjoruniye ne i mena, iye iya ne i woraŋgiya emunjoruko Loi kaiwae, ne i vakathaŋga na hu ghareghare emunjoruke wolaghɨye. Mane i utu mbe ghamberegha eŋge le renuwaŋa, ko ne i utuŋa eŋge budakaiya i loŋwe e ghino na budakaiya amba i menamenako.
43016014	Amalaghɨniye ne i woraŋgiya wo tarawa kaiwae ne i wo budakaiya ghino ya utuŋa na i utugiya weŋga.
43016015	Bwebwe le bigibigiko wolaghɨye ghino lo bigibigi, iyake kaiwae yaŋa ne i wo budakaiya ghinowe na i utuŋa weŋga.”
43016016	“Mbaŋa ubotu mane hu thuweŋgo na mbaŋa seiwova kaero hu thuweŋgova.”
43016017	Gharaghambu vavana thɨ vevaitoŋgi thɨŋa, “Ŋgoroŋga gharumwaru iya meŋake, ‘Mbaŋa ubotu mane hu thuweŋgo na mbaŋa seiwova kaero hu thuweŋgova,’ na mbowo meŋava, ‘Kaiwae kaero ya wa weya Bwebwe’?
43016018	Ŋgoroŋga ‘mbaŋa ubotu’ gharumwaru? Ma ra ghareghare ŋgoroŋga gharumwaru iya i utu na ŋgora iyako.”
43016019	Jisas kaero i ghareghare lenji renuwaŋako nuwanjiya thɨ vaito, iya kaiwae i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Mbwata lo utuutuko kaiwae iya hu vevaitoŋgana iya maŋake, ‘Mbaŋa ubotu mane hu thuweŋgo na mbaŋa ubotu seiwova kaero hu thuweŋgova’. Nuwamiya hu ghareghare ŋgoroŋga gharumwaru?
43016020	Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, ne hu randa na nuwami i tharɨ, ko yambaneke gharɨgharɨniye ne thɨ warari. Ne hu nuwatharɨ, ko lemi nuwatharɨna ne i vɨvɨna i woveŋga warari.
43016021	Mbaŋa ŋgama kaero i vwara ghatambwa, tɨnaeko nuwae i tharɨ kaiwae vɨrɨ ghambaŋa kaero i vuthawe; ko mbaŋa ŋgama i virɨ, i renuwaŋa valawe vɨrɨko iyako, na i warari kaiwae ŋgama kaero i virɨ e yambaneke.
43016022	Iyake ŋgoreiya ghemi, e mbaŋake iyake hu nuwatharɨ, ko tene ya thuweŋava na warari ne i riyevanjaraŋga. Warariko iyako ma tene lolo regha i woraŋgiyava weŋga.
43016023	Ne e mbaŋako iyako, ma tene hu naŋgova bigi regha e ghino. Ya dage emunjoru e ghemi, Bwebwe ne i woveŋga the bigiya ne hu naŋgowe e idaŋgu.
43016024	Ma vamba hu ndenaŋgo mun bigi regha e idaŋgu ghaghad vara mbaŋake iyake. Hu naŋgo na mbala hu vaidi, lemi wararina mbala ma i motomoto.”
43016025	Jisas mbowo iŋava, “Va ya utuŋaŋgiya bigibigike thiyake vambe ya goghaimba eŋge, ko mbaŋa i menamenako mane ya utu weŋga ŋgoreiyako, ko ne ya utu ŋgalauwa moli Bwebwe utuniye na hu loŋwe na hu ghareghare.
43016026	Ne e mbaŋako iyako hu naŋgo e idaŋgu. Ma yaŋa ghino ne ya naŋgo weya Bwebwe ghemi kaiwami,
43016027	nandere, Bwebwe ghamberegha i gharethovuŋga, kaiwae ghemi hu gharethovuŋgo na hu loŋweghathɨgha ghino ya mena weya Loi.
43016028	Va ya mena weya Bwebwe na ya njama e yambaneke; na e mbaŋake iyake ya iteta yambaneke na ya njogha weya Bwebwe.”
43016029	Amba Jisas gharaghambu thɨŋa, “E mbaŋake iyake len utuŋgina i manjamanjala weime kaiwae kaero ma u goghaimba.
43016030	Kaero wo thuwe u ghareghare bigibigike wolaghɨye, ma len renuwaŋa ŋgoreiye na lolo regha i giya vaito e ghen. Iyake i vakathaime na wo loŋweghathɨ mbema emunjoru u mena weya Loi.”
43016031	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Ko ambama hu loŋweghathɨ vara mbaŋake?
43016032	Mbaŋa maiya i menamenake na kaero ina gheke. E mbaŋako iyako taulaghɨna ghemi ne hu rakavo, tomethi e ghambaghambami na ne hu iteteŋgo womberegha moli. Ko iyemaeŋge ma womberegha kaiwae Bwebwe mbe iya weiŋguke.”
43016033	“Kaerova ya utuvao weŋga bigibigike thiyake utuninji mbala e ghino hu vaidiya gharemalɨlɨ. E yambaneke ne hu vaidiya vuyowo, ko hu vurɨgheghe eŋge. Kaerova ya kivwala yambaneke.”
43017001	Jisas i utuvao utuutuke thiyake na e ghereiye, marae i voro e buruburu na i naŋgo iŋa, “Bwebwe, mbaŋa kaero ina gheke. U wovavwenyevwenyeŋa Naru, mbala Naru i wovavwenyevwenyeŋaŋge.
43017002	Kaiwae u vatomwewe na i mbaroŋaŋgiya gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye na mbala i giya yawalɨ memeghabananiye weŋgiya thavala kaerova u vatomwewe.
43017003	Na yawalɨ memeghabananiye gharumwaru, thɨ ghareghareŋge ghanɨmberegha moli Loi emunjoru na Jisas Krais ghen va u variye.
43017004	Kaero ya wovavwenyevwenyeŋaŋge e yambane na ya vakathavao kaiwoma va u woveŋgo na ya kaiwoŋa.
43017005	E mbaŋake iyake Bwebwe, weiŋgu ghen ra yaku na u wovavwenyevwenyeŋaŋgo, ŋgoreiya va weiŋgu ghen ra yaku e vwenyevwenyena tɨne amba muyai yambaneke i yomara.”
43017006	“Kaerova ya woraŋgiyaŋge weŋgiya thavala va u vaŋguŋgi e yambaneke tɨne na u giya e ghino. Ghen len gharɨgharɨ na u giya e ghino. Thɨ ghambugha ghalɨŋana,
43017007	na mbaŋake thɨ ghareghare bigibigike wolaghɨye u giya e ghino i mena e ghen.
43017008	Kaiwae kaerova ya utuŋa weŋgi iya utuutuma va u utugiyama weŋgo na thɨ wovatha. Thɨ ghareghare mbema emunjoru ya mena e ghen na thɨ loŋweghathɨ ghen va u variyeŋgo.
43017009	Ma ya naŋgo yambaneke gharɨgharɨniye kaiwanji, ko iyemaeŋge thavala va u giya e ghino kaiwanji, kaiwae thiye len gharɨgharɨ.
43017010	Thavala inanji e ghino ghenɨwe, na thavala inanji e ghen ghinowe, na thiye weŋgi gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye ne thɨ thuwe lo vwenyevwenye.
43017011	E mbaŋake iyake kaero ne ya ghaona e ghen. Mane tembe ya yakuva e yambaneke, ko thiye mbowo ne thɨ yaku e yambaneke. O Bwebwe Boboma, idana le vurɨgheghe e tɨne u njimbukikiŋgi — idako iyako kaerova u giya e ghino — mbala thɨ tabo wabwi regha ŋgoreiya ghen na ghino, regha ghinda.
43017012	Mbaŋa vamba weiŋguyaŋgi idana vurɨghegheniye e tɨne ya njimbukikiŋgi, idana iyava u woveŋgona. Va ya njimbukikiŋgi na ma regha mun i ghawe, mbema regha eŋge vara vambe len renuwaŋa e tɨne na i vaidiya vuyowo na i vaemunjoruŋa buk le utu.”
43017013	“Ya ghaona e ghen vara mbaŋake iyake. Ko mbaŋa amba inaŋgu e yambaneke ya naŋgo ŋgoreiyako, na lo warari mbala i riyevanjara gharenji.
43017014	Kaero ya giya len utuna weŋgi na yambaneke i botewoŋgi, kaiwae thiye ma lenji renuwaŋa ŋgoreiya gharɨgharɨ e yambaneke lenji renuwaŋa, na ghino tembe ŋgoreiyeva.
43017015	Iya elo naŋgoke ma yaŋa u mbanɨ raŋgiyaŋgi e yambaneke, ko ya naŋgo eŋge e ghen na u njimbukikiŋgi weya tharɨ loloniye.
43017016	Thiye ma yambaneke gharɨgharɨniye, tembe ŋgoreiyeva ghino.
43017017	Ghalɨŋan i emunjoru! U vavaghare weŋgi ghalɨŋan mbala thɨ boboma emunjoru e ghen.
43017018	Ŋgoreiya va u variyeŋgo na ya mena e yambaneke, ya variyeŋgi na thɨ raŋgi e yambaneke.
43017019	Thiye kaiwanji ya ghatha raŋgiyaŋgo e ghen kaiwae nuwaŋguiya thiye tembe thɨ ghatha raŋgiyaŋgiva emunjoru e ghen.”
43017020	“Lo naŋgoke ma mbe thiye eŋge kaiwanji, mbe ya naŋgova thavala ne thɨ loŋweghathɨŋgo thiyeko lenji utuutuko kaiwae,
43017021	mbala thiya wabwi na regha, ŋgoreiya Bwebwe ghen inan e ghino na ghino inaŋgu e ghen. Thiye mbala inanji weinda, iya kaiwae yambaneke mbala i loŋweghathɨ ghen va u variyeŋgo.
43017022	Vwenyevwenyeke va u giyake e ghino, kaero va ya giya weŋgi mbala thiye thɨ tubwe na regha ŋgoreiye ghen na ghino.
43017023	Ghino naŋgu weŋgi na ghen inan e ghino, mbala thɨ tabona regha moli, mbala yambaneke i ghareghare va u variyeŋgo na u gharethovuŋgi ŋgoreiya u gharethovuŋgo.”
43017024	“Bwebwe, nuwaŋguiya thavala va u giya e ghino, weiŋguyaŋgi na ghino aŋga inaŋgu thiye inanjiwe, mbala thɨ thuwe lo vwenyevwenye. Vwenyevwenyeko iyako va u giya e ghino kaiwae u gharethovuŋgo amba muyai yambaneke i yomara.”
43017025	“Bwebwe, thovuye gharavakatha, othembe yambaneke ma i ghareghareŋge, ko ghino eŋge ya ghareghareŋge na thiyeke thɨ ghareghare va u variyeŋgo.
43017026	Ya vakathaŋgi na thɨ ghareghareŋge, na ne ya vakathambele mbaŋake wolaghɨye, iya kaiwae mbala thɨ vegharethovu weŋgi ŋgoreiya ghen u gharethovuŋgo, na mbala ghino ya yaku weŋgi.”
43018001	Mbaŋa Jisas i naŋgovao, i wareri weiyaŋgiya gharaghambu na thɨ rakalawa e gunugu idae Kidɨron. Valɨmbwa, olivɨ ghauma regha inawe, Jisas na gharaghambu thɨ ruwe.
43018002	Judas, iye Jisas ghaliliva, i ghareghare iya valɨvaŋgako iyako, kaiwae mbaŋa i ghanagha Jisas na gharaghambu va thɨ mevathavatha gheko.
43018003	Amba Judas i lawa e umako tɨne weiyaŋgiya Rom lenji ragagaithɨ na Ŋgolo Boboma gharagatɨgatɨ vavana. Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Parisi va thɨ variyeŋgi. Va thɨ bigiya tosi, lemp na gaithɨ bigibiginiye.
43018004	Jisas vama i ghareghare budakai ne i yomarawe, i raŋgi na i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Nuwamiya thela?”
43018005	Thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Jisas rara Nasaret.” Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Mbema iya ghinokeni.” Judas, amalaghɨniye ghalilivama va ina gheko i ndeghathɨ weiyaŋgi.
43018006	Mbaŋa Jisas i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Mbema iya ghinokeni,” thɨ ndendeŋa ghereinji na thɨ dobu.
43018007	Mbowo i vaitoŋgiva iŋa, “Nuwamiya thela?” Thɨŋa, “Jisas rara Nasaret.”
43018008	Jisas i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Kaero ma dage weŋga maŋa mbema iya ghinokeni. Thoŋgo hu tamweŋgo, hu viyathuŋgiya thiyake thɨ rakawa.”
43018009	Iyake i yomara na i vaemunjoruŋa amalaghɨniye ghalɨŋae, va iŋa, “Ma ya ndethɨvai mun regha iyava u giyake e ghino.”
43018010	Amba Saimon Pita, va ele gaithɨ ghaghalithɨ, i wo na i gothethe ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva le rakakaiwo yanawae, valɨvaŋga e uneko. Rakakaiwoko iyako idae Malkus.
43018011	Jisas i dage weya Pita iŋa, “U worawe len gaithɨna ghaghalithɨ e ghambae. U renuwaŋa ma valɨkaiwaŋgu ya muna vuyowoke ghembwa iya Bwebwe i giyake e ghino?”
43018012	Amba ragagaithɨko weinji lenji randeviva na Jiu lenji ragatɨgatɨko thɨ yalawe Jisas. Thɨ ŋgara nɨmanɨma
43018013	na thɨ vaŋgu vuthakai weya Anas, Kaiyapas ghendiyae. Kaiyapas iye ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva e theghatheghako iyako.
43018014	Kaiyapas iye iyava mbaŋa regha i dage weŋgiya Jiu lenji randeviva iŋa, “I thovuye eŋge thoŋgo lolo regha ghamberegha moli i mare gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye kaiwanji.”
43018015	Saimon Pita na gharaghambu reghava vambe thɨ rereghambawe vara Jisas. Kaiwae gharaghambuke iyake ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randevivako va i ghareghare, iya kaiwae va ve ru weiye Jisas e ghaghayayaoko tɨne,
43018016	ko iyemaeŋge Pita vambe i ndeghathɨ eto ŋgora ghamba ruko. Amba gharaghambuma iya me ruma i njogha, i dage weya wevoko i njimbukikiya ghamba ruko na i vaŋguruwo Pita.
43018017	Elaghɨniye iya i njimbukikiya ghamba ruko i vaito Pita iŋa, “Ma gharaghambu regha ghen, ae?” I gonjoghawe iŋa, “Nandere, ma ghino.”
43018018	Njighɨnjighɨ kaiwae rakakaiwoko na ragatɨgatɨko thɨ ndeghɨliŋa ndɨghe va thɨ rumbo na i raŋiŋila na thɨ mwa. Pita vambe i ndeghathɨva weiyaŋgi i mwamwa ndɨgheko.
43018019	Amba ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva i vaito Jisas, gharaghambu na le vavaghare kaiwanji.
43018020	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Mbaŋake wolaghɨye ya utu na gharɨgharɨke wolaghɨye thɨ loŋwevao. Ya vavaghare e ŋgolo kururu tɨnenji na e Ŋgolo Boboma ŋgora Jiu taulaghɨko lenji ghamba mevathavatha. Mava ya utu thuwele mun bigi regha.
43018021	Buda kaiwae u vaitoŋgo? U vaitoŋgi eŋge thiye va thɨ loŋwe lo utuke. Emunjoru thɨ ghareghare budakaiya va ya utuŋa.”
43018022	Mbaŋa Jisas i dage ŋgoreiyako, giyagiyako regha e ghadidiye i ŋge ghamwae e nɨmae. I dagewe iŋa, “Ravowovowo laghɨye ghalɨŋae ghaghethombe ŋgoreiyako?”
43018023	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Thoŋgo ya utuvatharɨ, u woraŋgiya taulaghɨke weŋgi budakai i tharɨ. Ko thoŋgo ma utuŋa emunjoru, buda kaiwae mo ŋgeŋgo?”
43018024	Amba Anas i variye weya Kaiyapas, ko iyemaeŋge ma vamba thɨ rakayathu nɨmanɨma ghathiyothiyo.
43018025	Mbaŋa Saimon Pita mbe i ndendeghathɨ na i mwamwa ndɨghe, kaero thɨ vaito thɨŋa, “Ma gharaghambu regha ghen, ae?” Ko Pita i ŋgiwethu, “Nandere, ma ghino.”
43018026	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye lenji randeviva le rakakaiwoko regha, iye le boda iya Pita me gothethe yanawaema, i dagewe iŋa, “Ma thuweŋge wein Jisas e umako tɨne, ŋgoreiye?”
43018027	Pita mbowo i rorova na iŋa ma i ghareghare, na e mbaŋako vara iyako kamkam i dage.
43018028	Amba Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ vaŋgwa Jisas Kaiyapas ele ŋgolo na thɨ yovaŋgu gawana ele ŋgolo, iye i mena Rom. E mbaŋako iyako vama ighɨviyavao, na kaiwae thiye Jiu va thɨ vaghaghaiŋa riwanji i mbighɨ ŋgoreiya lenji kururu ghambaro, mava thɨ ru e ŋgolo tɨne, kaiwae va nuwanjiya thɨ ghana Thaga Valaŋani ghanɨŋganiye.
43018029	Iya kaiwae Pailat i raŋgi weŋgi na i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Ne hu wonjowa amalake iyake e budakai?”
43018030	Thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Thoŋgo amalaghɨniye ma mbaro ghararaka, mbala ma mo vaŋgumena e ghen.”
43018031	Pailat iŋa, “Ko ghemi tembe ghamimberegha hu vakotɨŋa ŋgoreiya lemi mbarona le woraŋgiya.” Thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Ma mbaro i vatomwe weime na valɨkaiwame wo unɨgha lolo.”
43018032	Iyake i vaemunjoruŋa Jisas ghamberegha ghalɨŋae, va i woraŋgiya ŋgoroŋgavole i mare na iŋa.
43018033	Pailat i njogha e ŋgoloko tɨne amba iŋa na thɨ vaŋgumena Jisas na i dagewe iŋa, “Ghen Jiu lenji kiŋ?”
43018034	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Renuwaŋana iyena mbe ghanɨmberegha len renuwaŋa o gharɨgharɨ vavana methɨ utugiya utuutuniŋgu e ghen?”
43018035	Pailat i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Uŋa eŋge Jiu regha ghino? Mbe ghen ghamban gharɨgharɨniye na ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye methɨ vaŋgugiyaŋge e ghino. Va u vakatha budakai?”
43018036	Jisas iŋa, “Ghino ma ŋgoraŋguŋgiya kiŋ thɨ mbarombaro e yambaneke. Thoŋgo ŋgoraŋguŋgiya kiŋɨko thiyako, mbala woraghambuko thɨ gaithɨ kaiwaŋgu na thava thɨ vaŋgugiyaŋgo weŋgiya Jiu lenji randeviva. Ko lo ghamba mbaro ma ŋgora kiŋɨko thiyako.”
43018037	Pailat iŋa, “Ko mbema emunjoru ghen kiŋ?” Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Uŋa kiŋ ghino. Iyake kaiwae va ya virɨ, na iyake kaiwae tembe ya menava e yambaneke na ya utuŋa emunjoru utuniye. Thela ina emunjoru ele valɨvaŋga, i vandeŋe ghalɨŋaŋguke.”
43018038	Pailat i vaito iŋa, “Budakai emunjoru?” Iyake e ghereiye mbowo i njoghava eto weŋgiya Jiu na iŋa, “Ma ya ndevaidi mun rɨghethoru valɨkaiwae ne yaŋa na i mare.
43018039	Ko ghamithanavu me menakowe, Thaga Valaŋani ghambaŋa regha na regha ya vaŋguraŋgiya rayakuyaku regha iya e thiyo kaiwami. Nuwamiya ya vaŋguraŋgiya Jiu lenji kiŋ kaiwami?”
43018040	Thɨ kula njoghawe thɨŋa, “Nandere, thava amalaghɨniye! Nuwameiya Barabas.” Barabas iye va lolo raitharɨ moli, iye rakaivɨ.
43019001	Amba Pailat i vaŋguruwo Jisas na iŋa na thɨ yabɨbɨ.
43019002	Ragagaithɨ thɨ vona umbwa ele kinkin yaŋgae na thɨ thɨnɨrawe e umbaliye, amba thɨ liya kwama sosoro, ko mara eŋge i bwedi, na thɨ vanjimbowe,
43019003	thɨ mena evasiwae thɨ dagewe thɨŋa, “O Jiu lenji Kiŋ, len mbaro ne i meghabana!” Na thɨ wa na vethɨ lavalavaŋa.
43019004	Pailat mbowo i raŋgiva mbaŋara na i dage weŋgiya Jiu iŋa, “Wo hu thuwe, ne yaŋa na thɨ vaŋguraŋgiya kaiwami na ya vaghareŋga, ma ya ndevaidi mun le tharɨ na valɨkaiwae yaŋa na i mare.”
43019005	Amba Jisas i raŋgi, weiye umbaliyema ghagumogumo na ghakwamama methɨ vanjimbomawe, na Pailat i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Wo hu thuwe! Loloma maiya!”
43019006	Mbaŋa ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye na Ŋgolo Boboma gharagatɨgatɨ thɨ thuwe, thɨ kula thɨŋa, “U rokros! U rokros!” Ko Pailat i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Hu mena hu vaŋgu na hu rokros. Ma ya ndevaidi mun le tharɨ na valɨkaiwae yaŋa na i mare.”
43019007	Taulaghɨko thɨ kula njoghawe thɨŋa, “E lama mbaro na mbaroko iyako i dage ŋgoreiye — valɨkaiwae moliya i mare, kaiwae iŋava iye Loi Nariye.”
43019008	Mbaŋa Pailat i loŋwe iyake, i vakatha na ma i mararu eŋge laghɨye thoŋgo iŋa na Jisas i mare.
43019009	I njogha ele ŋgolo tɨne na i vaito Jisas iŋa, “Aŋga u mena?” Ko iyemaeŋge Jisas ma i gonjoghawe.
43019010	Pailat i dagewe iŋa “U botewo u thombeya ghalɨŋaŋguke? U ghareghare ghino ya mbaro. Valɨkaiwaŋgu yaŋa na ya rakayathuŋge na yaŋa na thɨ rokrosɨŋge.”
43019011	Jisas i gonjoghawe iŋa, “Ma mbala u mbaroŋaŋgo thoŋgo mava vatomwe i mena e ghen e buruburu; iya kaiwae thela i vaŋguŋgo na i vaŋgugiyaŋgo e ghen iye me vakatha tharɨ laghɨye moli.”
43019012	Mbaŋa Pailat i loŋwe iyako, i mando na i tamweya kamwathɨ na i rakayathu Jisas, ko Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ kula vurɨgheghewe thɨŋa, “Thoŋgo u rakayathu, ma Sisa gheu ghen! Thela iŋa iye kiŋ i ndeghereiyewana Sisa.”
43019013	Mbaŋa Pailat i loŋwe utuutuko iyako, i vaŋguraŋgiya Jisas eto amba Pailat i yaku e kot gharavakatha e lenji ghamba yaku. Va ina e valɨvaŋga idae Varɨ Vwata (vaŋa Hibru thɨŋa “Gabatha.”)
43019014	Mbala vama i wo ghararaghɨye mboro, mbaŋaniye vivatha ghambaŋa Thaga Valaŋani kaiwae. Pailat i dage weŋgiya gharɨgharɨko iŋa, “Wo hu thuwe! Lemi kiŋɨke!”
43019015	Thɨ kula njoghawe thɨŋa, “U tagavamare! U tagavamare! U rokros!” Pailat i vaitoŋgi iŋa, “Nuwamiya ya rokros lemi kiŋɨke?” Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye thɨ gonjoghawe thɨŋa, “Lama kiŋ mbe reghaeŋge, Sisa.”
43019016	Amba Pailat i vaŋgugiya Jisas weŋgiya Rom lenji ragagaithɨ na thɨ rokros. Ragagaithɨko thɨ yovaŋguya Jisas.
43019017	Thɨ raŋgi weinji na tembe ghamberegha i wo ghakros na thɨ mena e valɨvaŋga idae “Boutouto Ghambae” (Vaŋa Hibru thɨŋa “Golgota”).
43019018	Thɨ rokros gheko weiyaŋgiya gharɨgharɨ theghewo, regha valɨvaŋga e uneko na regha valɨvaŋga e moiyeko na Jisas ina yamoe.
43019019	Pailat iŋa na thɨ roriya nono na thɨ lirawe e krosɨko, iŋa ŋgora iyake, Jisas rara Nasaret, Jiu lenji Kiŋ.
43019020	Gharɨgharɨ lemoyo va thɨ vaona, kaiwae ghembako iyava thɨ rokrosɨkowe ma i bwagabwagawe Jerusalem, na va thɨ roriŋgi e ghalɨghalɨŋa thegheto, Hibru, Laten na Grik.
43019021	Ravowovowo laghɨlaghɨye thɨ dage weya Pailat thɨŋa, “Thambala mo roriva ‘Jiu lenji Kiŋ’ ko mbala moŋa eŋge, ‘Amalake iyake iŋava amalaghɨniye Jiu lenji Kiŋ.’ ”
43019022	Pailat i gonjogha weŋgi iŋa, “Budakaiya ma rori, kaero ma rori.”
43019023	Mbaŋa ragagaithɨ vama thɨ rokros Jisas, thɨ mbana ghakwamako na thɨ bigirawe na wabwivarɨ. Regha iya i mbana le wabwi. Ghakwama maya, riwaeko vasiwae vambe thɨ liva, vambe thɨ naŋge eŋge e yaŋgara.
43019024	Iya kaiwae ragagaithɨko thɨ vedage weŋgi thɨŋa, “Thava ra mwanathethe; ra mwadiwo eŋge mwadiwo regha na thela i viva i li.” Iyake va i yomara na i vaemunjoruŋa Buk le utu iya iŋake, “Thɨve giya weŋgiya wokwama na thɨ mwadiwoŋa mwadiwo regha weya wokwama maya riwaŋgu ghayabo.” Ragagaithɨko va thɨ vakatha iyako.
43019025	Va thɨ ndeghathɨ Jisas e ghakros ghadidiye, tɨnae Meri na ghaghae, Meri Klopas levo na Meri tɨnan Magadala.
43019026	Mbaŋa Jisas i thuwe tɨnae na gharaghambuma va i gharethovuma laghɨye i ndeghathɨ e vasiwae, kaero i dage weya tɨnae iŋa, “Elana, narunɨna.”
43019027	Amba i dage weya gharaghambuko iŋa, “Tɨna iyana.” E mbaŋako iyako gharaghambuko i vaŋgu na ve yaku weiye ele ŋgolo.
43019028	Jisas i ghareghare e mbaŋako iyako, bigibigiko wolaghɨye vama i vakathavaoŋgi. Na i vaemunjoruŋa Buk Boboma le utuutu iwaeŋge iŋa, “Mbwa i gharɨŋgo.”
43019029	Variye ina gheko, waen monyomonyo i riyevanjara, na thɨ liuta vunewe, thɨ liraweya vuneko e umbwa idae hisop yaŋgae, thɨ livairɨ na thɨ lirawe e ghae.
43019030	Mbaŋa Jisas i linjena waenɨko iŋa, “Kaero i ko!” Amba i wovakururuya umbaliye na i vatomwe na i mare.
43019031	Amba Jiu lenji randeviva thɨ naŋgo weya Pailat thɨŋa, “U vatomwe weŋgi na thɨ bebeya amaamalako thɨ kwatekwate e krosɨko gheghenji na thɨ biginjaniya riwanjiko.” Iyako Pɨraide, mbaŋa ghamba vivatha Jiu ghanjimbaŋa laghɨye Sabat kaiwae, na ma nuwanjiya riwaŋgiko thɨ yaku e krosɨko e ghanjimbaŋa kururuko. Iyako ghanjimbaŋa laghɨye regha.
43019032	Iya kaiwae ragagaithɨko thɨ raka na thɨ bebeya amalama va i ghenevivama gheghe na reghamava iyava thɨ rokrosɨŋgima weinji Jisas.
43019033	Ko mbaŋa thɨ menawe Jisas thɨ thuwe vama yawaliye iko, iya kaiwae ma thɨ beba gheghe.
43019034	Ko iyemaeŋge ragagaithɨko regha i vwowota Jisas njawanjawae ele kin na mbaŋara madibe na mbwa thɨ voruraŋgi.
43019035	Loloko iyava i thuweko, kaerova i utuŋa na le utuko utu emunjoru. I ghareghare i utuŋa utu emunjoru na ghemi mbala hu loŋweghathɨ.
43019036	Thiyake va thɨ yomara na thɨ vaemunjoruŋa Buk le utu iŋa: “Mane thɨ ndetagabebe mun wokiniye.”
43019037	Na buk regha mbowo iŋava: “Gharɨgharɨ ne thɨ thuweya loloko iyava thɨ vwowota riwaeko.”
43019038	Iyake e ghereiye, Josep rara Arɨmathiya, i wa weya Pailat na ve naŋgo Jisas riwaekowe. Josep iye Jisas gharaghambu regha ko va i rothuwethuwele kaiwae va i mararuŋgiya Jiu lenji randeviva. Pailat i vatomwewe na i wo Jisas riwae.
43019039	Nikodimos, iye va gougou regha i mena weya Jisas, iye va weiye Josep. Va i thɨna bigibigi butinji thovuye vwarara le vuyovuyowo mbala vama i wo 30 kilo. Bigibigi butinji thovuye idanji mer na alous.
43019040	Theghewoko thɨ wo Jisas riwae na thɨ ghavo e kwama kakaleva weiye bigibigiko butiye thovuye va thɨ liŋgi e riwae na thɨ ghavo. Iyako Jiu lenji kamwathɨ thɨ vakatha weya lolo riwae amba muyai vethɨ wobeku.
43019041	Uma regha ina ŋgorava thɨ rokros Jisas, na e umaumako iyako tɨne ghabubu togha regha inawe ma vamba thɨ ndewobeku mun lolo riwae reghawe.
43019042	Kaiwae Jiu ghanjimbaŋa vivatha na ghabubuko va ina evasiwanji, thɨ woraweya Jisas riwae gheko.
43020001	Va Sande mbaŋambaŋa moli, ma vambe ighɨviya na thovuye, Meri tɨnan Magadala i wa e ghabubu na i vaidiya varɨma va thɨ tagagana ghabubuko ghaemawe vama thɨ wovakatha.
43020002	I rukunjogha weŋgiya Saimon Pita na Jisas gharaghambuma regha iyava i gharethovuma na i dage weŋgi iŋa, “Kaero methɨ wo Jisas riwaema e ghabubuko, na ma wo ghareghare aŋga ina methɨ worawe!”
43020003	Amba Pita na gharaghambuma regha thɨ wa e ghabubuko.
